page.title: Siokālafi ʻo Tonga
page.text:
[[Image:Tonga 2.gif|left|thumb|454px|Tonga (mo e tafafonua (lanupulū) ʻo e konisitūtone ʻuluaki)]] [[Image:Flag of Tonga.svg|thumb|right|100px|Ko e fuka ʻo Tonga]] Ko e '''siokālafi ʻo e puleʻanga fakatuʻi ʻo Tonga''' ==Feituʻu== ʻI [[ʻOseania]] pe [[Pasifiki]], tafaʻaki tongahihifo; ki he tongahihifo ʻo [[Haʻamoa]], ki he hihifo ʻo [[Niuē]], ki he tongahahake ʻo [[ʻUvea]] mo [[Futuna]], ki he hahake ʻo [[Fisi]]. Mei he ngaahi kāungafonua mamaʻo ange: ki he tokelau ʻo [[ʻAnetātika]], ki he tonga ʻo [[Hauaiʻi]], ki he tokelauhahake ʻo [[Nuʻusila]]. ===Kolomuʻa=== Ko [[Nukuʻalofa]] ʻi he motu lahi taha (km² ʻe 257) ko Tongatapu.
==Vahevahe== ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi motu ʻe 169, ʻoku nofo kakai ʻi he 36. ʻOku nau vahevaheʻ ʻi he ngaahi pupunga ʻe fā, ʻi he laine mei he tonga ki he tokelau: *[[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu, ʻEua]] *[[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] *[[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] *[[:Category:Ongo Niua|Ongo Niua]]
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ongo faʻahinga: *fonua: tō mei he langi ʻi he ngaahi tukufakaholo Tonga; ko e ngaahi ʻotu motu tupu mei he moʻunga vela. *motu: maʻu ʻi he toutai ʻo [[Maui]] mei he kilisitahi ʻi he ngaahi tukufakaholo Tonga; ko e ngaahi ʻotu motu tupu mei he feo, naʻe teke ki ʻolunga ʻe māmani, pea naʻe ʻufiʻufi ʻa e liku ʻe he efuefu fakamoʻungaafi.
==Mafana== Ko hono mafana lahi taha ʻi he faʻahitaʻu mafana (Tisema — ʻĒpeleli) ko e 32 °C; ko e 27° C ʻi he faʻahitaʻu momoko (Mē — Novema). ʻOku tupu ʻa hono mafana mei he 23 °C ki he 27 °C pea ʻa hono ʻuha mei he milimita ʻe 1700 ʻi he taʻu ki he milimita ʻe 2970, kapau te ke folau mei he motu tonga ki he motu tokelau. Hauhau ʻo e ʻea: ʻavalisi 80%.
==Hono lahi== *potufonua: km² ʻe 30 *potutahi: km² ʻe 718 *kotoa: km² ʻe 748 *loloa ʻo e matāfonua: km ʻe 419 *feituʻu maʻolunga taha: [[Kao]], mita ʻe 1046
==Tataku== *World Factbook {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°|175°}} [[Category:Siokālafi ʻo Tonga|Tonga]] {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Motuʻalea fakatonga
page.category: Lea fakatonga
page.text:
Ko e '''motuʻalea fakatonga''' Ko e ngaahi mataʻitohi fakatonga # a # e # f # h # i # k # l # m # n # ng, ([[IPA]]: ''ŋ'') ''g'' ʻi mui he 1943 # o # p, ''b'' ʻi mui he 1943 # s, ʻoku faʻa ʻene tohi: ''j'' ʻi mui he 1943 # t # u # v # ʻ, fakauʻa ==Hisitōlia== Ko e sipela fakaonoʻaho ngāueʻaki ʻe he kau Polataʻane, ʻa ia ko e ʻeikivaka [[Semisi Kuki]] mo e hā fua, ʻi muʻa ʻa e aʻu ki Tonga ʻo e kau faifekau mei muli. (Manatuʻi, ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e teautaʻu hono 20, naʻe puʻaki ko e '''s''' ki he '''j''' pe '''ch''' ([[lea fakapilitānia]]).)
Fakatātā (meia [[Tokiukamea]])
ChenitacalaSinaitakala
Finow OoloocalalaFīnau ʻUlukālala
oë-óëfooahoihoifua
jiennasiana
toogoo-y-betuku ai pē
iky-obitoʻikai ʻaupito
gnedji nioongeʻesi niu
Vakai foki ki he [[tau fakaniua]] maʻa e taʻanga ʻi he lea onoʻaho. *J. Martin; Tonga islands, William Mariner's account; 1817 {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Lea fakatonga]]

page.title: Tohi Fatuʻanga-Lea
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text: '''Tohi Fatuʻanga-Lea''' ʻoku fokotuʻu heni ʻi he ''[[Palanite Tonga]]'' ke pulusi ai ʻa e ngaahi fatutohi ʻi he lea fakatonga. ʻOku fakataumuʻa ʻa e Tohi Fatuʻanga-Lea ko ʻeni ke tokoni ki hono pukepuke mo fakatupulekina ʻetau lea tuʻufonua. {{potuʻi}} *http://www.planet-tonga.com/language_journal/ [[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Tonga
page.category: Fakapuleʻanga
page.text:
__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ {{Infobox Tonga}} Ko '''Tongá''' pe ko e 'Pule'anga Fakatu'i 'O Tongá' ko ha 'otu motu 'oku tu'u 'i he Moana Pasifiki Tonga 'a ia 'oku kātoi ai ha motu 'e 176 vahevahe 'ʻi ha konga tahi ko hono 'ēlia ko e kilomita tapafā 'e 700,000 'i he Moana Pasifiki Tonga. Ko e motu fakakātoa 'e 52 'oku lolotonga nofo'i.
'Oku 'iloa 'a Tonga ko e '''ʻOtu Motu Angaʻofa''' koeʻuhi ko e anga'ofa 'a e kakai Tonga ki he kaivai Pilitānia ko Kapiteni [[Semisi Kuki]] lolotonga 'ene 'a'ahi ki Tongá ni, kā 'i he lau ʻa [[Tokiukamea]] (William Mariner), naʻe feinga e kau houʻeiki ke fakapoongi ʻa Kuki ka naʻe ʻikai ke nau lototaha ki ha fokotuʻutuʻu.
'Oku toe 'iloa 'a Tongá ni koe'uhi ko e fonua pē ia he Pasifiki kuo te'eki ai ke hoko ko ha kolonia ki ha toe fonua kehe.
== Hisitōlia == 'Oku pehē na'e 'i ai falukunga kakai lea faka-ʻOsitolinisia 'oku nau kau ki he 'Lapita Cultural Complex' naʻa nau a'u 'o nofo'i 'a Tongá ni fakafuofua ki he 1500-1000 KM. 'Oku kei hoko hono fakatotolo'i 'a e ta'u totonu na'e fuofua nofo'i ai 'a Tongá ni. 'Oku 'ikai ke fu'u lahi 'a e 'ilo ki he anga 'o e nofo 'o e kakai Tonga 'i 'ono'ahó koe'uhi ko e 'ikai 'i ai ha fa'ahinga founga tohi 'a e kakai Tongá ke lekooti ai e hisitōlia 'a e fonua. Ko e lahi taha 'o e me'a 'oku tau 'ilo he taimí ni ko e ngaahi talanoa tukufakaholo pē ia na'e lava ke tau fanongo 'o 'ilo ai e hisitōlia 'o e fonua. Ko e fuofua fetaulaki 'a e kakai Tongá mo e kakai papālangi na'e hoko ia 'i ha 'a'ahi mai 'a e vaka mei Tenima'ake ko e '''Eendracht''' 'i he ta'u 1616.
ʻI he aʻu ko ē ki he senituli 12, na'e 'iloa e Tu'i Tonga he loto Pasifiki- mei [[Niuē]], [[Haʻamoa]], vahe hahake ʻo [[Fisi]], [[Lotuma]], [[ʻUvea]] mo [[Futuna]], Niu Kaletōnia ki [[Tikopia]]; ʻo talanoa ai e kau fakatotolo 'e ni'ihi ki ha 'Emipaea Tonga. 'I he teautaʻu 15 ki he 17, na'e lahi hake ai e ngaahi tau fakalotofonua 'i he fonua. Ko e vaha'a taimi 'eni na'e lahi ai e 'a'ahi 'a e kau papālangi ʻo kamata meí he ongo folau mei [[Holani]] ko [[William Schouten]] mo [[Jacob Le Maire]] (naʻá na 'a'ahi ki [[Niuatoputapu]]) he 1616, [[Abel Jaszoon Tasman]] 'i he 1643 (na'á ne 'a'ahi ki Tongatapu mo Haʻapai). Na'e toki hoko ki ai ha kau kaivai 'iloa mei [[ʻEulope]] 'o hangē ko Kapiteni Semisi Kuki (tautahi ʻa [[Pilitānia]]) he ta'u 1773, 1774 mo e 1777; Alessandro Malaspina (tautahi 'a [[Sepeni]]) he ta'u 1793; fuofua ha'u 'a e kakai fakamafola lotu mei Lonitoni he ta'u 1797, pea mo e tangata fakamafola lotu mei he Siasi Metotisi Faka-Uēsiliana ko Rev. Walter Lawry ʻi he taʻu 1822.1826 hake mai ai misinale ko misa Tomasi 'i Hihifo mo hono kaunga fononga ko hutchinson.
ʻI he taʻu 1845 na'e hanga 'e he tangata loto feinga mo tufunga lea ko Tāufa'āhau 'o fakataha'i 'a Tonga ki ha pule'anga 'e taha. Na'e 'uluaki fakanofo ia ki he huafa 'o e Tuʻi Kanokupolú ka na'e papitaiso ia 'i he hingoa ko e '''Jiaoji'''(George) 'i he ta'u 1831. 'I he ta'u 1875, 'i he tokoni ʻo [[Shirley Waldemar Baker|Misi Peka]], na'á ne fakahā'i 'a Tonga ko e pule'anga fakatu'i, fakatau'atāina'i e kau hopoate, tauhi fakatoputapu e lao pea mo hono fakangatangata e mafai 'a e kau hou'eiki.
Na'e hoko a Tongá ni ko ha Pule'anga Malu'i 'o Pilitānia 'i ha Talite ke lelei ange 'a e vā 'o e ongo fonua 'i he 'aho 18 'o Mē, 1900, koe'uhi ko e feinga 'e he kau papālangi 'o e kuonga ko ia ke 'auhi 'a e tu'i hono ua 'o e fonua. Na'e hoko 'a Tonga ko e fonua taha pē 'i he Pasifiki kuo te'eki ai ke li'aki hono Pule'anga Fakatu'i. 'Oku hokohoko ta'emotu 'a e laine 'o e ngaahi tu'i 'o Tonga mei ha fāmili pē 'e taha. 'I he 1918, na'e mafola ai ha mahaki tō ko e kalasi pē 'e taha ʻo e fulū, pea iku 'o mole ai e mo'ui 'a e toko 1,800 'a ia ko e 8% 'o e kakai 'i he taimi ko ia.
Na'e tuku e tu'unga 'o Tonga ko e pule'anga malu'i 'o Pilitānia 'i he ta'u 1970 makatu'unga mei he fokotu'utu'u 'a Kuini [[Sālote Tupou III]] kimu'a peá ne hala 'i he ta'u 1965. Na'e kau 'a Tonga ki he Kominiueli 'o e Ngaahi Fonua 'i he ta'u 1970.
== Puleʻanga == Ko e tuʻi ([[Siaosi Tupou V]]) mo ʻene [[fakataha tokoni]] mo e kapineti mo e falealea mo e ngaahi maau tauʻatāina. Naʻe kamata mei he [[konisitūtone]] ʻo 1875.
== Kakai ʻo e fonua == ʻOku ʻi ai ha kakai ʻe taha kilu tupu. [[File:Tonga demography.png|left|thumb|300px|Ko e lahi ʻo e kakai ʻi Tonga 1963 — 2001. (lauʻi tahaafe)]]
* Tokolahi ʻo e kakai ʻi 30 Nōvema 1996: 97784 * Tokolahi ʻo e kakai ʻi 30 Nōvema 2006: 101991 (+0.4% he taʻu); tangata ʻe 51772, fafine ʻe 50219 http://tonga-broadcasting.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=845&Itemid=1
== Siokālafi == 'Oku tu'u 'a e 'otu motu Tonga 'i he faha'i faka-tonga 'o Ha'amoa pea 'i he vahe ua 'e tolu 'a e lōloa mei Nu'u Sila ki Hauai'i. 'Oku vahevahe 'a e 'otu motu Tonga ki he vahe 'e fā ko: Tongatapu, Ha'apai, Vava'u pea mo e ongo Niua. 'Oku 'i Tongatapu 'a e kolomu'a ko Nuku'alofa. 'Oku fa'ahinga 'e ua 'a e 'ū motu 'i Tonga 'a ia ko e motu fa'u 'e he feo pea mo e motu fa'u he mo'ungaafi. Ko e motuʻa feituʻu ʻi [[māmani]] ʻi he [[longitute]] ʻe 173° aʻu ki he 177° hihifo pea mo e [[latitute]] ʻe 15° aʻu ki he 23° tonga. He taimí ni ʻoku tānaki ko e [[Ongo Teleki]]. Vakai ki he [[:Category:Siokālafi ʻo Tonga|Siokālafi ʻo Tonga]].
[[Category:Fakapuleʻanga]]

page.title: Lea fakahaʻamoa
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
Ko e '''motuʻalea''' fakahaʻamoa (Sāmoa)
* [[A]]a * [[E]]e * [[F]]f * [[G]]g; ko hono puʻaki: [[Ŋ]]ŋ (nga); ʻi he lea onopooni ʻoku ne hoko ki he '''Nn''' * [[I]]i * [[L]]l; ʻoku tuha mo e '''L''' fakatonga pea mo e '''R''' fakapolinisiamuʻa (naʻe pulia ʻi Tonga) * [[M]]m * [[N]]n * [[O]]o * [[P]]p * [[S]]s; ʻoku faʻa tuha mo e '''H''' fakatonga * [[T]]t; ʻi he lea onopooni ʻoku ne hoko ki he '''Kk'''; ʻoku tuha mo e '''T''' pea mo e '''S''' fakatonga. * [[V]]v * [[U]]u * [[ʻ]]; ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻi Haʻamoa, kā meimei ʻikai ʻaupito ʻene tohi; ʻoku faʻa tuha mo e '''K''' fakatonga. Ko e fakauʻa fakatonga ʻoku pulia ʻi he lea fakahaʻamoa.
Fakatātā: * Haʻamoa → Sāmoa (pulia fakauʻa, a+a → ā, h → s) * maama, tō, ua → malama, tolo, lua * sī, sia, siale, Sinaitakala → tī, tia, tiale, Tinaita'ala (s → t) * hina, heu, hihifo → sina, seu, sisifo (h → s) * fefine, fiefia → fafine, fiafia (e → a) * kie kula, puaka, kupu → ʻie ʻula, pua'a, 'upu (k → ʻ) {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Founga fili fakafofonga fakanuʻusila
page.category: Fakapuleʻanga
page.text:
ʻOku fakataʻu tolu ʻa e Fili Fale Alea ʻa Nuʻusilá ke filiʻi ha kau Fale Alea mo ha Puleʻanga foʻou. ʻOku hanga ʻe he founga fili MMP ʻo ʻoange ha faingamālie pāloti ʻe ua maʻa e taha filí. Ko e taha te ke fili ai maʻa e faʻahi fakapolitikale ʻokú ke loto ke puleʻangá pea ko hono uá ko hoʻo fili pe pāloti maʻa e toko taha ʻokú ke loto ke Fakafofonga Fale Alea mei homou Vāhenga filí (electorate). Ko e tuʻasila ho nofoʻangá te ne fakapapauʻi ʻa e feitu'u Vāhenga fili te ke kau ki aí.
ʻOku ʻi ai ha vāhenga fili lahi pea mo ha vāhenga fili Mauli. ʻOku ʻi ai ha lisi ʻo e kau filí he vāhenga fili kotoa pē. Kapau ʻokú ke taʻu 18 pe lahi ange ai pea ngofua ke ke fili, pea ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he laó kuo pau ke ke lēsisita ke ke kau he filí.
Kapau ʻokú ke taʻu 17 pea ʻe ngofua pē ke ke lēsisita fakataimi. Ko hoʻo lēsisita pē pea kuo pau ke ke tokanga ʻo fakapapauʻi ʻoku tonu maʻu pē ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala ʻoku kau kia koe he lēsisitá.
Ko e tokotaha pāloti kotoa pe ʻoku ua ʻene foʻi fili. *'''Ko hoʻo fili ki ha paati''' ʻe tokoni ia ki hono fakapapauʻi pe ko e sea ʻe fiha ʻe maʻu ʻe ha faʻahi pe [[paati]] taki tahaʻi he falealea. ʻE faʻu leva ʻa e puleʻanga ʻe ha paati lahi ʻa e taha pe toe lahi ange ʻaki ʻa e lahi ʻo e ngaahi sea ʻoku nau maʻu ke nau mālohi ai ʻi he ngaahi pāloti ʻi falealea. *'''Ko hoʻo fili ki ha fakafofonga ʻi ha vāhenga fili''' ʻe tokoni ia ki hono filiʻi ʻa e fakafofonga falealea ʻi ho vāhenga fili. Ko e kanititeti vāhenga ʻe fili toko lahi taha ki ai ʻa e kakai ki ia ia ʻe mālohi.
ʻE maʻu ʻe he ngaahi paati ha ngaahi sea ʻo fakatatau ki honau ʻinasi e maʻu mei he fili paati. Ko e ʻinasi ko eni ʻo e ngaahi sea ʻe ʻuluaki fakafonu ia mei he kau fakafofonga vāhenga ʻoku mālohi he fili, pea toki fakakakato ia mei he kau kanititeiti ʻoku tuʻu honau ngaahi hingoa ʻi he lisi ʻa e paati.
ʻE maʻu ʻe ha paati ha ngaahi sea ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he lahi ʻo e ngaahi fili paati ʻi he paati ko ia, ʻo kapau te ne maʻu ha taha ʻo e ongo meʻa ko ʻeni: *5% pe lahi ange ʻi he fakakātoa ʻo e ngaahi fili ki he paati, pe *maʻu ha sea ʻe taha pe lahi ange ʻo e ngaahi sea ki he kau fakafofonga fakavāhenga fili.
ʻOku ui ʻa e meʻá ni ko e pe ko e tuʻunga ʻoku pau ke ʻi ai ha paati ke malava ai ke ne maʻu ha sea.
ʻOku ʻikai faʻa hoko eni, tukukehe pe kapau ʻoku ke ʻi ha vāhenga fili: *ʻOku pau ke mālohi ai ha paati kapau heʻikai te ne aʻusia ʻa e 5% ʻo e ngaahi fili paati fakakātoa. *ʻOku mālohi ai ha paati pea ne maʻu ai ʻe ia ha ngaahi sea ʻo lahi hake ia ʻi he fakafehoanaki mo hono ʻinasi ʻoku maʻu mei he ngaahi fili ki he paati – pe ʻiloa ko e “overhang” (pe mahulu lahi atu ʻa e ngaahi fili ki he fakavāhenga fili). *ʻE mālohi ʻi he vāhenga fili ia ko eni ha taha tauʻatāina ʻoku ʻikai kau ki ha paati pe ko ha kanititeiti mei ha paati ʻoku ʻikai ke nau fiemaʻu ʻa e fili ki ha paati.
Kapau ʻoku ke ʻi he ʻapi ʻo e kau vaivai pe falemahaki ʻe fekau ʻe he ʻOfisa Tānaki Fili ha tokotaha ke ʻalu atu ʻo maʻu mai hoʻo fili. Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke lava ke ke ʻalu ki he feituʻu faiʻanga fili koeʻuhi ko e puke, vaivai e sino pe faingataʻaʻia fakaesino, ʻoku malava ke maʻu ha tokoni. Fakafetuʻutaki ki homou ʻOfisa Tānaki Fili fakafeituʻu. Ke maʻu ʻa e fetuʻutakiʻanga.
Te ke fili mei he meʻa ʻe 4. ʻOku lava ke ke: *Fili tōmuʻa kapau ʻoku ke lolotonga ʻi Nuʻu Sila ni ʻi he uike ʻe 3 pea toki fai e fili *Paaki pe kopi ʻa e pepa fili mei homau tuʻasila fakakomipiuta ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e uike ʻe 3 ki muʻa ʻa e ʻaho fili). *Kole ke lī mai hoʻo fili ʻi he meili. *Fili fakafofonga falealea ʻi ha vaʻa ngāue ʻi muli.
[[Category:Fakapuleʻanga]]

page.title: Nukuʻalofa
page.category: Ngaahi tohi hokohoko
Tongatapu & takatakai
page.text:
[[File:Nukuʻalofa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Nukuʻalofa lahi (kolo)]] [[File:Raintree Nukuʻalofa.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Ko e fuʻu kāsia ʻi he ʻōfisi lī tohi]] Ko '''Nukuʻalofa''' ko e kolomuʻa ia ʻo Tonga ni. ʻOku tuʻu ia ʻi he motu ko [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. Ko Nukuʻalofa totunu, ko e kiʻi feituʻu pē ia takatakaiʻi he [[Sia ko Veiongo]], kae he taimi ni ʻoku tānakiʻi ʻa e ngaahi tuʻotuʻa kolo ki ai, fakatātā: [[Tofoa]], [[Haveluloto]], [[Hōfoa]], [[Maʻufanga]], mo e hā fua.
Naʻe fili ʻa e feituʻu ʻe he tuʻi [[Siaosi Tupou I]] ki he kolomuʻa, koeʻuhi ko e feituʻu ia ʻo e taulanga lelei taha ʻo e motu.
{{commons|Nuku'alofa|Nukuʻalofa}} == Ngaahi tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻo Nukuʻalofa lahi == * Fanga ʻo Pilolevu * Fasi mo e afi * Fongoloa * Hala ʻo Vave * Halaano * Halafoʻou * Halaleva * [[Haveluloto]] * Houmakelikao * Hunga * Kape * Kolofoʻou (ko e hala ʻoku vaheʻi Kolofoʻou mo Kolomotuʻa ʻoku ui ''Hala Vahaʻakolo'') * Kolomotuʻa (ko Nukuʻalofa totonu) ** Sopu ʻo Tāufaʻāhau (ʻoku nounou: Sopu) *** Sia ko Veiongo *** Tongataʻeapa * Longolongo ** Haʻavakaʻotua ** Kapetā ** Tavatuʻutolu ** Tuʻakātakilangi (ʻoku kovi: Tuʻatakilangi) * Lopaukamea * Mailetaha * Mataika * Matutuana * Maui * [[Maʻufanga]] * Ngeleʻia * Pahu * Pātangata * Pīkula * Takaunove * Telekava * Teufaiva * [[Tofoa]] * Tufuenga * Vaolōloa * ʻAmaile * ʻĀnana * ʻUmusī Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, tukukehe Maʻufanga mo Haveluloto mo ha ngaahi kiʻi ʻapi foki. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°13|175°20}} <gallery> Image:Tonga gov.jpg| Image:The Free Church of Tonga.jpg| Image:The Free Church of Tonga, description.jpg| Image:Tonga royal family tomb.jpg| </gallery> {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[Category:Ngaahi tohi hokohoko]]

page.title: Paʻanga
page.category: ʻekonomika
page.text:
'''Paʻanga''', TOP, T$, ko e maka mo e pepa fefakatauʻaki ia. Ko e fakamatala ʻo e ''ʻakau paʻanga'' mo e tupuʻanga ʻo e hingoa, vakai ki he [[paʻanga (ʻakau)]]. ==Maka== *seniti ʻe 1 (18mm): [[File:1¢-koane.jpg|144px]] [[File:1¢-vanila.jpg|144px]] *seniti ʻe 2 (21mm): [[File:2¢-tokoono.jpg|168px]] [[File:2¢-talo.jpg|168px]] *seniti ʻe 5 (19mm): [[File:5¢-‘olive.jpg|152px]] [[File:5¢-tuʻi.jpg|152px]] [[File:5¢-moa.jpg|152px]] [[File:5¢-niu.jpg|152px]] *seniti ʻe 10 (24mm): [[File:10¢-TupouIII.jpg|192px]] [[File:10¢-‘olive.jpg|192px]] [[File:10¢-TupouIV-1974.jpg|192px]] [[File:10¢-pulu-1979.jpg|192px]] [[File:10¢-TupouIV.jpg|192px]] [[File:10¢-siaine.jpg|192px]] *seniti ʻe 20 (29mm): [[File:20¢-TupouIII.jpg|232px]] [[File:20¢-sila.jpg|232px]] [[File:20¢-TupouIV.jpg|232px]] [[File:20¢-pī.jpg|232px]] [[File:20¢-‘ufi.jpg|232px]] *seniti ʻe 50 (32-33mm): [[File:50¢-TupouIV-1974.jpg|264px]] [[File:50¢-sila.jpg|264px]] [[File:50¢-ika-1977.jpg|264px]] [[File:50¢-TupouIV.jpg|264px]] [[File:50¢-temata.jpg|264px]] ==Laʻi paʻanga== Ko e ngaahi laʻi paʻanga onopooni ko e fakahū ki tuʻa ia ʻo e taʻu 2008 mo e 2009, ʻosi he hilifaki kalauni ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou V]]. Ko honau lahi ko e milimita ʻe 150 x 70 *1 mamata tofuaʻa, lanumata **[[File:T$1 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$1 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *2 ako mo e vaʻinga, lanukulamaama **[[File:T$2 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$2 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *5 ʻotu langi, lanufisiʻifekika **[[File:T$5 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$5 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *10 moʻunga (faʻitoka) ʻo e [[Malaʻekula]], lanupulūmaama **[[File:T$10 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$10 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *20 fale pule pangikē fakafonua, lanumelomelo **[[File:T$20 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$20 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *50 pālasi [[Nukuʻalofa]], lanumatamaama mo e engeenga **[[File:T$50 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$50 tuʻa.jpg|400px]] *100 taulanga [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], lanukulokula mo e hinehina **[[File:T$100 muʻa.jpg|400px]] [[File:T$100 tuʻa.jpg|400px]]
ʻOsi tuku ʻa e ngāueʻaki ʻo e paʻanga fakapilitānia, ko e [[silini]] mo e [[peni]] ʻi 1921, naʻe fakahū ki tuʻa ʻe he puleʻanga ni ʻa e ngaahi laʻi sōvaleni (''sovereign pound'') fakatonga. Naʻe pulusi ia ʻe he falepaaki [[Thomas Delarue Limited]] ʻi [[Pilitānia]]. Naʻe fakafetuʻutaki ʻa e sōvaleni ki he sōvaleni fakapilitānia. Naʻe liliu ʻi 1936: naʻe fakafetuʻutaki ia ki he sōvaleni [[ʻAositelēlia]].
ʻI he ngaahi taʻu 1960 naʻe liliu ʻa e ngaahi fonua ki he [[founga fakamita]], ʻa ia ʻi 1967 naʻe toʻo ʻi Tonga ni ʻa e ngaahi sōvaleni mo e silini (20 ʻi ha sōvaleni ʻe 1) mo e peni (12 ʻi ha silini ʻe 1), pea naʻe hū ʻa e paʻanga mo e seniti (100 ʻi he paʻanga ʻe 1). Naʻe tatau ʻa e seniti ʻe 10 ki he silini ʻe taha, ʻa ia naʻe tatau foki ʻa e sōvaleni ʻe 1 ki he paʻanga ʻe 2. Naʻa nau ʻasi ʻa e ʻata ʻo [[Sālote Tupou III]], pea [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]] mei he 1974. Naʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi laʻi ʻi he *paʻanga ʻe vaeua (seniti ʻe 50), ngāue mataka, lanupulū fio lanumata; naʻe tuku ʻi 1983 *paʻanga ʻe taha, taulanga Vavaʻu lolotonga he taʻu 1900, lanumata *paʻanga ʻe ua, ngāue ngatu, tutu, kokaʻanga, lanukulokula *paʻanga ʻe nima, [[Haʻamonga ʻa Maui (maka tupuʻa)|Haʻamonga]], lanufisiʻifekika *paʻanga ʻe hongofulu, pālasi, lanupulū *paʻanga ʻe uofulu, pangikē fakalakalaka ʻo Tonga, lanumoli, fakahake ʻi 1985 *paʻanga ʻe nimangofulu, taulanga Vavaʻu lolotonga he onopooni, lanumata mo e engeenga; fakahake ʻi 1988 Kamata he 1992, ʻoku fakahū ʻa e ngaahi laʻi paʻanga ʻe he pangikē fakafonua.
==2015== ʻOsi ʻa e hilifaki kalauni ʻo e tuʻi [[Tupou VI]], naʻe hū ki tuʻa ʻa e ngaahi maka foʻou, pea toʻo ʻaupito ʻa e maka motuʻa kotoa. {| border=1 | seniti || muʻa || mui || tiamita (mm) || matolu (mm) || mamafa (k) |- | 5 || [[File:5¢-heilala.png|201px]] || [[File:5¢-TupouVI.png|201px]] || 17.0 || 1.5 || 2.0 |- | 10 || [[File:10¢-malau.png|201px]] || [[File:10¢-TupouVI.png|224px]] || 19.0 || 1.5 || 2.75 |- | 20 || [[File:20¢-kalia.png|249px]] || [[File:20¢-TupouVI.png|249px]] || 21.0 || 1.6 || 3.5 |- | 50 || [[File:50¢-milolua.png|285px]] || [[File:50¢-TupouVI.png|285px]] || 24.0 || 1.8 || 5.0 |- | 100 || [[File:100¢-sila.png|282px]] || [[File:100¢-TupouV.png|282px]] || 24.0 || 1.8 || 7.0 |}
==Tataku== *http://tongareport.to/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=291:launching-of-one-hundred-paanga-note&catid=158:press-releases&Itemid=448 *fanongonongo, ko e lao ki he pangikē pule ʻo Tonga, vahe 102; 21 Sānuali 2009 {{potuʻi}} [[Category:ʻekonomika]]

page.title: Siasi moʻoni ʻa Sēsū
page.category: Lotu
page.text:
[[File:Tonga-liaison-office.jpg|right|thumb|300px|ʻŌfisi Tonga (ki muʻa)]] Ko e '''Siasi moʻoni ʻa Sēsū''' ((True (Jesus Church)) pe '''Siasi ʻa Sēsū moʻonia''' ((True Jesus) church) ko e siasi tauʻatāina, naʻe fokotuʻu ia ʻi ''[[Beijing]]'' ʻi [[Siaina]] ʻi he taʻu [[1917]]. ʻOku ʻi ai haʻane takilotu ʻe 1.5 miliona pe ofi ki ai ʻi he ngaahi fonua ʻe 40. Ko e siasi ko e huli fakasiaina mei he lotu [[Penitikosi]] [[fakakalisitiane]] naʻe hā mai lolotonga he kamataʻanga ʻo e taʻuteau hono 20. ʻOku lotokehekehe ʻa e siasi ki he [[Tokotolutapu]], kae ʻoku muimui ia ʻa e akonaki ko Sīsū hono huafa. Talu mei he [[2005]] mo hono fokotuʻu ʻo e siasi ʻeni ʻi [[Tonga]] ni ʻe he kau muli mei [[ʻEsia]] hahake.
Ko e akonaki tuʻunga ʻe hongofulu ʻo e siasi:
# [[Laumālie māʻoniʻoni]] — Ko e aʻusia ʻo e laumālie māʻoniʻoni, ʻa ia ko e lea fakalea, ko e fakamatemate ia ʻo e tofiʻa ki he puleʻanga fakahēvani. # '''[[Papitaiso]]''' - Ko e papitaiso ʻi he vai ko e sākalamēniti ia ki he fakamolemole ʻo ʻetau hia pea mo e fanauʻifoʻou. ʻOku hoko ʻa e papi ʻi he vai moʻui, ʻa ia ko e vaitafe, tahi pea mo e vaipuna. ʻOku fai ia ʻi he huafa ʻo e ʻeiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi ʻe he tokotaha kuo hili hono papi ʻi he vai mo e laumālie. Ko e founga, ʻoku fakauku ʻaupito ʻa e tokotaha papitaiso, pea ʻoku ne punou. # '''Tafitafi vaʻe''' - Te ke kau ki he ʻeiki Sēsū ʻe he sākalamēniti ʻo e tafitafi vaʻe. ʻOku hoko ki ha meʻafakamanatu, ʻoku pau ʻi ai haʻate ʻofa mo toputapu mo fakamāʻulalo mo ʻaonga. ʻE sai e tafitafi vaʻe ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū ki he tokotaha kuo papitaiso. ʻOku sai foki taimi kotoa pē ko e fetafitafi vaʻe. # '''[[ʻOhomohe ʻa e ʻEiki]]''' - Ko e ʻohomohe ko e sākalamēniti ia ki he fakamanatu ʻo e pekia ʻo Sēsū. ʻOku tau fakamafeiaʻi ʻi he kai ʻo e kiki mo e toto ʻo hotau ʻeiki pea aʻu ki he moʻui taʻengata mo e toetuʻu ʻi he ʻaho fakaʻosi. ʻOku toutou fai ha ʻohomohe tuʻolahi ʻaupito. Ngāueʻaki ʻa e mā taʻelēvani ʻe taha pē mo e huhuʻa kelepi. # '''Sāpate''' — Ko e ʻaho tapu ko e Tokonaki ia, ko e ʻaho fika fitu, naʻe tāpuakiʻi pea fakatapui ʻe he ʻotua. ʻOku tauhi ia ʻi he kelesi ʻo e ʻeiki ki he fakamanatu ʻo e tupuʻanga mo e fakamoʻui ʻo e ʻotua pea mo e ʻamanaki ki he mohe taʻengata ʻi he moʻui hoko. # '''[[Sīsū Kalaisi|Sēsū Kilisitō]]''' - Ko ia, ko e foʻi lea naʻe hoko kiki, naʻa ne pekia ʻi he kolosi ki he huhuʻi ʻo e kau hia, naʻa ne toetuʻu ʻi he ʻaho fika tolu pea hake ki he langi. Ko e fakamoʻui ʻe taha ʻo e maama ia, ko e fai langi mo māmani ia, mo e ʻotua moʻoni ʻe taha pē. # '''[[Tohitapu]]''' - Naʻe fasituʻu ʻe he ʻotua ʻa e tohitapu, ko e fuakava motuʻa mo foʻou, ko e meʻamoʻoni fakatohi ʻe taha pē, ko e fakamaʻunga fakakalisitiane. # '''[[Fakamoʻui]]''' — ʻOku ʻoatu ʻa e fakamoʻui ʻe he ʻotua mei he tui. Kuo pau ʻe falala ʻe he kau tonunga ʻi he tohitapu pea aʻusia he fakamoʻui, fakalāngilangiʻi he ʻotua pea ʻofa ki he maama. # '''[[Lotu]]''' - Ko e lotu, naʻe kamata ʻe hotau ʻeiki mo e laumālie māʻoniʻoni lolotonga ʻa e taimi ʻo e ʻuha fakaʻosi, ko e siasi moʻoni mo fakaola ʻi he taimí ni. # '''Fakamaau aofangatuku''' — ʻOku tui ʻa e siasi ʻe hoko ʻa e toe hāʻele mai ʻi he ʻaho fakaʻosi ʻe hifo ai ia mei langi ke fakamaau māmani. ʻE maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengata ʻe he kau angatonu, ʻe fakahalaiaʻi ʻa e kau angafulikivanu ʻi he taʻengata. {{english|translation}}
[[Category:Lotu]]

page.title: Lea fakatonga
page.category: Lea fakatonga|*
page.text:
Ko e '''lea [[fakatonga]]''' ʻoku ʻilo ʻe he kakai [[Tonga]] ʻe tokotaha kilu tupu mo e kakai Tonga nofo ʻi [[Nuʻu Sila]], [[ʻAmelika]] mo e hā fua, ʻe tokolahi mano tupu.
== Hisitōlia == Ko e motuʻalea fakatonga mo hono hisitōlia, vakai ki he [[motuʻalea fakatonga]]

page.title: ʻAho mahuʻinga eni ʻi Tonga
page.category: Fakapuleʻanga
page.text:
Ko e ngaahi ʻaho mahuʻinga eni ʻi Tonga, talu mei he 6 Tisema 2006.<ref>http://www.pmo.gov.to/artman/publish/article_238.shtml</ref>
Ngaahi ʻaho mālōlō fakapuleʻanga *ʻUluaki ʻaho ʻo e taʻu - 1 Sānuali *ʻAho Pekia mo e Toetuʻu - ʻaho ʻe niʻihi ʻi Maʻasi pe ʻEpeleli *ʻAho fakamanatu e tau (ANZAC) - 25 ʻEpeleli *ʻAho fakamanatu e Tauʻatāina - 4 Sune *ʻAho ʻaloʻi ʻo ʻe ʻalo ([[ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho]]) - 12 Siulai *ʻAho ʻaloʻi mo e kalauni ʻo e tuʻi [[Siaosi Tupou V]] - 1 ʻAokosi 2008 (kae ko hono ʻaho ʻaloʻi moʻoni ʻoku 4 Mē ia) *ʻAho fakafonua ʻo Tonga - 4 Nōvema (ʻI muʻa: ʻAho konisitūtone) *ʻAho fakamanatu ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou I]] - 4 Tisema *ʻAho kilisimasi mo e ʻaho hoko mei ai - 25 & 26 Tisema.
==Tataku== <references/> [[Category:Fakapuleʻanga]]

page.title: Ngatu
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
''Mataʻitohi mahei''ʻOku ngāueʻaki e ngatu ki he teuteu falé 'i he ʻotu motu Polinisiá. ʻOku ngaohi ʻa e ngatú mei he kili 'o e fuʻu [[hiapó]]. Ko ia ʻoku ui ai he taimi ʻe niʻihi ko e vala-kiliʻi-ʻakau.
ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻe he kakai Tongá ʻa e ngatú ki he teuteu fale ʻi honau ngaahi ʻapi pea pehē foki ki he ngaahi kātoanga ʻo fakaʻaonga ki he teunga tauʻolunga, faliki, holoʻaki ki he meʻafakaʻeiki pe putu, meʻaʻofa ki he mali pea mo kafuʻaki.
ʻOku ngāueʻaki foki ʻa e ngaahi fakatātā tukufakaholo mo makehe ki he kupesi. ʻOku nau vali ʻaki e ngatu ʻa e [[koka]]. Ko e kokaʻanga (ngaohi ʻo e ngatu) ʻoku faʻa fai pē ia ʻe he kakai fefine ʻo nau haʻohaʻo ha fuʻu papa. ʻOku faʻa hokohoko ʻa e fanga kiʻi ngatu iiki ke hoko ko e ngatu lahi.
Ko e anga hono teuteu ʻo e kokaʻanga, ʻoku tatala e kili ʻo e tutu (hiapo) ʻo fohi e kili ki tuʻa pea fakavai; ʻosi pea taʻaki e ike ʻi ha tutua. 'Oku faʻa teuteuʻi pe ʻa e ngatu ke fakaʻilongaʻi e feituʻu takitaha.
[[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Vala fakatonga
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
'Oku kei tui pe 'e he kakai Tonga honau vala pe teunga faka-fonua.
'Oku vala tupenu e kakai tangata 'a ia 'oku hange ha piva 'o nono'o meihonau kongaloto pea loloa 'o laka hifo honau tui. 'Oku tui e vala ko eni ki he ngaue mo e ngaahi feohi'anga mahu'inga.
'Oku 'i ai foki mo e ta'ovala. 'Oku hange eni ha ki'i fala si'isi'i'oku ha'i takai he kongaloto 'o nono'o 'aki e kafa, 'a ia 'oku fi'aki e pulu'i niu. 'Oku nau tui mo e sote 'oku kola. 'I he ngaahi me'a-faka'eiki mo e putu, 'oku nau ta'ovala aki 'a e ngaahi fala motu'a pea teunga'uli.
'Oku tui kofu pea vala tupenu mo e ta'ovala 'a e kakai fefine 'o a'u hifo ki honau tui. 'Oku teunga pehe ni 'a e kakai fefine ki he lotu mo e ngaahi feohi'anga mahu'inga hange ko e katoanga pe mali. 'I he taimi 'oku hoko ai ha me'afaka'eiki pe putu, 'oku na u kofu mo tupenu uli pea ta'ovala lanu faka'ahu pe ko e fala motu'a.
{{sipela}} [[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Māʻatu |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho, Fʻ |ʻaho fakanofo= 27 Sēpitema 1979 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 17 Fēpueli 2004 |ki muʻa=[[Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga (Māʻatu)]] |hoko= |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho, Fʻ |maama= tangata |tamai=Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi ([[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]]) |faʻē=[[Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 17 Tisema 1954 |ʻaho pekia= 17 Fēpueli 2004 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Manumataongo Tukuʻaho Tupou ([[Siaosi Tupou V]])|[[Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu Tuita (Tukuʻaho)]]|||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | |||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho ([[Tupou VI]])||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Heimataʻula Tukuʻaho (Kaho)]] |ʻaho1= 21 Siulai 1980 |fānau1= {{tokoua|ʻikai||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= Alaileula Tukuʻaho (Jungblut) |ʻaho2= 1989 |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Sitiveni ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Poluleʻuligana Tanusia maʻa Tonga Tukuʻaho|Sitiveni ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Poluleʻuligana Tanusia maʻa Tonga]]|Sālote Maumautaimi Haim Hadessah Be Yardena ʻAlinuanua|Fatafehi Sione Ikamafana Taanekinga ʻo Tonga
[[Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu Tuita (Tukuʻaho)|(ohi ʻe heʻene mehekitanga)]]|ʻEtani Haʻamea Tupoulahi Tuʻuakitau Ui Tuʻalangi|||||}} |}}*http://uqconnect.net/~zzhsoszy/states/tonga/tupou.html *http://www.matangitonga.to/scripts/artman/exec/view.cgi?archive=2&num=410 *Fanongonongo fakatuʻi, 7 Nōvema 1980, kupu 165/80 *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 Ko e hingoa ʻo hono ʻofefine, '''Maumautaimi''' ʻoku motuʻa. Naʻe ʻoatu ia ʻe [[Siaosi Tupou I]] ki he kau ʻohoana ʻo e houʻeiki [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] (Fulivai, Tutoe, Lutui) naʻe ʻikai lava fānauʻi. Ko e kau fefine vale kinautolu.

page.title: ʻIlima Lei Kalaniuvalu (Fifita Tohi)
Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV
page.link: Sitiveni ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Poluleʻuligana Tanusia maʻa Tonga Tukuʻaho
page.text: Naʻe ui ia ko '''Tāufaʻāhau''' ʻi heʻene kei talavou, pea naʻe ʻilo ko '''Tupoutoʻa''', pea '''Tupoutoʻa-Tungī''' (Tuboutoa-Tugi ʻi he lea onoʻaho), pea naʻe hoko ia ko e tuʻi '''Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV'''. [[File:Tupoutoʻa Tungī.jpg|thumb|right|200px|Ko e palemia, kei ʻalo]] [[File:Taufa Tupou 4.jpg|thumb|right|200px|Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tupoutoʻa |hingoa= Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi |ʻaho fakanofo= 1936 |ʻaho pongipongi=1938 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 4 Mē 1966 |ki muʻa= [[Sione Tupou Mateialona]] |hoko= [[Siaosi Tupou V|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Manumataongo Tukuʻaho]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tungī |hingoa= Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi |ʻaho fakanofo=1941 ? |ʻaho pongipongi=8 Tisema 1945 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 10 Sēpitema 2006 |ki muʻa= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |hoko=[[Sitiveni ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Poluleʻuligana Tanusia maʻa Tonga Tukuʻaho]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Kanokupolu |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 10 Sēpitema 2006 |ki muʻa= [[Sālote Tupou III]] |hoko= [[Siaosi Tupou V]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi ʻo Tonga |ʻaho fakanofo=16 Tisema 1965 |ʻaho pongipongi=4 Siulai 1967 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 10 Sēpitema 2006 |ki muʻa= [[Sālote Tupou III]] |hoko= [[Siaosi Tupou V]] |}} {{Palemia|hingoa= Tupoutoʻa-Tungī |ʻaho fakanofo= 12 Tisema 1949 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 16 Tisema 1965 |ki muʻa= [[Solomone Ula|Solomone Ula Ata]] |hoko= [[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni|Fatafehi Tuʻipelehake]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko=Tupou, Tāufaʻāhau |maama= tangata |hingoa= Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi (Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV) |tamai= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |faʻē= Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu ([[Sālote Tupou III]]) |ʻaho fanauʻi= 4 Siulai 1918 |ʻaho pekia= 10 Sēpitema 2006 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Uiliami Tukuʻaho]]|[[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe]] |ʻaho1= 10 Sune 1947 |fānau1= {{tokoua|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Manumataongo, [[Siaosi Tupou V]]|[[Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu Tuita (Tukuʻaho)|Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu]]|[[Fatafehi ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Tukuʻaho|Fatafehi ʻAlaivahamamaʻo]]|ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga ([[Tupou VI]])|||||}} |}}* N. page.title: Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe
Samisoni Fonomanu Tuʻiʻāfitu
page.text:
ʻEiki nōpele Tuʻiʻāfitu, minisitā mālōlō ʻo e Fonua, Savea mo e Koloa Fakaenatula, kōvana mālōlō ʻo Vavaʻu, fakafofonga mālōlō fika 1 ʻo e kau nōpele ʻo Vavaʻu ki he Fale Alea. {{houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻiʻāfitu |hokohoko=Tuʻiʻāfitu, SF |ʻaho fakanofo= 20 Nōvema 1976 |ʻaho pongipongi= 20 Sānuali 1977 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 4 ʻOkatopa 2005 |ki muʻa= [[Peleketi Tuʻiʻāfitu]] |hoko= [[Lolomānaʻia Tuʻiʻāfitu]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tuʻiʻāfitu, SF |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Peleketi Tuʻiʻāfitu]] |faʻē= Luʻisa Lātū Lelenoa |ʻaho fanauʻi= 21 Tisema 1933 |ʻaho pekia= 4 ʻOkatopa 2005 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Sisilia Losimani (Tuʻiʻāfitu)]]|ʻAnasisi Vaoloa Tuʻiʻāfitu|Suliasi Niulala Tuʻiʻāfitu||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ʻUhinga-e-Valu- ʻa-Tupoutoʻa- ʻi-Kolisi-Puleʻanga |fānau1= {{tokoua|Tunakaimanu|ʻAsenita Letele|[[Lolomānaʻia Tuʻiʻāfitu|Lolomānaʻia]]|Samisoni Fonomanu|Seini|ʻAikeio-ʻi-Nausoli|Luʻisa Tupou Veihola|Mapu-ʻa-Tonga|}} |}}*http://www.pmo.gov.to/artman/publish/printer_31.shtml

page.title: Sione Laumanuʻuli Luani
page.text: Naʻe ngāue ia ki he TCC (Tonga communications company) ʻi muʻa hono fili ki he Fale alea ʻi 2006, pea kōvana Vavaʻu he 1 Siulai 2009 {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Luani |hokohoko=Luani, L |ʻaho fakanofo= 29 Nōvema 1987 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 12 Mē 2010 |ki muʻa= |hoko=[[ʻInoke Tongaleva Ngongo Kilitoto Luani]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Luani, L |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Tongaleva Luani]] |faʻē= ʻAla ki Hihifo Luani (Taumoepeau) |ʻaho fanauʻi=18 Sune 1959 |ʻaho pekia=12 Mē 2010 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Talau-mo-Teʻemoa Luani Kaufusi||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau={{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Luseane Fakaola ʻi Fanga Luani (Vaea)]] |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[ʻInoke Tongaleva Ngongo Kilitoto Luani|ʻInoke Tongaleva Ngongo Kilitoto]]|ʻAlipate Halakilangi Tauʻalupeoko|ʻAla ki Hihifo Fusinevalasi||||||}} |}} *http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/20100524_tonga_luani.shtml *http://www.mic.gov.to/press-releases/1398-lord-luani-governor-of-vavau-passes-away.html

page.title: Sione Tupou Mateialona
Siosiua Tautalanoa
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Ata |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= [[Tofuaipangai]] |hoko= [[Solomone Ula]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga= houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Tofuaipangai]] |faʻē= |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1850 ? |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ? |fānau1= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}} Naʻe ʻikai ʻa e Ata ʻuluaki, kā ko e Ata ʻuluaki mei he kamataʻanga ʻo e konisitūtone he 4 Nōvema 1875, ʻa ia naʻe kamata ʻa e huafa ʻo e nōpele Ata.

page.title: Solomone Ula
page.text: [[Image:Ata (Solomone).jpg|left|thumb|Ata (Solomone Ula)]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Ata |ʻaho fakanofo= 12 Nōvema 1904 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 27 Maʻasi 1950 |ki muʻa= [[Siosiua Tautalanoa]] |hoko= [[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea]] |}} {{Palemia|hokohoko=Ula, Solomone |ʻaho fakanofo=20 Siulai 1941 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 12 Tisema 1949 |ki muʻa=[[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |hoko= [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV|Tupoutoʻa Tungī]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Ula, Solomone |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Tēvita Manuʻopangai Ata]] |faʻē= Pauline Manutuʻufanga Niumeitolu (Maʻafu) |ʻaho fanauʻi= 1883 |ʻaho pekia= 27 Maʻasi 1950 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|?||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ? |fānau1= {{tokoua|(ʻikai)||||||||}} |}}Ko hono hingoa totonu ko '''Solomone Piutau''', kā naʻe ohi ia ʻi hono taʻu ʻe 1, ʻe Saane Lafulafu, ko e tuofefine ʻo toutai ko Ula (Ulamoleka). ʻOsi ʻa e pekia ʻo Saane, naʻe ohi ia ʻe hono tama ko ʻAna mo ʻene ʻohoana ko e matāpule ko Sione Mohulamu. *http://www.planet-tonga.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20888&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=0&sid=50001f8fee86c1affb7230ab3694b7ee *E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999 *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Dociety, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929

page.title: Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea

page.title: Siaosi Manumataongo ʻAlaivahamamaʻo ʻAhoʻeitu Konstantin Tukuʻaho
page.link: ʻAngelika Lātūfuipeka Halaʻevalu Mataʻaho Napuaʻokalani Tukuʻaho
page.text:
[[File:Tupoutoʻa ʻUlukalala.jpg|thumb|Siaosi Manumataongo ʻAlaivahamamaʻo ʻAhoʻeitu Konstantin Tukuʻaho]] Taimi ʻe niʻihi hono hingoa ʻene sipela ʻoku: '''Jiaoji ... Konftantin ...'''. Mahalo pē ko e hala ʻi heʻene tohi fāʻeleʻi, maholo pe naʻe fakakaukauʻi. Kapau ko ia, ʻe sai ange ko: '''...Konſtantin...''' (ngāueʻaki ʻa e 's' -lōloa, ha foʻi lea motuʻa, ʻikai ʻiloa ʻi Tonga ni).
Kaekehe, mei heʻene taʻu ʻe 21, ʻoku ui ko 'Ulukālala, pea Tupoutoʻa ʻUlukālala, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito ngāueʻaki ʻa hono hingoa papitaiso ʻe he tokotaha.
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= ʻUlukālala |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho, SMʻAK |ʻaho fakanofo= 11 Sēpitema 2006 |ʻaho pongipongi= 30 Sēpitema 2006 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho ([[Tupou VI]]) |hoko= |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tupoutoʻa |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho, SMʻAK |ʻaho fakanofo= 30 Maʻasi 2012 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho ([[Tupou VI]]) |hoko= |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho, SMʻAK |maama= tangata |tamai=ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho ([[Tupou VI]]) |faʻē=[[Nanasipauʻu Tukuʻaho (Vaea)]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 17 Sēpitema 1985 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[ʻAngelika Lātūfuipeka Halaʻevalu Mataʻaho Napuaʻokalani Tukuʻaho]]||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Viliami ʻUnuaki-ʻo-Tonga Mumui Lalaka-mo-e-ʻEiki Tukuʻaho]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Sinaitakala Tuʻimatamoana ʻi Fanakavakilangi Tukuʻaho (Fakafānua)]] |ʻaho1=12 Siulai 2012 |fānau1= {{tokoua|Tāufaʻāhau Manumataongo (10 Mē 2013)|Halaevalu Mataʻaho (12 Siulai 2014)|Nanasipauʻu (20 Maʻasi 2018)||||||}} |}}*http://palaceoffice.gov.to/content/view/143/55/ *http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/20110810_tonga_ulukalala.shtml [[File:Tonga princes.jpg|500px|center|thumb|28 Sēpitema 2006, lolotonga e tangi maʻa e hala ʻo e tuʻi Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV. Toʻohema ki toʻomataʻu: ʻUlukālala (Siaosi), Tupoutoʻa-Lāvaka (ʻAhoʻeitu), Ata (Viliami)]]

page.title: Fakataha tokoni
page.text:
Ko e Fakataha tokoni (Privy council), ko e konga fakapuleʻanga māʻolunga taha ia ʻi Tongá ni ʻi muʻa ʻo 2010. [[Image:Fakataha_tokoni.jpg|center|828px|thumb|Ko e Fakataha tokoni ʻi 2004]] Mei hema ki mataʻu: *Fetuʻutolu ʻAloua Tupou, minisitā maluʻi *Viliami Tangi(?), minisitā moʻui *Fielakepa, minisitā fonua *? *[[Siaosi Tuʻihala ʻAlipate Vaea Tupou]] *[[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]], tuʻi *Langi Kavaliku, minisitā ako *Clive Edwards, minisitā polisi *? *? *Lāvaka-Ata-ʻUlukālala), palēmia (= ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho = [[Tupou VI]])
Vakai foki: *http://www.pmo.gov.to/artman/publish/article_20.shtml [[category:Fakapuleʻanga]]

page.text: [[Image:Fatafehi Tuʻipelehake.jpg|left|thumb|Fatafehi Tuʻipelehake]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻipelehake |hingoa= Fatafehi |ʻaho fakanofo= 22 Sēpitema 1944</br>(lau mei he kuohili 7 Sānuali 1943) |ʻaho pongipongi=14 Siulai 1945 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 10 ʻEpeleli 1999 |ki muʻa=[[Siaosi Fatafehi Toutaitokotaha]] |hoko= [[Sione ʻUluvalu Takeivūlai Ngū Tukuʻaho]] |}} *Naʻe ʻatā ʻa e lakanga Tuʻipelehake lolotonga 1912 — 1944. *Naʻe liliu hono hingoa kia '''Fatafehi''' (kau ki he fakanofo Tuʻipelehake, tatau mo e '''Tuʻifaleua''' mo e '''ʻEikihāʻele''') ʻosi ʻa e hala ʻene fehuhu. {{Palemia|hingoa= Fatafehi Tuʻipelehake |hokohoko=Tuʻipelehake, F. |ʻaho fakanofo= 16 Tisema 1965 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 21 ʻAokosi 1991 |ki muʻa= [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV|Tupoutoʻa Tungī]] |hoko=[[ʻAlipate Halakilangi Tauʻalupeoko Vaea Tupou|Paloni Vaea]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko=Tuʻipelehake, F. |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |faʻē= Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu ([[Sālote Tupou III]]) |ʻaho fanauʻi= 7 Sānuali 1922 |ʻaho pekia= 10 ʻEpeleli 1999 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi, [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]]|[[Uiliami Tukuʻaho]]|||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | |||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Melenaite Tupoumoheofo Veikune]] |ʻaho1= 10 Sune 1947 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Mele Siuʻilikutapu Kalaniuvalu (Tukuʻaho)|Mele Siuʻilikutapu]]|[[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku Namoa (Tukuʻaho)|ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku]]|[[Sione ʻUluvalu Takeivūlai Ngū Tukuʻaho|Sione ʻUluvalu Takeivūlai Ngū]]|[[Lavinia Mata-ʻo-Tāone Lausiʻi (Tukuʻaho)|Lavinia Mata-ʻo-Tāʻone]]||[[Sinaitakala ʻOfeina ʻe he Langi Fakafānua (Tukuʻaho)|Sinaitakala ʻOfeina ʻe he Langi]]|[[Viliami Tupoulahi Mailefihi Tukuʻaho|Viliami Tupoulahi Mailefihi]]|||}} |ʻohoana2= ʻOfa Vakauta (sinifu) |fānau2={{tokoua|Halatuituia (nofo ʻAmelika, foha ʻeveʻeva)||||||||}} |}}*Tonga investigation report

page.link: Sālote Lupepauʻu Salamasina Purea Vahine Arii ʻo e Hau Tuita
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Fusituʻa, ʻTʻFP |maama= fefine |tamai= [[Mataʻiʻulua ʻi Fonuamotu Fusituʻa]] |faʻē= [[Sālote Lupepauʻu Salamasina Purea Vahine Arii ʻo e Hau Tuita|Sālote Lupepauʻu Salamasina Purea Vahine Arii ʻo e Hau Fusituʻa (Tuita)]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 17 Nōvema 2003 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*http://www.matangitonga.to/scripts/artman/exec/view.cgi?archive=2&num=542 [[Image:Phaedra's cut.jpg|500px|center|thumb|Ko e kiʻi valevale ʻi hono kosi fofonga, fai ʻe Heeni Katipa mei ʻAotealoa, maʻa e pongipongi tapu, ʻaia ko e ngataʻanga ʻo e tangi maʻa e hala ʻo e tuʻi, ko ʻene kui-ua. Ki he toʻomataʻu ʻoku meʻa ʻa ʻene fehuhu, ko Lupepauʻu ia. 29 Sēpi 2006]]

page.title: Lesieli Afuhaʻapai Veikune (Namoa)
Heimataʻula Tukuʻaho (Kaho)
Sālote Lupepauʻu Salamasina Purea Vahine Arii ʻo e Hau Tuita
page.link: Frederica Lupeʻuluiva Fatafehi ʻo Lapaha Tuita
page.text: Ko '''Lupepauʻu Fusituʻa''' ko e ʻalo fefine ia, ko e ʻilamutu ʻo e tuʻi, [[Siaosi Tupou V]]. Ko e kau ʻalo fefine ʻa Pilolevu, ʻoku toe ʻiloa: '''fuifuilupe'''. {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko= Tuita, SLSPVAH |maama=fefine |tamai=[[Siosaia Maʻulupekotofa Tuita]] |faʻē=[[Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu Tuita (Tukuʻaho)]] |ʻaho fanauʻi=16 ʻEpeleli 1977 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua={{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau={{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua={{tokoua|[[Titilupe Fanetupouvavaʻu Tuita]]|[[Frederica Lupeʻuluiva Fatafehi ʻo Lapaha Tuita]]|[[Lupeolo Halaevalu Moheofo Tuita]]|Fatafehi Sione Ikamafana Taanekinga ʻo Tonga|||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Mataʻiʻulua ʻi Fonuamotu Fusituʻa]] |ʻaho1=Sune 2003, vete: Mē 2008 |fānau1={{tokoua|[[ʻAnaseini Tupouveihola ʻIkaleti-olo-ʻi-Fangatapu Phaedra Fusituʻa|ʻAnaseini Tupouveihola ʻIkaleti-olo-ʻi-Fangatapu Phaedra]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= ʻEpi Taione |ʻaho2=17 ʻAokosi 2013 |fānau2={{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*Talaki '''5''', 217 Pulelulu 14 Mē 2008 *http://matangitonga.to/2013/08/20/lupepau%E2%80%98u-marries-%E2%80%98epi-taione

page.title: Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi
page.text: [[Image:Tugī & Sālote.jpg|left|thumb|300px|Sālote Tupou III & Tungī Mailefihi ʻi heʻena taʻane, 19 Sēpitema 1917]] [[Image:Tungī Mailefihi.jpg|left|thumb|Viliami Tungī Mailefihi]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tungī |ʻaho fakanofo= 1909 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 20 Siulai 1941 |ki muʻa=[[Viliami Tungī Halatuituia]] |hoko=Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi ([[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]]) |}} {{Palemia|hokohoko=Tūngī, Viliami |ʻaho fakanofo= 30 Sune 1923 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 20 Siulai 1941 |ki muʻa= [[Tēvita Polutele Kaho]] |hoko= [[Solomone Ula|Solomone Ula Ata]] |}} Naʻe tokolahi ʻa e kau pele ʻo Tungī Mailefihi. Ko e mahuʻinga lahi taha, ko Tulu mei [[Muʻa (Tongatapu)|Muʻa]] ia. ʻOkusitino Māhina, ''Psychoanalysis and Tongan Poetry, Literature and Aesthetics'', The Journal of the Sydney Society of Literature and Aesthetics, '''13 (1)''', pp. 97-106.</ref><ref> ʻOkusitino Māhina, ''Tatau, potupotutatau and mālie: A realist reflection on the symmetry, harmony and beauty of Queen Sālote’s poetry'', Polynesian Paradox: Essays in Honour of Futa Helu. Suva, Fiji: Institute of Pacific Studies, University of the South Pacific, pp. 168-83.</ref> {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tūngī, Viliami |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho]] |faʻē=[[Mele Siuʻilikutapu]] |ʻaho fanauʻi=1 Nōvema 1887 |ʻaho pekia=20 Siulai 1941 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu ([[Sālote Tupou III]]) |ʻaho1= 19—21 Sēpitema 1917 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi]]|[[Uiliami Tukuʻaho]]|[[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni]]||||||}} |}}<references/> {{English|more}}

page.title: Sālote Tupou III
page.text:
[[Image:Salote Tupou 3.jpg|right|200px|thumb|Kuini Sālote]] [[Image:Salote Tupou III of Tonga in 1908.jpg|right|200px|thumb|Kuini Sālote]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Kanokupolu |hokohoko=Tupou III |ʻaho fakanofo=5 ʻEpeleli 1918 |ʻaho pongipongi=9 ʻOkatopa 1918 |ʻaho fakamālōlō=16 Tisema 1965 |ki muʻa=[[Siaosi Tupou II]] |hoko=Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi ([[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]]) |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi ʻo Tonga |hokohoko=Tupou III |ʻaho fakanofo=5 ʻEpeleli 1918 |ʻaho pongipongi=11 ʻOkatopa 1918 |ʻaho fakamālōlō=16 Tisema 1965 |ki muʻa=[[Siaosi Tupou II]] |hoko=Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi ([[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]]) |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko=Tupou III |maama= fefine |hingoa=Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu (Sālote Tupou III) |tamai=[[Siaosi Tupou II]] |faʻē=[[Lavinia Veiongo Fotu]] |ʻaho fanauʻi=13 Maʻasi 1900 |ʻaho pekia=16 Tisema 1965 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[ʻOnelua]]|[[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku (Tupou)]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |ʻaho1= 19—21 Sēpitema 1917 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV|Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupoulahi]]|[[Uiliami Tukuʻaho]]|[[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni]]|ʻAlaivahamamaʻo (mate ʻi kete, ʻEpeleli 1924)|tamatō|tamatō|||}} |}}{{English|abstract}}

page.title: Mele Siuʻilikutapu
page.text: [[Image:Mele Siuʻilikutapu (Mafileʻo).jpg|thumb|left|Mele Siuʻilikutapu, ~1890]] {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama=fefine |tamai= [[Sūnia Mafileʻo]] |faʻē= [[Fane Tupou Vavaʻu]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 24 Siulai 1865 |ʻaho pekia=29 Siulai 1921 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Sione Lamipeti]]||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|ʻAlipate Tutae Tupoulahi||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=[[Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho]] |ʻaho1=12 Sēpitema 1886 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]]||||||||}} |}}*N. Tukuʻaho, M. Taumoefolau, E. Wood-Ellem, A. Kaeppler; Songs & poems of Queen Sālote; ISBN 978-982-213-008-9 Naʻe ohi ia ʻa Tēvita ʻUnga mo Tangitau, ʻene fakafotu.

page.title: Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho
page.text:
Meimei ha [[:category:Tungī|Tungī]] ia, kae naʻe mālōlō ʻi muʻa ʻene ʻeiki.
Ko e tupuʻanga ia ʻo e faiva [[lakalaka]]. {{Palemia|hokohoko=Tukuʻaho SU |ʻaho fakanofo= Siulai 1890 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= Nōvema 1893 |ki muʻa= [[Shirley Waldemar Baker]] |hoko= [[Siosāteki Tonga Veikune]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tukuʻaho SU |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Viliami Tungī Halatuituia]] |faʻē= [[ʻAnaseini Tupou Veihola]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 18 Maʻasi 1854 pe 1858 |ʻaho pekia= 7 ʻOkatopa 1897 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=[[Mele Siuʻilikutapu]] |ʻaho1=12 Sēpitema 1886 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2=Fane |ʻaho2= |fānau2= {{tokoua|ʻUngapapālangi Tukuʻaho||||||||}} |}}*Songs & poems of Queen Sālote; ISBN 978-982-213-008-9 [[File:Siaosi Tuku‘aho.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Siaosi Tukuʻaho]] [[File:Siaosi Uiliami Tukuʻaho.jpg|350px|right|thumb|Siaosi Tukuʻaho]] <br style="clear:all" /> [[File:Tombe de Siaosi Tuku'aho.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Ko e maka fakamanatu ʻi Tofoa, ko e feituʻu naʻe tō ai ʻa Siaosi mei heʻene hoosi ki hono pekia. ʻOku ui ʻa e feituʻu mei he taimi ē ko e Hala maumau koula.]] {{English|more}}

page.title: Viliami Tungī Halatuituia
page.text:
[[Image:Tungīvaivai.jpg|thumb|left|Tungī Vaivai]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tungī |hokohoko= Tungī VH |ʻaho fakanofo= 1842? |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 13 Sune 1900 |ki muʻa=(ʻuluaki ia) |hoko= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko= Tungī VH |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Maealiuaki Fatukimotulalo]] |faʻē= [[Kaunanga Lataihahake]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia=13 Sune 1900 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[ʻIlaisaane Tupouʻāhau]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[ʻAnaseini Tupou Veihola]] |ʻaho1= 1853 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= ʻEsetia |ʻaho2= |fānau2= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999
ʻOku ui foki: ko e Tungī Vaivai (ko Tungī motuʻa ia).
Naʻe tuku ʻa e hingoa ʻo e [[:category:Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua|Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua]] ʻi 1799 ʻosi ʻa e pekia ʻo [[Mulikihaʻamea]]. Naʻe ʻeiki pē, taʻehuafa, hono foha ko [[Maealiuaki Fatukimotulalo]]. Kae ʻosi ʻene pekia ʻi 1842 naʻe fokotuʻu ʻe [[Siaosi Tupou I]] maʻa hono hako, ʻa e huafa fakanofo foʻou, ʻa ia ko [[:category:Tungī|Tungī]]. ʻI he 1885 naʻe filia ia ki he [[hokohoko ki he Kalauni]] ʻo Tonga.

{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala I ʻi Maʻofanga]] |faʻē= [[ʻUlukilupetea]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= 1809 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Fīnau Fisi]]|[[Tupouniua]]|Lualala|Tupoutuʻa|Lolohea Loholoho||||}} |ʻohoana1= Lāpulou |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Fīnau ʻUlukālala Moengangongo]]|[[Halaevalu Moheofo]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana2= Fatafehi Ongoʻalupe |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Fīnau ʻUlukālala III ʻi Pouono (Tuapasi)]]||||||||}} |}}*http://web.archive.org/web/20030315012835/http://www.uq.net.au/~zzhsoszy/states/tonga/ulukalala.html Ko ia mo e hono tehina ko Tupouniua, naʻe tāmateʻi kinaua ʻa [[Tukuʻaho]] ʻi 1799. {{English|more}}

page.title: Fīnau ʻUlukālala I ʻi Maʻofanga
page.text:
[[Image:Fīnau ʻUlukālala.gif|right|200px|thumb|Fīnau I pe hono tehina (Labillardiere 1793).]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= ʻUlukālala |ʻaho fakanofo= 1777? |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 12 Sune 1797 |ki muʻa= (ʻuluaki) |hoko= [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Vavaʻu |ʻaho fakanofo= 1777? |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 1793 |ki muʻa=[[Tuituiohu]] |hoko=[[Vuna]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Tuituiohu]] |faʻē= Lātūfuipeka |ʻaho fanauʻi= 1748 |ʻaho pekia= 12 Sune 1797 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[ʻUlukilupetea]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= Adi Mekemeke |fānau2= {{tokoua|Fīnau Fisi||||||||}} |ʻohoana3= [[Fehiʻa Fuimāono]] |fānau3= {{tokoua|[[Tupouniua]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana4= Vutulogo |fānau4= {{tokoua|Lualala||||||||}} |ʻohoana5= Mafimatapoko |fānau5= {{tokoua|Tupoutuʻa|Lolohea Loholoho|||||||}} |}}*http://web.archive.org/web/20030315012835/http://www.uq.net.au/~zzhsoszy/states/tonga/ulukalala.html *http://epress.anu.edu.au/austronesians/origins/mobile_devices/ch12s03.html Ko hono hingoa tenetene (Maʻofanga, hono kiʻi liliu ʻo [[Maʻufanga]]), koeʻuhi naʻa ne faia ʻi hē.
ʻI he taʻu 1793 pe ofi ki ai, naʻe fekau ke ʻalu ʻa Fīnau ʻe [[Tupoumoheofo]] (naʻa ne hola ki [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] ʻosi ʻa heʻene fakahifo), pea naʻe hoko ʻa e tokotaha, ko [[Vuna]] (hako ʻo [[Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau]]), kōvana mo [[:Category:Tuʻi Vavaʻu|Tuʻi Vavaʻu]]. Naʻe pehē ʻe [[Alejandro Malaspina]] mei [[Sepeni]], (kuo aʻu ki [[Neiafu]] he 20 Mē 1793) naʻe tali ia ʻe he kōvana ko Vuna ʻi [[Pouono]].
Naʻe ʻita ʻaupito ʻa Fīnau mo hono foha [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)|Fangupō]]. Naʻe talaʻofa ʻe [[Tukuʻaho]] ke liua ʻa e hau ʻo Vuna kapau ʻe tokoni mai ia ʻe Fīnau. ʻI 1797 naʻe hoko ʻa Tukuʻaho ki he [[:Category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]], kā naʻe ʻikai fakahifo ʻa Vuna. Naʻe pekia ʻa Fīnau uike siʻisiʻi pē ki mui; pekia ʻi he lotomamahi?
Naʻe hiki ʻa e sauni kia Fangupō. Ko ia ai, naʻe tāmateʻi ʻa Tukuʻaho ʻe [[Tupouniua]] mo Fangupō ʻi ʻEpeleli 1799. {{English|translation}} [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |hokohoko=Tupou II |hingoa= Tāufaʻāhau (Siaosi Tupou II) |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Siaosi Fatafehi Toutaitokotaha]] |faʻē= [[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 18 Sune 1874 |ʻaho pekia= 5 ʻEpeleli 1918 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Tupou Moheofo]] |ʻaho1= ʻikai |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Viliami Vīlai Vakalotu Tupou]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= [[Lavinia Veiongo Fotu]] |ʻaho2= 1 Sune 1899 |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Sālote Tupou III|Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana3= [[ʻAnaseini Takipō Afuhaʻamango]] |ʻaho3=11 Nōvema 1909 |fānau3= {{tokoua|[[ʻOnelua]]|[[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku (Tupou)]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana4= [[Litia Cakobau]] |ʻaho4= ʻikai |fānau4= {{tokoua|[[Edward Tuivanuavou Tugi Cakobau]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana5= [[Vaohoi Konaheʻulu-ʻo-ʻAhoʻeitu]] |ʻaho5= ʻikai |fānau5= {{tokoua|Siaosi Vuna Takitakimālohi||||||||}} |ʻohoana6= [[Vika Kaufusi Afuhaʻamango]] |ʻaho6= 'ikai |fānau6= {{tokoua|Tupou Maluhola||||||||}} |}} *http://web.archive.org/web/20030116185915/http://www.uq.net.au/~zzhsoszy/states/tonga/tupou.html *N. Tukuʻaho, M. Taumoefolau, E. Wood-Ellem, A. Kaeppler; Songs & poems of Queen Sālote; ISBN 978-982-213-008-9 *E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999 Ko hono huafa papitaiso ko '''Tāufaʻāhau''' ia, kae naʻa ne maʻu ʻa e huafa '''Siaosi''' ʻi heʻene kalauni, mo e huafa '''Tupou''' ʻi heʻene nofo Tuʻi Kanokupolu. {{English|more}} [[Image:Tupou II and Lavinia Veiongo.jpg|left|300px|thumb|Siaosi Tupou II mo Lavinia Veiongo]] [[Image:Tupou II and ʻAnaseini Takipō.jpg|300px|right|thumb|Siaosi Tupou II mo ʻAnaseini Takipō]]

page.link: Ratu Edward Palalaika ʻa Tungī Vaea
page.text:
[[File:STʻ Vaea.jpg|left|thumb|Vaea, kei mui]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Vaea |ʻaho fakanofo= 16 Mē 1942 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō=7 Sune 2009 |ki muʻa=[[Siosaia Pauʻuvale Lōloaʻatonga]] |hoko=[[ʻAlipate Tuʻivanuavou Vaea]] |}} {{Palemia|hokohoko=Vaea Tupou, S. |ʻaho fakanofo= 22 ʻAokosi 1991 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 3 Sānuali 2000 |ki muʻa= [[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni|Fatafehi Tuʻipelehake]] |hoko= ʻUlukālala Lāvaka Ata (ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho, [[Tupou VI]]) |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Vaea Tupou, S. |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Viliami Vīlai Vakalotu Tupou‎]] |faʻē= [[Tupouseini Manumatavai Vaea Tupou]] |ʻaho fanauʻi=15 Mē 1921 |ʻaho pekia=7 Sune 2009 |taʻokete-tokoua={{tokoua|Sālote Tupou Moheofo Vaea|[[Fatafehi Lapaha Tuita (Tupou)]]|||||||}} |taʻokete-lau={{tokoua| | |||||||}} |tehina-tokoua={{tokoua|[[Palu Vavaʻu Cousins (Tupou)]]|[[Vaohoi Kona Naufahu (Vaea Tupou)]]|[[Toutai Tupou]]|[[Leafātulangi Mataele (Tupou)]]|[[Kupuʻovanua Tupou]]|[[Tēvita Tupou]]|||}} |ʻohoana1=[[Tuputupu ki Pulotu Vaea (Maʻafu)|Tuputupu ki Pulotu Maʻafu]] |ʻaho1= 1952 |fānau1={{tokoua|[[Nanasipauʻu Tukuʻaho (Vaea)|Nanasipauʻu]]|[[Luseane Fakaola ʻi Fanga Luani (Vaea)|Luseane Fakaola ʻi Fanga]]|[[ʻAlipate Tuʻivanuavou Vaea|ʻAlipate Tuʻivanuavou]]|[[ʻAmelia Luoluafetuʻu Lasike (Vaea)|ʻAmelia Luoluafetuʻu Lasike]]|[[Moimoikimofuta Kaifāhina Vaea]]|[[Ratu Edward Palalaika ʻa Tungī Vaea]]|[[Cassandra Tukuia-a-Purea Tukuʻaho (Vaea)|Cassandra Tukuia-a-Purea]] (ohi)|||}} |}}
Ko hono hingoa fakatānaki, ko '''Siaosi Tuʻihala (ʻAlipate Vaea Tupou)''', naʻa ne maʻu ʻosi ʻene ohi (ʻe hai?).
*http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/20090608_tonga_vaea_death.shtml
== Fakatovavevave == *1938—1941 Wesley College, [[ʻAokalani]] *1942—1945 Royal New Zealand Air Force *1945—2000 ngāue puleʻanga Tonga *1953—1958 tangata tokoni ki he tuʻi fefine [[Sālote Tupou III]] *1960—1968 kōvana [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] *1970 hoko he paloni *1969—1972 komisoni māʻolunga ki [[Pilitānia]] *1975—2000 minisitā ngoue mo e vaotātā *1972—1991 minisitā ngāue mo e fefakatauʻaki *1991—2000 palemia [[File:Vaea Tuputupu.jpg|center|thumb|300px|Vaea & Tuputupu ʻi he malaʻe vakapuna, 2004]]

page.text: [[File:Siaosi Fatafehi Toutaitokotaha.jpg|thumb]] {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻipelehake |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 20 Nōvema 1912 |ki muʻa= [[Filiaipulotu]] |hoko= [[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni|Fatafehi]] |}} {{Palemia|hokohoko=Toutaitokotaha, SF |ʻaho fakanofo=Sānuali 1905 |ʻaho fakamālōlō=Sānuali 1905 |ki muʻa=[[Siosāteki Tonga Veikune]] |hoko= [[Sione Tupou Mateialona]] |}} {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Toutaitokotaha, SF |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Filiaipulotu]] |faʻē= [[Sālote Mafileʻo Pilolevu (Tupou)]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 2 Siulai 1842 |ʻaho pekia= 20 Nōvema 1912 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=[[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku]] |ʻaho1= 1870 |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Siaosi Tupou II]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2=Lepeti (mei [[Haʻamoa]]) |ʻaho2= 1897 |fānau2= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*E. page.title: Tēvita Polutele Kaho
page.text: [[Image:TPP Tuʻivakanō.jpg|left|thumb|Tēvita Polutele Kaho]] {{Palemia|hokohoko=Kaho, TP |ʻaho fakanofo= 30 Sēpitema 1912 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 30 Sune 1923 |ki muʻa= [[Sione Tupou Mateialona]] |hoko= [[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻivakanō |hokohoko=Kaho, TP |ʻaho fakanofo= 25 Sānuali 1912 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 4 ʻAokosi 1923 |ki muʻa= [[Mānoa]] |hoko= [[Siosiua Niutupuʻivaha Kaho‎‎]] |}} ʻOku ui '''TP Tuʻivakanō''', ʻosi ʻene fakanofo ʻi he huafa nōpele Tuʻivakanō. Ko ia ai, ʻi heʻene lakanga palemia. Ko e tupuʻanga ʻo hono hingoa ko '''Saga Upolutele''' ia, ko e hingoa [[fakahaʻamoa]] ia, pe ʻoku nounou Polutele pe Poutele. {{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko= Kaho, TP |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Manase Kahomovailahi]] |faʻē=[[ʻAnaseini Tokilupe ʻEveʻevaʻitoafa Kaho]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 25 Tisema 1869 |ʻaho pekia= 4 ʻAokosi 1923 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Lātūsokopeti||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Siosiua Niutupuʻivaha Kaho‎‎]]|[[Sioape Alo Kaho]]|[[Manase Kaho]]|[[Feʻiloakitau Kaho]]|Taeao||||}} |ʻohoana1= Kilisitina († 1971) |ʻaho1= 1905 |fānau1= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*Tonga- Land, sea and people; Tonga research association, 2011; ISBN 9789829806215 {{English|more}}

page.title: Feleti Vakaʻuta Sevele
page.category: Nōpele
page.text:
[[Image:Feleti Sevele.jpg|left|200px]] {{Palemia|hokohoko=Sevele, VS |ʻaho fakanofo= 30 Maʻasi 2006 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 22 Tisema 2010 |ki muʻa=ʻUlukālala Lavaka Ata (= ʻAhoʻeitu ʻUnuakiʻotonga Tukuʻaho = [[Tupou VI]]) |hoko=[[Siale ʻAtaongo Kaho]] (Tuʻivakanō) |}} Ko e palemia leʻoleʻo ia mei he 11 Fēpueli 2006.
Naʻe fakanofo ko e ([[:Category:Nōpele|nōpele]]) Sevele ʻo [[Vailahi]] ʻi 31 Tisema 2010. {{Kāinga ofi |hokohoko= Sevele VS |maama= tangata |tamai= Viliami Vakaʻuta Sevele |faʻē= Mele Yarnton |ʻaho fanauʻi= 7 Siulai 1944, Maʻufanga |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ʻAinisi Sevele (Manu) |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|Maliana|Frederick Stephen Jnr|Pisila||||||}} |}}*http://www.pmo.gov.to/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=117&Itemid=157 *http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/20101230_tonga_life_peers.shtml [[Category:Nōpele]]

page.title: Mei
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Breadfruit |faitā= Arto commun T 040924 ltn.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[rosales]] |familia= [[MORACEAE]] |genus= Artocarpus |species= altilis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Sydney C. Parkinson|Parkinson]]) [[Francis Raymond Fosberg|Fosberg]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mei''' ko ha meʻakai mahuʻinga lahi ʻi Tongá ni.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * kalou * kea, mo ha kili petepete ange, pea ʻene fua ʻosi ʻa e fua ʻo e loutoko ** kea kulufau ** kea loutoko ** kea maʻamaʻa ** kea tala, ko ha fuʻu talatala ** kea tenga, mo ha ʻū tenga * loumoa * lautolo * loutoko, mo ha kili molū ** loutoko maʻamaʻa ** loutoko kulufau ** loutoko nokonoko ** loutoko vahivahi ** loutoko kaunounou ** loutoko kauiki * maopo * maʻofala * puou * vahivahi (ngaahi lau vahevaheʻi) * ʻavelōloa * ʻavenonou
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == [[File:ARS breadfruit49.jpg|right|thumb|200px]] * ʻuru, maiore ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * ʻulu, ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], [[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * kuru, ([[lea fakamauli]], [[lea fakakuki]]) * mei, ([[lea fakamākuise]])
== Toe meʻa kehe == Kapau te ke mā ʻa e mei, ʻe hoko ki he '''[[mā]]'''.
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}} {{English|abstract}}

page.title: Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga
Tupoulahimuʻa
page.text:
ʻOku nounou hono hingoa: ko Tupoulahi. ʻOku ui ʻe John Thomas ʻa e Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua, kae ʻikai ʻe he kakai kotoa pē ki mui. {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Kanokupolu |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho fakamālōlō=1771 |ki muʻa=[[Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga]] |hoko=[[Maealiuakimuʻa]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua |ʻaho fakanofo= 1771 |ʻaho pongipongi= mahalo pē ʻikai |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= [[Fuatakifolaha]] |hoko= [[Maealiuakimuʻa]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga]] |faʻē= [[Lātūtama]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1740 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Tupouʻila|ʻĀnaukihesina|||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | |||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Maealiuakimuʻa]]|[[Mumui Tupouʻila Mapatongiamanu]]|[[Ngalumoetutulu]]||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Lupemeitakui]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Tongamana Tupouhaʻapai]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= [[Fuonuku]] |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Tupoumoheofo]]|[[Tuʻihalafatai]]|||||||}} |}} Naʻe ohi ia ʻa [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)]], ko e mokopuna ʻo hono tehina ko Ngalumoetutulu.

page.title: Maealiuakimuʻa
page.text: ʻOku nounou hono hingoa: ko Maealiuaki. {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo=Tuʻi Kanokupolu |ʻaho fakanofo= 1771 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa=[[Tupoulahimuʻa]] |hoko=[[Tuʻihalafatai]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo=Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua |ʻaho fakanofo=(ʻosi fakamālōlō Tuʻi Kanokupolu) |ʻaho pongipongi= mahalo pē ʻikai |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 1777 |ki muʻa=[[Tupoulahimuʻa]] |hoko=[[Mumui Tupouʻila Mapatongiamanu]] |}} ʻOku peheeʻi ko e Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua fakamuimui ia. {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga]] |faʻē= [[Lātūtama]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1730 |ʻaho pekia=1777 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Tupouʻila|ʻĀnaukihesina|[[Tupoulahimuʻa]]||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | ||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Mumui Tupouʻila Mapatongiamanu]]|[[Ngalumoetutulu]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana1=? |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Lātūtama (Māʻatu)|Lātūtama]]|Kongakava|||||||}} |ʻohoana2=[[Lupemeitakui]] |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Mulikihaʻamea]]||||||||}} |}}

page.title: Tuʻihalafatai
Mumui Tupouʻila Mapatongiamanu
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Kanokupolu |ʻaho fakanofo= 1793 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= 1797 |ki muʻa= [[Tupoumoheofo]] |hoko= [[Tukuʻaho]] |}} {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua |ʻaho fakanofo= ~1780 ? |ʻaho pongipongi= mahalo pē ʻikai |ʻaho fakamālōlō= ~1790 ? |ki muʻa= [[Maealiuakimuʻa]] |hoko= [[Toafūnaki]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga]] |faʻē= Popuaʻuliʻuli |ʻaho fanauʻi=1733 |ʻaho pekia= 29 ʻEpeleli 1797 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Tupouʻila|ʻĀnaukihesina|[[Tupoulahimuʻa]]|[[Maealiuakimuʻa]]|||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | | |||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Ngalumoetutulu]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Tuʻimala (mei Nukuʻalofa) |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Halaevalu (TK)|Halaevalu]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= [[Vailolomoli]] |fānau2= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana3= Sele Lepolo |fānau3= {{tokoua|[[Tukuʻaho]]|[[Halaevalu Fonongavaʻinga]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana5= Kaufusi |ʻohoana4= Tule |fānau4= {{tokoua|[[Tupou Veiongo]]||||||||}} |fānau5= {{tokoua|Uipulotumatāpule|[[Tupoumālohi]]|[[Aleamotuʻa (Josiah Tupou)]]||Halaevalu (Fonongavaʻinga ?)|Namoa|||}} |}}*I.C. Campbell, Island kingdom, Canterbury university press, 1992, 2001 *E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999 *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929
Ko e Tuʻi Kanokupolu ʻuluaki ia ʻoku nofo ʻi [[Nukuʻalofa]], ikai ʻi he vahe hihifo.
Ko e ʻofefine mei Sele Lepolo ko Halaevalu Fonongavaʻinga ʻoku ui foki ko Halaevalukovi. ʻOku tatau pe kehe mo e ʻofefine mei Kaufusi ?
Naʻe tui ʻe John Thomas pē, ko [[Tupoumālohi]] ko e fānau ohi pē ia. ʻI hono moʻoni ko e mokopuna ia ʻo [[Tupoulahimuʻa]], ko e taʻokete ʻo Mumui.
Ko hono hingoa ko '''Mumui''', ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko Tupou ia, ʻoku ʻila, pe [[mapa]] ʻoku tongi ʻa manu.

page.title: Toafūnaki
Mulikihaʻamea
Maealiuaki Fatukimotulalo
page.text:
Ko ʻene tamai naʻe he [[:category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]] mo [[:category:Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua|Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua]]. Ko ʻene foha naʻe he [[:category:Tungī|Tungī]], ko e hako ʻo e Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua. Kae Fatukimotulalo naʻe moʻui ia ʻi he taimi tau fakafonua. Ko e ʻeiki, ʻio, kā naʻe ʻikai maʻu hano hingoa fakanofo. {{Houʻeiki |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= [[Mulikihaʻamea]] |hoko= [[Viliami Tungī Halatuituia]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Fatukimotulalo, M |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Mulikihaʻamea]] |faʻē= Ikatonga |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= 1842 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|Vakameilalo|ʻUngapapālangi|Paluleleva|Paluvavaʻu|Palulongoteme||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Kaunanga Lataihahake]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Viliami Tungī Halatuituia]]|[[ʻIlaisaane Tupouʻāhau]]|||||||}} |}}*E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999

page.title: Mataʻiʻulua ʻi Fonuamotu Fusituʻa
page.link: Sālote Lupepauʻu Salamasina Purea Vahine Arii ʻo e Hau Tuita

{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Atamataʻila]] |faʻē= Tokilupe (ʻofefine ʻo Tuʻihaʻatuʻunga ʻi [[Nukunuku]]) |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1640 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Tuʻutangahunuhunu]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=Papa |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Mataelehaʻamea]]|[[Hafoka]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana2=Fatafehi mo/pe ʻUmukisia |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau]]|[[Afualo]]|[[Vaivai]]||||||}} |ʻohoana3=[[Tuʻimala]] |fānau3= {{tokoua|[[Longolongoʻatumai]]||||||||}} |}}*http://kitwithers.fortunecity.com/tonga/nobles.html *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929
ʻUmukisia, ʻofefine ʻo e Tuʻihaʻamea; hako ʻe taha: [[Uiliami Aokatoa Tuʻivakanō]] (kā moʻui ia taʻu ʻe 200 ki mui !). Tatau mo Papa, ko e ʻofefine ʻe taha ʻo e Tuʻihaʻamea.
ʻI he tala ʻe taha, ko Papa ko e ʻofefine ʻo Aokatoa, ko e Tuʻi [[Haʻamea]] ki mui, faʻē kia Mataelehaʻamea mo Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau foki. Ko ʻUmukisia hono tehina mo e [[fokonofo]].
Mahalo pē ko e ʻuluaki ia ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻa e huafa Tuʻi Kanokupolu. Naʻe kamata ʻa e maʻongoʻonga ʻo e haʻa, ʻo ngofua ʻene mali mo ha tamahā, ko Tuʻimala ia. Pea ko Mataeletuʻapiko, ko e ʻeiki ia ʻo e [[:category:Haʻa Havea lahi|Haʻa Havea lahi]].

{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Tonga |ʻaho fakanofo= ~1580 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= [[Tapuʻosi]] |hoko= [[Fatafehi]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |maama= tangata |tamai= [[Tapuʻosi]] |faʻē=Vaʻenopo (ʻofefine ʻo Lāvakavaoleleva) |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1580 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=[[Talafaiva]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana2=Nanasilapaha |fānau2= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana3=[[Mataukipā]] |fānau3= {{tokoua|[[Fatafehi]]|[[Sinaitakalaʻilangileka]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana4=mo e fokonofo ʻe 200 pe ofi ki ai |fānau4= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*E.W. Gifford, Tongan myths and tales, Bernice Pauahi Bishop museum bulletin 8, 1924 *http://www.findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m2375/is_n2_v32/ai_20554487/pg_7 Ko hono huafa '''ʻUluaki-mata''' pea mo '''Teleʻa'''. Mahalo pē naʻe ʻikai ko e ʻalo ia, foha ʻo e tuʻi, hoko tuʻi, kae ko ha sola mei [[ʻUvea]] pe [[Fisi]], ko ʻene ikuʻi ʻo Tonga mo ʻene toʻa fakaʻuvea ʻe 500. Kamata he taimí ni naʻe lahi ʻa e liliu ʻi Tonga, fakatātā naʻe kamata ʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga Fefine|Tuʻi Tonga Fefine]].
Naʻe langa ʻe ia ʻa e [[ʻotu langi|Paepae ʻo Teleʻa]] ʻi [[Lapaha]]. Naʻe maʻu ʻe ia ʻa e kalia lahi ʻaupito mei ʻUvea, ko e [[Lomipeau]].
Ko hono ʻohoana pele, ko Talafaiva ia. Lolotonga ʻena ʻafifio, ko Teleʻa mo Talafaiva ʻi [[ʻEuakafa]], naʻe hū ki loto, ngāueʻaki ʻa e fuʻu [[foʻui (ʻakau)|foʻui]] ʻa Lolomānaʻia pe Lepuhā. Pea naʻa na toka ko Talafaiva mo ia. Naʻe ʻita ʻaupito ʻa Teleʻa, pea naʻe tala ange kia ʻAuka pe ʻUka ke tā ʻe ia ʻa Talafaiva. Ko e tā, pe ko e tā ia, naʻe pekia ʻa e taʻahine. ʻOku toe hono faʻitoka ʻi ʻolunga ʻo ʻEuakafa. *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929

page.title: Fatafehi
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Tuʻi Tonga |ʻaho fakanofo= ~1600 |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= [[ʻUluakimata I]] |hoko= [[Kauʻulufonua III]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=fale ʻalo |maama= tangata |tamai= [[ʻUluakimata I]] |faʻē= [[Mataukipā]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1600 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Sinaitakalaʻilangileka]]||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Kaloafūtonga]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[ʻEkutongapipiki]]|[[Kauʻulufonua III]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana2= [[Alaitokaloto]] |fānau2= |}} Ko e sino (mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē) ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga ʻoku toputapu ʻaupito, ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai ha kakai Tonga ʻoku lava ke ala ki ai. Ko ha [[tātatau]] mei Tonga naʻe ʻikai lava. Kā ko Fatafehi naʻa ne fiemaʻu ʻa e tātatau. Naʻa ne hāʻele atu ki [[Manono]] ʻi [[Haʻamoa]] pea naʻa ne maʻu ʻa e konga ʻuluaki ʻo hono tātatau. Ko tufunga tātatau mei Haʻamoa, ko ia foki, naʻe puke koeʻuhi ʻene ala ki he Tuʻi Tonga, ʻoku pupula hono sino, pea naʻa ne mate.
Naʻe toki hāʻele ʻa Fatafehi ki Haʻamoa, ki [[Manuka (Haʻamoa)|Manuka]] he taimi ni, ke fakakakato hono tātatau. ʻOsi he ngāue, naʻe puke foki ʻa tufunga tātatau ʻeni, ʻoku pupula hono sino, pea naʻa ne mate.
Mei he taimi ko ia, naʻe tupu ʻa e hingoa fakatenetene ʻo Fatafehi ko '''Fakaua-ki-Manuka'''. Ko e ngaahi [[kie hingoa]] ʻoku manatuʻi ki he hisitōlia ʻeni ko ''Valatauotuimanuʻa'' (Vala tau ʻo e Tuʻi Manuka) mo ''Vaofumoolosega'' (Vā ʻo [[Ofu (Manuka)|Ofu]] mo [[Olosenga]]). *I.C. Campbell, Island kingdom, Canterbury university press, 1992, 2001 *Adrienne L. Kaeppler, Kie hingoa: Mats of power, rank, prestige and history. JPS Volume 108, p 168-232; 1999 [[http://www.jps.auckland.ac.nz/document/Volume_108_1999/Volume_108,_No._2/Kie_hingoa%3A_Mats_of_power,_rank,_prestige_and_history,_by_Adrienne_L._Kaeppler,_p_168-232/p1]]

Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho/en
page.text:
Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho would have been installed with the high chiefly title of Tungī, if he had not died before his father. He fell from his horse in Tofoa, a village close to town, on a place marked nowadays by a little monument. The area is still known nowadays as ''broken gold'' because of this.
He is the one who reintroduced traditional dancing in Tonga, and is the father of the lakalaka.
*Puha TUPUʻANGA, tangata, fefine : genealogy box, man, woman *mātuʻa, ʻeiki/tamai & fehuhu/faʻē : parents, father & mother *tokoua : brothers and sisters (usually including half brothers/sister and adopted, but not those born out of wedlock) *ʻohoana, ʻaho mali, fānau : spouse, wedding date, children
When [[Shirley Waldemar Baker]] was deported, king Tupou I asked the nobles to select a new prime minister, and they took Tukuʻaho. An intelligent guy, had been educated from Moulton's [[Kolisi Tupou]], was the son of [[Viliami Tungī Halatuituia]], who had become the noble [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]] in 1875, despite having been one of the most implacable opponents of king Siaosi. Nevertheless after the death of all his sons, Tupou I had nominated in 1885 the Tungī line as an alternative royal succession line. As Tukuʻaho had been against Baker, he was automatically favoured by the chiefs and foreign traders alike. (Interestingly his monumuent later would be erected by the Europeans in Tonga, not the Tongan population).
Nevertheless Tukuʻaho made a mess of the administration, and it was only the help of [[Basil Thomson]], the British consul which kept some order in the chaos. But the latter left already in August 1891. And then it was the incomptence and laziness of Tukuʻaho again. Admittedly, his staff was even more untrained and inexperienced, and of no help.
When [[Siaosi Tupou II]] became king in begin 1893, he saw Tukuʻaho as a potential contender to the throne. He did not have long to wait for an excuse, and towards the end of 1893 he could discredit him and nomiate [[Siosāteki Tonga Veikune]] in his place, who had been a friend of Tupou I and Baker.
*I.C. Campbell; Island kingdom; Canterbury press, 2001 {{Foki||Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho}}

page.title: Ngaahi kupu tali liliu ʻi he lea fakatonga/en
Contents/en
page.text: HOW TO… * Mark an article as a stub? ** add somewhere, preferably at the bottom '''[[:template:potuʻi|<nowiki>{{potuʻi}}</nowiki>]]'''. * Make the special Tongan character accents, the fakauʻa (glottal stop), toloi (macron) and fakamāmafa (definite accent)? ** use the toolbox at the bottom of your editwindow, if your keyboard does not have these characters. * Delete an article? ** add the template '''[[:template:db-laupisi|<nowiki>{{db-laupisi}}</nowiki>]]''' or '''<nowiki>{{delete}}</nowiki>''' if the artice is really rubbish; ** add the template '''[[:template:db-kole|<nowiki>{{db-kole}}</nowiki>]]''' or '''<nowiki>{{db-kole|reason}}</nowiki>''' in other cases, giving other editors some time to add their opinion ''yes'' or ''no'' to the talk page before the final decision is taken. In any case an administrator will then delete it. * Add the Babel template to your user's page? ** copy this '''[[:template:Pēpeli|<nowiki>{{Pēpeli | x | x | x }}</nowiki>]]''', then change the ''x'' 's into expressions like "to", "en-0", "to-fuka"" and so on, or add more of them up to 30. For example: <nowiki>{{Pēpeli | to | en-3 | fr-2 | to-fuka |}}</nowiki>. * Upload a picture? ** select the upload command (fakahekaʻi hake) from the toolbox to the left. '''You must add a LICENSE by using this template: [[Template:fakamatala|information]]. * Add an English translation? ** add one of the following templates to your article, it does not matter where: '''[[:template:English|<nowiki>{{English | abstract}}</nowiki>''' or '''<nowiki>{{English | translation}}</nowiki>''' or '''<nowiki>{{English | more}}</nowiki>]]'''. Once done, press the ''GO'' button and start the English version page. Use '''[[:template:foki|<nowiki>{{Foki || articlename}}</nowiki>]]''' to return. * Start a disambiguation page? ** add the following template to the top of the disambiguation page: '''[[Template:Fakaʻuhingakehe|<nowiki>{{Fakaʻuhingakehe}}</nowiki>]]'''. {{Foki||Help:Contents}}

page.title: English/en
page.text: If you want to mark your article to possess an English version, then add one of these three templates somewhere to your text: *<nowiki>{{</nowiki>English | abstract}} <font color="#060">''if the English text is an abstract of the Tongan version or only a small part of it.''</font> *<nowiki>{{</nowiki>English | translation}} <font color="#060">''if the English text is essentially a translation of the Tongan, but it does not need to be a literal translation.''</font> *<nowiki>{{</nowiki>English | more}} <font color="#060">''if the English text is more extensive than the Tongan, addressing topics not found in the Tongan text. This situation will be marked as belonging to the category [[:Category:Ngaahi kupu tali liliu ʻi he lea fakatonga|Articles awaiting translation into Tongan]].''</font> Use the ''[[:template:Foki|Foki]]'' template to return to the Tongan article. {{Foki|s|English}}

page.title: Peesi tali fiefia/en
page.text:
__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ *''This is the wikipedia for the language of TONGA, Polynesia, South Pacific.'' *''Ceci est la wikipédia en [[:fr:tongien|tongien]], la langue des [[:fr:Tonga|TONGA]], Polynésie, Pacifique Sud.'' *''Dit is de wikipedia in het [[:nl:Tongaans|Tongaans]], de taal van [[:nl:Tonga|TONGA]], Polynesië, Stille Oceaan.'' *''Ko e wikipedia ʻeni maʻa lea fakatonga ʻi TONGA ni, ʻi Polinisia, mo e muli.'' This Wikipedia is made in the Tongan language. However, to help strangers to move around, some of the main navigation pages have an English translation. Also some articles which may be interesting to foreign scholars (but not interesting enough for the general public to warrant inclusion on the English Wikipedia) may also have translations. If there is it appears in the upper right corner of the screen as follows: *[[Image:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg |40px]] '''English abstract available GO''' when the English text is an abstract of the Tongan version or only a small part of it. *[[Image:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg |40px]] '''English translation available GO''' when the English text is essentially a translation of the Tongan, but it does not need to be a literal translation *[[Image:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg |40px]] '''More information in English available GO''' when the English text is more extensive than the Tongan, addressing topics not found in the Tongan text. See the list of [[:Category:Articles with an English translation|articles with an English translation]] here.
