page.title: Hulita
Holonga
Holonga (Vavaʻu)
page.text:
[[Image:HolongaVAV.gif|right|350px|thumb|Holonga (kolo) + Lupepauʻu (malaʻe vakapuna)]] Ko '''Holonga''' ko e kolo ʻi he tokelau ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
Naʻe langaʻi ʻa ʻene fale lotu ʻi he feituʻu foʻou, ʻi he taimi fakalahiange ʻo e ''[[malaʻe vakapuna Lupepauʻu]]''.
ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa e kolo ki heʻene faiva ko e [[tauʻaʻalo]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]] ia. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°587|173°952}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Holonga (Tongatapu)
Holonga (Tongatapu)/en
page.text: '''Holonga''' is a small village in the eastern district of [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], close to the lagoon. It lays along the Tāufaʻāhau road between [[Malapo]] and [[ʻAlakifonua]]. ==Origin== According to the popular story Holonga originally got its name from the people of [[Pea]]. They escaped from their hometown after they lost the battle against [[Nukuʻalofa]]. Some Pea people ranned as far to Malapo and stayed there, some ranned and settled at [[Tatakamotonga]]. When the rest of the people of Pea still ran, they got tired and weary. They stopped, turned and hid in the bush. That place was named Holonga. ''Holo'' means escaped and ''nga'' means stopped, turned and hide in the bush. {{Foki||Holonga (Tongatapu)}}

page.title: Kolonga
page.text:
[[Image:Kolonga.gif|right|350px|thumb|Kolonga (kolo)]] Ko '''Kolonga''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he matāfonua tokelau ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Manuka]] mo [[Afā]]. Ko hono hingoa faka-tenetene ko e '''ʻUtu longoaʻa''' ia, naʻe ui pehē ʻe Fatafehi, ko e tuofefine ʻo [[Talatama]] mo [[Talaihaʻapepe]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:category:Nuku|Nuku]] ia.
Ko e hingoa ''Kolonga'' ʻoku hā foki ʻi he lea heliaki ē:{{Kananga|Alai-sia-alai-kolonga}}.
==References== *Tuʻisoso; Tohi palovepi (Tohi Paloveape) *ʻO. Māhina; Reed book of Tongan proverbs; 2004; ISBN 978-0-7900-0963-6 *Tevita O. Ka'ili; [https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/ala-%CA%BBi-sia-ala-%CA%BBi-kolonga-an-indigenous-tongan-proverb_us_5a405f2fe4b0df0de8b0665f Ala ʻi Sia, Ala ʻi Kolonga: An Indigenous Tongan Proverb for Contemporary Pacific Islanders]; 2017
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°130|175°067}} {{potuʻi}}
[[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Kolovai
page.text:
[[Image:Kolovai.gif|right|350px|thumb|Kolovai (kolo)]] [[Image:Koka Kolovai.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Ko e fuʻu koka he onopooni]] Ko '''Kolovai''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo (kae ʻoku ui ''Hala Mohuanga'' ʻi he koló ni), ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Haʻavakatolo]] mo [[ʻĀhau]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e '''Taungapeka''' ia, ʻoku ongoongoa ia koeʻuhi ʻene taunga peka. Ko e kolo motuʻa ʻaupito ia, he onoʻaho naʻe ʻi ai ha kolotau, naʻe ui ia ko '''Pelukihehau''' (pelu ki he hau), koeʻuhi naʻe tau ʻa e ngaahi toʻa maʻa e Tuʻi Kanokupolu, naʻe afio ofi ki ai (ʻi mui ʻene hiki ki [[Kanokupolu]]).
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:category:Ata|Ata]]. ʻI he hihifo, ʻosi he ''Hala Totonu'' ʻi he matāfonua, ʻoku tuʻu ko ''ʻApi ko Liukava'', ko e ʻapi ʻo Ata, ko e foha ia ʻo e ʻalo ʻo Tonga. Kae ko e ʻapi meʻaʻanga ʻo e houʻeiki Ata moʻoni (ko e fakamuimui ko [[Solomone Ula]]), naʻe tuʻu ʻi loto kolo, ʻofi ki he faʻitoka ko ''Pouvalu''.
ʻI he tafaʻaki tokelau ʻo e kolo naʻe tuʻu ʻa e fuʻu [[koka]], ko e feituʻu ʻafioʻanga ʻo e [[:category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]]. ʻOku pulia ʻa e fuʻu ʻakau lahi he taimí ni, kae ʻene ʻakau naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻi he fetuʻu ʻo e tāloni ʻo e tuʻi ʻo Tonga. Ko e fuʻu koka siʻi ʻo e onopooni ko e huli ʻo e koka motuʻa.
==Kokanavela==
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°110|175°339}} {{potuʻi}} *http://www.fiat.to/eva/eva-55.htm [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Kanokupolu
page.text:
[[Image:Kanokupolu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Kanokupolu (kolo)]] Ko '''Kanokupolu''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[ʻĀhau]] mo [[Haʻatafu]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e '''Folaʻosi''' ia, pe '''[[Niu]] tuʻu tolu'''.
Ko e folaʻosi ko e teunga mei he [[ngatu]] maʻa e kakai ʻo Kanokupolu pē ʻi heʻenau faiva [[lakalaka]]. ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa e ngaahi lakalaka mei he koló ni, naʻe kamata ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e teautaʻu hono 20 ʻe he tuʻi [[Sālote Tupou III]]. Koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻi heni naʻe kamata ʻe [[Ngata]] ʻa e holongā hau foʻou, ko e [[:category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]]. Ko ia ai, ko e kolo mo e ʻapi ʻuta takatakai, ko e tofiʻa ʻo e tuʻi.
Ko e konga fakatonga ʻo e kolo, ko e kolo kehe ia ko '''Neiafu''' (Neiafu ʻi Tongatapu, ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Lasike|Lasike]], ko e taha ʻo hono ngaahi ''Lakepa''), kae ʻoku tui ʻe he tokolahi ko Neiafu ko e tuʻotuʻa kolo pē ʻo Kanokupolu.
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°075|175°332}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: ʻĀhau
page.text:
[[Image:ʻĀhau.gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻĀhau (kolo)]] Ko '''ʻĀhau''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Kolovai]] mo [[Kanokupolu]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e '''Ahi ʻo Ulakai''' ia. Ko e kolo mo hono takatakai ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga mo ha kiʻi konga ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Lasike|Lasike]], ko e taha ʻo hono ngaahi ''Lakepa''.
Ko e konga fakatokelau ʻo e kolo, ko e kolo kehe ia ko '''Haʻakili''', kae ʻoku tui ʻe he kakai ko Haʻakili ko e tuʻotuʻa kolo pē ʻo ʻĀhau.
Naʻe faʻa ʻikuna ʻe ʻĀhau ʻa e pale ʻuluaki ʻi he ngaahi feʻauhi ko e kolo maʻamaʻa taha. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°091|175°338}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻatafu
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻatafu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haʻatafu (kolo)]] Ko '''Haʻatafu''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he ngataʻanga ʻo e Hala Hihifo ʻosi he [[Kanokupolu]]. Ko e kolo mo hono takatakai ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Ko e matatahi ʻo Haʻatafu ko e matatahi fakaʻofoʻofa ia, kae ʻoku mingi ia he taʻu kotoa pē, koeʻuhi ʻoku kaihaʻa ʻene ʻone ʻe he kakai.
ʻOku ʻi ai lahi ha ngaahi "ʻuluaki" maʻa Haʻatafu. *Ko e feituʻu ia naʻe haʻu ai ʻa e ʻuluaki pālangi ʻi Tongatapu, ko [[Abel Tasman]] ʻi 1624. *Ko e feituʻu aʻuanga ʻo e ʻulukai kau misa. *Ko e ʻuluaki misa, fai ʻe [[John Thomas]] ʻi he taʻu 18??, naʻe ʻi ai, {{feituʻu Tonga|21°071|175°327}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Foʻui (Tongatapu)
Haʻavakatolo
Malapo
page.text:
[[Image:Malapo.gif|right|350px|thumb|Malapo (kolo)]] Ko '''Malapo''' ko e kolo ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta, ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e manga tolu ki he tokelau pe tonga ʻo e vahe, mo [[Holonga (Tongatapu)|Holonga]].
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:category:Luani|Luani]], ʻoku ʻiloʻi foki ko ''Tāufatoutai''.
Ko e kalapu fakatonga ongoongoa ko e ''Afoeteau'' ia.
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°201|175°153}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Talau
page.category: Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[Image:Talau.gif|right|350px|thumb|Talau (kolo + moʻunga)]] Ko '''Talau''' ko e tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻo [[Neiafu]] ia, ofi ki he moʻunga ko e '''ʻAlo-i-Talau''' (māʻolunga mita ʻe 131).
Ko e fale mahaki ''Ngū'' ʻoku ofi ʻene tuʻu ki Talau.
Ko e patele Sānele ([[Pierre Chanel]]) naʻe aʻu ki Talau ʻi 1837, feinga ʻo kamata he [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] ʻi Vavaʻu. Naʻe ʻikai te ne ola, kā ʻosi he taʻu siʻisiʻi, naʻe tupu ʻa e siasi. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°645|173°993}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Fungamisi
page.category: saienisi ʻo e fetuʻu
Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[Image:Fungamisi.gif|right|350px|thumb|Fungamisi (kolo + funga)]] [[File:Neiafu church.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko e fale lotu, Sangato Sōsefo]] Ko '''Fungamisi''' ko e tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻo [[Neiafu]] ia.
ʻOku lahi ngaahi hotele, taulanga mo e hā fua i ai maʻa e kau takimamata, fakatātā ko e ''Hotele palataisi fakatuʻapuleʻanga''. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e fale lotu lahi ''Sangato Sōsefo'' ʻo e [[siasi Katolika Loma]], mo e fale ako ko e [[Kolisi Petelō Sanele]].
ʻI he feituʻu māʻolunga taha ʻo e ngaahi funga, ofi ki he faʻitoka, ʻoku tuʻu ha kiʻi maka fakamanatu. Ko e tangata fakasaienisi ʻo e fetuʻu mei [[Silovakia]] ko [[Milan Rastislav Štefánik]] naʻa ne vakai ki he mate ʻa e laʻā kakato ʻi he 29 ʻEpeleli 1911.
{{feituʻu Tonga|18°654|173°981}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Vavaʻu]] [[Category:saienisi ʻo e fetuʻu]]

page.title: Tuʻanekivale
page.text:
[[Image:Tuʻanekivale.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tuʻanekivale (kolo) + Matoto (mātanga) + ʻEneʻio (matātahi)]] Ko '''Tuʻanekivale''' ko e kolo ʻi he tokelauhahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
ʻOku ofi ia ki he matatahi fakaʻofoʻofa ko '''ʻEneʻio'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. Ko [[Palefau]] ko e ʻeiki lahi, ka naʻe ʻikai hoko ki ha [[:Category:Nōpele|nōpele]] ia.
==Matoto== Ko e meʻa makehe ko Matoto. Ko e feituʻu ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e vao, ka ʻoku ʻikai tupu ha fuʻu ʻakau ʻi ai, ko e musie pē. ʻOku tokua ko e ʻuhinga naʻe nofo ʻi ai ha [[tēvolo]] ko '''Tuʻi Matoto''' hono hingoa. Ko e kiʻi maka ʻi he tafaʻaki tokelau ʻoku ui ko e ''kali ʻa Mototo''.
Ko Matoto ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he matāliku hahake, ʻoku ui foki ''Hopo ʻa e māhina''. ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa e ngaahi hopo ʻa e māhina kātoa ʻi Matoto. ʻOku tokua kapau ʻe ʻikai te ke longolongo ʻi he taimi hopo, ʻe pulia ʻa e māhina ʻi he ʻaoʻaofia pea ʻe ʻikai te ke lava sio ki heʻene hopo.
==Talatupuʻa== ʻOku ua ʻa e kolo, ko Kei pea mo Tuʻanakivale ka kuo hoko pē he ʻaho ni ʻo ngāueʻaki ‘a e Tuʻanekivale.
Ko Tuʻanakivale pē ʻoku ʻiloa he ʻaho ni ko Tuʻanekivale. ʻOku tuʻu ʻa Kei ki he hihifo kae hahake ʻa Tuʻanakivale.
Ko e hingoa ‘o e kolo ni ʻoku pehē ʻe he talanoa ko e tupu mei he talatupuʻa .
Ko Kei tokua ko e ʻuluaki kolo he ʻoku tuʻu ia ʻo hanga ki he Tonga ka ‘oku aʻu mai ki ai ‘a e foʻi tafe lahi ʻoku haʻu mei koloa pea naʻe pehe naʻe tuʻu ʻi Kei ʻa e taulanga lelei koeʻuhi ko ʻene nonga ʻo feʻunga mo e folau vakala ʻo e ‘aho ko ia. Naʻe tala mai tokua naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e uafu lelei mo e fale ʻi he fanga ko eni ʻoku ʻiloa ko Matatoa.
Ko e ʻeiki tauhi fonua ko Balefau (Palefau) ko e tehina ʻo [[Niukapu]]. ʻOku pehē ‘e he talanoa na’a na tupu hake ʻi Nualei, Tongatapu, pea na hola mei ai ʻi he vela ‘a e kolo hono tutu e Tukuʻaho. Pea na fononga holo ai pe ‘o aʻu mai ki Tuʻanekivale. Naʻe mali ʻa e ongo tangata mo e ongo ʻofefine ʻo Feteini ([[Fetuani]]).
Ko e hingoa matāpule ia ʻoku ngāueʻaki ‘e he kāinga ko Fetuani pea ne toki lahi hono fakanofo ʻe Palefau ʻene matuʻa fai fatongia ʻo hangē ko ia ko Taupeaʻulo, ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi ngahau ʻa Palefau naʻe ne ngāueʻaki lolotonga ʻa e tau fakafonua ʻa e fonua ni he 1797 ʻo aʻu mai ki he 1852, ko Makafilia, ko Tangi-ke-ua, ko e tau hingoa ki he [[Tahisi]] naʻa ʻomi ʻe lotu Faka-Kalisitiane ki he kolo ni.
==Alā meʻa pehē== http://www.tuanekivale.net/ ko e feituʻu ʻi he vaheope ki he fetaulakiʻanga ʻo e kāinga Tuʻanekivale ʻi māmani katoa.
Ko e minisitā ako ʻo Tonga (2007— ), ko [[Tēvita Palefau]], ʻoku haʻu mei heni.
{{feituʻu Tonga|18°626|173°921}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga
page.text:
[[Image:Tuʻahivi.gif|right|thumb|350px|Tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi, mape]] [[Image:Tuʻahivi 2.jpg|right|thumb|397px|Tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi (Hunga—Fonualei), faitā]] Ko e '''tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga''' ko e ʻotu fonua moʻunga vela ia, ʻoku ʻāluloa mei [[ʻAta]] ʻi he tongatongahihifo ki [[Tafahi]] ʻi he tokelautokelauhahake. ʻOku ne huʻufataha mo e [[Kelimoana ʻo Tonga]], ʻi he mamaʻo ʻo e kilomita ʻe 200 pe ofi ki ai. ʻOku ui foki ko e '''Ngaope Tofua''' (Tofua volcanic arc). Ko e ngaahi motu ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tuʻahivi:
hingoamāʻolungalaku fakamuimui
[[ʻAta]]382 mfuoloa
[[Hunga (Haʻapai)|Hunga Haʻapai]]128 mMaʻasi 2009
[[Hunga (Haʻapai)|Hunga Tonga]]149 m1988
[[Fonuafoʻou (Haʻapai)|Fonuafoʻou]] (Falcon Island)-17 m1936
[[Tofua]]515 mlolotonga
[[Kao]]1046 mfuoloa
[[Metis Island]]< 0Sune 1995
[[Home Island]]75 mʻAokosi 2006
[[Late]]540 m1854
[[Tokū]]1846 ?
[[Fonualei (moʻungaafi)|Fonualei]]180 m2001
[[Niuatoputapu]]157 m3-miliona
[[Tafahi]]560 mfuoloa
[[Hakau Curacoa]]-33 m1979
Ko e ngaahi motu mo ʻenau māʻolunga < 0, ʻoku ʻi lalo fukahi moana he taimí ni, ʻa ia ʻoku toe ha hakau pē. Naʻe aʻu ʻi ʻolunga ʻa Metis island ki he mita ʻe 43 ʻi 1995. Naʻe aʻu ʻa Fonuafoʻou ki he mita ʻe teau he taimi ʻi niʻihi. ʻOku toe ha motu lahi ʻe taha, kae ʻikai tuʻu ʻi he tuʻahivi tatau.
[[Niuafoʻou]]260 m1985
*D. Stanley; South Pacific handbook *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/region.cfm?rnum=0403 [[category:siokālafi ʻo Tonga]] [[category:ngaahi tohi hokohoko]]

page.title: ʻEuafoʻou
page.text:
[[Image:ʻEuafoʻou.gif|right|thumb|350px|ʻEuafoʻou (ngaahi kolo)]] Ko '''ʻEuafoʻou''', pe '''ʻEua Niuafoʻuou''', ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi loto [[ʻEua]]. Naʻe hiki ki ai ʻa e kakai mei [[Niuafoʻou]] ʻi 1946 ʻosi he puna ʻa e afi ʻi ai.
Kae ko e hingoa ʻEuafoʻou, ʻoku tātātaha haʻane ngāueʻaki. ʻOku ne ngaohiʻaki he kolo koʻeni (mei he tokelau ki tonga): *'''Angahā''' 21.362° S 174.957° W *'''Futu''' 21.366° S 174.955° W *'''ʻEsia''' 21.371° S 174.956° W *'''Mataʻaho''' 21.373° S 174.952° W (tafaʻaki hahake pē ʻo e hala loto ?) *'''Sapaʻata''' 21.375° S 174.955° W *'''Fataʻulua''' 21.377° S 174.955° W *'''Muʻa''' 21.380° S 174.954° W *'''Tongamamaʻo''' 21.385° S 174.953° W *'''Petani''' 21.388° S 174.953° W Kā ʻoku lotokehekehe ko e kakai ʻe taha mo e kakai ʻe taha ʻoku ʻi fē ʻa e kamataʻanga ʻo e kolo ʻe taha mo e ngataʻanga ʻo e kolo ʻe taha. Ko e kolo ʻo [[Pangai (ʻEua)|Pangai]] ʻoku ʻikai kau ki he vahenga ʻEuamotuʻa.
Naʻe hiki foki ʻa e ngaahi hingoa ʻo ʻenau kolo ʻe he kakai Niuafoʻou ʻi heʻenau ō mai ki ʻEua.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°375|174°954}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻatuʻa
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻatuʻa-Kolomaile.gif|right|thumb|350px|Haʻatuʻa + Kolomaile (kolo)]] ʻOku tala mai ʻe he taha: ko '''Haʻatuʻa''' ko e kolo ia, mo '''Kolomaile''' ko hono tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻi he hahake ʻo e hala loto.
ʻOku tala mai ʻe he taha: ko '''Haʻatuʻa''' ko e kolo ia ʻi hihifo, ko '''Kolomaile''' ko e kolo ia ʻi hahake, takatakaʻi he hala loto.
Kae ʻoku pau, ko e (ongo) kolo ia maʻa e kakai mei [[ʻAta]], kuo ō mai ki ʻEua ʻi 1863. Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°393|174°962}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Tufuvai
ʻOhonua
page.text:
[[Image:ʻOhonua.gif|right|thumb|350px|ʻOhonua (kolo)]] Ko e kolomuʻa ʻo [[ʻEua]] ko '''ʻOhonua''' ia, ko e kolo lahi taha ʻo e motu, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he matāfonua, takatakaʻi he muivai ʻo e vaitafe pē ʻe taha ʻi Tonga. Ko e feituʻu ʻo e taulanga ko ''Nafanua''.
ʻI he kolo, ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi fale ʻo e puleʻanga, mo e pangikē mo e hā fua. ʻI loto kolo, ʻi he ʻesi ʻoku ui '''ʻEsi ʻo Tāone''', ʻoku tuʻu ʻi i ha fuʻu [[toa]] lahi, ʻoku ui ko '''Taha kae afe'''. Ko e hingoa tenetene ia ʻo e koló ni.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°344|174°954}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Taʻanga (ʻEua)
Houma (ʻEua)
Hunga
page.text: {{fakaʻuhingakehe}} * ko e kiʻi konga, ko e tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻi [[Nukuʻalofa]] * ko e motu lahi mo e mahuʻinga, mo hono kolomuʻa ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] → '''[[Hunga (Vavaʻu)]]''' * ko e ongo motu siʻi ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]] mo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] → '''[[Hunga (Haʻapai)]]'''

page.title: Hunga (Haʻapai)
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:HungaHPA.gif|right]] Ko e ongo kiʻi motu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] mo [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tuʻu ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. Ko '''Hunga Tonga''' ʻi hahake, ko '''Hunga Haʻapai''' ʻi hihifo, kae mahalo pē ʻoku na fakafetongi. ʻEna lōloa takitaha ko e kilomita ʻe 2, ʻena mamaʻo ko e kilomita ʻe 4. Ko Hunga Tonga hono māʻolunga ko e mita ʻe 149, ko Hunga Haʻapai ko e mita ʻe 128.
Ko ongo motu ko e moʻungaafi kinaua, ko e ngaahi toenga ʻo e ngotoʻumu lahi ʻe taha. Ko e feituʻu laku ʻi 1912 mo 1937 naʻe tuʻu kilomita ʻe 3.0 ki he tonga ʻo Hunga Tonga. Kae ko e puna ʻa e afi fakamuimui ʻi 1988, naʻe hoko mei ha feituʻu kilomita ʻe taha tongatongahahake ʻo Hunga Haʻapai.
Hili he ngaahi mafuike lolotonga he uike ʻi muʻa, naʻe kamata laku he 16 Maʻasi 2009, mahalo pē ki he hihifo ʻo Hunga Haʻapai. Naʻe tuku ʻa e laku ʻosi he uike ʻe taha.
Naʻa ne toe laku mei he vaeua ʻo Tisema 2014 ki he vaeua ʻo Sānuali 2015.
[[File:Hungatonga aster 20090326.jpg|thumb|720px|center|Ko e ʻata fakalanuloi mei he ASTER satelaite ʻi he 25 Maʻasi 2009. Ko ha motu foʻou ʻoku hā ʻi he tonga ʻo Hunga Haʻapai. ʻOku haaʻi ʻuliʻuli ko Hunga Haʻapai ko e ʻuhinga naʻe mate ʻa heʻene ngaahi ʻakau kotoa pe ʻufiʻufiʻi he efuefu. ʻOku kulokula ʻa Hunga Tonga ko e ʻuhinga ʻoku kei moʻui ʻa heʻene ngaahi ʻakau.]] *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-04= *http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/natural_events/tonga_hunga_eruption_180309.shtml {{Feituʻu Tonga|20°54|174°39}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Fonuafoʻou
Fonualei
Tokū
page.category: Vavaʻu

page.title: Late
page.category: Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[Image:Late.gif|right|350px|thumb|Late (motu)]] Ko '''Late''' ko e motu lahi ia (taiamita: kilomita ʻe 6), ʻi he hihifo ʻo [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], tuʻu ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. Ko e moʻungaafi ia, naʻe puna ʻa e afi ʻi 1790 pea fakamuimui ʻi 1854. Hono māʻolunga ko ʻe mita ʻe 540. Naʻe ʻikai te ne laku ʻi 1854, ko [[Fonualei]] pē ia.
ʻI muʻa ʻene aʻu mai ki Vavaʻu, ko e papālangi ʻuluaki ia, naʻe folau ʻa Don Francisco Antonio Maurelle ki Late ʻi Fēpueli 1781, ʻosi ʻene ʻaʻahi ki Fonualei. Naʻe tali ia ʻe he kakai, kae naʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ha inu vai. Monū, ko hono aʻu hoko, ko Vavaʻu ia, naʻe lahi sai ange.
ʻOku ʻikai nofo ha tokotaha ʻi Late he taimi ni. Ko e hako ʻo ʻene kakai nofo ʻi [[Hunga (Vavaʻu)]] he taimi ni.
ʻOku pununga pē he taimí ni ko e [[kōkī]] (kakā) mei [[ʻEua]], naʻe ʻomi ki hē ʻi 1994.
*D. Gerstle; Gentle people, into the heart of Vavaʻu 1781-1973; Tofua press 1973 *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-09= *http://www.fiat.to/eva/eva-43.htm {{Feituʻu Tonga|18°806|174°646}} {{potuʻi}} ʻOku toe ha faitā ʻo Late ʻi he kupu ʻo e [[Home Island]]. [[Category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tofua
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Tofua.Tonga.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tofua (motu) + Lofia (ngotoʻumu)]] [[Image:Tofua.jpg|right|429px|thumb|Tofua faitā]] Ko '''Tofua''' ko e motu lahi ia, ko e moʻungaafi ia mo ha ngotoʻumu ʻi loto, ko e anovai. ʻI he tokelau ʻo e vai, ʻoku tuʻu ha ngotuʻumu siʻi kae loloto mo ha afi taʻengata: ko '''Lofia''' ia. ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e fonua ʻi he hihifo ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. Hono māʻolunga ʻo e moʻunga: ko ʻe mita ʻe 515. Hono māʻolalo ʻo e anovai: ʻikai ʻiloa.
Naʻe vahevahe ʻa e kelekele ʻo e motu ki he kakai. Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻe he puluʻanga ʻa e ngaahi kolo ʻe tolu: *Hokula 19.715° S 175.059° W *Hotaʻane 19.755° S 175.103° W *Manaka 19.760° S 175.028° W Kae ko e ngaahi kolo eni, ʻoku mahaloloto pē. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ngāue ha kakai ʻe 20 pe 50 pē, kae nofo kinautolu ʻi [[Matuku]] pe [[Kotu]] pe ko e hā motu ʻo Lulunga. Ko e ngāue heni ko e ngoue fakatupu kava. *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-06= {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°748|175°065}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Kao
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Kao.gif|right|350px|thumb|Kao (motu)]] Ko '''Kao''' ko e motu lahi ia, ko e moʻungaafi ia. ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e fonua ʻi he hihifo ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. Hono māʻolunga ʻo e moʻunga: ko ʻe mita ʻe 1046, ko e māʻolunga taha ʻi Tonga. Neongo ia, neongo hono ofi ki [[Tofua]], ʻoku mate ʻa e ngotoʻumu ʻo Kao.
Naʻe vahevahe ʻa e kelekele ʻo e motu ki he kakai. Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻe he puluʻanga ʻa e ngaahi kolo ʻe ua: *ʻApikakai 19.648° S 175.016° W *Topuefio 19.690° S 175.025° W Kae ko e ongo kolo eni, ʻoku mahaloloto pē. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ngāue ha kakai ʻe 20 pe 50 pē, kae nofo kinautolu ʻi [[Matuku]] pe [[Kotu]] pe ko e hā motu ʻo Lulunga. Ko e ngāue heni ko e ngoue fakatupu kava. *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-061 {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°669|175°014}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Metis Island
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Metis (2).gif|right|thumb|350px|Afua Metisi]] Naʻe tupu ʻa e motu fakamoʻungaafi mo e foʻou ʻi Sune 1995, mita ʻe 43 ki ʻolunga. Kae ʻoku pulia ʻi lalo fukahi moana he taimi ni. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻe haʻu, taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻe ʻalu. Ko ia ai, ʻoku sai ange ko e hingoa ''Metis shoal'' (Afua Metisi). ʻI he taimi ʻene ʻasi, ʻoku ui foki ko '''Late iki'''.
Ko e afua ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he hihifo ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]], ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-07= {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°18|174°87}} {{potuʻi}} [[Image:Metis_Shoal.jpg|left|thumb|422px|Motu Metisi ʻi 1995]] [[Category:Haʻapai]]

Langitoutai Finefeuiaki

page.title: Nuku Feʻao

Pangikē
page.category: ʻekonomika
page.text:
Ko e '''pangikē''' ko e feituʻu mo e lahi paʻanga ia.
Ko e ngaahi pangikē ʻi Tongá ni: * National reserve bank of Tonga * Tonga development bank - Pangikē fakalakalaka ʻo Tonga * Bank South Pacific (ʻi muʻa: Westpac bank of Tonga) * Australia New Zealand bank (ANZ) * Malaysian Borneo federation bank (MBf) * Pacific International Commercial bank (tapuni Siulai 2016)
[[Category:ʻekonomika]]

page.title: Paʻanga (ʻakau)/en
page.text:
When the first Europeans came to Tonga they brought coins with them, which the Tongans believed to be their shuffle stones. The Tongan shuffle stones were the seeds of the '''paʻanga''' vine. So the word ''paʻanga'' came in use also to mean 'money'.
==Etymology== ''Entada scandens'', native name '''paʻanga''', is a bean-like vine producing large pods with large reddish brown seeds. The seeds are roundish, up to 5 cm diameter and 1 or 2 cm thick. When strung together they are used as anklets, part of the [[kailao]] dance costume. They were also used as playing pieces in an ancient disc-throwing game, [[lafo]].
On 1 December 1806 Tongans attacked the passing ship ''Port-au-Prince'' in order to take it over. They failed, as the crew sank the vessel. The chief of [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] at that time, [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)]], resorted to the next plan, plunder what ever was worthwhile. On his inspection tour he found the ship's cash. Not knowing what money was he considered the coins as paʻanga. Finally, not seeing anything of value, he ordered the remains of the ship to be burned. It was much later that [[Tokiukamea|William Mariner]], one of the survivors of this attack and his protegé, told him that those pieces of metal were of great value and not merely playing stones.
When Tonga introduced decimal currency, it decided not to call the main unit the ''dollar'' because the native word, ''tola'' translated into a pig's snout, the soft end of a coconut, or, in vulgar language, a mouth. ''Paʻanga,'' on the other hand, translated into money.
Mariner also passed down the following statement of ''Finow'' (as he called him): :''If money were made of iron and could be converted into knives, axes and chisels there would be some sense in placing a value on it; but as it is, I see none. If a man has more yams than he wants, let him exchange some of them away for pork. [...] Certainly money is much handier and more convenient but then, as it will not spoil by being kept, people will store it up instead of sharing it out as a chief ought to do, and thus become selfish. [...] I understand now very well what it is that makes the papālangi [white men] so selfish — it is this money!'' See also [[paʻanga]] (money). {{foki||Paʻanga (ʻakau)}}

page.title: Paʻanga (ʻakau)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |hingoa=Paʻanga |name=Seabeans |faitā=Entada phaseoloides, pods.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |tribus=[[MIMOSEAE]] |genus= Entada |species= phaseoloides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Elmer Drew Merrill|Merr.]] |fehokotaki= s }} [[Image:Paʻanga.jpg|thumb|left|Ko e tengaʻi paʻanga]] [[File:Entada phaseoloides MHNT.BOT.2007.26.55.jpg|thumb|left|]] [[File:Entada africana MHNT.BOT.2013.22.53.jpg|thumb|''Entada africana'']] [[File:Entada abyssinica MHNT.BOT.2009.13.16.jpg|thumb|''Entada abyssinica'']] [[File:Entada polyphylla MHNT.BOT.2007.27.17.jpg|thumb|''Entada polyphylla'']]
Ko e '''paʻanga''' pe '''laupaʻanga''' ko e ʻakau totolo ʻi Tongá ni ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Entada scandens''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *valai-paʻanga; ngāueʻaki ʻa e foʻileá ni maʻa e fuʻu ʻakau ʻo e paʻanga, pea ko e paʻanga maʻa e ngaahi tenga pē. *paʻanga ʻa e kumā; tatau mo e [[vālai]].
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *fue inu, tupe ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *wa lai ([[lea fakafisi]]) *kaka ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko e ngāueʻaki ʻo e ngaahi tengaʻi ʻoku ʻi he vaʻinga onoʻaho ko e [[lafo]]. ʻI he taimi naʻe folau ʻa e kau papālangi ʻuluaki ki Tonga (teautaʻu hono 18), naʻe tui ʻa e kakai ʻo e fonuá ni ko ʻenau silini ko e tupu lafo ia. Ko ia ai he taimí ni ko e paʻanga ko e foʻi lea foki ʻo e maka fefakatauʻaki. Vakai foki ki he [[paʻanga]].
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}} {{English|more}}

page.title: Haʻalaufuli
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻalaufuli.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haʻalaufuli (kolo) + Keitahi (matātahi)]] Ko '''Haʻalaufuli''' ko e kolo ʻi he tokelauhahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, ʻoku taha ai mo [[Taʻanea]].
ʻOku ofi ia ki he matatahi lahi ko '''Keitahi''', ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]], ʻa ia ko e tuʻi fefine. ʻE haʻu e lahi kakai ki ai he ngaahi Tokonaki pe ʻaho mālōlō pehē.
Ko e toenga ʻo e vahe ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Afu|Afu]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°606|173°934}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Taʻanea
ʻUtui
Okoa
page.text:
[[Image:Okoa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Okoa (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Okoa''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he hahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, kae ʻoku fohokotaki ki ai mo e lākanga. Ko e hū ʻo e lākanga ʻi he motu, ko e feituʻu ia ʻo e kolo mo e hingoa tatau. Ka ko e konga ʻe taha ʻo e kolo ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he motu lahi.
Okoa (kolo) 18°649 S 173°952 W
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻilakepa|Tuʻilakepa]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°651|173°951}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Koloa (Vavaʻu)
page.text:
[[Image:Koloa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Koloa (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Koloa''' ko e motu ʻi he hahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, kae ko e motu, mo e kiʻi motu ʻi he vahaʻa, ko [[Uatoloa]], ʻoku fehokohokotaki ki ai mo e lākanga. Ko e hūʻanga ʻo e lākanga ʻi he motu, ko e feituʻu ia ʻo e kiʻi kolo ko [[Holeva]]. Ko e kolo lahi mo e hingoa tatau ki he motu, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he hihifo: '''Koloa (kolo)''' 18°642 S 173°937 W
Ko e ngaahi toafa ʻi he lākanga, ko e feituʻu ia ʻo e malaʻevakapuna foʻou, ʻe langa ʻanai.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°643|173°931}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Holeva
page.text:
[[Image:Holeva.gif|right|350px|thumb|Holeva (kolo)]] Ko '''Holeva''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he motu ʻo [[Koloa (Vavaʻu)|Koloa]] ʻi he hahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, ofi ki he hūʻanga ʻo e lākanga ki [[Uatoloa]] pe ki [[Tuʻanekivale]].
ʻI onoʻaho ko ha ''holeva'' ko e ngaahi feituʻu kotoa ʻoku lava ʻo ʻafio ʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ʻi ai.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°638|173°922}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tefisi
Longomapu
page.text:
[[Image:Longomapu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Longomapu (kolo)]] Ko '''Longomapu''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tongahihifo ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:category:Veikune|Veikune]].
Ko e punake ko [[Feke Tutuila]] naʻe lōloa ʻene nofo ʻi ai.
Ko e fanga ʻo Longomapu, ko e tuʻuanga ia ʻo e papālangi ʻuluaki naʻe folau ki Vavaʻu, ko [[Maurelle]] ia ʻi Fēpueli 1781. Naʻe ui ʻa e kōmakí ni ʻe ia ko e ''Puerto del refugio'' (taulanga ʻo e ungaʻanga). ʻOsi he ʻilo ʻa e fanga ʻo [[Neiafu]], (Lolo ʻa Halaevalu), naʻe ʻoatu ʻa e hingoá ni ki ai, naʻe hoko ki he ''Puatalefusi'' he kuongá ni.
{{feituʻu Tonga|18°644|174°057}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tuʻanuku
page.text:
[[Image:Tuʻanuku.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tuʻanuku (kolo)]] Ko '''Tuʻanuku''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tongahihifo ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, ʻi he takinga vai ki [[Neiafu]]. Ko e muitolotolo ʻi he hūʻanga ʻoku ui ko ''Tavakefaiʻana'', ko e hingoa tenetene ia ʻo e kiʻi kolo mo ʻene ʻeiki foki.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]], (tafaʻi mo [[:category:Malupō|Malupō]]).
Ko e [[taʻovala]] [[kuta]] ʻoku ne haʻu mei he feituʻú ni. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°661|174°033}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Taoa
Feletoa
page.text:
[[Image:Feletoa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Feletoa (kolo)]] Ko '''Feletoa''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tokelau ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e tuʻi mo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Naʻe kolotau ia ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e teautaʻu hono 19, pea naʻe tau lahi ʻi 1807 pe 1808 ʻe [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala II ʻi Feletoa (Fangupō)]] mo [[Toeʻumu]]. Naʻe tanu ʻa Fīnau ʻi heni, ʻoku toe hono faʻitoka he ʻahó ni. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°608|173°972}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Leimātuʻa
page.text:
[[Image:Leimatuʻa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Leimātuʻa (kolo)]] Ko '''Leimātuʻa''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tokelau ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Fotu|Fotu]], mo e ngaahi tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Fulivai|Fulivai]] mo [[:Category:Tuʻipelehake|Tuʻipelehake]] ʻoku ofi.
ʻOku ʻiloa ʻa e hala ʻi loto Leimātuʻa, ko e manga ono ia, ʻalu ki he *tokelau, (hala lahi) ki he malaʻe vakapuna motuʻa (Lupepauʻu). *tokelauhahake, ki [[Holonga (Vavaʻu)|Holonga]] *hahake, ki [[Taʻanea]] *tongahahake, (hala lahi) ki [[Feletoa]] *tonga, ki he matātahi ʻo e [[Vaipūua]] *hihifo, hala matāfonua ki [[Tefisi]]
ʻOku pehē ʻe he tokotaha ko e [[mānaʻia]] ko [[Lepuhā]] naʻe nofo ʻi heni kae ʻikai ʻi [[Tapana]].
Naʻe ʻi ai ha taimi fuofuoloa naʻe ʻosi pē ʻa e meʻakai ʻi Leimātua, ʻa ia ko e kiki. ʻAho ʻe taha naʻe ʻi ai ha kiki foʻou ʻi he falekoloa, ko e ngaahi kapa pulu ʻi he kapa lahi, kilo ʻe 3 (pāuni ʻe 6). Naʻe fiefia ʻaupito ʻa e tokotaha pea naʻe tā ʻe ia ʻa e kapa ki heʻene mauamau. Naʻe ʻi ai ha kiki ʻi he hala, ngaahi feituʻu kotoa pē. Ko e tauatea ia, naʻe tala ange ʻa e tangatá, maʻa e kapa koeʻuhi naʻe ʻikai heni fuofuoloa.
Mei he taimi ko ia, ko e hingoa fakatenetene ʻo Leimātua ko e '''pāuni ono''' (heliaki: manga ono), pea ʻoku ʻi ai ha tukutala foʻou. Taimi kotoa lolotonga ʻa e ngaahi kātoanga, ko e meʻaʻofa ʻo Leimātuʻa ko e ngaahi kapa pulu ia.
==Tataku== *Tonga- Land, sea and people; Tonga research association, 2011; ISBN 9789829806215 {{feituʻu Tonga|18°599|173°983}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Haʻakio
Makāve
page.text:
[[Image:Makāve.gif|right|350px|thumb|Makāve (kolo)]] Ko '''Makāve''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he hahake ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻiʻāfitu|Tuʻiʻāfitu]], ko hono meʻaʻanga, ko ʻApi-ko-Toalea-ʻo-Kilikilitefua, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi loto kolo.
Ko e tukutala ia; kapau ʻoku faʻeleʻi ʻa e tokotaha ʻi he feituʻú ni, naʻe ʻave ʻe heʻene motuʻa ʻa e maka ʻe taha ki he tuʻunga maka ʻi he muitolotolo fakatonga. ʻA ia ko e hingoa ʻo e kolo: ''maka ave''. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°650|173°966}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Vaimalō
page.text:
[[Image:Vaimalo.gif|right|350px|thumb|Vaimalō (kolo)]] ʻOku tuʻu ʻa '''Vaimalō''' ʻi he Vahe Hihifo ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu pea ʻi he tafaʻaki fakahihifo ʻo e Hala Fakakavakava ka e tuʻu mai ʻa [[Neiafu]] mei hono tafaʻaki fakahahake.
Ko '''Vaimalō''' ʻoku kau ia ʻi he kolo siʻi ʻo e Vahenga Fonua Hihifo ʻo Vavaʻu. ʻI hono lau fakafonua ʻo e kakai ʻo e kolo ni fakamuimui ʻi he 2005 naʻa nau kakato ki he toko 187; naʻe toko 119 ʻa e kakai lalahi ʻi he taʻu 18 ki ʻolunga pea na ʻe toko 68 ʻa e fanau iiki ʻihe taʻu 17 ki lalo<ref>(2005 Senisā L.K.FkS.: Vahenga Hihifo-ʻO.Kov.,2005)</ref>. ʻOku feʻunga ʻae ngaahi ʻapi lesisita ʻoku nofoʻi ʻi he kolo ni mo e ʻapi 'e 32<ref>(Fkkt: ʻA.L.FkP.-ʻO.Kov.,2005)</ref>.
Ko '''Vaimalō''' na 'e toki fakahoko pe ia ko e "Kolo" ʻi he tofi fonua Fakavahe Kolo ʻa e Puleʻanga na ʻe fakahoko ʻi he ongo taʻu 1881 mo e 1914 (Fkkt: V.K.FkF.-ʻO.Kov.,1881,1914). ʻI he ki muʻa ai ko '''Vaimalō''' hono kotoa, ko e "ʻApi" meʻaʻanga pe ia ʻo e tama ʻa Finau Fisi mo Luseane ʻIfangahihifo ko [[Naufahu Mapilitoa]]. Naʻe mali ʻa Naufahu Mapilitoa mo Tulukava ʻo Taoa ʻo ʻi ai ʻe na tama, ko e tamasiʻi naʻa na fakahingoa ko Avala-ʻae-tau. ʻI he pekia atu ʻa Naufahu Mapilitoa naʻe hoko atu ho no nofoʻi ʻo '''Vaimalō''' ʻe hono foha mo hona kainga.
Naʻe mali ʻa Avalaʻaetau mo ʻAlilia Funakitoutai ʻo na fanauʻi ʻa e toko fā; #Tevita Taʻofi-kae-tau Tapueluelu #Lesieli Afuhaʻapai #Lavinia Sialehaehae #Salesi Mataele-ʻo-Haʻamea
Ko [[Tevita Taʻofikaetau Tapueluelu]] naʻe fakanofo ia ʻe he [[ʻEne ʻAfio Siaosi Tāufaʻāhau Tupou 1]] ke hoko ia ko e fuofua ʻOfisa Kolo ʻo Neiafu kotoa. Naʻe hiki leva ʻa Tapueluelu mei '''Vaimalō''' ʻo nofo Neiafu pea ne fakahingoa ʻa hono meʻa ʻanga ʻi [[Neiafu]] ko '''Sailoame''' pea ʻoku kei nofo tuku fakaholo pe ai ʻa hono hako ʻo aʻu mai ki he kuonga ni. Ko [[Lesieli Afuhaʻapai]] naʻe mavahe mo ia mei Vaimalō ko 'e ne takai fala ki he tama ko [[Siaosi ʻUlukivaiola Tuita]].
ʻI he mavahe ko ʻeni ʻa e ongo tamaiki lalahi, naʻe vahe ua leva ʻe Lavinia Sialehaehae mo Salesi Mataeleʻohaʻamea ʻa '''Vaimalō'''. Naʻe maʻu ʻe Lavinia ʻa e mata fanga ki tahi hono kotoa pea naʻa ne fakahingoa ʻa hono ʻapi ko '''Muileleu'''. Naʻe maʻu leva ʻe Salesi ʻa e konga fakaloto fonua kotoa ʻo '''Vaimalō''', pea naʻa ne fakahingoa ʻa hono ʻapi ko '''Mohemolanga'''. Ko Lavinia Sialehaehae naʻe paʻa pea naʻe hala ia ha hako. Ko Salesi Mataele-ʻo-Haʻamea naʻe mali ia mo Lavinia mei Faleloa, Haʻapai, ʻo na fanauʻi ʻa e tamasiʻi pea na fakahingoa ia ko [[Salesi Kato-ki-moʻunga Tuʻipulotu]]. ʻI he pekia atu pe ʻa Lavinia Sialehaehae, na ʻe hiki atu leva ʻa Salesi Kato-ki-moʻunga Tuʻipulotu ia ʻo ne nofoʻi ʻa '''Muileleu''', pea foaki ʻe ia ʻa Mohemolanga ki he taha ʻa hono kāinga. Ko e hako mo e kāinga kotoa ʻeni ʻo Salesi Mataele-ʻo-Haʻamea ʻoku nau kei nofoʻi ʻa '''Vaimalō''' ʻi he kuonga ni. ʻOku toe ʻi ai foki mo e kāinga ʻa ʻe ne Kui ko Naufahu Mapilitoa kuo nau maʻu ʻapi ʻi Vaimalō mei [[Niuē]], [[Fisi]], [[Haʻamoa]], mo e [[ʻotu Solomone]].
Ko e hingoa fakatenetene ʻo '''Vaimalō''' ko '''Funga Mapitoa'''. Ko '''Funga Mapitoa''' ko e hingoa ia ʻo e fuʻu maka lahi ʻoku tuʻu ʻi tahi mavahe siʻi pe mei he ngataʻanga fonua ʻo '''Muileleu''' na ʻe fakahingoa ʻe he tuʻi ko [[Siaosi Tupou I]] ko e fakamanatu ʻo [[Naufahu Mapilitoa]].
Ko '''Vaimalō''' ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e Puleʻanga. Ko e ongo motu siʻisiʻi ki he tongahihifo ʻoku ui ko Koloʻuta (18.637° S 174.009° W) mo Kolotahi (18.638° S 174.011° W). Ko e ongo motu ko e tafatofiʻa ʻo [[:category:Veikune|Veikune]] mo [[:category:Tupoutoʻa|Tupoutoʻa]]. ==Tataku== {{feituʻu Tonga|18°634|174°005}} <references/> {{English|translation}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

Houma (Vavaʻu)
Mangia
Mataika (Vavaʻu)
Toula
page.text:
[[Image:Toula.gif|right|350px|thumb|Toula (kolo)]] Ko '''Toula''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tonga mamaʻo ʻo e motu lahi ʻo Vavaʻu, ʻi he hala lahi mei [[Neiafu]] ki he lākanga ki [[Pangaimotu (Vavaʻu)|Pangaimotu]].
Ko e ngaahi tangikē lolo-fefie ʻo Vavaʻu ʻoku tuʻu heni.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°673|173°983}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Db-kole/en
Ngaʻunoho
page.text:
[[Image:Ngaʻunoho.gif|right|thumb|350px|Ngaʻunoho (kolo)]] Ko '''Ngaʻunoho''' ko e kolo ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he motu ʻo [[ʻUtungake]]. Ko ʻene matātahi ʻoku ongoongoa ʻe he taukei mo e sola foki. Ko e kolo ʻoku tatau mo '''Talihau''' ?
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°682|174°021}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: ʻUtungake
page.text:
[[Image:ʻUtungake.gif|350px|thumb|right|ʻUtungake (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''ʻUtungake''' ko e motu ʻi Vavaʻu ia, kae he taimi ni ʻoku fehokotaki mo e [[Pangaimotu (Vavaʻu)|Pangaimotu]] ngāueʻaki ʻa e lākanga. Ko e feituʻu fakaʻofoʻofa pea ʻoku tokolahi ʻa e kau takamamata ʻo haʻu ki ai.
Ko ʻUtungake foki ko e hingoa ʻo e kolo lahi taha ʻi he motu (18.664° S 174.021° W). Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuita|Tuita]].
ʻOku toe ha kolo ʻe taha ʻi he motú ni, ko [[Ngaʻunoho]] ʻi he tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°673|174°025}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: ʻUtulei
Pangaimotu (Vavaʻu)
page.category: Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[File:PangaimotuVAV.gif|right|thumb|350px|Pangaimotu (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Pangaimotu''' ko e motu lahi ʻi Vavaʻu ia, kae he taimi ni ʻoku fehokotaki mo e Vavaʻu lahi in hahake, ofi ki [[Toula]], pea ʻoku fehokotaki foki mo e [[ʻUtungake]] ʻi hihifo, ngāueʻaki e ongo lākanga.
Ko Pangaimotu foki ko e hingoa ʻo e kolo lahi taha ʻi he motu (18.683° S 173.998° W).
ʻOku toe ha kiʻi kolo ʻe taha pē ʻi he motú ni, ko [[ʻUtulei]] ia.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e kolo mo hono takatakaʻi, ko e tofiʻa ʻo e tuʻi (tatau ke ke mahalo mei he hingoa). Kae ʻi he motu, ʻoku ʻi ai foki ha ngaahi tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, pea mo [[:Category:Tuita|Tuita]], pea mo [[:Category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]] pea mo [[:Category:Motuʻapuaka|Motuʻapuaka]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°679|174°001}} {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tulie
Pousini
page.text: [[Image:Pousini (1).gif|right|thumb|350px|Pousini (motu)]] [[Image:Pousini.jpg|left|thumb|400px|Ko e motu ʻi heʻene ʻasi mei [[Taʻanea]]]] Ko '''Pousini''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tahi hahake ʻo Vavaʻu, ʻofi ki [[Taʻanea]] mo [[Haʻalaufuli]]. {{kananga|Taka Haʻafuluhao teʻeki sio ʻi Pousini.}}Ko e ʻuhinga: Naʻe toitoi ʻa [[Talafaiva]] ʻi heni lolotonga ʻa e kumi ʻo e ngaahi toʻa ʻo hono ʻohoana. Naʻe ʻikai te nau ʻilo ia. Pe, naʻe nofo heni ko e mānaʻia ko Tūtone. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°609|173°936}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]] Koe mo'oni pe koe motu 'oe mana'ia koia ko Tutoe, ka na'e 'iai e fu'u fale tonga pe ia na'e langa fkfuo potopoto pea. Pea koe kau Siamane na'e fuofua omi 'o nofo i Ha'alaufuli. Pea koe kava 'ae kau Siamane koe GIN ( Sini ) pea na'e fokotu'utu'u takai e kava 'o hange koe pou ia 'oe fale, Pea na'e holoi tounga ki he motu pea lata ki ai e kakai, koe o inu e kava. Na'e ma'u mei ai e Pousini, koe 'uhinga ki he fu'u fale kava.

page.title: Mala
Ovaka
Uho taha
page.category: Fetuʻutakiʻanga
page.text: Ko e foʻi lea mei he Tonga tukufakaholo, ko e '''uho taha'''. Ko e fanga tamasiʻi mei ha faʻē ʻe taha kae tamai kehekehe. Vakai foki ki he ''[[uho tau]]''. {{English|more}} *I.C. Campbell, Island kingdom, Canterbury university press, 1992, 2001 [[Category:Fetuʻutakiʻanga]]

page.title: Uho tau
page.category: Fetuʻutakiʻanga
page.text: Ko e foʻi lea mei he Tonga tukufakaholo, ko e '''uho tau'''. Ko e fanga tamasiʻi mei ha tamai ʻe taha kae faʻē kehekehe. Vakai foki ki he ''[[uho taha]]''. {{English|more}} *I.C. Campbell, Island kingdom, Canterbury university press, 1992, 2001 [[Category:Fetuʻutakiʻanga]]

page.title: Uho tau/en
page.text: In traditional Tongan society it was quite normal for a man (especially a chief) to spread his seed over several women. In this way he avoided (sometimes fatal) jealousy between the different families. Later when his sons had grown up he would select the best one to succeed him in his position. By consequence all these sons were rivals, vying for their father's blessing. As such the term '''uho tau''' - fighting navelstring - for brothers with the same father but different mothers. {{foki||Uho tau}}

page.title: Uho taha/en
page.text: In traditional Tongan society it was quite normal for a woman (especially a chiefess) to bear children from several men, whether or not she was still unmarried or already married with one of them. The term "illigitimate" did not exist in that time. In any case the sons from such a mother were supposed to support each other, especially the oldest taking care of his younger brothers. There was no need for rivalry among them. As such the term '''uho taha''' - united navelstring - for brothers of the same mother but different fathers. {{foki||Uho taha}}

page.text: {{Fakaʻuhingakehe}} *Ko e kiʻi motu ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], ofi ki [[Kapa]] → '''[[Nuku (Kapa)]]''' *Ko e kiʻi motu ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], ofi ki [[Okoa]] → '''[[Nuku (Okoa)]]''' *Ko e kiʻi motu ʻi [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] → '''[[Nuku (Haʻapai)]]''' *Ko e nōpele, meʻa ʻi [[Kolonga]] → '''[[:Category:Nuku|Nuku]]'''

page.text:
[[Image:Nuku-(Kapa).gif|right|thumb|350px|Nuku (motu)]] [[Image:Nuku Island Vava'u.jpg|left|350px|thumb|ʻOku manakoa ʻe he kau takimamata maʻa e kiʻi kaimeʻakai]] Ko '''Nuku''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu, ofi ki [[Kapa]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e taumafa hoatā ʻe he tuʻi [[Siaosi Tupou V]] ʻi he ʻaho 1 Sēpitema 2008, ʻosi hono hilifaki kalauni.
{{feituʻu Tonga|18°712|174°044}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Aʻa
page.category: Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[File:Aʻa.gif|right|thumb|350px|Aʻa (motu)]] Ko '''Aʻa''' ko e motu ia ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu, ofi ki [[Kapa]].
Ko ha fale toputapu ia ʻo [[Fehuluni]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°742|174°047}} {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: ʻOto
Luakapa
Kapa
page.text:
[[Image:Kapa (2).gif|right|thumb|350px|Kapa (motu + kolo) mo e ʻAna pekepeka]] Ko '''Kapa''' ko e motu lahi ia ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu. ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e kolo ʻe fā: [[ʻOtea]], [[Vakataumai]] ʻoku pipiki mo [[Falevai]], pea mo '''Kapa (kolo)''' ʻi he tongahahake (18.719° S 174.024° W).
Ko e feituʻu ʻo Kapa (kolo) mo ʻOtea, ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, kaekehe ko e takatakaiʻi ʻo Vakataumai mo Falevai ʻoku kau ki he tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Fakatulolo|Fakatulolo]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e '''Toa ko Teisina'''.
Ko e ʻana ʻo e pekepeka ʻi he tafaʻaki tokelau, ʻoku manakoa ia ʻe he kau taki mamata, sio ki he fanga [[Pekepeka (manupuna)|pekepeka]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°705|174°030}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

Hunga (Vavaʻu)
page.text:
[[Image:Hunga.gif|right|thumb|350px|Hunga (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Hunga''' ko e motu lahi ia ʻi he hihifo ange ʻo Vavaʻu. Ko hono hingoa tenetene ko '''Fā-ko-Avahungalu''' pe '''Vaonukonuka''' ia. Ko hono kolo ʻoku ui foki, ko '''Hunga (kolo)''' (18.685° S 174.122° W).
Ko e tahi ʻi he tafaʻaki tongahihifo, meimei ha ano, ʻoku kāpui ʻe he motu lahi mo [[Kalau (Vavaʻu)|Kalau]] pea mo [[Fofoa]] ʻoku ʻiloʻi ko '''Valetoamamaha'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Fulivai|Fulivai]], kae ko e muileleu tonga ʻo e motu ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻilakepa|Tuʻilakepa]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°678|174°122}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

Ovalau
page.text:
[[Image:Ovalau (1).gif|right|thumb|350px|Ovalau (motu)]] Ko '''Ovalau''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ofi ki [[Ovaka]] ʻi he tongahihifo ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Ko e tupuʻanga taha hono hingoa mo e motu mahuʻinga ko Ovalau ʻi [[Fisi]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°748|174°079}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Moʻunu (Vavaʻu)
page.text:
[[Image:MoʻunuVAV.gif|right|thumb|350px|Moʻunu (motu)]] Ko '''Moʻunu''' ko e kiʻi motu fakaʻofoʻofa ia ofi ki [[Ovaka]] ʻi he tongahihifo ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e feituʻu ia ʻo e ''Mounu island resort''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°748|174°070}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Sisia
page.text:
[[Image:Sisia.gif|right|thumb|350px|Sisia (motu)]] Ko '''Sisia''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu, ʻi he lotomālie ʻo [[Kapa]] mo [[Ovaka]] mo [[ʻEuakafa]] mo [[Nuapapu]].
Ko e tupuʻanga taha ʻa e hono hingoa mo [[Cicia]] ʻi [[Fisi]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°728|174°054}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Tahifehifa
Taula
Taunga
page.text:
[[Image:Taunga.gif|right|thumb|350px|Taunga (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Taunga''' ko e motu siʻisiʻi kae motu mahuʻinga ʻi he pupunga motu tonga ʻo Vavaʻu. Kapau momoʻa ʻa e tahi, ʻoku pipiki ʻa ʻene afua mo [[Ngau]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e kolo mo e hingoa tatau, ko '''Taunga (kolo)''' (18.741° S 174.014° W).
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:ʻAkauʻola|ʻAkauʻola]].
ʻI he ʻaho 2 Maʻasi 2007 naʻe lisi ʻa e konga lahi taha ʻo e motú ni, ko e ʻeka ʻe 28 ki he ''Warwick International Hotels'' maʻa e taʻu ʻe 99, koeʻuhi te nau fielanga ʻa e hōtele mamafa, fetuʻu ʻe 4 pe 5.
*http://www1.tonga-now.to/Article.aspx?ID=2435 {{feituʻu Tonga|18°742|174°013}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Iki Tupou Fulivai
page.text: {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Fulivai |hokohoko= Fulivai IT |ʻaho fakanofo= kamataʻanga 1900 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= |hoko= |}} ʻOku ʻiloa foki ko '''Iki Lolohea''' mei [[Lifuka]], kae nofo ʻi [[Neiafu]] {{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga= houʻeiki |hokohoko= Fulivai IT |maama= tangata |tamai= |faʻē= |ʻaho fanauʻi= 18xx |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Temaleti Levaitai Tupou |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|Iki Tupou Fulivai Talolakepa||||||||}} |}}*http://www.kaianuanufamily.com/
