page.title: Fonuafoʻou (Haʻapai)
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Fonuafoʻou.gif|right|350px|thumb|Fonuafoʻou (motu (taimi ʻe niʻihi))]] Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻi heʻene puna ʻa e afi, ko '''Fonuafoʻou''' ko e konga fonua moʻoni. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] mo [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tuʻu ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]].
Kae ʻosi ʻa e laku, ʻoku kai ʻa e fonua ʻe he tahi, pea ʻoku vave ʻene puli ʻi lalo fukahi moana. Ko e laku fakamuimui naʻe ʻi 1936; he taimí ni ko e fonua, hono lototo ko e mita ʻe 17 (hifo mei he mita ʻe 150 ʻi 1933). Naʻá ne pulia ʻi lalo fukahi moana ʻi 1949.
ʻOku ʻiloa foki ko ''Falcon island'', koeʻuhi ko e kau papālangi naʻe sio ki ai ʻuluaki ko e kauvaka ʻo e ''HMS Falcon'' ʻi 1865. Mei he taimi ē ki he taimí ni naʻe ʻasi mo pulia tuʻonima ʻa e motu. Naʻe laku ʻi 1885, 1927, 1933.
==Ngaahi mape fakahisitōlia== <gallery> File:Fonuafoou tonga 1889.jpg|Mape mei 1889 File:Fonuafoon tonga 1928.jpg|Mape mei 1928 </gallery>
*http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-05=
{{Feituʻu Tonga|20°32|174°42}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Fonuafoʻou (Vavaʻu)
Fonualei (moʻungaafi)
page.category: Vavaʻu
page.text:
[[Image:Fonualei-(moʻungaafi).gif|right|350px|thumb|Fonualei (motu)]] [[Image:Fonualei.jpg|right|350px|thumb|ʻAta mei vavā ʻo e NASA]] Ko '''Fonualei''' ko e motu ia, ʻi he tokelau ange kae ʻoku ofi ki [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], tuʻu ʻi he [[tuʻahivi fakamoʻungaafi ʻo Tonga]]. Ko e moʻungaafi ia, naʻe puna ʻa e afi fakamuimui ʻi 2001. Hono māʻolunga ko ʻe mita ʻe 180. Ko e laku lahi naʻe ʻi Sune 1846, naʻe laku ia lolotonga he māhina ʻe niʻihi pea ʻufiʻufi ʻaupito ʻa Vavaʻu ʻe he efuefu. Ko [[Tokū]], mo [[Late]] mo e moʻungaafi ʻe taha, mahalo pē naʻe ʻikai laku, ka naʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi vaka naʻe hala ʻe kinautolu ʻi he motu totonu. * 1791: pā lahi (hono mālohi fika 2 ʻi he tohi hokohoko ʻo pā moʻungaafi) ʻo e moʻungaafi * 9 Sune 1846: pā lahi ʻaupito (mālohi fika 4); ngaahi mafuike lahi ʻi Vavaʻu * 11 Sune 1846: laku lahi, konga ʻao efuefu, maumauʻi he kelekele, hola atu ʻa e kakai ki Tokū * 12 Sune 1846: kamata tō efuefu ʻi Vavaʻu * 22 Sune 1846: kei laku; ʻosi ʻalu kakai kotoa * ʻOkatopa 1846: pā lahi (mālohi fika 3), laku * Maʻasi 1916: pā siʻi ? * Sune 1939: pā (mālohi fika 2), laku * 21 ʻAokosi 1951: pā (mālohi fika 2), laku * Sune 1957: pā siʻi ? * 16 Fēpueli 1974: pā (mālohi fika 2)
ʻI muʻa ʻene aʻu mai ki Vavaʻu, ko e papālangi ʻuluaki ia, naʻe folau ʻa [[Don Francisco Antonio Maurelle]] ki Fonualei ʻi Fēpueli 1781. Naʻe ui ʻa e motu ʻe ia ko e ''Motu konaʻīʻī (Bitterness island)'' koeʻuhi naʻe ʻikai te ne ʻilo ha inu vai ʻi ai.
ʻI he taimi ko ia, naʻe nofo ʻa e kakai ʻi Tokū, pea naʻa nau folau ki Fonualei ke ngoue. Pea nau nofo pē ʻi ai, koeʻuhi naʻe sai ʻaupito ʻa e kelekele. Naʻe langa ʻe kinautolu ʻa e fale lotu. Naʻe ngata kotoa ia ʻi 1846, ʻoku ʻikai toe ha tokotaha ʻi Fonualei he taimi ni.
*D. Gerstle; Gentle people, into the heart of Vavaʻu 1781-1973; Tofua press 1973 *http://www.volcano.si.edu/world/volcano.cfm?vnum=0403-10= *Dirk HR Spennemann, [http://csusap.csu.edu.au/~dspennem/ReportStore/JCReport196.pdf The June 1846 Eruption of Fonualei Volcano, Tonga. An Historical Analysis]. The Johnstone Centre. Report Nº 196. *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 {{Feituʻu Tonga|18°024|174°316}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Fonualei (Vavaʻu)
Taʻuta
ʻEuaiki
page.text:
[[Image:ʻEuaiki.gif|right|thumb|350px|ʻEuaiki (motu)]] Ko '''ʻEuaiki''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu, ofi ki [[ʻEuakafa]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Ko hono hingoa moʻoni, ʻoku pehē ʻe he kakai nofo ʻi Vavaʻu, ko '''ʻEueiki''' ia. ʻOku hala ʻa e hingoa ''ʻEuaiki'' ʻe he puleʻanga Tonga. Ka ʻoku kehe ia mo e kiʻi motu ko [[ʻEueiki]] ʻi Tongatapu. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°764|174°021}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Alinonga
page.category: Vavaʻu

page.title: Kulo
Tangatasito
Langitoʻo
Lape
page.text:
[[Image:Lape.gif|right|thumb|350px|Lape (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Lape''' ko e motu ʻi Vavaʻu ia ʻi he vaeua ʻo [[Vakaʻeitu]] mo [[Nuapapu]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e kolo mo hono hingoa tatau, ko '''Lape (kolo)''' (18.718° S 174.086° W).
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°717|174°084}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Vakaʻeitu
Matamaka
Nuapapu
page.text:
[[Image:Nuapapu.gif|right|thumb|350px|Nuapapu (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Nuapapu''' ko e motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki hihifo ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu. Mahalo pē ʻi he taimi fuoloa naʻe taha ai mo [[Vakaʻeitu]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi kolo ʻe ua, ko e lahi taha mo e hingoa tatau: '''Nuapapu (kolo)''' (18.699° S 174.074° W). Ko e kolo ʻe taha ko [[Matamaka]].
Ko e motu, taʻe kau ki ai ko Matamaka, ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]].
ʻOku ongoonga ko '''ʻAna-uku''' ʻi he matāfonua tokelau ʻo e motu. Ko e hūʻanga ʻo e ʻaná ni ʻoku ʻi lalo fukahi moana. Naʻe lauʻi ʻe [[Tokiukamea]], ʻa ia ʻoku ʻiloa foki ko ''Mariner's cave''. [[Image:Fotumai.jpg|left|thumb|526px|Fotu mai mei he ʻAnauku]] {{feituʻu Tonga|18°692|174°077}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Katofanga
Muʻomuʻa
Fangasito
Luaʻui
Fonuaʻoneʻone
page.text:
[[Image:Fonuaʻoneʻone.gif|right|thumb|350px|Fonuaʻoneʻone (motu)]] Ko '''Fonuaʻoneʻone''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
ʻOku kehe mo e ngaahi kāungamotu, ko e ngaahi motu liku pea mo taʻemaausia, ko e motú ni ko e motu ʻoneʻone ia, sai ki he ngoue.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°815|174°065}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Luahiapo
page.text:
[[Image:Luahiapo.gif|right|thumb|350px|Luahiapo (motu)]] Ko '''Luahiapo''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e ''lua'' ko e ʻuhinga ia ko e ''hakau ngoto''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°796|174°042}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Luaʻatofuaʻa
page.text:
[[Image:Luaʻatofuaʻa.gif|right|thumb|350px|Luaʻatofuaʻa (motu)]] Ko '''Luaʻatofuaʻa''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e ''lua'' ʻi he ''lua ʻa tofuaʻa'' ko e ʻuhinga ia ko e ''hakau ngoto''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°838|174°048}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Luaʻafuleheu
page.text:
[[Image:Luaʻafuleheu.gif|right|thumb|350px|Luaʻafuleheu (motu)]] Ko '''Luaʻafuleheu''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e ''lua'' ʻi he ''lua ʻa fuleheu'' ko e ʻuhinga ia ko e ''hakau ngoto''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°812|174°026}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Lualoli
page.text:
[[Image:Lualoli.gif|right|thumb|350px|Lualoli (motu)]] Ko '''Lualoli''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e ''lua'' ʻi he ''lua [ʻa] loli'' ko e ʻuhinga ia ko e ''hakau ngoto''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°835|174°013}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Luatafito
page.text:
[[Image:Luatafito.gif|right|thumb|350px|Luatafito (motu)]] Ko '''Luatafito''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tongahahake ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu.
Ko e ''lua'' ko e ʻuhinga ia ko e ''hakau ngoto''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°821|173°976}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Maninita
page.text:
[[Image:Maninita.gif|right|thumb|350px|Maninita (motu)]] Ko '''Maninita''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo e pupunga motu ʻi he tonga ʻo Vavaʻu. Ko e motu tonga mamaʻo taha ʻo e pupunga (kae vakai ki [[Hakaufasi]]).
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Ko e paʻake fakaʻenatula fakapuleʻanga maʻa e fanga manutahi. Naʻe avea ʻa e fanga kumā mei ai ʻi 2002.
*http://www.pacificbirds.com/baselinedraft.pdf {{feituʻu Tonga|18°854|173°997}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Fuaʻamotu (Vavaʻu)
Ngau
Lekeleka (Vavaʻu)
Fatumanga
Uatoloa
Vaipūua
Puatalefusi
page.text:
[[Image:Puatalefusi.gif|right|350px|thumb|Puatalefusi (tahi) [kulokula, mo e engeenga maʻa Puatalefusi tupuʻi ʻo Maurelle]]] Ko '''Puatalefusi''' ko e kōmaki lahi ia ʻoku vahevaheʻi ʻa Vavaʻulahi mei [[Pangaimotu (Vavaʻu)|Pangaimotu]]. ʻOku ui ko e taulanga lelei taha ʻo māmani. Ko e taulanga ia ʻo [[Neiafu]].
Ko e hingoa fakatonga moʻoni ko '''Lolo ʻa Halaevalu''', ko ''Puatalefusi'' kuo tupu mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]] ''Port of refuge'', naʻe ʻoatu ʻe [[Don Francisco Antonio Maurelle]] ʻi Fēpueli 1781. Kae ko ʻene ''Puerto del refugio'' tupuʻi, ko e fanga ʻo [[Longomapu]] ia. {{feituʻu Tonga|18°66|173°99}} {{potuʻi}} [[Image:Neiafu.jpg|left|thumb|800px|Puatalefusi; Neiafu (toʻohema) mo Fungamisi (toʻomataʻu)]] [[category:Vavaʻu]]

page.title: Ano
page.category: Vavaʻu

page.title: Ngofe
Hoi (Tongatapu)
Nukuleka
page.text:
[[Image:Nukuleka.gif|right|350px|thumb|Nukuleka (kolo)]] Ko '''Nukuleka''' ko e kiʻi kolo ʻi he tokelau ʻo e vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta ofi ki [[Makaunga]].
Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Vai-kāsila'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°152|175°126}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Makaunga
Talafoʻou
page.text:
[[Image:Talafoʻou.gif|right|350px|thumb|Talafoʻou (kolo)]] Ko '''Talafoʻou''' ko e kiʻi kolo ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], matāfonua tokelau, ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Makaunga]] mo [[Navutoka]].
Naʻe talaʻi kia [[Tatafuʻeikimeimuʻa]] naʻe moemoeapō ʻene ʻeiki ko e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ko [[Havea I]]. Ko e tala-foʻou kia te ia.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Lauaki|Lauaki]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°136|175°118}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Navutoka
page.text:
[[Image:Navutoka.gif|right|350px|thumb|Navutoka (kolo)]] Ko '''Navutoka''' ko e kiʻi kolo ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], matāfonua tokelau, ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Talafoʻou]] mo [[Manuka]]. Ko hono hingoa tenetene ko '''Funga ʻonetaka''' ia.
ʻOku ongoongoa ia maʻa ʻene siu ʻanga, pea foki mo ʻene kulupu tāmeʻa, ko e Fungaʻonetaka.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]], kae ko e konga ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Lasike|Lasike]], ko e taha ʻo hono ngaahi ''Lakepa''. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°127|175°107}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Manuka (kolo)
Afā
page.category: Tongatapu & takatakai
page.text:
[[File:Afā.gif|right|350px|thumb|Afā (kolo)]] Ko '''Afā''' ko e kiʻi kolo ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], matāfonua tokelau, ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Kolonga]] mo [[Niutōua]]. Ko hono hingoa tenetene ko '''Ngalufānifo'''.
ʻOku pehē naʻe telio ʻi ai ʻi he ''[[ʻotu langi|langi Moʻungalafa]]'' (ʻoku toe haʻane lusaʻanga) ko e ʻofefine ʻo [[Tuʻitātui]] naʻe ui ko Afā, pea naʻa ne ʻoatu hono hingoa ki he koló ni.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
* Taimi ʻo Tonga, '''18''', ''21'' (15 Maʻasi 2007) {{feituʻu Tonga|21°132|175°055}} {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Niutōua
page.text:
[[Image:Niutōua.gif|right|350px|thumb|Niutōua (kolo)]] Ko '''Niutōua''' ko e kolo ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], matāfonua tokelau. Ko e kolo fakamui ia ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻosi [[Afā]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e '''Tuitui ʻa Tamale'''.
ʻOku ofi ko e [[Haʻamonga ʻa Maui (maka tupuʻa)|Haʻamonga ʻa Maui]], ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he feituʻu ko [[Heketā]]. Ala ʻoku ngāueʻaki foki ʻa e heliaki: '''Uasi laʻā''' pe '''Makafaakinanga'''.
Ko Niutōua ko e ʻafioʻanga ia ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ko [[Momo]], mo ʻene kakai, ko e ''Haʻamenuʻuli''. Naʻe tupu ʻi he feituʻú ni ʻa e fuʻu niu ʻe ua, ko e niu kula mo e niu tea, naʻe tō ʻi he luo ʻe taha.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. Ko [[:Category:Tamale|Tamale]] ko e ʻeiki lahi, ka naʻe ʻikai hoko ki ha [[:Category:nōpele|nōpele]] ia.
ʻOku ʻiloa ʻa e kalapu Tonga ʻo Niutōua: Ko e ''tuitui ʻa Tamale kalapu ʻa Niutōua''. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°144|175°040}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Fāʻimata (Tongatapu)
ʻEueiki
page.text:
[[Image:ʻEueiki (1).gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻEueiki (motu)]] Ko '''ʻEueiki''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he hahake mamaʻo ʻo Tongatapu. Ko [[Fāʻimata (Tongatapu)|Fāʻimata]] ko hono kolomuʻa (faingofua, ko e kolo ʻe taha pē).
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo Tu'itufu.
ʻI he taimi kuo hili fuoloa, naʻe nofo ʻa e ongo motuʻa ʻi Fāʻimata, ko Fevanga mo Fefafa ko hona hingoa. Naʻe ʻi ai hona ʻofefine valevale, ko [[Kavaʻonau]]. (Vakai ki he [[kava]].)
Naʻe ʻoatu ʻa e hingoa tatau ki he kiʻi motu ʻi Vavaʻu, ʻoku ʻilo ʻe he puleʻanga ʻo Tonga ko [[ʻEuaiki]].
[[Image:ʻEueiki.jpg|left|thumb|350px|ʻEueiki i heʻene ʻasi mei Muihopohoponga ([[Niutōua]])]] {{feituʻu Tonga|21°117|174°983}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Tau (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[Image:Tau.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tau (motu)]] Ko '''Tau''' ko e kiʻi motu ia, ko e motu fakamuimui, ʻosi [[ʻAtā]], ʻi he ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu.
Naʻe feinga ʻe he puleʻanga ʻo fokotuʻu ha ʻapi popula maʻa e toʻutupu ʻi he motú ni.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°021|175°005}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: ʻAtā
page.text:
[[Image:ʻAtā.gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻAtā (motu)]] Ko '''ʻAtā''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Nuku (Tongatapu)|Nuku]] mo [[Tau (Tongatapu)|Tau]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
ʻI he talatukufakaholo fakatonga naʻe peheeʻi ko ʻAtā ko e motu motuʻa taha ia, ko e feituʻu ʻuluaki ʻa e nofo mo e ngoue ʻo e kakai ʻi Tonga. Kae mahalo pē ʻoku fehalaʻaki ia mo [[ʻAta]] ʻi he tonga mamaʻo.
Ko e ʻapi ia ʻo [[Vaʻelaveamata]].
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°056|175°004}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Nuku (Tongatapu)
Fukave
Motutapu
page.text:
[[Image:Motutapu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Motutapu (motu)]] Ko '''Motutapu''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[ʻOnevao]] mo [[Fukave]].
ʻOku tapu ʻa e motú ni koeʻuhi ko e feituʻu ʻeveʻevaʻanga ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ʻi he onoʻaho.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°093|175°057}}
{{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: ʻAtatā
Moʻunu (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[Image:MoʻunuTBU.gif|right|350px|thumb|Moʻunu (motu)]] Ko '''Moʻunu''' ko e kiʻi motu siʻisiʻi ia ʻi he fangaʻuta hahake ʻo Tongatapu, ofi ki Kolongahau ([[Lapaha]]).
Ko e kiʻi motu mahuʻinga ia, naʻe tau ʻi ai ʻa e kalia ko [[Lomipeau]].
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°088|175°158}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: ʻOnevao
ʻOnevai
Velitoa hahake
page.text:
[[File:Velitoahahake.jpg|left|500px|thumb|Velitoa hahake, ʻasi mei Velitoa hihifo]] [[File:Velitoahahake (1).gif|right|350px|thumb|Velitoa hahake (motu)]] <br style="clear:left;">Ko '''Velitoa hahake''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Velitoa hihifo]] mo [[ʻOnevai]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°085|175°133}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Velitoa hihifo
page.text:
[[File:Velitoahihifo.jpg|left|500px|thumb|Velitoa hihifo, ʻasi mei Velitoa hahake]] [[File:Velitoahihifo (1).gif|right|350px|thumb|Velitoa hihifo (motu)]] <br style="clear:left;">Ko '''Velitoa hihifo''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ʻi he ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Fafā]] mo [[Velitoa hahake]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e ongo fale tukuʻanga ʻone maʻa e kau maluʻi ʻo Tonga. Kae taimi kotoa pē naʻe kaihaʻasi ʻa e ʻone ʻe he kau toutai kovi mo vale, fiengāueʻaki ha ʻone fanaika. ʻOku tapu ia. He taimí ni ʻoku liʻekina ʻa e fale koʻeni.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. [[File:faleʻone.jpg|left|350px|thumb|ko e lusaʻanga ʻo e fale tukuʻanga ʻone ʻe taha]] {{feituʻu Tonga|21°084|175°137}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Fafā
page.text:
[[Image:Fafā.gif|right|350px|thumb|Fafā (motu)]] Ko '''Fafā''' ko e kiʻi motu ia, ko e motu ʻuluaki ʻo e ʻotu motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu, ko e hoko ko [[Velitoa hihifo]] ia.
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e ''Fafā island resort''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°088|175°158}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Monūafe
page.text:
[[File:Monūafe-2002.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Monūafe ʻene ʻasi ʻi 2002]] [[File:Monūafe.gif|right|350px|thumb|Monūafe (motu)]] [[File:Monūafe-2009.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Monūafe ʻene ʻasi ʻi 2009]] [[File:Monūafe, keina 2009.jpg|right|350px|thumb|ko e keina lahi ʻe he peu ʻa e matātahi ʻi 2009]] [[File:Monūafe-2010.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Monūafe ʻene ʻasi ʻi 2010, ʻoku mamate koeʻuhi ʻa e afā naʻe ʻikai fuoloa]] [[File:Monūafe-2012-maʻa-ofi.jpg|right|350px|thumb|meimei pulia ʻi Maʻasi 2012]] [[File:Monūafe-2011-tis.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Monūafe ʻene ʻasi ʻi Tisema 2011]] [[File:Monūafe-2012-maʻa.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Monūafe ʻene ʻasi ʻi Maʻasi 2012]] [[File:Monūafe-2012-nōv.jpg|left|350px|thumb|ko e laulauʻātea pē, sm ʻe 20 hono lototo, ko e toenga ʻi Nōvema 2012]] [[File:Monūafe-2018.jpg|right|350px|thumb|ko e toafa pē, fotu mai ʻi he fonohifo ʻa e tahi, Sānuali 2018]]
Ko '''Monūafe''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ofi ki he taulanga ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] ʻi Tongatapu, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Makahaʻa]] mo [[ʻOnevai]].
ʻI onoʻaho ko e motu ko e feituʻu ʻeveʻevaʻanga ia ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]]. Kae he onopooni ʻoku fakasiʻisiʻi ange ʻa e motu ʻe he ngaahi afā mo e ngalu ʻo e tahi. ʻOku mole ʻene ʻoneʻone ʻi he tahi.
Naʻe fakavavevave ange ʻa e keina ʻi he taʻu 2009. Lolotonga he 2012, naʻe puli ʻaupito ʻa e motu kakato. ʻOku toe pē ha afua, ʻoku mōmoa ʻi he mamaha ʻa e tahi.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°104|175°139}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Makahaʻa
Pangaimotu (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[File:Pangaimotu cross.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Ko e kolosi fakamanatu naʻe fokotuʻu ʻe he ʻepikopō ko [[Patelisio Fīnau]] ʻi he 2 Siulai 1992]] [[File:First mass in Tonga.jpg|300px|left|thumb|Misa ʻuluaki, ʻata mei he [[Falelotu Sangato Mikaele]]]] [[Image:PangaimotuTBU.gif|right|350px|thumb|Pangaimotu (motu)]] Ko '''Pangaimotu''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ofi ki he taulanga ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] ʻi Tongatapu, pea foki ofi ki [[Makahaʻa]] ʻi he tafaʻaki ʻe taha ʻo e ava [[Piha]].
Ko e misa ʻuluaki ʻi Tonga ʻo e [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] naʻe ʻi heni ʻi 2 Siulai 1842 ʻe he ʻepikopō ko [[Soane Patita Pompallier]] (Jean Baptiste Pompallier), ko e [[pātele Sevelo]] (Chevron) mo e felela ko [[ʻAtalo]] (Attale), naʻe ō mai kinautolu mo e kakai ʻo e [[:Category:Lavelua (Tuʻi ʻo ʻUvea)|Lavelua]], ([[Soane-Patita Vaimua Lavelua]]) ʻi he vaka Sancta Maria mei [[ʻUvea]] mai.
ʻOku ʻiloa ʻa e motu ʻe he kakai takimamata pea mo e taukei foki.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]] mo hono faleʻalo. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°125|175°158}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[category:lotu]] [[category:Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Manima
page.text:
[[Image:Manima.gif|right|350px|thumb|Manima (motu)]] Ko '''Manima''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ofi ki he taulanga ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] ʻi Tongatapu, pea foki ofi ki [[Pangaimotu (Tongatapu)|Pangaimotu]] mo [[Oneata]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
[[File:Manima passage.jpg|thumb|left|400px|Naʻe mafahi ua ʻa e kiʻi motu ʻe he ngaahi peau ʻi 2017 pe ofi ki ai. Vākai ki he tokelau; toʻohema: [[Pangaimotu (Tongatapu)]], toʻomataʻu: [[Makahaʻa]]]] {{feituʻu Tonga|21°125|175°147}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Oneata
page.text:
[[Image:Oneata.gif|right|350px|thumb|Oneata (motu)]] Ko '''Oneata''' ko e kiʻi motu ia ofi ki he taulanga ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] ʻi Tongatapu, pea ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Manima]] mo [[Nukunukumotu]].
Ko e hingoa ʻoe motu ʻoku tatau mo e motu ʻi [[Fisi]], ko ''[[Oneata (Fisi)]]'' foki. ʻOku ʻikai ha [[lea fakatonga]] ki he ''ʻone-ata'' pe ''ʻone-ʻatā''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°128|175°145}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Siesia
page.text:
[[Image:Siesia.gif|right|350px|thumb|Siesia (kolo)]] Ko '''Siesia''' ko e kolo ia ʻi he motu ʻo [[Nukunukumotu]].
ʻOku ui ha kolo, kae mahalo pē ʻoku tuʻu ʻa e ngaahi ʻapi ʻe 10 tupu pē. ʻOku ʻikai ha hala, ʻoku ʻikai foki ha hala ki [[Pātangata]] ʻi Tongatapu. Kapau ʻoku mamaha ʻa e tahi ʻoku lava aʻa ʻa e kakai ʻi he ava.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°138|175°149}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Pātangata
page.text:
[[Image:Pātangata.gif|right|350px|thumb|Pātangata (kolo)]] Ko '''Pātangata''' ko e kolo taʻefakalao ia ʻi he ngataʻanga ʻo Tongatapu ʻi kō atu he [[Popua]], ofi ki he motu ʻo [[Nukunukumotu]]. Ko e matāfonua tokelau-hahake taha ʻoku ui ko e houma '''Hōleva'''.
ʻOku tokolahi ʻa e kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi ai, kae ʻoku ʻikai lēsisita honau ʻapi. ʻOku ʻikai fietuli kinautolu ʻe he puleʻanga.
ʻOku ofi foki ki he liʻanga veve ʻo Popua, kae ʻoku tāpuni ia he taimí ni, ʻosi ʻa e fakaava ʻo e liʻanga veve ko [[Tapuhia]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
==Hisitōlia== ʻI he onoʻaho koe feituʻu ʻo Pātangata mo Popua ko e vao ia mo e ngaahi [[sia]] maʻa e houʻeiki, ʻa ia ko e Tuʻi Tonga [[Pau]]. Naʻe ʻaʻahi ki ai ʻa e ʻeikivaka [[Semisi Kuki]] ʻi heʻene folau ʻo 1777.
==Tataku== *Tonga- Land, sea and people; Tonga research association, 2011; ISBN 9789829806215 {{feituʻu Tonga|21°140|175°155}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Nukunukumotu
page.text:
[[Image:Nukunukumotu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Nukunukumotu (motu)]] Ko '''Nukunukumotu''' ko e motu lahi ia ofi ki [[Pātangata]] ʻi Tongatapu, pea ʻoku ofi ki [[Oneata]] foki.
Ko e ano ia mo e lahi [[tongo]], tukukehe ʻa e kiʻi konga ʻoneʻone ʻi he tokelau, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai ko e kolo [[Siesia]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°144|175°146}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Moʻungatapu
page.text:
[[Image:Moʻungatapu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Moʻungatapu (motu)]] Ko '''Moʻungatapu''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he fangaʻuta ʻo Tongatapu, ofi ki [[Kauvai]].
Naʻe tapu ʻa e motú ni koeʻuhi naʻe tuʻu lolotonga he pō ʻa e vaka putu ʻo [[Tuʻitātui]] ʻi heʻene folau ki he telio ʻi [[Malapo]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°182|175°140}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Ngofonua
Talakite
page.text:
[[Image:Talakite.gif|right|350px|thumb|Talakite (motu)]] Ko '''Talakite''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he fangaʻuta ʻo Tongatapu, ofi ʻaupito ki he motu ko [[Mataʻaho (Tongatapu)|Mataʻaho]].
Naʻe ui ''Tala-kite'' koeʻuhi ʻa e ʻasi mai ʻo ha manupuna, ko e kite. Vakai ki he talanoa ʻo [[ʻIlaheva Vaʻepopua]] mo [[Tangaloa ʻEitumātupuʻa]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
ʻOku tala ʻe he ngaahi hiva motuʻa mo talatukufakaholo, naʻe ʻi ai ʻi heni ha ngaahi motu ʻoku pulia he onopooni. Naʻe ui: Toʻonangakava (ʻi he lotomālie ʻo Talakite mo Mataʻaho, kei naʻe ʻi ai ʻi he teautaʻu hono 19), Motutala, Haʻangakafa, mo Moho.
==Tataku== *Tonga- Land, sea and people; Tonga research association, 2011; ISBN 9789829806215 {{feituʻu Tonga|21°161|175°155}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Mataʻaho (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[Image:MataʻahoTBU.gif|right|350px|thumb|Mataʻaho (motu)]] Ko '''Mataʻaho''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he fangaʻuta ʻo Tongatapu, ofi ʻaupito ki he motu ko [[Talakite]].
Naʻe ui ''Mata-ʻaho'' koeʻuhi ʻosi fuoloa ʻa e hopo ʻa e laʻā, pea kei mohe ʻa [[ʻIlaheva Vaʻepopua]] mo [[Tangaloa ʻEitumātupuʻa]].
Naʻe moemoepoongi ʻa [[Takalaua]] ʻi he motú ni.
Naʻe tukua ʻa [[Fīnau Filimoeʻulie]] ʻi he ʻau lahi ʻi ai ke mate ia.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°162|175°154}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Kanatea
Toketoke
Poloʻa
page.text:
[[Image:Poloʻa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Poloʻa (motu)]] Ko '''Poloʻa''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Vahe hihifo mo [[ʻAtatā]], ofi ki [[ʻAlakipeau]].
Ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he hihifo ʻi he tafaʻaki ʻe taha ʻo e ava siʻisiʻi, ʻoku taʻehingoa ia. ʻOku puli ʻi lalo fukahi tahi kapau ʻoku tahi lahi ʻaupito.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°092|175°243}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: ʻAlakipeau
Tufuka
page.text:
[[Image:Tufuka.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tufuka (motu)]] Ko '''Tufuka''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo Tongatapu. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Vahe hihifo mo [[ʻAtatā]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e fale maama siʻisiʻi.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°068|175°254}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Manase Kaho
Tupou Posesi Fanua (Kaho)
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi |hokohoko= Fanua, TP |maama= fefine |tamai=[[Feʻiloakitau Kaho]] |faʻē= ?(mate 1918) |ʻaho fanauʻi= 1 Nōvema 1913 |ʻaho pekia=23 Maʻasi 1999 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Posesi Fanua Lofanga |ʻaho1= 1934 |fānau1= {{tokoua|tamasiʻi ʻe 1|taʻahine ʻe 7|||||||}} |}}*http://www.latrobe.edu.au/anthropology/tonga/vol10-1.html Ngaahi tohi naʻa ne fatu: *Pō Fananga (1975) *Pō Tatala (1982)

page.title: Tēvita ʻUnga Tangitau
page.text: {{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Maʻafu |hokohoko=Tangitau, Tʻ |ʻaho fakanofo= 20 ʻEpeleli 1954 |ʻaho pongipongi= |ʻaho fakamālōlō=24 ʻOkatopa 1997 |ki muʻa= |hoko=[[Siosaia Lausiʻi]] |}} Hingoa lōloa: Maʻafu Tukuʻiʻaulahi {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tangitau Tʻ |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Siosaia Lausiʻi (Fakatulolo)]] |faʻē=[[ʻĀnaukihesina Maʻafu]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 1929 |ʻaho pekia=24 ʻOkatopa 1997 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|?||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Tuputupu ki Pulotu Vaea (Maʻafu)]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Peti |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Siosaia Lausiʻi]]||||||||}} |}}*http://www.tongatapu.net.to/tonga/news/briefs/ss971030.htm

page.title: Hiko
page.category: Faiva fakatonga
page.text:
Ko e '''hiko''', ko e faiva mei onoʻaho.
Ko e hiva ʻo e hiko.
Peʻi langi mai, peʻi langi mai, langi mai he kuo longo kakai.
Fuofua ka u moʻua pea u tō ki ʻana ua faifai pea u fepaki pea u tō ki fehivai ko pai ko ʻulu ko hateniti hatenata ʻuanga pē ʻa lama kōkī foʻi koli Savaiʻi ʻa totofu le pupunu ki lelenga ʻakumenga manatu ki Manavanga foha ʻulu fetakinanga 'Anaua ʻa Pulotu heki toto ʻa e laʻā.
Ko ʻalu ā toka ki vanope ngānangana tatenima malu kapusi napahaka ʻoiʻoi maʻanaʻana fololonga fotatai pili ā ho vai mamaʻo hai mamaʻo tala mo tapenai, ʻio tulou, ʻio fe ai ʻio ka malu tafuafi taputaʻane matangi ka hūla Halaevalu tangi ho ʻatu tangi ho ʻate he siale pili ko vai ko manu lele.
{{potuʻi}} [[Category:Faiva fakatonga]]

page.title: ʻAlakifonua
page.text:
[[Image:ʻAlakifonua.gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻAlakifonua (kolo)]] Ko '''ʻAlakifonua''' (pe ʻoku nounou ko '''ʻAlaki''' pē) ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Holonga (Tongatapu)|Holonga]] mo [[Tatakamotonga]].
Ko hono tafa tokelau (mo Tatakamotonga) ʻoku tafe ʻi ai ʻa e vaitafe ʻi lolofonua ko e '''(Funga) Tolopona''', lataʻanga kaukau ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]]. Naʻe ofi tuʻu ʻa e [[ʻovava]] lahi, ko e '''Malumalu ʻo Fulilangi''' (pe Fala-e-Tuʻipelehake; ʻoku pulia he taimí ni, neongo ʻa e tō ʻo e kiʻi fuʻu ʻakau). ʻI lalo he fuʻu ʻovavá ni naʻe feʻiloaki ʻa e ʻeikivaka ko [[Semisi Kuki]] mo e Tuʻi Tonga ko [[Pau]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻipelehake|Tuʻipelehake]]. Ko hono kiʻi fale meʻaʻanga ʻi he matāfonua ʻoku ui ʻUtumoteka. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°194|175°134}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Tatakamotonga
page.text:
[[Image:Tatakamotonga.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tatakamotonga (kolo)]] Ko '''Tatakamotonga''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[ʻAlakifonua]] mo [[Lapaha]]. Ko hono hingoa pauʻu ko '''Kolosiale''' ia. Ko e fakataha ʻo Tatakamotonga mo Lapaha ʻoku ui ko '''Muʻa''', ho hono hingoa pauʻu ko '''Pakimoetoʻi''' pe '''Kolokakala''' pe '''Kolosalusalu''' pe '''Koloveʻeveʻe''' mo e hā fua.
ʻI he onoʻaho ʻi Tatakamotonga naʻe nofo ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki mo e kaunanga ʻo e houʻeiki, naʻa nau meʻa ʻi Lapaha.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]]. Ko hono kiʻi fale meʻaʻanga ʻi loto kolo (ofi ki he lautohi) ʻoku ui ko ''Uoleva'' (naʻe vela ʻi 2004). {{feituʻu Tonga|21°188|175°122}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Lapaha
page.text:
[[File:Lapaha.gif|right|350px|thumb|Lapaha (kolo)]] [[File:Lapaha-fakahinohino.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Tali fiefia ki Lapaha]] [[File:Leuleukefu.jpg|right|350px|thumb|ko e maka Levulevukefu (pe Leuleukefu)]] Ko '''Lapaha''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Tatakamotonga]] mo [[Talasiu]]. Ko hono hingoa ʻoku tupuʻanga taha mo [[Labasa]] ʻi [[Fisi]]. Ko Lapaha ko e kolomuʻa ʻo Tonga he onoʻaho mo e kolomuʻa ʻo e vahe hahake he onopooni, kae naʻe fakataha mo Tatakamotonga pea ʻoku na ui ko '''Muʻa''', mo hono hingoa pauʻu ko '''Pakimoetoʻi''' pe '''Kolokakala''' pe '''Kolosalusalu''' pe '''Koloveʻeveʻe''' mo e hā fua.
ʻI he onoʻaho ʻi Lapaha naʻe ʻafio ʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] pea naʻe meʻa ʻa ʻene houʻeiki. ʻI taimi ki mui (~1470) naʻe meʻa foki ʻi ai ʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua|Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua]], kae naʻe toe pē maʻana ʻa e matātahi ʻo e fangaʻuta. Ko ia ai ʻoku ui ʻa e houʻeiki ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga ko e [[:Category:Kauhalaʻuta|Kauhalaʻuta]] pea ko e houʻeiki ʻo e Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua pea ki mui ange (~1600) ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]] foki ko e [[:Category:Kauhalalalo|Kauhalalalo]].
ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi [[ʻotu langi]] ʻi Lapaha.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Kalaniuvalu|Kalaniuvalu]].
==Lotu== ʻOku lahi kau [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] ʻi Lapaha, koeʻuhi naʻe papitaiso ʻi he siasi ko ia ko [[Laufilitonga]], ko e Tuʻi Tonga. Ko honau fale lotu ko [[falelotu Sangato Mikaele]] ia.
ʻI he touliki tongahahake ʻo e ʻā ʻo e fale lotu ni, ʻoku tuʻu ʻa e maka feo ʻoku ui ko e '''Levulevukefu'''. Naʻe tuʻu ʻa e maka ni ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e matapā ʻo e ʻapi ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga, kā naʻe ʻunu mei ai ʻi he taimi fakahisitōlia. Kaekehe ʻoku pehē ʻe he kakai naʻe lī ʻe [[Māui]] ʻa e maka mei [[ʻEua]] ki hono tuʻuʻanga onopooni.
ʻOku lahi kau [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]] ʻi Tatakamotonga, koeʻuhi ko honau ʻeiki ko [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]], ʻoku ne kau ki he kauhalalalo. ʻOku ʻi ai ha fale lotu uesiliana ʻe ua ʻi he kolo ē.
==Tataku== *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°179|175°115}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Talasiu
page.text:
[[Image:Talasiu.gif|right|350px|thumb|Talasiu (kolo)]] Ko '''Talasiu''' ko e kolo ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki fangaʻuta ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Lapaha]] mo e hala manga ua ki [[Hoi (Tongatapu)|Hoi]] mo [[Kolonga]], kae naʻe fakataha ia mo Lapaha.
ʻI he onoʻaho ko Talasiu, mo ʻene kiʻi vaitafe ʻi lalofonua, ko '''[[Fangafeʻatu]]''' mo '''Vai-ko-Tālanga-mo-e-vale''' ko e peito ia ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]]. Naʻe ʻafifio ʻi heni ʻa e kau [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga Fefine|Tuʻi Tonga fefine]] mo [[:Category:Tamahā|Tamahā]] (ʻi muʻa ʻenau hiki ki [[Tungua]]). Ko e hingoa leva ʻo honau ʻapi ko e '''ʻApi ko Poulalahi''' pea ʻoku kei tuku fakaholo mai ai pē ʻa e laine ko ia ʻo aʻu mai ki he ʻaho ni mo hono hako ki he kelekele.
ʻAho ʻe taha naʻe manako maʻu pē ʻa e Tuʻi Tonga ke fakahā ki Poulalahi ki hono tuofefine ha fononga ki ai pea mo ʻave polopolo ki ai. Ko ia naʻe ui ai pe e tafaʻaki ko ʻeni ko "Talasiu" ko e hono ʻuhinga ko e tala ʻo ha fononga pe ha ʻaʻahi ki he Tuʻi Tonga.
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e toenga ʻo e kolotau lahi.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻilakepa|Tuʻilakepa]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°175|175°115}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Muʻa (Tongatapu)
page.text:
Ko '''Muʻa''' ko e fakataha ia ʻo e ongo kolo ko '''[[Tatakamotonga]]''' mo '''[[Lapaha]]''' (mahalo pe mo [[Talasiu]] foki).
Ko e kolomuaʻa onoʻaho, pea ko e fetuʻu ia ʻo e ngaahi '''[[ʻotu langi]]'''.

page.title: ʻotu langi
page.category: Tuʻi Tonga
page.text:
Ko e ngaahi '''ʻotu langi''' ko e moʻunga (faʻitoka) kinautolu maʻa e kau [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]]. Ko e konga lahi, ʻoku nau tuʻu ʻi [[Lapaha]]. ʻOku tatau ʻenau ʻasi, kae ko e ngaahi malaʻe (faʻitoka) maʻa e kau [[:Category:Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua|Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua]], ʻoku ui ko e '''fale'''. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi Lapaha foki. Ko e kau tuʻi ʻo Tonga, ko ʻenau telioʻanga ko [[Malaʻekula]] ia. {| border=1 | || Langi Hēhea
pulia ? || [[File:Mape ʻesi Hēhea.svg]] |- | || Langi ʻEsi-ʻa-e-kona pe ʻEsi-ʻaikona
pulia ? || [[File:Mape ʻesi ʻAikona.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi-Namoala.jpg|350px]] || Langi Na-moala
Naʻe telio ko Tuʻipelehake ([[Sione ʻUluvalu Takeivūlai Ngū Tukuʻaho]]) mo hono ʻohoana heni ʻi 2006 || [[File:Mape langi Namoala.svg]] |- | [[File:Paepae ʻo Teleʻa.jpg|350px]] || Langi Paepae-ʻo-Teleʻa pe: Pae(pae) o Teleʻa.
Mahalo pē ko e langi ʻiloa taha ia, koeʻuhi hono maka tuliki makehe. ʻOku pehē naʻe ʻikai ʻa e langi maʻa [[ʻUluakimata I]] (hono hingoa tenetene ko Teleʻa)), ka maʻa e tufunga langi pē. Ko ia ai ko e ʻuhinga ʻoku ui ko e ''paepae'' ia, ʻikai ha ''langi''. Ka mahalo pē ko e ʻuhinga naʻe ʻikai ʻa e foha ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga ko ʻUluakimata, ka ko e sola ikuna.
Naʻe telio heni ko [[Sioeli Pangia]] ʻi 1935 mo [[Siosiua Ngalumoetutulu Kalaniuvalu|Kalaniuvalu]] ʻi 1998 mo [[Tiofilusi Fatuilangi Ngalumoetutulu|hono foha]] ʻi 2010. || [[File:Mape Paepae ʻo Teleʻa.svg]] |- | [[File:Nakulukilangi.jpg|350px]] || Langi Nakulu-ki-langi
ʻi [[Talasiu]], ko e faʻitoka ʻoe [[:Category:Tuʻilakepa|Tuʻilakepa]], tatau mo e langi Toamanatu (ʻi fē?) || [[File:Mape langi Nakulukilangi.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Malomaloaʻa.jpg|350px]] || Langi Malomaloaʻa
(ʻoku ui ko e Langi Langalanga-fehi ʻe ʻAholangamaka)
ʻi [[Talasiu]] || [[File:Mape langi Malomaloaʻa.svg]] |- | [[File:Pau mo ngau.jpg|350px]] || Pau-mo-ngau
ʻOku toe maka ʻe ua pē. Mahalo pē tatau mo e Langi Leka ? || [[File:Mape Pau&Ngau.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi-Tōfāua.jpg|350px]] || Langi Tōfā-ua, koeʻuhi naʻe telio ʻa e tuʻi ʻe ua
(ʻoku ui ko e Langi Leka ʻe ʻAholangamaka, ka ʻoku ʻikai leka ʻa e langi ní) || [[File:Mape langi Tōfāua.svg]] |- | || Langi Leka
pulia pe ʻikai ʻiloa. Ko e langi ʻuluaki ia, naʻe langa ʻe [[Talatama]]. ʻOku tōfā heni ko [[Sinaitakalaʻilangileka]]|| |- | [[File:Langi Sinai.jpg|350px]] || Langi Sinai (?), ofi ki he fale fakataha fakasiasi, ko Tonunga || [[File:Mape langi Sinai.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Faʻapite.jpg|350px]] || Langi Faʻapite (?) || [[File:Mape langi Faʻapite.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Puipui.jpg|350px]] || Langi Puipui (?) || [[File:Mape langi Puipui.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Nukulau1.jpg|350px]] || Langi Nukulau ʻuluaki (?) || [[File:Mape langi Nukulau 1.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Nukulau2.jpg|350px]] || Langi Nukulau ua (?) || [[File:Mape langi Nukulau 2.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Foʻou.jpg|350px]] || Langi Foʻou (?) || [[File:Mape langi Foʻou.svg]] |- | || Langi Hahake
ʻikai ʻiloa, ofi ki Langi Foʻou ? || |- | [[File:Langi Luani & Tuituiohu.jpg|350px]]|| Langi ʻo Luani mo Tuituiohu (?) || [[File:Mape langi Luani mo Tuituiohu.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Kofe=Maka.jpg|350px]] || Langi Maka pe Langi Kofe || [[File:Mape langi Kofe = Maka.svg]] |- | [[Image:Langi-Maluʻatonga.jpg|350px]] || Langi Malu-ʻa-Tonga pe Langa Lili
ko e langi toputapau maʻa e kau tuʻi || [[Image:Mape langi Maluʻatonga.svg]] |- | [[Image:Langi Tauhala.jpg|350px]] || Langi Tauhala
ko e langi toputapau maʻa e kau tuʻi || [[Image:Mape langi Tauhala.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi-Tau‘atonga.jpg|350px]] || Langi Tau-ʻa-Tonga
ko e langi toputapau maʻa e kau tuʻi || [[File:Mape langi Tauʻatonga.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi-Tu‘ofefafa.jpg|350px]] || Langi Tuʻo-fefafa
Ko e langi toputapu ʻaupito ia: ko e telio ia ʻo e [[Sanualio Laufilitonga]] ʻi 1865 (hifo he kolosi lahi, ʻi he puha sima, ʻoku ui ''langi foʻou'') mo e [[pātele Sevelo]] foki, ko e muʻa ʻo e kau misinale katolika (1842—1884) || [[File:Mape langi Tuʻofefafa.svg]] |- | || Langi Kātoa
(ʻoku ui ko e Langi Fanakava ʻe ʻAholangamaka)
pulia || [[File:Mape langi Kātoa.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Fanakavakilangi.jpg|350px]] || Langi Fanakava-ki-langi, ʻoku tōfā heni ko [[Sinaitakalaʻifanakavakilangi]]
(kā ʻoku ui ko e Langi Kātoa ʻe ʻAholangamaka) || [[Image:Mape langi Fanakavakilangi.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Taetaea.jpg|350px]] || Langi Taetaea
(ʻoku ui ko e Langi Tuʻoteau ʻe ʻAholangamaka, pea hono Langi Taetaea ʻoku ofi ki Langi Faʻapite) || [[File:Mape langi Taetaea.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Tuʻoteau.jpg|350px]] || Langi Tuʻo-teau
(ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai hano hingoa ʻe ʻAholangamaka) || [[File:Mape langi Tuʻoteau.svg]] |- | || Langi Tamatou
ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Hoi]] mo [[Makaunga]]; telioʻanga ʻo e tamapua ko [[Tuʻitonganui Tamatou]] || |- | || (Langi) Lotunofo
ko e langi moʻoni? ko e hingoa ʻo e ʻapi ofi ki he falelotu katolika ʻo Lapaha, telioʻanga ʻo [[Sinaitakalaʻilotunofo]] || [[File:Mape ʻapi Lotunofo.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Heketā.jpg|350px]] || Langi Heketā
ʻi [[Niutōua]] ofi ki he [[Haʻamonga ʻa Maui]] || [[File:Mape langi Heketā.svg]] |- | [[File:Langi Moʻungalafa.jpg|350px]] || Langi Moʻungalafa
ʻi [[Afā]] || [[File:Mape langi Moʻungalafa.svg]] |- |} [[Image:Mu'a.jpg|thumb|right|upright=2]] {| border=1 | [[File:Loʻāmanu.jpg|350px]] || Fale Loʻāmanu (ʻAta: tafaʻaki tonga) || [[File:Mape Loʻāmanu.svg]] |- | || Fale Fakauō || |- | || Fale Tui(nga)papai || |- | || Fale Pulemālō || |- | || Fale Tauhakeleva || |} ==Tataku== *Matāpule ko Makalangahiva (Kalonikali, Sune 2006) *Matāpule ko Maka ʻAholangamaka, (ʻEva, ʻEpeleli 2002) http://www.fiat.to/eva/eva-57.htm *ʻEiki Falefā, (Langi tauʻolunga, 2000) *Minisitā ʻo e fonua (1962) *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]] [[Category:Tuʻi Tonga]] [[category:ngaahi tohi hokohoko]]

page.title: Haveluliku
page.text:
[[File:Haveluliku.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haveluliku (kolo)]] [[File:Makatolo.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Ko e makatolo ʻa Maui]] Ko '''Haveluliku''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki he Hala Liku ʻi he hahake ʻo [[Tatakamotonga]] pea ofi ki [[Fātumu]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻi he matāfonua ko ʻene ʻana ʻiloa, ko e '''ʻAnahulu''', ʻoku lahi ʻa e fanga [[pekepekatea]] nofo ʻi loto.
ʻI loto kolo ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi maka (liku) lahi ʻe fā, ʻoku ui ko e '''makatolo ʻa Maui'''. ʻOku pehē naʻe lī ʻa e ngaahi maka ni ʻe Maui mei [[ʻEua]] ki heni, ʻi he taimi tatau naʻe keli ʻe ia ʻa ʻAnahulu. Vakai foki ki [[Kalaʻau]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]] (tafaʻaki ʻuta), mo e puleʻanga ʻo e Tonga (tafaʻaki liku ʻo e hala). {{feituʻu Tonga|21°205|175°104}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Pelehake
Fātumu
Lavengatonga
page.text:
[[Image:Lavengatonga.gif|right|350px|thumb|Lavengatonga (kolo)]] Ko '''Lavengatonga''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki he Hala Liku ʻi he hahake ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Fātumu]] mo [[Haʻasini]] & [[Hamula]], pea he ngataʻanga ʻo e hala mei [[Pelehake]].
ʻOku ofi ki he matātahi ko '''ʻOholei''', ko e matātahi fakaʻofoʻofa ia he onoʻaho. Kae ʻosi he kaihaʻa ʻo ʻene ʻoneʻone, ko e matātahi matamatakovi.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]] (tafaʻaki ʻuta), mo e puleʻanga ʻo e Tonga (tafaʻaki liku ʻo e hala). {{feituʻu Tonga|21°235|175°107}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Nakolo
Fuaʻamotu (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[Image:FuaʻamotuTBU.gif|right|350px|thumb|Fuaʻamotu (kolo)]] Ko '''Fuaʻamotu''' (ʻoku ʻikai ko Fuʻamotu) ko e kolo ia ʻi he vahe hahake ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], tafaʻaki he Hala Liku ʻi he tonga ʻo e motu, ofi ki [[Nakolo]] ki he hahake, pea ʻoku ofi foki ki [[Pelehake]] ʻi he tokelau.
Ko hono hingoa fakatene ko '''Vai ko Latai''' pe '''Hoosi tea''', koeʻuhi ʻa e hoosi naʻe tō mei ai ki hono pekia ko [[Siaosi U. Tukuʻaho]], pe '''Maka ʻa kiu''', koeʻuhi ʻoku tuʻula ʻa e fanga [[kiu]] ʻi ʻolunga ʻo e ngaahi maka ʻi he matātahi lolotonga he mamaha ʻa e tahi, pe '''Fanga ko fēfē ho loto'''.
Ko e malaʻe vakapuna ʻuluaki ʻi Tonga, ʻoku ui ko ''Fuaʻamotu airport'', kae ʻi he moʻoni ʻoku tuʻu ia ʻi Pelehake.
ʻOku ʻi ai ha lautohi ʻe 2, ko e GPS mo e FWPS.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tungī|Tungī]]. Ko e ʻofisa kolo ko Kolo Napaʻa ia. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°264|175°139}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻasini
Hamula
Milan Rastislav Štefánik
page.text:
[[Image:Milan Rastislav Štefánik.jpg|left|thumb|200px|Milan Rastislav Štefánik]] [[Image:Štefánikmaka.jpg|right|thumb|500px|Maka fakamanatu (ko e tuʻunga ʻo ʻene fakaʻata) ʻi [[Fungamisi]]. ʻOku tohi ki ai: 
Na počesť Milana R.Štefánika, sloven-
ského astrónoma, ktorý na ostrove
Vavaʻu robil v roku 1911 výskum zatme-
nia Slnka

In honour of Milan R.Štefánik, Slovak
astronomer, who executed a research
on the solar eclipse on the Vavaʻu
island in 1911
]] Ko '''Milan Rastislav Štefánik''' ko e tangata fakafalealea mo tau mo saienisi ʻo e fetuʻu, mei [[Silovakia]]. Fāʻeleʻi: 21 Siulai 1880 ʻi Košariská — pekia 4 Mē 1919 ʻi Ivánka pri Dunaji. Naʻe lahi ʻene folau ʻi māmani. Naʻa ne haʻu ki [[Tahisi]] ʻi Mē 1910 ʻo fakaʻata ki he [[fetuʻu esiafi]] ko ''Halley'', kae naʻe movete koeʻuhi he ʻaoʻaofia. ʻOsi ko ia naʻa ne folau ki [[Nuʻusila]] pea ki [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]]. ʻI he ʻaho ʻo 29 ʻEpeleli 1911 naʻa ne mamata ki he mate ʻa e laʻa kakato ʻi he tumuʻaki ʻo [[Fungamisi]], ʻi he feituʻu ʻoku toe he taimí ni ʻa e kiʻi maka fakamanatu. Naʻa monūʻia ʻa Štefánik he taimi ē koeʻuhi naʻe tafitonga ʻa e langi, naʻe ola ʻaupito ʻene fakaʻata ki he laʻā fakasaienisi. ==Tataku== http://www.stefanik.net/ {{DEFAULTSORT:Štefánik MR}} [[category:kakai]] {{English|abstract}}

page.title: Popua
page.text:
[[Image:Popua.gif|right|350px|thumb|Popua (kolo)]] Ko '''Popua''' pe '''Vaʻepopua''' ko e kolo foʻou ia ʻi he tafaʻaki hahake ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]], ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Maʻufanga]] mo [[Pātangata]]. Ko hono hingoa ʻoku haʻu mei he sia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai, tatau mo e fefine naʻe nofo ʻi ai ʻoku fuofuoloa, ko [[ʻIlaheva Vaʻepopua]].
Ko e feituʻu āulalo ʻaupito ia, ʻoku lōmakiʻi ia ʻi he tahi tau.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°152|175°161}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Maʻufanga
page.text:
[[Image:Maʻufanga.gif|right|350px|thumb|Maʻufanga (kolo (kulokula) + tofiʻa (engeenga))]] Ko '''Maʻufanga''' (pe onoʻaho: '''Maʻofanga''') ko e kolo tuʻotuʻa ia ʻi he tafaʻaki hahake ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Vai ʻo moko''' ia. Ko e tupuʻanga ʻo e hingoa: ko e ''fanga'' naʻe ''maʻu'' ʻe ha tuʻi pe ha ʻeiki, mahalo pē ko [[Fīnau ʻUlukālala I ʻi Maʻofanga]].
Ko e konga ʻo Nukuʻalofa lahi, kae ʻoku kehe ʻa e feituʻú ni, koeʻuhi ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Fakafānua|Fakafānua]]. Ko hono ʻapi meʻaʻanga ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he lotomālie, ko ''Siumafuaʻuta''. Kā ko e tofiʻa ʻoku lahi ange he kolo pē, ʻoku toe ha ngaahi kolo kehe, kolo tuʻotuʻa ʻa Nukuʻalofa, ʻoku nau tuʻu ʻi he tofiʻá ni.
ʻI onoʻaho ko Maʻufanga ko e kolo hūfanga ia, fakatapui ki he kau ʻotua, ko e feituʻu maʻa e feʻiloaki fakamelino ʻo e houʻeiki ʻi he taimi tau. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°143|175°187}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina
page.text:
[[Image:The_Free_Church_of_Tonga.jpg|left|400px|thumb|Ko honau fale lotu lahi taha ʻi Nukuʻalofa]] Ko e '''Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina''', (Free church of Tonga), ko e taha ʻo e [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga]].
Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻi 1928 ʻe he kau palesiteni naʻe ʻikai te nau loto ki he fakataha ʻi 1924 ʻo e ''Wesleyan mission '' mo e ''Free church'' ki he [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]]. Naʻe haeʻi mei ai, pea naʻe pehē ʻe kinautolu, ko e Siasi tauʻatāina moʻoni ʻa kinautolu, naʻe kamata ʻi he 6 Sānuali 1885. ʻI he taimi tatau naʻe haeʻi foki ʻa e [[Siasi ʻo Tonga]], pea naʻe pehē ʻa e meʻa tatau ʻe kinautolu. Ko ia ai, ko e Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina ʻoku ʻiloa foki ko e '''Siasi ʻo e palesiteni''', pea mo e siasi ʻe taha ʻoku ui ko e Siasi ʻo e houʻeiki.
ʻOsi he kau palesiteni papālangi fakamuimui, ko e kau palesiteni lolotonga `o e Siasi ko Rev Semisi Fonua.
Ko ʻenau akoʻanga: ko '''Tailulu''' (ʻi Tongatapu, Haʻapai mo Vavaʻu).
[[Image:The Free Church of Tonga, description.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko e maka fakamanatu]] {{English|translation}} [[category:lotu]]

page.title: Masilamea
page.text:
[[Image:Masilamaea.gif|right|350px|thumb|Masilamea (kolo)]] Ko '''Masilamea''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Teʻekiu]] pea mo e manga fā ofi ki [[Foʻui (Tongatapu)|Foʻui]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Vai ko lele ʻa lulu'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga.
Ko e matāpule tauhi fonua ʻi he koló ni ko ''[[:category:Sikei|Sikei]]''. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko ''Veʻeloʻa''. Ko e hingoa tauhi fonua ko ʻeni, ʻoku fakanofo pē ia ʻe [[:Category:Lauaki|Lauaki]]. Pea ʻoku kau ʻa Sikei ʻi he kau Nimatapu ([[:category:Haʻa Tufunga|Haʻa Tufunga]]). Ko Sikei, ko e tehina faifatongia ia ʻa Lauaki. Ka ʻi ai ha poʻuli kuo tō ʻi he fonua, pea ka ʻikai kē ʻi Tongá ni ʻa Lauaki, ko Sikei te ne fakahoko honau fatongia fakahaʻatufunga pea toki tokoni mai ai pē ki ai ʻa e toenga ʻo e kau Haʻa Tufunga.
Ko e taimi foki naʻe pekia ai ʻa e taʻahine ʻalo ko [[ʻElisiva Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku (Tupou)|Fusipala]] (tehina ʻo [[Sālote Tupou III]]) ko Sikei (Siale) naʻe ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he fatā fakataha mo e taʻahine, mei hono fakahāʻele mei pālasi ki [[Malaʻekula]].
==Tataku== Lēkoti ʻa e ʻōfisi ʻo e pālasi. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°125|175°326}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[category:Sikei]]

page.title: Teʻekiu
Nukunuku
page.text:
[[Image:Nukunuku.gif|right|350px|thumb|Nukunuku (kolo)]] Ko '''Nukunuku''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Fatai (Tongatapu)|Fatai]] mo [[Teʻekiu]].
Ko e akoʻanga: Ako māʻolunga ko Tupou, lotoʻā Nukunuku.
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ko e kolotau ko '''Hule'''. ʻOsi ʻene ikuna ʻi he tau ʻo Sānuali 1837, ko e kau toa ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou I]], naʻa nau tāmateʻi ʻa e kakai kotoa.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:category:Tuʻivakanō|Tuʻivakanō]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°133|175°300}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Fatai (Tongatapu)
Matafonua
Puke
Hōfoa
page.text:
[[Image:Hofoa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Hōfoa (kolo)]] Ko '''Hōfoa''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu mamamamaʻo mei he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] mo [[Puke]]. Ko hono moʻoni, he onopooni naʻe kamata ʻo hoko ki ha tuʻotuʻa kolo pē ʻo Nukuʻalofa. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Fonu mo e moa''' pe '''Ko e vai ko lomoloma.'''
Kau ai ʻa e matāpule faifatongia ʻa Hofoa ko Mafi-to-he-sopu-o-taufaʻahau pea mo Kauʻatoa
Ko Hofoa foki ko e vahe kolo pe ia ʻo Kolomotuʻa he ko Hofoa pe ko e konga ia ʻo Kolomotuʻa
Ko e houʻeiki ʻo Hofoa ko e hou'eiki pe mei Kolomotuʻa ka ko e kakai ʻo e fonua ʻoku taumuʻa ʻi heʻenau ngaahi kātoanga ko Lausiʻi Niu
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°132|175°227}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Kalaʻau
page.text:
[[Image:Kalaʻau.gif|right|350px|thumb|Kalaʻau (kolo)]] [[File:Tsunami rock.jpg|left|350px|thumb|Ko e maka tolo ʻa Maui ʻi Kalaʻau]] Ko '''Kalaʻau''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Liku ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Fāhefa]] & [[Haʻutu]] mo e manga fā ofi ki [[Foʻui (Tongatapu)|Foʻui]].
Ko e ngaahi ʻapi ʻuta tatatakai ko e tofiʻa kinautolu ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, kae ko e kolo, ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Lasike|Lasike]], ko e taha ʻo hono ngaahi ''Lakepa''. ==Maka tolo ʻa Maui== Ko e ngaahi hingoa kehe: ''Tsunami rock'' (lea fakapalangi). ''Maka tolo ʻa Maui'', ''Maka asiasi'', ''Maka sioʻata''. Vakai foki ki [[Haveluliku]]. Ko e konga feo ia, ko e 1.6 Kk (kika kalami) hono mamafa. Ko e maka fakamanatu ofi ki ai ʻoku tala ange:
Maka tolo ʻa Maui ʻOku pehē ʻe he talatupuʻa ʻa Tonga ni, ne ʻita ʻa Maui Kisiksi ʻi he fafangu ia ʻe he moataʻane ʻa ʻene ʻEiki pea ne tuli ke tamateʻi. Naʻe hola e moa mei ʻEua ki Tongatapu ni ka naʻa ne tolo mai ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu maka ke tamateʻi ʻaki, pea ko e maka ni ʻa ia ko e lahi taha ia ʻo e ngaahi maka, te ne toki tamateʻi e moa. Maka ʻo e peau kula ʻOku tui ʻa e kau fakatotolo ko e fuʻu maka feo eni, ʻa ia ʻoku pehē ko e lahi taha ia ʻi mamani ʻi he ngaahi maka peau kula naʻe omi ʻi he mita nai ʻe 100 mei he ngaahi hakau ʻoku ne takatakai ʻa Tonga. ʻOku nau pehē ko e maka ni naʻe heka mai ʻi he fuʻu peau kula fakalilifu ʻi he meimei taʻu ʻe laui afe kimuʻa. {{English|more}} {{feituʻu Tonga|21°139|175°336}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻutu
Fāhefa
Vaotuʻu
Matahau
Lakepa
Nafualu
page.text:
Ko e lahi ʻa e ngaahi feituʻu ʻoku ui '''Nafualu''' pe '''Fualu'''.
Ko Nafualu mahuʻinga taha, ko e feituʻu ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Hihifo ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Puke]] & [[Hōfoa]] pea mo [[Matafonua]] & [[Fatai (Tongatapu)|Fatai]]. ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai ko e kolisi [[Siaʻatoutai]]. Ko e konga ia ʻo [[Haʻamea]].
Ko Fualu ʻe taha ko e feituʻu ia ʻi he hihifo ʻo [[Pea]].
{{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻamea
page.category: Talatukufakaholo
page.text:
Ko e hingoa ʻo e feituʻu, ko '''Haʻamea''', kae ʻoku ʻikai pau ʻi fē pea mo ʻanefē.
ʻI he onoʻaho, naʻe tuʻi ʻa [[Loʻau]], naʻá ne meʻa pe ʻafio ʻi Haʻamea. Mahalo pē ko [[Haʻamoa]] ia, ʻa ia naʻe tatau pe lahi ange ʻa e pule ʻo Loʻau ʻi he pule ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]].
ʻI he kuonga ʻe taha, mahalo pē fakamuimui ange, naʻe meʻa pē ʻa e ʻeiki ko Loʻau ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]], ko e feituʻu ofi ki [[Lakepa]], [[Nafualu]] pea mo [[Matangiake]]. ʻI he talatukufakaholo ʻo e [[folau ʻa Kae]] naʻe folau ʻe Loʻau ʻa hono kalia ʻi he lepa ʻi Haʻamea.
ʻI he onopooni naʻe ʻi ai hano ʻapi ngoue ʻa [[:Category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]] ([[Siaosi Fīnau Mīsini]]) ʻi he feituʻú ni, ʻa ia naʻe ui ʻa hono foha ʻe [[Sālote Tupou III]] ko [[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea]].
{{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[Category:Talatukufakaholo]]

page.title: Houma (Tongatapu)
page.text:
[[Image:HoumaTBU.gif|right|350px|thumb|Houma (kolo)]] Ko '''Houma''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Liku ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Haʻakame]] mo [[Vaotuʻu]].
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Vaea|Vaea]], ko e taha ʻo hono ʻapi meʻaʻanga ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai.
ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa Houma ki he '''Puhi ʻa Vaea''' pe '''Pupuʻa puhi''' pe '''Mapu ʻa Vaea''', ko e hingoa tenetene ʻo e koló ni foki. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°170|175°303}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Pangai (ʻEua)
page.text:
[[Image:PangaiEUA.gif|right|thumb|350px|Pangai (kolo)]] Ko '''Pangai''' ko e kolo ia ʻi loto [[ʻEua]], ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo Angahā mo Futu ʻi [[ʻEuafoʻou]], kae ʻoku ne kau ki he vahenga ʻo ʻEuamotuʻa.
ʻI onoʻaho ko e feituʻu ʻo Pangai mo e ngaahi ʻapi ʻuta ʻi heʻene tokelau (hahake ʻo Angahā), naʻe tuʻu ʻi ai ko e kolo ʻo Valu, ʻiloa mo hono [[siale]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°362|174°954}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻakame
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻakame.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haʻakame (kolo)]] Ko '''Haʻakame''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Liku ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Haʻalalo]] (ʻoku pipiki ki ai) mo [[Houma (Tongatapu)|Houma]].
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Vaea|Vaea]].
ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa Haʻakame ki heʻene ngaahi fuʻu [[toa]], ʻa ia hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Hala toa mui'''. Naʻe kamata tō ʻa e ngaahi toa ʻuluaki ʻi 1868 ʻe Sione Mataele, ko e tamasiʻi ako mei he fale ako [[Wesleyan mission|Uesiliana]] ʻi [[Nafualu]], (ʻoku ʻui [[Siaʻatoutai]] he taimí ni).
Naʻe pehē ʻoku ui ʻa e koló ni ko e ''[[haʻa]]'' ʻa ''Kame''. Ko Kame ko e tehina ʻo Kae, pea naʻa na foha ʻo [[Loʻau]] ʻo [[Haʻamea]]. Kae ʻoku ʻikai ʻilo ha tokotaha ko Kame ʻi he talatukufakaholo ʻo e [[folau ʻa Kae]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°184|175°284}} {{potuʻi}} *http://www.fiat.to/eva/eva-58.htm [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Haʻalalo
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻalalo.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haʻalalo (kolo)]] Ko '''Haʻalalo''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Liku ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[ʻUtulau]] mo [[Haʻakame]] (ʻoku pipiki ki ai, kā ha tofiʻa kehe).
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tupoutoʻa|Tupoutoʻa]].
Naʻe tanupou ʻa e kolo ʻe Tupou, ko e foha ʻo ha [[:Category:Vaea|Vaea]] ʻe taha, maʻa hono tuofefine ko Mapuhengalu, ko e ohoana ʻo ha [[Valu (ʻeiki)|Valu]] ʻe taha.
Ko hono hingoa tenetene ko '''Peaumaʻa''', koeʻuhi ʻa e ngaahi ngalu ʻi he likutapu. ʻOku pehē te ke lava sio hoʻo pele ʻi he afu. Ko e ʻaho ʻe taha ko ha [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]], ko [[Takalaua]] ʻi heʻene toutai, naʻa ne ʻilo ʻi he afu ha fefine talavou ʻaupito, ko ʻUlukihelupe. Naʻa ne foki ki he matātahi, ko ''Fanga Matakiʻata'' (ʻe lava ke ke mata ki [[ʻAta]] ʻi ai), pea naʻa ne kumi mo kumi ki he fefine ko ia. Pea naʻa ne ʻilo ia ʻi [[Lapaha]], ko e tuʻa, ko [[Vaʻelaveamata]].
Ko e tangata ongoongoa mei Haʻalalo: [[Nau Saimone]], punake. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°185|175°281}} {{potuʻi}} *http://www.fiat.to/eva/eva-58.htm [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: ʻUtulau
page.text:
[[File:ʻUtulau.gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻUtulau (kolo)]] [[File:FWC chapel 'utulau.JPG|thumb|left|300px|Ko e falelotu SUTT ʻo e kolo ni]] Ko '''ʻUtulau''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Liku ʻi muʻa ʻo [[Haʻalalo]] ko e kolo ʻuluaki ʻi ai.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tupoutoʻa|Tupoutoʻa]], kā ʻi muʻa ʻo 1921 naʻe kau kia [[Valu]].
Ko e ngaahi hingoa fakatenetene: '''Alafolau Heavula, Toa Fakaʻamu, Tokaʻanga ʻa e kalia ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga, Sika ʻa Valu, Vai ko Pāʻehe ʻa Tēvolo'''. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°190|175°269}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Kahoua
page.text:
[[Image:Matangiake.gif|right|350px|thumb|Matangiake (kolo)]] Ko '''Kahoua''' ko e kiʻi kolo ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e vahe hihifo ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu mamamamaʻo he Hala Kahoua ofi ki [[Liahona]], pea mo kiʻi mamaʻo ange mei [[Lomaiviti (Tongatapu)|Lomaiviti]]. Ko e tafaʻaki tokelau ʻo e koló ni ʻoku ui ko '''Haʻafeva'''. Ki he fakatonga ʻo Liahona, ʻoku ʻi ai ha kiʻi kolo ko '''Matangiake'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Lāvaka|Lāvaka]].
Ka ʻi he tukufakaholo naʻe ʻi ai ʻae ongo houʻeiki ʻe tokoua, ko Lavaka mo Vaea. He ʻaho ni, Ko Kula, ko e matāpule ia 'a [[:Category:Vaea|Vaea]], ko ia 'oku fai fatongia 'i Matangiake.
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°162|175°269}}
=Kahoua= [[File:kahouasign.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e sika ʻa Lāvaka (Tapukuhikuloa) pea mo e sika ʻa Vaea (Kaukauloa) ʻa ia naʻe hunuki fakataha ʻa e ongo siká ni ʻa ia naʻe ngaohi loua ʻa e ongo siká ni pea meí ke Kaho. Ne hunuki ʻa e ongo sika ʻiloá ni ʻi Kahoua [Veifoa] he matapā ʻo Hoamofaleono. Ko e fakaʻilonga tapu ke ʻuhia ʻe ha taha kae ʻoua kuo fakahifo ʻa e ʻalo pele ʻo Haʻa Havea Lahi. Ko e ongo foʻi tekeua ʻoku ʻiloa he hisitōlia ʻo e fakahifo tamá ko Kaukauloa pea mo Tapukuhikuloa. Ko kinaua ʻoku ʻiloa ʻi [[Nafualu|Fualu]] ko Kahoua. Ko e ongo siká ni ne ʻiloa he malaʻe sika ʻo e Funga Matatoa ʻa ia ko e sika ʻa Lāvaká naʻe nounou ka ko hono fakahikú ne lōloa tahá pea ʻoku ʻiloa koe Fakatapuku. Ko e sika ʻa Vaeá ko e sika ne lōloa tahá ne ʻiloa ko Kaukauloa.
Kuo ʻiloa ʻa e ongo siká ni he ʻahó ni ne kuó na fakatouola ʻi loto tatau, ko e fakamoʻoni ia kuo [[Tupou VI|Tuʻi ʻa Lāvaka]] pea [[Nanasipauʻu Tukuʻaho (Vaea)|Kuini ʻa Vaea]].
=Vai ko Haʻapele= [[File:haʻapele.jpg|400px|right]][[File:vaikohaʻapele.jpg|400px|right|thumb|ko e luo he ʻaho ni mo e vai ʻi lalo]] ʻI he 1797, makatuʻunga ʻi he kaikaiʻāfua ʻa Hoamofaleono ʻone fakaʻamau pē ke inu ha totoʻi tangata heʻene tuʻituʻia pea kei manava ʻa [[Siaosi Tupou I|Taufaʻāhau]]. Ko [[Tāufa Hoamofaleono|Hoamofaleono]] ko e ʻofefine ia ʻo [[Maluʻotāufa|Maʻafu]] ko e ʻulu ʻo [[:Category:Haʻa Havea lahi|Haʻa Havea Lahi]]. Naʻe aʻu ʻene kaikaiʻāfua ke fekauʻi ʻe hono tuongaʻane [[Tangataʻilavalu Maluʻotāufaʻāhau|Tangata-ʻIla-Valu]] ʻa e taʻokete ʻo Hoamofaleono ke hokohokaʻi ʻa hono nima ke fakatafe mei ai ʻa e toto ke inu a Hoamofaleono.
Naʻe fai ʻa e manavahē koeʻuhi ko e kaikaiʻāfua ʻa Hoamofaleono pea mei ai naʻe ʻomai ai ʻe Lāvaka pea mo Vaea ʻa Hoamofaleono ki Veifoa ʻi Fualu. Naʻe tānaki mai leva ʻa e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo e kau Haʻa Havea Lahi ke nau fakafeʻao kia Hoamofaleono pea ui ai honau ngaahi tuʻunga falé ko Haʻapele. Naʻe keli heni ʻa honau vai pea ui pē ko e Vai ko Haʻapele. Ko e vai ʻeni naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻe Hoamofaleono pea mo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo Haʻa Havea Lahi naʻa nau ʻi Fualu.
ʻOku pehē naʻe huufi ʻa e Vai ko Haʻapele ʻi Maʻasi 1797, ʻoku fakapapauʻi ʻení he ko e meʻa mai ʻa Maʻafu ke huufi ʻa e Vai ko Haʻapelé mo e fāʻeleʻi ʻo Moeakihīʻatu ʻe Fusipongi ʻo fakahingoa ai ʻe Maʻafu ʻa e tama ʻa Fusipongi ko Moeakihīʻatu.
[[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Lomaiviti (Tongatapu)
Tokomololo
Haʻateiho
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻateiho.gif|right|350px|thumb|Haʻateiho (kolo)]] Ko '''Haʻateiho''' ko e kolo ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e vahe loto ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Pea]] mo [[Veitongo]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko '''Sila pelu ua''', ko e ʻuhinga naʻe pelu ʻa e mape fakapuleʻanga ʻo Tonga ʻi he tetepu hahake ʻo e kolo, ofi ki ʻĀtele, ko ʻene tuʻotuʻa kolo (21.183° S 175.225° W). Ko e feituʻu foki ia ʻoku kamata ʻa e Hala Loto ki [[Tokomololo]] mo e ngaahi feituʻu hihifo ange.
Ko [[Kolisi Tonga]] ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ʻĀtele, pea mo e [[Faiʻanga vaʻinga lotofale ko ʻĀtele]] pea mo e lotoʻā ʻo e [[ʻUnivesiti ʻo e Pasifiki tonga]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻihaʻateiho|Tuʻihaʻateiho]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°179|175°230}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Veitongo
page.text:
[[Image:Veitongo.gif|right|350px|thumb|Veitongo (kolo)]] Ko '''Veitongo''' ko e kolo ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e vahe loto ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Pea]] [[Haʻateiho]] mo [[Vainī]]. Ko ʻene tuʻotuʻa kolo, ko '''Lotohaʻapai''' (21.186° S 175.215° W) ko e konga hihifo ʻo e koló ni, kaʻe ʻoku ʻikai ʻilo ʻe he tokolahi. Ko e hingoa tenetene ko '''Fakamalusioʻata''' mo '''Halafuoleva''' ia.
Ko e ʻuhinga ʻo e lea Veitongo, ʻoku pehē hono tala ko e fonua ne fakaʻofoʻofa hono kakai fefine pea nau toe sino lelei foki. ʻI he taimi ko ē ne hoko e ngaahi tau pea ne hola ʻa e kakai e kiʻi fonua ni ʻo toi mei he tongo. Ne meʻa atu ʻa nōpele [[:Category:Niukapu|Niukapu]] ki he kakai ko eni: «Kuo Veia honau vaʻe he ngāue ʻa e tongo». Pea ko e ʻuhinga ia e Veitongo.
ʻOku tolu ʻa e kautaha soka ʻi heni, kau katoa (2003) ki he kautaha lahi ʻo e [[Tonga Football Association]]: ko [[SC Lotohaʻapai]] mo [[Lotohaʻapai Dragon]] mo [[Veitongo FC]]. Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻi 21 Mē 2002 ʻa e senitā fakafonua akonekina, pea naʻe langaʻi, ofi ki he kolo, ʻa e ʻapi ako soka foʻou ʻe faá.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, kā ko Lotohaʻapai ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻihaʻateiho|Tuʻihaʻateiho]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°186|175°194}} {{potuʻi}} *http://www.tongafootball.com/ [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[category:soka & ʻakapulu]]

page.title: Vainī
page.text:
[[Image:Vainī.gif|right|350px|thumb|Vainī (kolo)]] Ko '''Vainī''' ko e kolo lahi ia ʻi he vahe loto ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Veitongo]] mo [[Malapo]], ʻoku manga ʻa e hala ki [[Longoteme]].
Ofi ki Vainī, ʻi he hala ki hihifo, ʻoku tuʻu: *Nualei (21.189° S 175.179° W) ko e tuʻunga ʻo e fāmá (ʻoku ui: ko e ''Vainī research station''). *Tapuhia, ko e liʻanga veve foʻou, naʻe kamata ʻi 2007.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Maʻafu|Maʻafu]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°196|175°174}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

page.title: Pea
page.text:
[[File:Pea (1).gif|right|350px|thumb|Pea (kolo)]] Ko '''Pea''' ko e kolo ia ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e vahe loto ʻo [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]]. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Tofoa]] mo [[Haʻateiho]], pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e hala ki [[Tokomololo]]. Ko hono hingoa tenetene ko '''Vaikopuna''' (ko e vaitafe ʻi lolofonua) pe '''Niuvākai''' (mei he tau ʻo 1852). Ko Pea ko feituʻu mahuʻinga ʻi he tau fakafonua naʻe kamata ʻi 1799. Naʻe langa ʻa e [[kolotau]] ʻe [[Takai]].
Naʻe fakaʻosi ʻo e hīteni, ko e ʻeiki ʻo Pea, ko Lāvaka. Naʻe tau ʻe [[Siaosi Tupou I]] ʻa e tau fakaʻosi ʻo Tongatapu ʻi heni mei he 23 Maʻasi aʻu ki he 17 ʻAokosi 1852, pea ne ikuna. Naʻe tautea lahi ʻa Pea ʻe he mafi: naʻe kaihaʻa hono tofiʻa. Ko e tofiʻá ni ko e matāliku ʻo e tuʻi he taimí ni, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e ''Vila'' pea mo ''Tufumāhina''
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Lāvaka|Lāvaka]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°171|175°234}}
=Ko e tupuʻanga ʻo e hingoa Vai-ko-puna= [[File:Vaikopuna.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e ʻuluaki hingoa ʻo e kiʻi vaí ni ko Ngasēsē naʻe toki liliu pē ʻo ui ko e Vai-ko-puná ʻi he taimi naʻe faʻa tākele ai ʻae taʻahine ko [[Sinaitakalaʻilotunofo]] he fakatete ʻa e kau fefine hoihoifuá ki he mānaʻia ko [[Tungīmānaʻia]]. ʻOku pehē tokua naʻe ngaohi ʻe he kau fefine ʻa e pitú ʻo fakafonuʻaki ʻa e ngaahi foʻi pitú pea ʻai ʻa e pitu ʻe taha ʻo tekeʻaki ʻa e vaí ʻo tākele ai ʻa e taʻahine ko Sinaitakalá. Pea ʻi he vakai ko ia ʻa e kakai ki he puna ko ia ʻa e vaí pea mei he pitú naʻa nau pehē kuo puna ʻa e vaí pea toki liliu ai pe ʻo ui ko e Vai-ko-puná.
Ko e Vai-ko-puná foki ko ha fakataipe ia ʻo e vai ko Soataní ʻi he [[tohitapu|tohitapú]]. ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e vaí ni ke mulumulu ai ʻa kinautolu ʻoku ʻi ai honau fokoutua kili hūfanga he fakatapú. Ko e vai ʻeni naʻe fuofua papitaiso ai ʻa Fieotaʻanga ʻa e kiʻi fefine naʻa ne tali ʻa e [[Siasi Katolika Loma|lotu katoliká]] ʻi Pea ni ʻi he taʻu 1842.
ʻI he anga ko ia ʻa e tuʻu ʻa e kolotaú ko e Vai-ko-puná ko e ʻulu ia ʻo e pea (lea pālangi: bear). Ko e matapā ko Nakaú ko e nima toʻohemá ia pea ko e nima toʻomataú ko Nainusi. ʻOku pehē tokua ʻe faingataʻa ki he filí he hūhangatonu mai ʻi he ngaahi matapā ʻe 9 ko e hūʻanga pe ki he kolotaú mei [[Fangaʻuta|Fangaʻutá]] ko e Vai-ko-puná ka ʻoka faifai pea ne fakakaukau ke ne hū mai ʻi Puna, ko e nima hemá te nau kau [Nakau] pe na na nusi [Nainusi] ʻa e filí.
=Ko e tupuʻanga ʻo e hingoa Niu-vākai= [[File:Niuvākai.jpg|400px|right]] Ko e fuʻu niu ʻeni ne ʻi ai ʻa e asiasi ʻo e kolotaú. Ko e tangata asiasi, ko Teʻefoto. Ko hono fatongia ko e kaka he fuʻu niu vākai ʻo fai mei ia hono fakasio ʻo e fili. Ko Teʻefoto naʻa ne fai fatongia ko e asiasi ʻo aʻu ki he taimi naʻe malolo ai ʻa e kolotaú.
Ka ʻi ai ha fili ʻoku fotu mai, te ne fusi leva ʻa e ngaahi maea ʻe 3 kou haʻi ki he toko3 ni ʻoku fai fatongia mei lalo. Ko e taimi ʻoku nau ʻongoʻi ai ʻoku fusi ʻa e maea, ʻoku nau ʻilo ʻoku ʻi ai ha fili ʻoku haʻu. Ko e hingoa ʻeni ʻo e toko3 fai fatongiá ko: # Matangisinga # Uipi ʻo Matahiva # Fafangu ʻo Loto Tonga Pea te nau fakahoko ki he kau toʻa mo e kakai ʻi he loto kolotau ke nau mateuteu.
=Ko e ngaahi matapā ʻe hiva= ==Ko e matapā ko Nakau== [[File:Matapā_ko_Nakau.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e taha ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi matapā ʻe 4 ʻo e fuofua kolotau ʻa ia ko Peá. Ko e matapā hūʻanga mei he faʻahi fakatokelau hahaké. Ko e matapā ʻeni mei Fangaʻuta. Ko e matapā fietaʻa ʻeni naʻe tō tau ai ʻa e kau toʻa ʻo hangē ko Kapiteni Kaloká. Ko e matapaá ni foki ʻoku pehē ʻe faingataʻa ka hū ha fili mei tahi. Ka hū mai ʻi he Vaikopuná te na kau [Nakau] pea na nusi [Nainusi] ʻa e fili ʻa ia ko e ongo matapā taupotu ʻeni ki he Vaikopuná. ʻOku ʻi ai foki ʻa e tala ʻo pehē tokua ko e fakatauhingoa ʻeni ki he matapā ʻo Pulotu ko Nakau. Ko [[Pulotu]] ko e feituʻu ia naʻe tauhi ai laumālie ʻo e houʻeiki kuo nau pekiá.
==Ko e matapā ko Papālangi \ Napāvatu== [[File:Matapā ko Papālangi Napāvatu.jpg|400px|right]] Matapā ko Papālangi pe ko Napāvatu: Ko e taha ʻeni ʻa e ngaahi matapā ʻe 5 naʻe toe keli ko ia ʻa e kolotau ko Angó pea fakalahi maiʻaki ʻa e ngaahi ʻotu matapaá. Naʻe fuofua ui ko Papālangi makatuʻunga ia he ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe fuofua ʻi ai ʻa Simi Tēvoló. Ko e Napāvatu ko hono ʻuhinga fakafisi ko e ''malu pe maka''. Ko e hingoa pē ia ʻa e Fisi naʻe leʻo ʻi he matapaá ni hili ʻa Simi Tēvoló kae foki mai ʻa Simi ʻo taka holo pe he ngaahi mataapaá. Ko e kau Fisi naʻe ʻomi kinautolu he ko kinautolu naʻa nau foʻu ʻe kalia ʻo Lāvaka, ʻa e Tavahikená.
==Ko e matapā ko Nakita== [[File:Matapā ko Nakita.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe ʻiloa ko Nakita. Ko e fakatauhingoa ʻeni ʻe he kau toʻa Fisi ne fakafolau mai ke nau kau hono maluʻi ʻa e kolotau ʻi Pea, pea toe foʻu ʻa e kalia ʻo Lāvaka. Ko e ''nakita'' ʻi he lea fakafisi ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ki he lotoʻaki ke fakahoko ha meʻa pē, pe ko hono fakahoko ha meʻa ʻoku lotoʻaki. Mahalo ʻo mei ʻuhinga lelei pē eni ki hi lotoʻaki ʻe he kau leʻo he matapā ki he kolotau ke nau taʻofi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku feinga ke ʻohofi ʻa e kolotau.
==Ko e matapā ko Malekini== [[File:Matapā ko Malekini.jpg |400px|right]] Ko e matapā ʻeni tokua naʻe lahi taha ai ʻa e mate. Ko e matapaá ni naʻe siʻisiʻi pea naʻe angakehe mei he toenga ʻo e ngaahi matapaá. Ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe ngāueʻaki ki he fehūʻaki ʻa e kakai ki he kolotaú fakaʻaho. ʻI he taimi tatau ko e hūʻanga ko ha ongo fuʻu niu ʻe 2 naʻe lī fakalava mei he kolotaú ni ke tafaʻaki ko ia ʻa e taha he ko e ngataʻanga e kolotaú naʻe fakatafe ai e vaí pea fakatoka e kahó masila ʻi lalo ʻi he vaí. Ka ʻilo mei he kolotaú ko e tokotaha ʻoku kaka mai he ongo foʻi niu (hala fakakavakava) ʻoku ʻikai ko ha Pea ʻe viloho leva mei loto ʻa e ongo foʻi niu pea tō ki he vai ʻo mate. Ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe ʻi ai ʻa Tauʻatevalu mo ʻene ongo māhangá.
==Ko e matapā ko Hōleva== [[File:Matapā ko Hōleva.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e matapā ʻeni hono tolu ʻo e fuofua kolotaú ʻa Pea ʻa ia naʻe tuʻu ʻi he fakatongahihifo ʻo e kolotaú. Ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe ngāueʻaki ki he feʻaluʻaki ki [[Fualu|Fualú]]. Naʻe tokolahi ʻa e kau toʻa pea mo hono ngaahi haʻa mo e matakali ʻi he kolotaú pea ko e tokonaki meʻatokoní naʻe fakahū mai ki he kolotaú ʻi Hōleva ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhinga ko e toki ''hō leva'' ʻoka lafa honau fatongiá.
==Ko e matapā ko Kaiʻavale== [[File:Matapā ko Kaiʻavale.jpg |400px|right]] Ko e taha foki ʻeni ʻa e ngaahi matapā naʻe toki fakalahi mai ʻi hono langa ai a ʻo Angó ʻo tuʻu fakatonga palāleli atu ki he matapā ko Puna-ki-langí. Ko e matapā ʻeni naʻe tuʻu ofi ki he ongo feleoko ʻo Tungīmānaʻia-ʻa-Tauvū-ki-Maʻananga pea mo Kaiʻavale, pea naʻe ʻi ai pē mo e sia ʻi he veʻe matapā ko ʻení ko e Sia-ko-Kaiaʻvale. Naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻa e matapaá ni ʻe kinautolu naʻe ʻi he feleokó.
==Ko e matapā ko Puna-ki-langi== [[File:Matapā ko Punakilangi.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e matapā ʻeni hono fā ʻo e fuofua kolotaú ʻa ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he fakatonga ʻo e kolotaú. Ko hono ʻuhingá ka ʻi ai ha fili ʻoku ne feinga ke hū ki he kolotaú ʻoku pau ange ʻa ʻene feingá ke ''puna ki langi'' ʻo toki tō hifo ai ki he kolotaú ʻi haʻane feinga ke hū hangatonu ʻo fou ʻi he matapaá ʻi he malu ko ia ʻa hone leʻohi pea mo e kau toʻa ne nau ʻi he matapaá ni.
==Ko e matapā ko Vailea \ Tuʻavale== [[File:Matapā ko Vailea Tuʻavale.jpg|400px|right]] Naʻe fakatau hingoa pē ʻa e matapā ni ki he toʻa ko Siale Vailea naʻe leʻo ʻi he matapā ni pea ʻi he mālōlō ʻa Vaileá ko e toʻa ko ia mei [[Folaha]] ko Mākivaka naʻe ʻi he matapā nipea naʻe pehē ko e saieniti ʻeni ʻo e kolotaú. Ko Tuʻavalé ko e maʻu mei he tangata ni he naʻa ne fata lalo tokotaha mai pē ʻa e tokonaki ki he kolotaú mei Folahá pea ne malava pē heʻene fuʻu lahí ʻo puna mei he kolotau ki he tuʻakolo ʻo fakalaka ʻi he vai naʻe keli he tuʻa kolotaū.
==Ko e matapā ko Nainusi== [[File:Matapā ko Nainusi.jpg|400px|left]] Ko e matapā ʻeni ʻi he tafaʻaki fakatonga-hahake ʻo e fuofua kolotau ko Peá. Ko e makatuʻunga ʻeni ia ʻi he foʻi loloto ʻi Vai-ko-puná ʻa ia ko e ngaahi fakatafe kotoa (vai) ʻi he ngaahi tuʻa kolotaú ne fakatafe kotoa ki Puna. Ko ʻene huʻa mai ko ia ʻa e tahí ʻone ʻomai ʻa e ngaahi kinohaʻa kotoa mei he kolotaú ke fakatafe ki tahi lahi pea ko e foʻi loloto ko ʻeni ʻoku ne nusi ʻa e ngaahi kinohaʻa ni. ʻI he taimi tatau ʻoku fakahoa foki ʻene fietaʻa pea mo Nakau ʻi ha taimi ʻe hū mai ai ha fili mei Fangaʻuta ko e huʻu ke ʻohofi ʻa e kolotau te na kau (Nakau) pea na nusi (Nainusi) ʻa e filí.
[[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Tofoa
page.text:
[[Image:Tofoa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tofoa (kolo)]] Ko '''Tofoa''' ko e kolo ia ʻi [[:category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]] ʻi he tonga ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]]. Naʻe vave ʻaupito ʻene tupu lolotonga he taʻu ʻe hongofulu tupu fakamuimui, naʻe hoko ʻa e tuʻotuʻa kolo ʻo e kolomuʻa. ʻOku e tuʻu ʻi he Hala Tāufaʻāhau ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Haveluloto]] mo [[Pea]]. ʻOku heni ʻi ai ʻa e manga ua mo Hala Vahaʻakolo. Ko e konga ʻi he tonga mei ai, ʻoku ui ko '''Koloua''' (21.162° S 175.229° W).
ʻOku na tuʻu ʻi ai ko e fale mahaki ko ''Vaiola'' pe mo ''Senitā fakafonua ʻa Tonga''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|21°159|175°226}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]]

Fonoifua
page.text:
[[Image:Fonoifua.gif|right|thumb|350px|Fonoifua (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Fonoifua''' ko e motu ia ʻi he ʻOtu muʻomuʻa, ʻa ia he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]. Ko e kiʻi motu ofi ʻi tonga ko [[Tanoa]] ia, ko e kiʻi motu ofi ʻi tokelau ko [[Meama (tonga)|Meama]] ia.
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ha kolo mo hono hingoa tatau, Fonoifua (kolo), 20.279° S 174.632° W.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻiʻāfitu|Tuʻiʻāfitu]]. {{feituʻu Tonga|20°278|174°629}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Tanoa
Meama (tonga)
Mango (Haʻapai)
page.text:
[[Image:Mango (2).gif|right|thumb|350px|Mango (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Mango''' ko e motu ia ʻi he ʻOtu muʻomuʻa, ʻa ia he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]. Ko e hakau ki heʻene hahake (tonga ʻo [[Fonoifua]], ʻoku ui ko ''Lua tafitu''.
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ha kolo mo hono hingoa tatau, '''Mango (kolo)''', 20.323° S 174.715° W.
Ko e feituʻu māʻolunga taha: mita ʻe 38.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]], ʻa ia ko e tuʻi fefine. {{feituʻu Tonga|20°329|174°709}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Nomuka
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[File:Nomuka.gif|right|thumb|350px|Nomuka (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Nomuka''' ko e motu lahi ia ʻi he ʻOtu muʻomuʻa, ʻa ia he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ha kolo mo hono hingoa tatau, Nomuka (kolo), 20.257° S 174.797° W, ko e kolomuʻa ʻo e ʻOtu muʻomuʻa.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tupoutoʻa|Tupoutoʻa]], tatau mo e [[Nomuka iki]].
Ko e ano lahi ʻo Nomuka, ʻoku ui ko '''Ano ava''', mo hono mālave tonga ko '''Mamaha''', ʻoku taitai kinaua. ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e ngaahi kiʻi motu siʻisiʻi ʻi loto: * Loto 20.254° S 174.790° W * Puhoʻava 20.247° S 174.788° W * Tefisi 20.259° S 174.789° W
Naʻe ʻaʻahi ʻa e motu ʻe he ʻeikivaka [[Abel Tasman]] ʻi 24 Sānuali 1643. Naʻa ne ui ia ko e motu ''Rotterdam'', ([[Rotterdam]], ko e kolo lahi ʻi hono fonua ko [[Holani]]), pea naʻa ne tala ange ko e hingoa tuʻufonua ko ''Amamocka'' ia. {{feituʻu Tonga|20°250|174°794}} [[File:Nomuka-Aerial View.jpg|left|thumb|ʻasi mei he vakapuna|300px]]
{{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Nomuka iki
page.text:
[[Image:Nomukaiki.gif|right|thumb|350px|Nomuka iki (motu)]] Ko '''Nomuka iki''' (pe Nomukaiki, pe Nomukeiki) ko e motu ia ofi ki [[Nomuka]] ʻi he ʻOtu muʻomuʻa, ʻa ia he tafaʻaki tonga ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]].
Ko e motu ʻoku ngāueʻaki ia he ʻapi pōpula.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tupoutoʻa|Tupoutoʻa]].
Naʻe ʻaʻahi ʻa e motu ʻe he ʻeikivaka [[Abel Tasman]] ʻi 24 Sānuali 1643. Naʻa ne ui ia ko ''Amorkakij''. {{feituʻu Tonga|20°282|174°804}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Haʻapai]]

ʻUiha
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:ʻUiha.gif|right|350px|thumb|ʻUiha (motu)]] [[Image:Halatoaongo.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Hala toa ongo]] Ko '''ʻUiha''' ko e motu lahi mo e mahuʻinga ia ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]. Ko hono hingoa fakatenetene ko e ''Ongo Haʻangana'', (ko [[Haʻano]] ko e taha ia).
ʻOku ʻi ai ha kolo ʻe ua: *Felemea 19.910° S 174.410° W ʻi he tafaʻaki tonga *ʻUiha (kolo) 19.892° S 174.405° W ʻi he tafaʻaki tokelau Ko e konga tokelau, ʻoku tuʻu ko ʻUiha (kolo) ʻi ai, ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Malupō|Malupō]], ko e konga tonga, ʻoku tuʻu ko Felemea ʻi ai, ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e [[:Category:tuʻi ʻo Tonga|tuʻi ʻo Tonga]], ʻa ia ko e tuʻi fefine.
ʻOku mahuʻinga lahi ko ʻUiha ʻi he hisitōlia ʻo Tonga. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ko e: *[[Makahokovalu (faʻitoka)|Makahokovalu]], ko e moʻunga (faʻitoka) lahi, tatau mo e [[Paepae ʻo Teleʻa]], ʻi he matātahi tokelau *Fāʻonelua ʻo ʻUiha (kolo). *[[Malaʻelahi]], naʻe telio ʻa e kau faleʻalo ʻi ai ʻi ʻUiha kolo. *Halatoaongo, ko e hala fakaʻeiki ki Malaʻelahi. *Tuʻalikutapu, ko e matāfonua hahake. *ʻOtu motu kinekina, ʻi he tonga ʻo e motu, ko e heliaki maʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]], vakai kia [[Tuʻitātui]]. *ʻEsi ʻo Maʻafu ([[Henele Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga]]) (ʻi Felemea).
Naʻe faʻelei ʻi ʻUiha: ko [[Feke Tutuila]]; [[Peni Tutuʻila Malupō]]; [[Tēvita Moala Kamitoni]]; [[ʻUlukilupetea]].
Ko [[Soakai]] ko e toʻa lahi, naʻe ʻafio ia ʻi Felemea ʻi he taʻu 1800 pe ofi ki ai (ko e kui ʻo Henele Maʻafuʻotuʻitonga mo e houʻeiki [[:Category:Fielakepa|Fielakepa]]).
{{Feituʻu Tonga|19°902|174°401}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]] [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Nukunamo
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Nukunamo.gif|right|350px|thumb|Nukunamo (motu)]] Ko '''Nukunamo''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Haʻano]] mo [[Foa]]. ʻOku ʻikai nofo ha tokotaha, ʻoku lahi ʻene vaoa.
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi sia motuʻa pea mo lusa ʻi ʻuta, mahalo pē langa ʻe [[Mataʻuvave]] I ʻi he taimi ʻo [[Kauʻulufonua (fekai)]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi ʻo Tonga|Tuʻi ʻo Tonga]], ʻa ia ko e tuʻi fefine. {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°715|174°273}} {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Tatafa
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Tatafa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Tatafa (motu)]] [[File:Tatafa island (Tonga).jpg|left|thumb|Ko Tatafa.]] Ko '''Tatafa''' ko e kiʻi motu ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo [[Uoleva]] mo [[ʻUiha]]. ʻOku ʻikai nofo ha tokotaha.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°876|174°418}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Uoleva
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Uoleva.gif|right|350px|thumb|Uoleva (motu)]] Ko '''Uoleva''' ko e motu lahi ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]], pea ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi ʻapi ʻuta ʻi ai he taimi ni, kae ʻoku ʻikai tuʻu ʻa e kolo. Ko e ʻuhinga naʻe ʻikai nofo pē ʻa e kakai, ko e feituʻu heilupe ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ia, ko [[Kauʻulufonua (fekai)]]. Naʻe nofo ʻa e kakai tauhi mei [[Lifuka]] pē, pea ko [[Mataʻuvave]] I mei [[Muʻa]] ko e kōvana.
Naʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi sia ʻe 30 tupu, ka ʻoku toe ʻilo ʻe 7 pē. *Finevalapililolo *Siamaka *Siakape *Kulufotu *Tunu-ʻete-feke-kae-kai-ʻete-ika *Tulikituʻahaʻa *Mamata-atu Naʻe lahi ʻa e ngaahi [[lupe]] he taimi ko ia lolotonga ʻenau lele mei [[Haʻamoa]] ki [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]] ʻi [[ʻOkatopa]] pea ʻenau foki ʻi [[Maʻasi]]. ʻOku toe foki ha ngaahi sia ʻi Muitoa ([[Haʻano]]) mo [[Nukunamo]].
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga pea mo e [[:Category:tuʻi ʻo Tonga|tuʻi ʻo Tonga]], ʻa ia ko e Tuʻi fefine. {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°850|174°403}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]] *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 [[sv:Ha'apai#Lifukaöarna]]

page.title: Foa
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Foa.gif|right|350px|thumb|Foa (motu)]] Ko '''Foa''' ko e motu lahi mo e mahuʻinga ia ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]].
ʻOku ʻi ai ha kolo ʻe fā mo ʻenau tofiʻa ʻi he takatakai: *'''Faleloa''' 19.734° S 174.288° W, tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Fakafānua|Fakafānua]] **kā ko e konga tonga ʻi he tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuita|Tuita]], ʻoku ui ko '''Haʻafakahenga''', **pea ko e kiʻi kolo tonga ange, ʻi he tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻihaʻateiho|Tuʻihaʻateiho]], ʻoku ui ko '''Haʻateihosiʻi'''. *'''Lotofoa''' 19.742° S 174.305° W, tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻipelehake|Tuʻipelehake]] mo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga *'''Fotua''' 19.749° S 174.318° W, tofiʻa tatau *'''Fangaleʻounga''' 19.753° S 174.323° W, tofiʻa ʻo [[:Category:Niukapu|Tuʻipelehake]] pea ʻoku toe ha ngaahi kiʻi ʻapiʻuta siʻisiʻi pē ʻo e tofiʻa ia ʻo e [[:Category:tuʻi ʻo Tonga|tuʻi ʻo Tonga]] mo e tuʻi fefine foki.
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e lākanga ki [[Lifuka]]. {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°749|174°298}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Lifuka
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Lifuka.gif|right|350px|thumb|Lifuka (motu)]] Ko '''Lifuka''' ko e motu mahuʻinga taha ia ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]. Ko hono hingoa tenetene (tatau mo Haʻapai) ko '''Foʻi ʻoneʻone'''.
ʻOku tuʻu ʻa e kolo ʻe nima: *Koulo 19.777° S 174.341° W, oku tuʻu ʻa e malaʻevakapuna ko ''Sālote Pilolevu'' ʻi heni *Holopeka 19.784° S 174.341° W *[[Pangai]], ko e kolomuʻa *Haʻatoʻu 19.811° S 174.350° W *[[Tongoleleka]]
ʻOku ʻi ai ha lākanga ki [[Foa]] ʻi he houma tokelau, pea ʻoku lave te ke aʻa ki [[Uoleva]] mei he houma tongahihifo lolotonga ʻa e mamaha ʻa e tahi. Ko e hakau mei Uoleva ki he tokelau ʻoku ui ko e '''Hakau loa'''.
Ko e tofiʻa ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, kā ko e takatakai ʻo Holopeka ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo [[:Category:Tuʻiʻāfitu|Tuʻiʻāfitu]]. ʻOku toe foki ha ngaahi tofiʻa fakatuʻi pe fakafaleʻalo, ko ia ai: Tauʻakipulu (pālasi) mo Leaʻaetohi ʻi Pangai, Niuʻakalo ʻi Holopeka, mo e hā fua. {{Feituʻu Tonga|19°807|174°344}} {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Haʻapai]]

page.title: Fotuhaʻa
page.category: Haʻapai
page.text:
[[Image:Fotuhaʻa.gif|right|thumb|350px|Fotuhaʻa (motu + kolo)]] Ko '''Fotuhaʻa''' ko e motu ia, tuʻu ʻi he tafaʻaki hihifo ʻo [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]], kā ʻi he tokelau ʻo [[Lulunga]].
ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e kolo, ko '''Fotuhaʻa (kolo)''', ʻi he lotomālie ʻo e motú ni.
Ko e tofiʻa ia ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga. {{feituʻu Tonga|19°812|174°719}} {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mango
Milan Rastislav Štefánik/en
page.text: Milan Rastislav Štefánik was a diplomat, soldier and astronomer from Slovakia (1880—1919). He travelled a lot; he was on Tahiti in May 1910 to see the comet of Halley (clouded out), then went via New Zealand to Vavaʻu. On the top of the Fungamisi, he observed the tolal solar eclipse of 29 April 1911 (blue sky), performing scientific measurements. His telescope pedestal still remains nowadays as a remembrance stone. {{Foki||Milan Rastislav Štefánik}}
