page.title: Lemani
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lemon |faitā=Lemon tree Berkeley closeup2.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |subclassis= [[rosidae]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Citrus |species=limon |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lemani''' pe '''moli lemani''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * lemani petepete (''[[Citrus medica]]'')<ref>Peter Newsome, Les Basher, [http://ecc.gov.to/?mdocs-file=518&mdocs-url=517 ''Environmental Impact Assessment of the 'Eua Forest Estate''], June 2010, p. 42</ref>,<ref>[http://www.hear.org/pier/species/citrus_medica.htm Citrus medica L.], Pacific Island Ecosystems at Risk (PIER)</ref>; kili petepete * lemani molemole, ''Citrus limon''; kili molemole * lemani fōiiki; foʻi fua siʻi * [[laimi]] * [[moli]] * [[kola]] * [[kamikuati]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * kukane ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * moli, moli tipolo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], kā vakai ki he [[laimi]]) ** tipolo patupatu, moli uʻu, ''Citrus hystrix'' * remene ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson <References/> {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Laimi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Key lime, Westindian lime |faitā=Citrus lime.png |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |subclassis= [[rosidae]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Citrus |species=aurantiifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Gottlieb Friedrich Christmann|Christm.]]) [[Walter Tennyson Swingle|Swingle]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''laimi''' pe '''moli laimi''' (pe '''laime''') ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku hala ko e tohi ''Citrus aurantifolia'' kā ʻoku faʻa hono ngāueʻaki.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * [[lemani]] * [[moli]] * [[kola]] * [[kamikuati]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * tāporo ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * tipoli, moli tipolo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], kā vakai ki he [[lemani]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kola
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Sour/bitter orange, Seville orange |faitā=Pomeranzen BMK.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |subclassis= [[rosidae]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Citrus |species=aurantium |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Johnson grass |faitā=Sorghum halepense closeup.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |genus=Sorghum |species=halepense |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Christiaan Hendrik Persoon|Pers.]] |fehokotaki= s }} ʻOku ua ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau ʻoku ui ko e '''kola''' ʻi Tongá ni. * Ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻoku tatau mo e ''Citrus vulgaris'', mo e hono foʻi fua, ʻoku meimei tatau mo e ngaahi [[moli]] kae siʻi ange mo e mahi ange. * Ko e faʻahinga [[mohuku]], ʻoku tui ʻe he kau saienisi ʻe taha ko e ''Sorghum sudanense'' ia, pea ʻikai ko e ''S. halepense''. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau ko e ''Andropogon halepensis''. ʻOku ngāueʻaki foki maʻa e ''Sorghum bicolor'', ko e faʻahinga kehe (pe tatau ?), ka meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ui foki ko [[hana]], kā ko e mohuku kehe ia.
Ko e mohuku ko e ʻakau vaoa taʻefiemaʻu ʻaupito ia. ʻOku ui ko e ''ʻakau kovi ʻoku mafola mo tupu vao'' ʻe he [[:Category:palemia ʻo Tonga|palemia]] ʻi 1927 (lao fakalahi 1988, vahe 128) maʻa [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] mo [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], pea ʻi 1929 maʻa [[Niuatoputapu]] mo [[Tafahi]].
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * [[laimi]] * [[moli]] * [[lemani]] * [[kamikuati]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * moli uʻu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], Citrus aurantium) * tarapī ([[lea fakakuki]], Sorghum bicolor)
== Toe meʻa kehe == Tokua naʻe ʻomi ʻa e ngaahi tenga ʻo e kola mohuku ki Tongá ni ʻi he kola hoosi.
== Tataku == * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/sorghum_halepense.htm * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Moli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Orange |faitā=OrangeBloss wb.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |subclassis= [[rosidae]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Citrus |species=sinensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Pehr Osbeck|Osbeck]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''moli''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia mo e ngaahi foʻi fua, ʻoku ui ko e '''foʻi moli'''. Ko e hingoa fakataha maʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe, kā ʻoku ʻikai kau ki ai ʻa e kola mo e laimi mo e lemani.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * [[kola]] * [[laimi]] * [[lemani]] * moli kai, moli inu, ''Citrus sinensis'', [sweet orange] * moli peli, ''Citrus reticulata'', [mandarine, tangerine] * moli uku, moli tonga, ''Citrus maxima'', [pommelo, shaddock]; ngāueʻaki maʻa e uku (fufulu louʻulu) * moli kālepi, pomelo, ''Citrus grandis'' pe ''Citrus paradisi'', [pommelo, grapefruit] * moli papālangi * moli mahi, ''Citrus reticulata molimahi'', [sour mandarine] * moli fōiiki, ''Citrus reticulata molifoiiki'' * moli vaikeli, ''Citrus reticulata paradisi x reticulata'', [tangelo] * situlumelo, ''Citrus volkmeriana'', [citrumello] * [[kamikuati]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * ʻānani ([[lea fakatahisi]], [[lea fakakuki]]), ''Citrus sinensis'' * ʻalani ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]), ''Citrus sinensis'' * moli toga ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]), ''Citrus maxima'' ** moli siaina, ''Citrus reticulata'' ** moli ʻaiga, moli ʻaina, ''Citrus sinensis'' ** moli uʻu, ''Citrus hystrix'', ''Citrus macroptera'', ''Citrus vulgaris'' * moli kana ([[lea fakafisi]]), ''Citrus maxima'' * te aoranti ([[lea fakakilipasi]]), ''Citrus sinensis''
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mānioke
Puko
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lettuce tree |faitā=Starr_990611-0869_Pisonia_grandis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[NYCTAGINACEAE]] |genus=Pisonia |species=grandis |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''puko''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ʻaupito ia, mahalo pē mita ʻe 20 ʻi ʻolunga, kā ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ʻoku ke lava ngāueʻaki. Neongo, taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku tupu pē ki he mita ʻe 2 ʻi ʻolunga pe ofi ki ai. ʻOku lahi ngaahi fuʻu ʻi he matātahi.
ʻOku ui ko e [[fotulona]] ʻe Yuncker, kā naʻa ne fakafetongi kinaua. Ko e fotulona ʻoku tupu foki ʻi he matātahi, kā ʻoku kehe ʻaupito. Ko e meʻa fakangalingalikehe ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e fetongi tatau ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe.
ʻOua ʻe fakapuputuʻu mo e [[touhuni]], ʻoku tatau ʻa e ʻasi ʻo hona lou, kae ʻoku kehe ko e toenga. Ko e fuʻu lahi ʻa e ʻakaú ni.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *pukovili ''Gyrocarpus americanus'' (Hernandiaceae); ko e tenga ʻoku ʻi ai ʻene kapakau, ʻoku vili ʻi he tō ki lalo *puko; ko e fakakeheʻi ʻo e [[fusi]] *puko; ko e faʻahinga mei he kāinga ʻo e [[polo]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pukasea ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *pukotala ([[lea fakaʻuvea]], ''Hernandia peitata'') ko e puko ʻoku tala? *puka ([[lea fakafutuna]], ''Hernandia peitata'') *puka, puatea ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *puʻavai ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *puka, pukatea, puka Avarua ([[lea fakakuki]]) *puʻatea ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *pukavai ([[lea fakatūvalu]]) *buka ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== ʻI he taimi tukufakaholo naʻe lava lea ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu puko. Vakai ki he [[folau ʻa Kae]]. {{kananga|tala poʻuli ʻa puko}} ==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Hulufe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Swordfern |faitā=Nephrolepis biserrata.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[polypodiopsida]] |ordo= [[polypodiales]] |familia= [[LOMARIOPSIDACEAE]] |genus=Nephrolepis |species=biserrata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Sw.) Schott. |fehokotaki= c }} [[Image:Hulufe.jpg|left|250px|thumb|ko e hulufe ʻe taha ia]] [[Image:Nephrolepis hirsutula.jpg|left|250px|thumb|hulufe lauʻitelinga, ''N. hirsutula'']] [[Image:Nephrolepis biserrata 'Macho' Leaf 3008px.jpg|left|250px|thumb|hulufe taʻelauʻitelinga, ''N. biserrata'']] Ko e '''hulufe''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafānau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]]. Ko e ʻuhinga tatau ko e ''Aspidium biserratum'', ''Polypodium puctulatum'' mo e hā fua. ʻOku meimei tatau mo e ''Nephrolepis hirsutula'' (ʻoku ʻi ai hano kiʻi laulahi ʻi he kau ʻo e lau, tatau mo ha lauʻitelinga).
ʻOku toe lahi ha ngaahi faʻahinga kehe meimei tatau ʻenau ʻasi, ʻoku ui ko e hulufe foki.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *hulufeiiki, tatau mo e [[kahivaʻe]] (Dicranopteris) ? *hulufeuhi, ''Pteris ensiformis'' (Pteridaceae) *holufe<ref>ʻOku pehē ʻe Yuncker, kā mahalo pē ʻoku ne hala, ko e "hulufe" ia foki</ref>, ''Dennstaedtia parksii'' pe ''Dennstaedtia solida'', Leather fern *[[ponga|hulufe vai]] *hulufe leisi, ''Arachnoides aristata'' (Aspidiaceae) pe ''Loxoscaphe gibberosum'' (Aspleniaceae)
ʻOku ui ʻe Yuncker ko e [[hakato|''Asplenium'']] ko e hulufe, pea ko e ''Nephrolepis'' ko e [[laufale]], kā ʻoku mahalo pē naʻe hala ia.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== tūroutou, maire toa ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6431 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6435 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}} <references/>

page.title: Kahivaʻe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=False staghorn |faitā=Starr_020803-0027_Dicranopteris_linearis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[polypodiopsida]] |ordo= [[polypodiales]] |familia= [[GLEICHENIACEAE]] |genus=Dicranopteris |species=linearis }} Ko e '''kahivaʻe''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]]. ʻOku teʻeki loto-taha ʻe he kau saienisi ko e fē kāʻinga, pe ko e fē fokotuʻunga ʻoku kau ʻa e ʻakaú ni ki ai.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *kahivaʻe, ko ʻeni *kahivaʻe, ''Hypolepis tenuifolia'' (Dennstaedtiaceae)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *uluhe ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *anuhe ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *asaua ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *tuanuʻe, tuānuʻe, tuenuʻe ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6059 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ponga
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Giant fern, Kings fern |faitā=Angiopteris evecta0.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[marattiopsida]] |ordo= [[marattiales]] |familia= [[MARATTIACEAE]] |genus=Angiopteris |species=evecta |fakamoʻoniʻanga=(G.Forst.) Hoffm. |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''ponga''' pe '''hulufe vai''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[niu]], kā fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *ponga, ko ʻeni *ponga, ''Angiopteris commutata'' *ponga, ''Cyathea rugosula'' Copel. (CYATHEACEAE) pe ''Alsophila rugosula'' *ponga, ''Sphaeropteris lunulata'' (CYATHEACEAE)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *palatao ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *nahe ([[lea fakatahisi]] ''A. evecta'') *nase, faʻagase ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) **olioli, ''Cyathea spp.'' *ʻānaʻe, naʻe, rau naʻe ([[lea fakakuki]]) **panga, ''Cyathea spp.'' *palapala ([[lea fakafutuna]], ''Sphaeropteris lunulata'')
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/angiopteris_evecta.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5745 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻAkau
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e moʻui
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Crucigenia_EPA.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''ʻakau''' ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui]] ko e taha pē ʻo e ''puleʻanga tuʻi'' ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui ʻe 4 ʻoku fakatefito ki he ngaahi [[lokiʻimoʻui]] ʻoku lahi. Ko e ngaahi holisi ʻo honau lokiʻimoʻui ʻoku fefeka pē mo e meʻa ngeʻesi ʻi loto. ʻOku faingataʻa ʻo fakamatala totonu ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau. Kā ko e lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau ʻoku lanumata he ''chlorophyll'', ko e meʻa kemi ʻoku lava puke ʻa e ivi ʻo e maama ʻo e laʻā. ʻA ia ko e ʻakau ko e tumuʻaki ʻo e haʻi sēini meʻatokoni ʻi māmani.
== Ko e ngaahi puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e meʻamoʻui fakalokiʻimoʻui == * ʻakau ([[leafakalatina]]: ''plantae'') * [[monumanu]] (''animalia'') * [[talingelinga]] (''fungi'') * [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] (''protista'') Ko e fanga meʻamoʻui kehe (taʻelokiʻimoʻui): [[siemu]], [[vailasi]], mo e hā fua
== Ngaahi kupu mahuʻinga taha ʻo e puleʻanga tuʻí ni == * '''ʻakau tupu ʻi tahi''' (''algae'') ** limutahi lanumata (vakai foki ki he [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]]) ** mo e alā meʻa pehē * '''ʻakau tupu ʻi fonua''' (''embryophytes'') ** ʻakau taʻekālava (''bryophytes'') (ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻanau ngaahi kālava fakaʻakau) *** [[limuʻuta]] (lanumata pē) ''bryophyta'' *** [[limuʻuta]] (lanumata pē) ''marchantiophyta'' *** [[limuʻuta]] (lanumata pē) ''anthocerotophyta'' ** ʻakau kālava (''tracheophytes'') (ʻoku ʻi ai haʻanau ngaahi kālava maʻa e fetuku ʻo e vai pe toʻi) *** [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] (ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻanau tengaʻiʻakau) *** [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]] (''spermatophytes'') (ʻoku ʻi ai haʻanau tengaʻiʻakau) **** [[tengaʻiʻakau telefua]] (''gymnospermae'') (ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻanau matalaʻiʻakau) ***** [[ponga paame]] (''cycadophyta'') ***** [[ʻakau fuasiliva]] (''ginkgophyta'') ***** [[ʻakau paini]] (''pinophyta'') ***** [[ʻakau sukau]] (''gnetophyta'') ***** [[ponga tenga]] (''pteridospermatophyta'') (kuo ʻauhamālie ʻaupito ʻosi ʻa e taʻu ʻe 400 miliona kuo hili pe ofi ki ai) **** [[tengaʻiʻakau ʻufiʻufi]] (''angiospermae'') (ʻoku ʻufiʻufi ʻa e ʻū tenga ʻi loto ʻo e foʻi fua ʻosi ʻenau tupu ʻi loto ʻo e matalaʻiʻakau) ***** [[ʻakau matala]] (''magnoliophyta'')
He onopooni ʻoku ʻikai ngāueʻaki ʻe he kau saienisi ʻa e ongo meʻa ko e "tengaʻiʻakau telefua" mo e "ʻufiʻufi" ʻi heʻenau fakafaʻafaʻahinga ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui. ʻOku pehē: he onopooni ʻoku toe ʻa e ngaahi ''vahe'' ʻe 5 ʻi he ''ʻuluʻivahe'' ʻo e "ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau", ko e ngaahi ponga paame mo e ʻakau fuasiliva mo e ʻakau paini mo e ʻakau sukau mo e ʻakau matala. ʻOku sai pē ko e ongo meʻa "tengaʻiʻakau telefua" mo e "ʻufiʻufi" ʻoku ngāueʻaki pē ʻi he lea faingofua. {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Saienisi ʻo e moʻui]]

page.title: Monumanu
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e moʻui
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Animalia diversity.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''monumanu''' ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui]] ko e taha pē ʻo e puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ʻe 4 ʻoku fakatefito ki he ngaahi [[lokiʻimoʻui]] ʻoku lahi. Ko e ngaahi holisi ʻo honau lokiʻimoʻui ʻoku vaivai pē. ʻOku faingataʻa ʻo fakamatala totonu ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻo e ngaahi monumanu. Kā ko e lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi monumanu ʻoku ngaue mo mānava mo kai. Ko ʻenau meʻakai ko e ngaahi [[ʻakau]] ia ([[monumanu kai louʻakau]]) pe ko e fanga monumanu kehe ([[monumanu kai kanomate]]).
ʻOku siʻi kehe ʻa e '''monumanu''' ʻi he lea fakatonga tukufakaholo — vakai ʻi lalo.
== Ko e ngaahi puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e meʻamoʻui fakalokiʻimoʻui == * monumanu ([[leafakalatina]]:''animalia'') * [[ʻakau]] (''plantae'') * [[talingelinga]] (''fungi'') * [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] (''protista'') Ko e fanga meʻamoʻui kehe (taʻelokiʻimoʻui): [[siemu]], [[vailasi]], mo e hā fua
== Ngaahi kupu mahuʻinga taha ʻo e puleʻanga tuʻí ni == * '''oma, kana''' (''parazoa'') meimei tatau ko honau lokiʻimoʻui kotoa * '''"toenga"''' (''mesozoa'') ʻikai pau, mahalo pē ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai * '''monumanu mo e ngaahi konga kehe ʻi loto''' (''eumetazoa'') ʻoku ʻi ai hanau ngakau ** '''monumanu potupotutatau''' (''radiata'') ʻoku tatau honau sino ʻi he fua kotoa pē mei he tumuʻaki *** vahe: '''kolukalu uʻu''' (''cnidaria'') kolukalu, feo, ūmana, … *** vahe: '''kolukalu taʻeuʻu''' (''ctenophora'') kolukalu siʻi ** '''monumanu potupotumālie''' (''bilateria'') ʻoku tatau hema mo e mataʻu honau sino *** vahe lahi ange: '''monumanu ngutu ʻuluaki''' (''protostomata'') ko e luo ʻuluaki ʻo e monumanu kei ʻi he foʻimanu (pe kete) ʻoku hoko ki he [[ngutu]], ko e luo hono ua, kapau ʻoku ʻi ai, ʻe hoko ki he [[ʻusi]] **** vahe lahi: '''[[monumanu unu]]''' (''ecdysozoa'') ʻunufē, hina, uo, paka, … **** vahe lahi: '''[[monumanu maʻukave]]''' (''lophotrochozoa'') feke, ʻatalava, kelemutu, … *** vahe lahi ange: '''monumanu ngutu hono ua''' (''deuterostomata'') ko e luo ʻuluaki ʻo e monumanu kei ʻi he foʻimanu (pe kete) ʻe hoko ki he ʻusi, ko e luo hono ua ʻe hoko ki he ngutu **** vahe lahi: '''[[monumanu kili talatala]]''' (''echinodermata'') vana, vatuke, alamea, … **** vahe: '''[[monumanu filo siliva]]''' (''chordata'') ika, manupuna, manuveʻefā, …
=== Vahevahe kehe === [[File:Araneus diadematus shed skin 2.jpg|thumb|right|180px|monumanu unu]] ʻOku ʻi ai ha vahevahe faingofua ange, ʻoku fili ʻe he kau saienisi ʻe taha: * '''oma, kana''' (''parazoa'') * '''monumanu potupotutatau''' (''radiata'') ** mo ʻene ongo vahe (''phyla'') tatau mei ʻolunga. * '''monumanu potupotumālie''' (''bilateria'') ** vahe lahi ange: '''monumanu ngutu ʻuluaki''' ( ''protostomata'') *** vahe lahi: '''[[monumanu unu]]''' (''ecdysozoa'') ʻunufē, hina, ʻuo, paka, … *** vahe lahi: '''[[monumanu maʻukave]]''' (''lophotrochozoa'') feke, ʻatalava, kelemutu, … ** vahe lahi ange: '''monumanu ngutu hono ua''' (''deuterostomata'') *** vahe: '''[[monumanu kili talatala]]''' (''echinodermata'') vana, vatuke, alamea, … ** vahe: '''[[monumanu filo siliva]]''' (''chordata'') ika, manupuna, manuveʻefā, …
=== Tokanga === Tānaki ʻa e '''monumanu luo''' (''coelenterata''): ko e oma mo e monumanu potupotutatau ia.
Ko e ngaahi māʻolunga (vahe lahi, vahe, vahe siʻi) ʻoku kehe ʻi he ngaahi manga vahevahe ʻe niʻihi
== Ngaahi kupu tukufakaholo ʻi Tongá ni == ʻOku siʻi kae maau ʻa e vahevahe ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui he onoʻaho: * manu — naʻe ngāueʻaki pē maʻa e manu nofo ʻi fonua, ʻikai ha ika mo e fingoata ** manupuna — ʻoku foki kau ki ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻinisēkite ** manu veʻefā — fanga manu lahi ʻi fonua * ika — ko e manu nofo ʻi tahi, kau ki ai ko e fonu mo e tofuaʻa, kae ʻikai ko e toke mo e kolukalu * fingota - ko e toenga ʻo e meʻa moʻui nofo ʻi tahi: toke, kolukalu, oma, loli, alamea, mo e limutahi foki
Ko e foʻi lea ''monumanu'' naʻe ʻikai ngāueʻaki he onoʻaho, ka ko lea fakamanuki pē. {{English|translation}}
[[Category:Saienisi ʻo e moʻui]]

page.title: Talingelinga/en
Monumanu/en
page.text:
'''Animals''' are in [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui|biology]] one of the 4 kingdoms of multi-[[lokiʻimoʻui|celled]] based life. The walls of their cells are soft. It is difficult to define exactly which organisms are animals, but farout most of the animals they move, they breath, and they eat. Their food consists of plants ([[monumanu kai louʻakau|herbivores]]) or of other animals ([[monumanu kai kakanoʻimanu|carnivores]]).
==The kingdom of celled living creatures== *animals ([[leafakalatina|Latin]]:''animalia'') *[[ʻakau|plants]] ([''plantae'') *[[talingelinga|fungi]] (''fungi'') *[[meʻamoʻuimuʻa|'other' organisms]], most single cell (''protista'') Other organisms without distinct cells: [[siemu|bacteria]], [[vailasi|viruses]], and so forth.
==Top divisions in this kingdom== *'''spunges''' (''parazoa'') all their cells are practically the same *'''"remainder"''' (''mesozoa'') not sure, maybe this group does not exist at all *'''animals with differentiated organs''' (''eumetazoa'') they have intestines and more **'''radial symmetrical animals''' (''radiata'') their body is almost the same in all directions from the centre ***phylum: '''stinging jellyfish''' (''cnidaria'') jellyfishes, corals, anemones, … ***phylum: '''nonstinging jellyfish''' (''ctenophora'') small jellyfishes **'''reflective symmetrical animals''' (''bilateria'') the left and right of their body is almost the same ***'''primordial mouth animals''' (''protostomata'') the first hole in their embryonal phase becomes the [[ngutu|mouth]], the second hole, if any, the [[ʻusi|anus]] ****superphylum: '''[[monumanu unu|skin shedding animals]]''' (''ecdysozoa'') caterpillars, spiders, lobsters, crabs, … ****superphylum: '''[[monumanu maʻukave|tentacled animals]]''' (''lophotrochozoa'') octopus, squid, earthworms, … ***'''secondary mouth animals''' (''deuterostomata'') the first hole in their embryonal phase becomes the anus, the second hole the mouth ****phylum: '''[[monumanu kili talatala|spiky skinned animals]]''' (''echinodermata'') sea urchins, seastars, … ****phylum: '''[[monumanu filo siliva|spinal corded animals]]''' (''chordata'') fishes, birds, quadrupeds, …
===Alternative division=== There is a simpler division scheme possible, favoured by some scientists *'''spunges''' (''parazoa'') *'''radial symmetrical animals''' (''radiata'') **with its ''phyla'' the same as above *'''reflective symmetrical animals''' (''bilateria'') **'''primordial mouth animals''' ( ''protostomata'') ***with its ''phyla'' the same as above **'''secondary mouth animals''' (''deuterostomata'') ***phylum: '''[[monumanu kili talatala|spiky skinned animals]]''' (''echinodermata'') sea urchins, seastars, … **phylum: '''[[monumanu filo siliva|spinal corded animals]]''' (''chordata'') fishes, birds, quadrupeds, …
===Notes=== Add the '''cavity animals''' (''coelenterata''): the spunges and radial symmetricals.
The levels of superphylum, phylum, and so on do not necessarily align in the tables.
==Divions in traditional Tongan culture== The division of living creaturs in traditional society was much simpler *manu — 'animals' used for any animal on the land, as such excluding fishes and shellfish **manupuna — 'birds', but also including insects **manu veʻefā — '4 feeted animals', mammals, reptiles *ika — 'fish' used for any larger animal in the sea, including turtles and whales, but not eels and jellyfish *fingota - 'shellfish' used for the remaining lifeforms in sea: shellfish, eels, spunges, seacucumbers, seastars and even seaweeds
The word ''monumanu'' was not used in former times, except as a derogatory term for ''manu''. {{Foki||Monumanu}}

page.title: ʻakau/en
page.text:
'''Plants''' are in [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui|biology]] one of the 4 kingdoms of multi-[[lokiʻimoʻui|celled]] based life. The walls of their cells are hard, and there is a vacuole inside. It is difficult to define exactly which organisms are plants, but farout most of the plants are green of ''chlorophyll'', a chemical substance which allows them to catch the energy of the light of the sun. As such plants are at the top of the foodchain of this world.
==The kingdom of celled living creatures== *plants ([[leafakalatina|Latin]]:''plantae'') *[[monumanu|animals]] (''animalia'') *[[talingelinga|fungi]] (''fungi'') *other organisms (mostly single celled) (''protista'') Other organisms without distinct cells: [[siemu|bacteria]], [[vailasi|viruses]], and so forth. {{Foki||ʻakau}}

page.title: Talingelinga
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e moʻui
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Parmelia physoides - 01.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[talingelinga]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''talingelinga''' ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui]] ko e taha pē ʻo e puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui ʻe 4 ʻoku fakatefito ki he ngaahi [[lokiʻimoʻui]] ʻoku lahi. ʻOku faingataʻa ʻo fakamatala totonu ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻo e ngaahi talingelinga. ʻOku lahi honau lokiʻimoʻui, kā ʻikai ha monumanu pea mo ʻikai ha ʻakau. Ngaahi fakatātā: * anga monumanu: kai, kā fakatoka ʻenau meʻakai ʻi tuʻa ʻo e sino * anga ʻakau: fakafānau mo e ngaahi [[tengaefuefu]]; holisi ʻo honau lokiʻimoʻui ʻoku fefeka, kā ʻoku fai he ''chitine'', ʻikai he ''cellulose'' * anga kehe: ʻikai ha sino maʻopoʻopo, kā tupu ʻi he ngaahi filo (''mycelium'').
== Ko e ngaahi puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e meʻamoʻui fakalokiʻimoʻui == * talingelinga ([[leafakalatina]]:''fungi'') * [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] (''protista'') * [[ʻakau]] (''plantae'') * [[monumanu]] (''animalia'') Ko e fanga meʻamoʻui kehe (taʻelokiʻimoʻui): [[siemu]], [[vailasi]], mo e hā fua
Ko e ngaahi talingelinga ʻi Tongá ni ko e [[limuʻuta]] mo e [[fakamaluʻatēvolo]]. {{English|translation}} {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Saienisi ʻo e moʻui]]

page.title: Fakamaluʻatēvolo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Mushroom |faitā=Mycena galopus.jpg |regnum= [[talingelinga]] |divisio= [[basidiomycota]] |subdivisio= [[hymenomycotina]] |classis= [[homobasidiomycetes]] |ordo= [[agaricales]] pe [[polyporales]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''fakamalu-ʻa-tēvolo''' ko e fuʻu talingelinga lahi ia. ʻOku tupu ʻi he ʻakau mate mo viviku. ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi kāinga mo lahi ange ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kehe.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *topukie; oku ulo maama tatau mo e [[motu]] pe [[teʻetuli]]
===Tohi hokohoko ʻa Yuncker=== *''Stereum caperatum'' (Thelephoraceae) *''Daedalea elegans'' (Polyporaceae) *''Favolus brasiliensis'' (Polyporaceae) *''Ganoderma mangiferae'' (Polyporaceae) *''Hexagonia sp.'' (Polyporaceae) *''Polyporus cinnabarinus'', ''P. polyzonus'', ''P. vinosus'' (Polyporaceae) *''Trametes cingulata'', ''T. lactinea'', ''T. corrugata'' (Polyporaceae) *''Schizophyllum commune'' (Agaricaceae) *''Auricularia polytricha'' (Auriculariaceae)
==Tataku== *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959
<gallery> File:Champignons_Agaricus.jpg|Agaricus bisporus File:Hausschwamm.jpg|Serpula lacrymans File:Fliegenpilz.001.jpg|Amanita muscaria var. muscaria </gallery>

page.title: Limuʻuta
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lichen |faitā=Lichen 2.jpg |regnum= [[talingelinga]] |divisio= [[ascomycota]] |classis= [[lecanoromycetes]] |ordo= [[lecanorales]] |genus= |species= }}{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Moss |faitā=Moos 5769.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[bryophyta]] |classis= [[bryopsida]] |ordo= [[dicranales]] pe [[orthotrichales]] pe [[hypnales]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''limuʻuta''', pe ʻoku nounou ko e '''limu''' pē, ko e talingelinga siʻi ia, nofo fakataha mo ha kiʻi ʻakau. Pe, kapau ʻoku lanumata, ko e kiʻi ʻakau pē ia. ʻOku tatau ʻenau ʻasi mo ha [[oma]] pe [[kana]]. ʻOku tupu ʻi ʻuta (vakai foki ki he [[limutahi]]). ʻOku lahi ʻaupito ʻenau kāinga mo ʻenau faʻahinga kehe.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *kumukumu, ko e limu ʻoku tātāupe, vakai foki ki he [[kumukumutahi]] *[[limufonua]] *[[limuvai]]
===Tohi hokohoko ʻa Yuncker=== *fanga talingelinga **''Physma boryanum'', ''P. hypopsilum'', ''P. plicatum'' (Collemataceae) **''Pannaria wainioi'' (Pannariaceae) **''Cladonia firma'', ''C. pityrea'' (Cladoniaceae) **''Parmelia latiloba'', ''P. setchellii'', ''P. zollingeri'' (Parmeliaceae) **''Ramalina dichotoma'', ''R. leucosticta'', ''R. taitensis'' (Usneaceae) **''Usnea insignis'', ''U. marivelensis'' (Usneaceae) **''Physcia plumosa'' (Physciaceae) *fanga ʻakau **''Tremadoton longicollis'' (Dicranaceae) **''Campylopus umbellatus'' (Dicranaceae) **''Leucobryum pentastichum'' (Leucobryaceae) **''Leucophanes smaradginum'' (Leucobryaceae) **''Calymperes tenerum'' (Calymperaceae) **''Brachymenium melanothecium'' (Bryaceae) **''Philonotis (Philonotula) yunckereana'' (Bartramiaceae) **''Macromitrium incurvifolium'', ''M. pilicalyx'', ''M. tongense'' (Orthotrichaceae) **''Aerobryopsis vitiana'', ''A. striatula'' (Meteoriaceae) **''Orthorrhynchium cylindricum'' (Phyllogoniaceae) **''Taxithelium kerianum'' (Sematophyllaceae) **''Ectropothecium molle'', ''E. cyathothecium'' (Hypnaceae) **''Isopterygium minutirameum'' (Hypnaceae) *fanga ''hepaticae'', vahe: [[marchantiophyta]] **''Radula andicola'' (Radulaceae) **''Lejeunea flava'' (Lejeuneaceae) **''Brachiolejeunea sp.'' (Lejeuneaceae) **''Dumortiera hirsuta'' (Marchantiaceae)
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mangele
Limufonua
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Whisk fern |faitā=Psilotum.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[psilotopsida]] |ordo= [[psilotales]] |familia= [[PSILOTACEAE]] |genus=Psilotum |species=nudum |fakamoʻoniʻanga=([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) Beauvois |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''limufonua''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]]. Ko hono ''vahe'', ko e [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]], mahalo pē ʻoku ʻikai ko e ''pteridophyta'' kā ko e ''psilotophyta''. ʻOku lotokehekehe ʻa e kau saienisi ki ai.
ʻOku tatau mo e '''aveave''' ? (ʻikai ha [[aveave ano]] pe [[aveave pālangi]]).
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *toatoa, remu niu, wetai ([[lea fakakuki]]) *tumetume, tumetume fenua ([[lea fakapaʻumotu]]) *moa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *faleotekimoa, moegaotekimoa ([[lea fakatokelau]]) *pupu ([[lea fakalotuma]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6584 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tengaefuefu
page.text: [[Image:Fern leaves.jpg|right|375px|thumb|Ko e ngaahi lou mo e pupunga tengaefuefu]] Ko e '''tenga-efuefu''' ([[lea fakapilitānia]]: ''spore'') ko e meʻa fakafanau ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau ʻoku ʻilo ko e [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]]. ʻOku kehe mei he [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]], ʻoku ne ngāueʻaki mo e ʻū tenga. {{potuʻi}} [[category:saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]]

page.title: ʻakau tengaefuefu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Spore plants (ferns) |faitā=Fern-leaf-oliv.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= '''ʻakau tengaefuefu''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''ʻakau tenga-efuefu''' ko e ʻakau ia ʻoku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]]. Ko e ''vahe'' ia ʻi he fakafaʻafaʻahinga fakasaienisi, tatau mo hono tokoua, ko e fanga [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]]. Ko e ''tracheophytes'' kinaua, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai haʻane ngaahi kālava ʻi loto maʻa e fetuku ʻo e vai pe toʻi.
ʻI he [[saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]] ko "ʻakau tengaefuefu" ʻoku ʻikai ha fakafaʻafaʻahinga ʻe taha pē, kā ʻoku mavahevahe ʻi he ngaahi vahe ʻe 5. Ko honau hingoa ʻi he [[lea fakalatina]]: *''equisetophyta'', ko hono ʻuhinga: ''ikuʻihoosi'', kā ʻoku ʻikai te nau tupu ʻi Tongá ni *''pteridophyta'', ko e ''fern'' ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]], ʻoku kau ki ai ko e: [[hakato]], [[hulufe]], [[kahivaʻe]], [[kulutuma]], [[laufale]], [[masalu]], [[pasivaka]], [[ponga]], [[ʻuluʻitāupoʻou]] *''lycopodiophyta'', ko e [[ikuʻikulī]] (pe hikuʻipusi) ʻoku kau ki ai *''psilotophyta'', ko e [[limufonua]] ʻoku kau ki ai *''ophioglossophyta'', ʻoku ʻi ai ʻene faʻahinga ʻe taha ʻi Tongá ni, kā ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai ʻa hano hingoa fakatonga
ʻOku lotokehekehe ʻa e kau saienisi ki he vahevahe totonu. ʻOku pehē ʻe he tokoniʻihi ko e ''lycopodiophyta'' mo e ''psilotophyta'' mo e ''ophioglossophyta'' ko e konga pē (''haʻa'' pe ''fokotuʻunga'') ʻo e ''pteridophyta''.
===Tohi hokohoko ʻa Yuncker=== *''Ophioglossum pendulum'' (kāinga: Ophioglossaceae) (pe vahe: Ophioglossophyta) *''Angiopteris commutata'', ''A. evecta'' (Marattiaceae) [[ponga]] *''Dicranopteris linearis'' (Gleicheniaceae) [[kahivaʻe]] *''Schizaea dichotoma'', ''S. digitata'' (Schizaeaceae) [[masalu]] *''Trichomanes bipunctatum'', ''T. elongatum'', ''T. minutum'', ''T. omphalodes'' (Hymenophyllaceae) *''Cyathea rugosula'' (Cyatheaceae) [[ponga]] *''Dryopteris concolor'', ''D. dissecta'', ''D. euaensius'', ''D. invisa'', ''D. macroptera'', ''D. parasitica'', ''D. subspinosa'', ''D. unita'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Polysticum aristatum'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hulufe leisi]] *''Tectaria laifolia'', ''T. stearnsii'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Arthropteris obliterata'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Nephrolepis biserrata'', ''N. hirsutula'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hulufe]] *''Humata heterophylla'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Davallia solida'' (Polypodiaceae) [[kulutuma]] *''Microlepia speluncae'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Dennstaedtia parksii'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hulufe]] *''Sphenomeris chinensis'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Schizoloma ensifolium'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Lindsaya decomposita'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Diplazium harpeodes'', ''D. petersenii'', ''D. proliferum'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Asplenium falcatum'', ''A. gibberosum'', ''A. laserpitiifolium'', ''A. nidus'', ''A. obtusatum'', ''A. remotum'', ''A. unilaterale'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hakato]] *''Blechnum orientale'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Stenochlaena palustris'' (Polypodiaceae) [[pasivaka]] *''Hypolepis tenuifolia'' (Polypodiaceae) [[kahivaʻe]] *''Adiantum capillus-venerus'', ''A. diaphanum'', ''A. hispidulum'' (Polypodiaceae) [[ʻuluʻitāupoʻou]] *''Pteris comans'', ''P. ensiformis'', ''P. pacifica'', ''P. tripartita'', ''P. vittata'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hulufe|hulufe uhi]] *''Histiopteris incisa'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Vittaria elongata'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Anthrophyum alatum'', ''A. plantagineum'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Hymenolepis mucronata'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Polypodium nigrescens'', ''P. scolopendria'' (Polypodiaceae) [[laufale]] *''Drynaria rigidula'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Acrostichum aureum'' (Polypodiaceae) [[hakato]] *''Bolbitis lonchophora'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Pyrrosia adnascens'' (Polypodiaceae) *''Lycopodium cernuum'', ''L. squarrosum'' (Lycopodiaceae) (lycopodiophyta) [[ikuʻikulī]] *''Selaginella laxa'', ''S. yunckeri'' (Selaginellaceae) (lycopodiophyta) *''Psilotum complanatum'', ''P. nudum'' (Psilotaceae) (psilotophyta) [[limufonua]]
==Tataku== *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kulutuma
Hakato
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Golden leatherfern, Coastal leatherfern |faitā=Acrostichum-aureum.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[pteridopsida]] |ordo= [[pteridales]] |familia= [[PTERIDACEAE]] |genus=Acrostichum |species=aureum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] }} {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bird's nest fern |faitā=Asplenium.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[polypodiopsida]] |ordo= [[polypodiales]] |familia= [[ASPLENIACEAE]] |genus=Asplenium |species=nidus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''hakato''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]]. ʻOku ʻi ai ha ongo hakato mei he kāinga ʻe ua:
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *hakato; ko e ngaahi ''Acrosticha'' kehe *hakato; ko e ngaahi ''Asplenia'' kehe, fakatātā ko e ''Asplenium australasicum'' mo e ''Asplenium nidus'', neongo naʻe pehē ʻe Yuncker ko e ''A. nidus'' ko e [[hulufe]] ia. ʻI he onoʻaho naʻe kau ki he kāinga ʻo e ''polypodiaceae'', kae naʻe fahi ʻe he kau saienisi ʻi he kāinga maʻana, ko e ''aspleniaceae'', ʻio mahalo pē ko e fokotuʻunga maʻana, ko e '' aspleniales''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *saʻato ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *piʻākato, piākato ([[lea fakakuki]]) ===Asplenium nidus=== *laugapāpā ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *laumea ([[lea fakatokelau]]) *ʻakaha, ʻekaha, ʻekahakaha ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *kōtaʻa, kōtaʻa pānau, kōtaʻa tuarua, raukōtaha ([[lea fakakuki]]) **kotaʻa, kotaʻa tuakiu (''Asplenium australasicum'') *kukulufi ([[lea fakalotuma]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5699 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5785 *http://www.polynesien.minks-lang.de/a.pol.deutsch/pol.arten.a/asplenium.nidus.html *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 *ʻEneʻio botanical garden {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Laufale
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Maile scented fern, Wart fern |faitā=Polypodium scolopendria.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[pteridopsida]] |ordo= [[polypodiales]] |familia= [[POLYPODIACEAE]] |genus=Polypodium |species=scolopendria |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Nicolaas Laurens Burman|Burm.f.]]) [[Rodolfo Emilio Giuseppe Pichi-Sermolli|Pic.Serm.]], [[1973]] }} Ko e '''laufale''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *laufale; ko ʻeni, tatau mo e ''Phymatosorus scolopendria'' tatau mo e ''Microsorum scolopendria'' *laufale, ''Nephrolepis sp.'' swordfern; ʻoku ui ko e [[hulufe]] ʻe he tokotaha
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻāmoʻa ([[lea fakatahisi]], ''Nephrolepis exalta'') *maire ([[lea fakatahisi]], ''Polypodium pustulatum'', ''Polypodium vitiense''); vakai foki ki he [[maile]] **lauʻaʻe ([[Mataiva]] Tuamotu) *tūroutou, maire, maire tūtaepuaka ([[lea fakakuki]], ''Nephrolepis spp.'', ''Polypodium spp.'') *lau auta, lau magamaga ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]])
==Tataku== *http://www.plantcare.com/catalog/tepPlantPage.php?PlantId=2074 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

Pasivaka
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Climbing fern |faitā=Stenoc palus 100625-5189 mms.JPG |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[pteridopsida]] |ordo= [[athyriales]] |familia= [[BLECHNACEAE]] |genus=Stenochlaena |species=palustris |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Burm.f.) Bedd. }} [[image:Stenochlaena palustris.JPG|thumb|left|320px|''Stenochlaena palustris'']] Ko e '''pasivaka''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]].

page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Fan fern |faitā=Schizaea dichotoma Kewarra 4690.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] |classis= [[pteridopsida]] |ordo= [[schizaeales]] |familia= [[SCHIZAEACEAE]] |genus=Schizaea |species=dichotoma |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) J.E. Sm. }} Ko e '''masalu''' pe '''masalu ngaue''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ne fakafanau ngāueʻaki he [[tengaefuefu]].
==Tataku== *http://www.hiddenforest.co.nz/plants/trueferns/schiz02.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6637 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. page.title: Ikuʻikulī
ʻakau matala
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Monocot vs dicot Pengo.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio='''ʻakau matala''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''ʻakau matala''' ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]] ko e taha pē ʻo e '''vahe''' ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ʻe 5 ʻi he ʻuluʻivahe ko [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]] (''spermatophytes''). Kā ko e vahe ʻiloa taha. Ko e ngaahi vahe ʻe 4 ʻoku toe: * [[ponga paame]] (''cycadophyta'') * [[fua siliva]] (''ginkgophyta'') * [[ʻakau paini]] (''pinophyta'') * [[ʻakau sukau]] (''gnetophyta'') ʻOku faingofua ʻo fakapupungaʻi kinautolu ʻi he [[tengaʻiʻakau telefua]] (''gymnospermae''). Ko e '''ʻakau matala''' ko e taha pē ia ʻi he pupunga ʻo e [[tengaʻiʻakau ʻufiʻufi]] (''angiospermae''). ʻOku lava ʻo tānaki ʻa e vahe [[ponga tenga]] (''pteridospermatophyta'') ki he tengaʻiʻakau telefua, kā naʻe nau ʻauhamālie ʻaupito ʻosi ʻa e taʻu ʻe 400 miliona kuo hili pe ofi ki ai. == lautengaʻitaha, lautengaʻiua == ʻOku faʻa vahevahe ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau matala ʻi he ongo haʻa: * [[lautengaʻitaha]] ''monocotyledones'' pe (onopooni): ''liliopsida'' * [[lautengaʻiua]] ''dicotyledones'' pe (onopooni): ''magnoliopsida'' Ko e "lautenga" ko e lau ʻe taha pe ua ia ʻoku hū tuʻa mei he tenga, ko e (ongo) lau ʻuluaki ʻo e ʻakau. ʻOku ʻasi ʻi he faitā ko e tupu ʻo e lautengaʻitaha (hema) mo e lautengaʻiua (mataʻu). Kā ʻoku toe ʻa e ngaahi vahevahe kehe:
lautengaʻitahalautengaʻiua
lauʻimatalatuʻotolutuʻofā pe tuʻonima
efuefu fakafuakiʻi ʻavaʻava ʻe tahakiʻi ʻavaʻava ʻe tolu
kālava ʻi he louʻakauʻoku huʻufatahaʻoku manga
tengaʻiʻakauʻoku kamata lou ʻe tahaʻoku kamata lou ʻe ua
ngaahi akataha pē, mo e lahi aka siʻiʻoku manga aka kotoa
kālava ʻi he fuʻu sinotuʻu movetevetetuʻu ʻi he mama
tupu fuolahi foʻou ʻikaiʻoku lava
ʻOku ʻi ai ha ngaahi ʻakau ʻoku kehe ʻenau anga ʻe taha kā ʻikai kehe ʻe taha, ʻa ia ʻoku kei lotokehekehe ʻa e kau saienisi ki he vahevahe totonu, pea taimi e niʻihi ʻoku nau fai ha ngaahi vahavahe foʻou. ʻOku pehē ʻe he tokotaha ʻoku tatau tonu ko e ''dicotyledones'' mo e ''magnoliopsida'', ʻoku pehē ʻ e he toktaha ʻoku meimei pē. Pea ʻoku nau tānaki ʻa e haʻa ko e ''eudicots'' pea mo e ''rosopsida''. == Tukufakaholo == Vakai foki ki he [[kakala]], ko e ngaahi matala ʻi he tukutala fakatonga.

page.title: Ponga paame
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=RIMG0124.JPG |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio='''ponga paame''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''ponga paame''' (''cycadophyta'') ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]] ko e taha pē ʻo e '''vahe''' ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ʻe 5 ʻi he ʻuluʻivahe ko e [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]] (''spermatophytes''). ʻOku ne kau ki he pupunga ʻo e [[tengaʻiʻakau telefua]] (''gymnospermae''), tatau mo e: * [[ʻakau fuasiliva]] (''ginkgophyta'') * [[ʻakau paini]] (''pinophyta'') * [[ʻakau sukau]] (''gnetophyta''). Ko e vahe fika hono 5 ko e [[ʻakau matala]] (''magnoliophyta'') ia, ko e taha pē ia ʻi he pupunga ʻo e [[tengaʻiʻakau ʻufiʻufi]] (''angiospermae'').
ʻOku meimei tatau ʻenau ʻasi ki he fuʻu [[paame]] pe fuʻu [[niu]] pea ʻoku meimei tatau foki ki he [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] (ko e [[ponga]] mo e hā fua), kā ko e pupunga ʻoku kehe ʻaupito.
ʻOku tupu ʻe taha pē ʻo e fanga ponga paame ʻi Tongá ni, ko e [[longolongo]]. {{potuʻi}} * [http://www.kpr.sk/flora/cycads/ Ponga paame]

page.title: Longolongo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Queen sago (fern palm) |faitā=Cycas circinalis.jpg |faitālaulahi= 250px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ponga paame]] (cycadophyta) |classis= [[cycadopsida]] |ordo= [[cycadales]] |familia= [[CYCADACEAE]] |genus=Cycas |species=circinalis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''longolongo''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e fuʻu [[niu]], kā ʻoku ʻikai ha niu moʻoni, ko e ʻakau kehe ʻaupito ia. ʻOku ne kau ki he [[tengaʻiʻakau telefua]], ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻane matalaʻiʻakau.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * longolongo; ko ʻeni * longolongo, ''Cycas rumphii'' * longolongo hako * [[longolongoʻuha]] pe [[tupuʻa]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * fualele ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], ''Emilia sonchifolia'')
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻakau sukau
Sukau
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Jointfir |faitā=Gnetum gnemon.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau sukau]] (gnetophyta) |classis= [[gnetopsida]] |ordo= [[gnetales]] |familia= [[GNETACEAE]] |genus=Gnetum |species=gnemon |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sukau''' ko e hingoa ia ʻi he [[lea fakafisi]] maʻa e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku ʻikai te ne tupu ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku ui foki (ʻi Fisi): sikau, sukau, sukau buli, sukau motu.
Ko e ʻakau makehe ia. ʻOku ʻi ai hono tenga, kā ʻoku ʻikai hano matala. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻene foʻi fua, kā ʻoku ʻikai ui 'fua' ʻe he kau saienisi. {| |[[File:Melinjo.jpg|thumb|left|200px|]]||[[File:Melinjo2.jpg|thumb|left|200px|]] |- |[[File:Gnetum gnemon BotGardBln1105C.JPG|thumb|left|200px|]]||[[File:Gnetum gnemon male.jpg|thumb|left|200px|]] |} ==Tataku== *http://www.agroforestry.net/tti/Gnetum-gnetum.pdf *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻakau paini
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Pinus_nigra_-_Köhler–s_Medizinal-Pflanzen-242.jpg |faitālaulahi= 280px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio='''ʻakau paini''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''ʻakau paini''' (''pinophyta'') ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]] ko e taha pē ʻo e '''vahe''' ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui ʻe 5 ʻi he ʻuluʻivahe ko e [[ʻakau tengaʻiʻakau]] (''spermatophytes''). ʻOku ne kau ki he pupunga ʻo e [[tengaʻiʻakau telefua]] (''gymnospermae''), tatau mo e: * [[ponga paame]] (''cycadophyta'') * [[ʻakau fuasiliva]] (''ginkgophyta'') * [[ʻakau sukau]] (''gnetophyta'') Ko e vahe fika hono 5 ko e [[ʻakau matala]] (''magnoliophyta'') ia, ko e taha pē ia ʻi he pupunga ʻo e [[tengaʻiʻakau ʻufiʻufi]] (''angiospermae'').
ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻi he vahé ni, ko e lahi taha ʻoku ui ko e [[paini]]. Ko e ngaahi paini ʻoku tupu ʻi Tongá ni ʻoku kau ki he ʻakau paini, kā ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi kāinga kehe. Ko e [[uhiuhi]] ko e ʻakau paini foki. Kā ko e [[toa]] ko e ʻakau kehe ʻaupito, ko e ʻakau matala ia.
Ko e foʻi lea ''pinophyta'' ([[lea fakakālisi]]) pe ''coniferae'' ([[lea fakalatina]]) pe ''conifer'' ([[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e ʻuhinga ko e '''fuesia fuotuʻu''' ia, koeʻuhi ko e fakafuo ia ʻo e meʻa ʻoku tupu ʻenau tengaʻiʻakau ʻi loto. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ui foki ko e ngaahi '''ʻakau hui-tuitui''', koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻasi ʻenau lou tatau mo e hui.
ʻOku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau paini ʻi Tongá ni. Ko e [[uhiuhi]] mo e ngaahi paini naʻe ʻomi, ʻa ia ko e [[paini]] mo e [[kauli]].
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kahikahi (ʻakau)
Limuvai
Limutahi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Seaweed |faitā=Seaweed.jpg |regnum= [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] |divisio= [[heterokontophyta]] |classis= [[phaeophyceae]] |ordo= [[chordariales]] |familia= [[CHORDARIACEAE]] |genus=Cladosiphon |species=okamuranus }} Ko e '''limutahi''' pe '''limu''' ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻakau fakakuongamuʻa ia tupu ʻi tahi.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * limu fuofua, ''Caulerpa racemosa'' * limu koka * limu loa * limu louango * limu palalafa * limu tangaʻu; koʻeni mo e ngaahi faʻahinga ''Cladosiphon'' kehe mo e ''Gracilaria verrucosa'', ʻoku lava ʻo kai * limu tao * limu teʻemoa, ''Codium geppii'' * limu teʻepuaka * limu tuʻu; ʻikai ke kai, sai maʻa e olo vaka * limu vāloa * limu ʻalako * limu ʻa tēvolo * [[limuʻuta]]; kehe ʻaupito, tupu ʻi ʻuta * [[limufonua]]; tatau * [[limuvai]]; kehe ʻaupito, tupu ʻi he vai melie
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * rimu ([[lea fakamauli]]) * limu ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]])
== Toe meʻa kehe == {{kananga|Limu tuʻu ʻi ʻau}}Ko e tokotaha ʻoku vaivai he ʻatamai.
Ko e '''limu tangaʻu''' ʻoku utu ʻe he kautaha Horiuahi Co., pea fakatau atu ia ki [[Siapani]], ko ʻenau ''mozuku'', o fai ko ʻe ''limu moʻui''. ʻOku ʻi ai ha meʻa kemi ʻi loto, ko e ''fucoidan''.
== Tataku == {{Commons|Category:Fucales}} * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * http://www.fao.org/docrep/005/AC894E/AC894E00.htm * http://www.spc.int/coastfish/Countries/Tonga/TongaTongan.pdf Lipooti ʻa e Minisitā maʻa e toutai ki he taʻu 1997 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Limu
page.text: {{fakaʻuhingakehe}} *ko e kiʻi motu ʻi [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] → '''[[Limu (Haʻapai)]]''' *ko e [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] tupu ʻi tahi → '''[[Limutahi]]''' ''Cladosiphon okamuranus'' mo e alā meʻa pehē *ko e [[talingelinga]] pe ko e [[ʻakau]] tupu ʻi ʻuta → '''[[Limuʻuta]]''' ''ascomycota'' pe ''bryophyta'' *ko e [[ʻakau tengaefuefu]] → '''[[Limufonua]]''' ''Psilotum nudum'' *ko e [[ʻakau matala]] tupu ʻi vai (melie) → '''[[Limuvai]]''' ''Ruppia maritima''

page.title: Pua engeenga
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Yellow bell, Golden trumpet, Buttercup flower |faitā=Allamanda cathartica 5.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[gentianales]] |familia= [[APOCYNACEAE]] |genus=Allamanda |species=cathartica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Allamanda cathartica MHNT.jpg|thumb|''Allamanda cathartica'']]
Ko e '''pua engeenga''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi mei [[Palāsili]], kā ʻoku manakoa ʻi he ngaahi vao kakala. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[pua|pua tonga]] pe ko e [[kaute]] engeenga.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *piti ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *lani aliʻi ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *puataunofo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *ʻaramena, puapua, tiare rengarenga ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/allamanda_cathartica.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Meʻamoʻuimuʻa
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e moʻui
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Ammonia tepida.jpg |regnum= [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''meʻa-moʻui-muʻa''' ʻi he [[saienisi ʻo e moʻui]] ko e taha pē ʻo e ''puleʻanga tuʻi'' ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui ʻe 4 ʻoku fakatefito ki he ngaahi [[lokiʻimoʻui]] ʻoku lahi. Kā ko e ʻotoʻota pē ia ʻo e ngaahi meʻamoʻui ʻoku ʻikai kau ki he ʻakau, monumanu mo e talingelinga. ʻA ia, ko e ngaahi lokiʻimoʻuitaha kehe, neongo ko e ngaahi [[limutahi]] ʻoku lahi honau lokiʻimoʻui. Ko e ʻuhinga ko e ʻotoʻota pē, ʻoku lotokehekehe ʻaupito ʻe he kau saienisi ko e fē meʻamoʻui ʻoku kau ki ai. Ko ʻenau vahevahe ʻoku liliu taimi kotoa pē.
== Ko e ngaahi puleʻanga tuʻi ʻo e meʻamoʻui fakalokiʻimoʻui == * [[meʻamoʻuimuʻa]] ([[leafakalatina]]: ''protista'') * [[talingelinga]] (''fungi'') * [[ʻakau]] (''plantae'') * [[monumanu]] (''animalia'') Ko e fanga meʻamoʻui kehe (taʻelokiʻimoʻui): [[siemu]], [[vailasi]], mo e hā fua
ʻOku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻi he puleʻanga tuʻí ni, neongo ko e konga lahi taha ʻoku siʻisiʻi ʻaupito, ʻoku ʻasi pē ʻi he [[meʻa fakaʻata efu]]. Ko e siʻi ngaahi faʻahinga mahuʻinga ange, ko e limutahi ia ([[lea fakapilitānia]]: algae): * limutahi lanumata ''chlorophyta'' - ʻoku kau ki he [[ʻakau]] * limutahi lanupulū ''cyanobacteria'' - ʻoku kau ki he [[siemu]], ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai hanau lokiʻimoʻui * limutahi kulokula ''rhodophyta'' - meʻamoʻuimuʻa * limutahi melomelo ''phaeophyta'' - meʻamoʻuimuʻa, vakai ki he [[limutahi]] moʻoni
ʻA ia, ko e limutahi kulokula mo e melomelo pē ʻoku kau ki he puleʻanga ʻo e meʻamoʻuimuʻa. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku tupu ʻe he kau saienisi ʻa e puleʻange foʻou, ʻoku ui ko e ''chromalveolata'' pe ''chromista'' (limutahi fakalanu), pea mo e taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ʻikai. {{potuʻi}} {{English|translation}}
[[Category:Saienisi ʻo e moʻui]]

page.title: Meʻamoʻuimuʻa/en
Lautengaʻitaha
Lautengaʻiua
Fotulona
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Chinese lantern tree |faitā=Hernandia nymphaeifolia.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[laurales]] |familia= [[HERNANDIACEAE]] |genus=Hernandia |species=nymphaeifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] }} Ko e '''fotulona''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Hernandia ovigera'' pea mo e ''Hernandia sonora''. ʻOku [[fakaloupata]] ʻa e fuo ʻo hono lau.
ʻOku ui ko e [[puko]] ʻe Yuncker, kā naʻa ne fakafetongi kinaua. Ko e puko ʻoku tupu foki ʻi he matātahi, kā ʻoku kehe ʻaupito. Ko e meʻa fakangalingalikehe ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e fetongi tatau ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe.
Vakai foki ki he [[pipi]].
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *puka kula ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *puʻa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *puka ([[lea fakakuki]]) *tiʻanina ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *puka ([[lea fakatūvalu]]) *evuevu ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake, Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pakopako
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=nut sedge grass |faitā=Nutgrass Cyperus rotundus02.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Cyperus |species=rotundus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''pakopako''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ʻikai kau ki he ngaahi [[mohuku]]. ʻOku tapatolu hono kau. ʻOku sai ʻene manongi ʻo e aka maʻa e lolo (ʻikai pako failolo pē).
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *pakopako, tupu ʻi ʻuta *pako; tupu ofi ki he tahi *[[tuise]] pe pakopako *pakopako ano, ''Cyperus compressus'', ''C. polystachyas'' *[[pakopako fakamalu]] *pako failolo, ''Fimbristylis cymosa'' (Cyperaceae) *pakopako, vakai ki he [[pakaka]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *mumuta ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) ?
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mahelehele
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Flat sedge |faitā= Cyperus javanicus closeup.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Cyperus |species=javanicus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Houttuyn|Houtt.]] }} Ko e '''mahelehele''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Mariscus javanicus''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *mahelehele; koʻeni *mahelehele, ''Scleria margaritifera'' (CYPERACEAE) *mahelehele, hano, ''Rynchospora corymbosa'' (CYPERACEAE)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *moʻu haʻari ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *ʻahuʻawa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *selesele ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *mauku tatau tai ([[lea fakamauli]]) *davairadua ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Moʻosipo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=(Beach)-bur bush |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[malvales]] |familia= [[TILIACEAE]] |genus=Triumfetta |species=procumbens |fakamoʻoniʻanga=[[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] }} Ko e '''moʻosipo''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia mei he matātahi.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *moʻosipo, ''Triumfetta procumbens'' pe ''T. rhomboidea'' *moʻosipo engeenga, ''Triumfetta procumbens'' pe ''T. bartramia'' **neongo ʻoku pehē ʻe he kau saienisi: ''T. rhomboidea'' = ''T. bartramia'' *moʻosipo hina *moʻosipo, ''Urena lobata'' (MALVACEAE)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *sisi tai, mosipo, motipo ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *piripiri, piripiri takato, toketo, toteto, ʻurio ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *mautofu, mautofu vao ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *piripiri, purūmu ([[lea fakakuki]]) *aunehu, puehu, puʻunehu, pununehu, punehu haoʻe ([[lea fakamākuise]]) *qatima, qatima ni vavalagi ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/triumfetta_rhomboidea.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lala
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Simpleleaf chastetree |faitā=Vitex trifolia.jpg |faitālaulahi=280px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[LAMIACEAE]] |genus=Vitex |species=trifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''lala''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi pe lahi ia. ʻI he taimi kuo hili naʻa ne kau ki he [[VERBENACEAE]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *lalaʻuta, ''Desmodium umbellatum'' (FABACEAE) *lalatahi; koʻeni, matalaʻakau lanufekika (ʻata toʻomataʻu) *lalatahi, ''Desmodium umbellatum''; matalaʻakau lanuengeenga *lalavao, ''Wikstroemia foetida var.vitiensis'' pe ''W. rotundifolia'' (THYMELAEACEAE) *lalahina
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *lala ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], [[lea fakaʻuvea]], lalaʻuta) *namulega (lea fakahaʻamoa, lalatahi) *tokaibebe ([[lea fakafisi]], lalaʻuta) *rara ([[lea fakakuki]]) *laakau fela mata ([[lea fakafutuna]], lalaʻuta) *polinalina, kolokolokahakai ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko e '''lala''' ko e hingoa ʻo e [[kahoa]] foki.
Ko e lalatahi ko e faitoʻo tukufakaholo ia.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fao
Kalaka
Kau
Mateloi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Sensitive plant |faitā=Mimosa pudica.gif |faitālaulahi= 400px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Mimosa |species=pudica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File: Mimosa pudica MHNT.BOT.2004.0.0.495.jpg|thumb|'' Mimosa pudica '']]
Ko e '''mate-loi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia mo e talatala masila, ʻoku lāvutu ko e mate kapau kuo alaʻi.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * mateloi vavaʻu, ''Cassia leschenaultiana'' = ''Cassia nictitans'' = ''Chamaecrista nictitans'' mo e hā fua (FABACEAE); matalaʻiʻakau engeenga
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * fue inu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) (ko e hala?, vakai foki ki he [[vālai]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻŌhai siʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Dwarf poinciana |hingoa=ʻŌhai |faitā=Caesalpinia pulcherrima.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |tribus=caesalpinieae |genus=Caesalpinia |species=pulcherrima |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Olof Swartz|Sw.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ʻōhai''' (ʻōhai siʻi) ko e fuʻu ʻakau ia mo e ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau fakaʻofoʻofa. Vakai foki ki he [[ʻōhai lahi]].
Ko e māhina hono matala ʻi Tongatapu, ko ʻEpeleli ia. Ko e ʻakau siʻi pē, kā taimi ʻe niʻhi ʻoku tupu ki he fuʻu ʻakau lahi.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *fisihetau, fitihetau ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *lau pā ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *ʻōva‘i, ʻōvai, pī tiare ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/caesalpinia_pulcherrima.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻŌhai lahi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Royal poinciana, Flamboyant |hingoa=ʻōhai |faitā=Flamboyant BW 2.jpg |faitālaulahi= 250px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |tribus=caesalpinieae |genus=Delonix |species=regia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Wenceslas Bojer|Boj.]] ex [[William Jackson Hooker|Hook.]]) [[Constantine Samuel Rafinesque|Raf.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ʻōhai''' (ʻōhai lahi) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia mo e ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau fakaʻofoʻofa. Vakai foki ki he [[ʻōhai siʻi]].
ʻOku kehe ʻaupito ko e ''ʻōhai'' mei [[Hauaiʻi]]. ʻOku siʻi foki hono lou, kulokula foki hono matalaʻiʻakau, kā ko e''Sesbania tomentosa'' ia.
ʻOku meimei tatau hono matalaʻiʻakau mo e [[fehimuli]] pea mo ha [[ʻoketi]].
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * raʻau tamarumaru ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * patai, rakau tamarumaru, marumaru, pu pi ([[lea fakakuki]])

page.title: Laveʻimoa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Poinsettia, Christmas star |faitā=Euphorbia pulcherrima (non domesticated).jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[EUPHORBIACEAE]] |genus=Euphorbia |species=pulcherrima |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Willd. ex Klotzsch |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Weihnachtsstern - groß.jpg|left|280px|thumb|Ko e laveʻimoa mo ʻene lanu fuʻu fakamālohi, ʻoku fakatau ʻi [[ʻEulope]]. ʻOku siʻisiʻi ange ʻa e kulokula maʻa e ngaahi fakakeheʻi ʻi [[Polinisia]] (vakai ʻi toʻumataʻu).]] [[Image:Euphorbia pulcherrima, white.jpg|left|320px|thumb|lau hinehina]] Ko e '''laveʻimoa''' (ko e fulufulu hiku ʻo e moa) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia mo e ngaahi lou lahi mo kulokula. ʻOku siʻisiʻi pē hono matalaʻiʻakau. Ko e ʻakau muli, ʻomi mei [[Mekesikō]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *laveʻimoa; koʻeni *[[laveʻimoa leka]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *tiare ʻāpa-mataʻiti ([[lea fakakuki]])

page.title: Piʻisi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Smooth rattlebox |faitā=Crotalaria mucronata.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Crotalaria |species=mucronata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Desvaux|Desv.]] }} Ko e '''piʻisi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Crotalaria pallida'' Ait. ''var. obovata'' (G. Don) Polhill pe ''Crotalaria falcata'' Vahl ex DC., pe ''Crotalaria striata'' DC. (koeʻuhi ko hono kiʻi ngaahi tuhi vaioleti).
ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e hingoa "piʻisi" ʻe Yuncker pē, neongo naʻe hala ia, ko e hingoa moʻoni ko e pīsí. Ko e '''piisi''' mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]] ko e ''peas''. Kā ko e [[piisi]] ʻoku haʻu foki mei he lea fakapilitānia ko e ''peach''. ʻA ia mahalo pē ʻoku sai ange ʻe ʻikai liliu.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *piʻisi; koʻeni *haʻapai (?), mahalo pē nounou maʻa e '''piʻisi-haʻapai''', ''Crotalaria spectabilis'' Roth, [showy rattlebox]; ʻoku tupu ʻi [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] pē vakai foki ki he ngaahi [[pī (ʻakau)]]
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/crotalaria_spectabilis.htm *http://plants.usda.gov/java/profile?symbol=CRPAO&photoID=crpao_002_avp.tif *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

Forberg }} [[image:Inocarpus edulis, fruit.jpg|left|thumb|320px|ko e tenga]] Ko e '''ifi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Inocarpus fagifer(us)''. Sai ʻo kai ʻa e ngaahi niu kelekele.

page.title: Kava
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Kava |faitā=Starr_021122-0034_Piper_methysticum.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[piperales]] |familia= [[PIPERACEAE]] |genus=Piper |species=methysticum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Georg Forster|G.Forst.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''kava''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi aka maʻa e kava, ko e meʻa inu. ʻOku mahuʻinga ʻaupito ʻi he ʻulungāana fakatonga (mo e konga lahi ʻo [[Polinisia]] hihifo).
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *kava papālangi; ʻikai ha ʻakau, kā ko e ngaahi inu mālohi mei muli *kava ʻakau *kava leka *kava hina *kava kula *kava valu *kava tea *kavakavāʻulie, ''Macropiper puberulum'', (PIPERACEAE) *kavahaha, [[tuʻamea]], ''Santaloides samoense'' (CONNARACEAE); [[ʻakau totolo]] ngāueʻaki maʻa e [[ʻaukava]]. *kavahaha, ''Derris trifoliata'' (FABACEAE); ngaahi ʻakau totolo ngāueʻaki maʻa e ʻaukava. *kavahaha, ''Agatea violaris'' (VIOLACEAE); ngaahi ʻakau totolo ngāueʻaki maʻa e ʻaukava. *kavafisi; ʻakau totolo, ngāueʻaki maʻa e ʻaukava. *kavahuhu, ''Tephrosia purpurea'' (FABACEAE) **kavahuhuʻuta **kavahuhuveli **[[kihikihitahi|kavahuhutahi]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == *ʻawa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *ʻava ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) **fue oʻona (kavahaha, ''D. trifoliata'') **ʻavaʻava aitu (kavakavāʻulie) *yaqona ([[lea fakafisi]]) **yaqoyaqona (kavakavāʻulie)
== Toe meʻa kehe == Ko e fuʻu kava mo e [[tō]] ʻuluaki naʻe tupu mei he ʻangaʻanga ʻo [[Kavaʻonau]].

page.text:

Ko e fuʻu ʻakau tuʻufonua.
[[Image:Arundo.donax1web.jpg|left|240px|thumb|kaho fōlalahi]] ==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *kaho, kaho fōiiki; koʻeni *kaho fōlalahi, ''Arundo donax'' (mohuku) vakai foki ki he [[alu|kaho alu]]
