page.title: Tamaline
Piini
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bean |faitā=A green bean.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Phaseolus |species=vulgaris |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Phaseolus vulgaris MHNT.BOT.2016.24.73.jpg|thumb|''Phaseolus vulgaris”]] Ko e '''piini''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Ko e meʻakai mahuʻinga ko hono ngaahi foʻi tenga. ʻOku ui ko e '''pini''' ʻe Yuncker mo e kakai ʻe niʻihi, ka ʻoku hala ia.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * piini, ''Phaseolus vulgaris'', [common bean]; koʻeni * piini, ''Vigna unguiculata sesquipedalis'' (L.) Verdc., [long bean] * piini, ''Psophocarpus tetragmolobus'', [winged bean] * [[piinivao]] * piiniʻaepuaka, piiniʻapuaka, ''Dolichos lablab'', ''Lablab purpureus'' (L.) Sweet, [wild bean] pe ''Phaseolus lunatus'' L., [lima bean] * piinipapālangi, [[teʻekosi]], teʻepulu, tengafefeka, ''Cassia toro'', ''Senna tora'' (L.) Roxb., ''Senna obtusifolia'', [java bean] * piinisoia, ''Glycine max'', [soy bean] * vakai foki ki he [[piʻisi]] mo e [[pī]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * pāpapa, pī ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], piiniʻaepuaka) * vao pinati ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], piinipapālangi) * kaumoce ([[lea fakafisi]], piinipapālangi)
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Piisi
Pī (ʻakau)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |hingoa=Pī |name=Pea |faitā=Doperwt rijserwt peulen Pisum sativum.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Pisum |species=sativum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Pisum sativum MHNT.BOT.2010.12.9.jpg|thumb|''Pisum sativum'']]
Ko e '''pī''' ko e foʻi tenga ʻo e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia mo e hingoa tatau. ʻOku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e foʻi pī ʻe taha, ʻoku ke fiemaʻu lahi ngaahi pī maʻa e meʻatokoni feʻunga. Mahalo pē ʻoku fakapikopiko ʻa e kakai Tonga ʻoku liliu he ʻahó ni ʻa e "ngaahi ʻū pī" ki he "piisi" pe "piʻisi (''peas'' ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]]). Kā ko e [[piisi]] mo e [[piʻisi]] ko e ongo ʻakau kehe ia.
Kaekehe, ʻoku toe ha meʻafihi ʻoku ʻi ai ha pī kehe, ko e [[pīkula]], ko e [[monumanu]] ia.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * pī; koʻeni * pī, ''Cassia occidentalis'' * pī matala; ko e pī melie * pī; mo e ngaahi ʻakau kehe ʻoku tatau ʻenau ʻasi mo e pī * [[pī kula]]
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.text: {{Fakaʻuhingakehe}} Ko e hingoa ʻo e fuʻu ʻakau, ko e ʻakau fefeka, manakoa ʻe he kau tufunga: *ko e ʻuhinga ʻe taha ʻo e fetaʻu pe ʻa e ʻakau ʻo e kāinga ē → [[fetaʻu]] *ko e ʻuhinga ʻe taha ʻo e pekepeka → [[pekepeka]] [[Category:Saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]]

page.title: Pekepeka
Takafalu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lime berry |faitā=Micromelum minutum fruit and foliage.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Micromelum |species=minutum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Georg Forster|(G.Forst.)]] [[Berthold Carl Seemann|Seem.]] |fehokotaki= s }} [[Image:Micromelum minutum flowers and foliage.jpg|thumb|left|''Micromelum minutum'']] [[Image:Gardenology.org-IMG 7674 qsbg11mar.jpg|thumb|left|''Micromelum minutum'']] Ko e '''takafalu''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, mita ʻe 5 ʻi olunga. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''M. pubescens''
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *takafalu, takafalu hina; koʻeni, tatau *takafalu, manonu, ''Tarenna sambucina'' (RUBIACEAE) *takafalu ʻuli, ahivao, ''Vavaea amicorum'' (MELIACEAE); *ahivao ''Acronychia niueana''; vakai ki he [[ahi]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *funavai ([[lea fakaʻuvea]], [[lea fakafutuna]], ''Tarenna sambucina'') *talafalu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) **maʻanunu (''Tarenna sambucina'')
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Acalypha grandis

page.title: Sita
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Chinaberry |faitā=Melia azedarach fruits.JPG |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[MELIACEAE]] |genus=Melia |species=azedarach |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} [[File:Melia azederach0.jpg|left|thumb|320px|ko e ngaahi matalaʻisita]] [[File:Starr_030405-0246_Toona_ciliata.jpg|left|thumb|320px|sita kula]] [[File:Cedrela odorata foliage.jpg|left|thumb|240px|sita hina]] Ko e '''sita''' ([[lea fakapilitānia]]: ''cedar'') ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ʻe niʻihi ia, ko e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau kotoa ʻoku tatauʻ enau asi mo e ''cedar''.
'''Tokanga:''' ʻoku fakakona ke mate ko e meʻa kotoa pē ʻo e ʻakaú ni.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * '''sita'''; koʻeni, [chinaberry, bead tree, persian lilac, white cedar], ''M. australis'', ''M. japonica'', ''M. sempervivens'' * '''sita hina''', ''Cedrela odorata'' L., [westindian cedar] * '''sita kula''', ''Toona ciliata'' M.Roem., ''Cedrela australis'', ''Cedrela toona'', ''Toona australis'', ''Cedrela sinensis'', [Australian red cedar, Indian mahogany] * '''[[nimi]]'''
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * sili, tili ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * tīra ([[lea fakatahisi]], [[lea fakakuki]], mei he ''cedar'', pe "tira" = ule) * ʻilinia, ʻinia ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * tuna ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], ''Toona ciliata'') * miro tahiti ([[lea fakarapanui]]) * bakain, dake ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6383 * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/melia_azedarach.htm * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Nimi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Neem tree |faitā=Neem (Azadirachta indica) in Hyderabad W IMG 6976.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[MELIACEAE]] |genus=Azadirachta |species=indica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Adrien-Henri de Jussieu|A.Juss.]] }} [[File:Azadirachta indica MHNT.BOT.2007.40.124.jpg|thumb|''Azadirachta indica'']]
Ko e '''nimi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi mei [[ʻInitia]] ʻikai fuoloa. ʻOku lahi ngāueʻaki he faitoʻo ʻi ʻInitia lolotonga taʻu fāafe tupu. ("Neem": [[lea fakasanisikiliti]]).
'''Tokanga:''' ko e ʻakau faitoʻo ko e nimi, kā ko e [[sita]], ʻoku meimei tatau ʻene asi, ko e ʻakau fakakona ia.
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=13775 * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/azadirachta_indica.htm * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mālōlō
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Glochidion ramiflorum.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[PHYLLANTHACEAE]] |genus= Glochidion |species= ramiflorum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Johann Reinhold Forster|J.R.Forst.]] & [[Georg Forster|G.Forst.]] }}
Ko e '''mālōlō''' pe '''masikoka''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi. Ko hono kāinga, ko e ''Phyllanthaceae'', naʻa ne tupu mei he kāinga siʻi ʻo e ''Euphorbiaceae'' he onoʻaho. Ko e ʻuhinga ʻe taha: ''Phyllanthus ramiflorus''. ʻOku tongi hono foʻi fua.
Ko e faʻahinga kehe ko e ''Glochidion concolor'' Müll.Arg., ko e ʻakau lahi ia ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange, ʻoku pehē ʻe he kau saienisi. Ka ʻoku tatau ʻena ʻasi ki he kakai. ʻOku tupu ʻi [[ʻEua]] mo [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]] pē ʻa e ''G. concolor'', ʻoku tupu ʻi Tonga kotoa pē ʻa e ''G. ramiflorum''.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga == Ko Yuncker ʻoku ui ko e ''G. ramiflorum'' ko e misikoka pe mālōlō.
Ko Churchward naʻe pehē ko e mālōlō ko e ʻakau siʻi pē mo e matala engeenga ia, pea ʻoku ui ko e masikoka ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]]. Pea ʻoku ʻi ai ha masikoka kehe, (vakai ki he ngaahi [[masi]]).
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * masame ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], [[lea fakafutuna]]) * mahame ([[lea fakaʻuvea]], [[lea fakatahisi]]) * maʻame ([[lea fakakuki]]) * molau ([[lea fakafisi]]) * ʻamʻama ([[lea fakalotuma]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6180 * http://www.polynesien.minks-lang.de/a.pol.englisch/pol1.arten.g/glochidion.concolor1.html * http://www.polynesien.minks-lang.de/a.pol.englisch/pol1.arten.g/glochidion.ramiflorum1.html * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fetonginauna kehe
page.category: Lea fakatonga
page.text:
Fetonginauna
kehe		 faʻahinga singulalitualipalulali
supiesi ‘opiesi supiesi ‘opiesi supiesi ‘opiesi
fa‘ahi ‘a‘aku
(1 -koe)		 hoānauna fakafetonginauna ''ʻa''ʻaku ''ʻo''ʻoku ʻamaua ʻomaua ʻamautolu ʻomautolu
hoāveape fakafetonginauna maʻaku moʻoku maʻamaua moʻomaua maʻamautolu moʻomautolu
maʻunimā fakahoāveape maʻaku moʻoku maʻama moʻoma maʻamau moʻomau
fa‘ahi ‘a‘ata
(1 +koe)		 hoānauna fakafetonginauna ''ʻa''ʻata ''ʻo''ʻota ʻataua ʻotaua ʻatautolu ʻotautolu
hoāveape fakafetonginauna maʻata moʻota maʻataua moʻotaua maʻatautolu moʻotautolu
maʻunimā fakahoāveape maʻate moʻoto maʻata moʻota maʻatau moʻotau
fa‘ahi ‘a‘au
(2)		 hoānauna fakafetonginauna ''ʻa''ʻau ''ʻo''ʻou ʻamoua ʻomoua ʻamoutolu ʻomoutolu
hoāveape fakafetonginauna maʻau moʻou maʻamoua moʻomoua maʻamoutolu moʻomoutolu
maʻunimā fakahoāveape maʻo moʻo maʻamo moʻomo maʻamou moʻomou
fa‘ahi ‘a‘ana
(3)		 hoānauna fakafetonginauna ''ʻa''ʻana ''ʻo''ʻona ʻanaua ʻonaua ʻanautolu ʻonautolu
hoāveape fakafetonginauna maʻana moʻona maʻanaua moʻonaua maʻanautolu moʻonautolu
maʻunimā fakahoāveape maʻane moʻono maʻana moʻona maʻanau moʻonau
ʻOku sai ke toʻo ʻa e silapa ʻuluaki, (ko e silapa lealōuaʻaki, ʻoku tohi ʻi he ''mataʻitohi mahei''), ʻo e ngaahi hoānauna fakafetonginauna singulali kotoa pē. Fakatātā: *ko hono valá *ko e vala ʻona *ko e vala ʻoʻona *ko hono valá ʻona *ko hono vala ʻoná *ko hono vala ʻoʻoná *ʻoku ʻoʻona ʻa e valá ni *ʻoku moʻona ʻa e valá ni *ʻoange ia moʻono valá [[Category:Lea fakatonga]]

page.title: Ngesi
Polokanite
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Surinam/Barbados cherry |faitā=Pitanga1.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[MYRTACEAE]] |genus=Eugenia |species=uniflora |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''polokanite''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia mo e ngaahi foʻi fua kulokula, ʻoku meimei tatau mo e [[polo]]. Kae ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloa mei fē hono hingoa.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *polokanite; koʻeni *polokanite, ''Phyllanthus acidus'' (L.) Skeels, (EUPHORBIACEAE), [Otaheite gooseberry]; foʻi fua hinehina neongo ko e fuo tatau *polokanite, ''Grossularia redinata'' (GROSSULARIACEAE), [gooseberry]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *kafika papalangi ([[lea fakaniuē]], ''Eugenia uniflora '') *mue ([[lea fakatahisi]], ''Phyllanthus acidus'') *vine ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], ''Phyllanthus acidus'') *venevene, menemene ([[lea fakakuki]], ''Eugenia uniflora'')
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/eugenia_uniflora.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/phyllanthus_acidus.htm {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pomikanite
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pomegranate |faitā=PunicaGranatum2.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[LYTHRACEAE]] |genus=Punica |species=granatum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''pomikanite''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia mo e ngaahi foʻi fua lahi (ki he sm ʻe 10) mo e sai ke kai.
<gallery> Image:Pomegranate02 edit.jpg </gallery> == Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * rēmuna ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Filo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Plantain |faitā=Breitwegerich.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[PLANTAGINACEAE]] |genus=Plantago |species= major |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Ribwort 600.jpg|left|240px|thumb|filohako]] Ko e '''filo''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ko e vao. Ko e hingoa [[lea fakapilitānia]], ko e ''plantain'' ʻoku kehe ʻaupito mei he [[fusi]].
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * filo, filomatolu; koʻeni, [broadleaf plantain] * filo, filohako, ''Plantago lanceolata'', [narrowleaf plantain]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * motie ([[lea fakaniuē]], filohako) * kūhēkili, laukahi ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], filomatolu) * noʻoʻanga tūpapaku (=nofoʻanga faʻahikehe) ([[lea fakakuki]] filohako)
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6548 * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6547 * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

Lolie
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Oleander |faitā=Nerium oleander flowers leaves.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[gentianales]] |familia= [[APOCYNACEAE]] |genus=Nerium |species=oleander |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:CatharanthusRoseus4.jpg|left|320px|thumb|vāleti, lanu vaioleti]] [[File:Catharanthus roseus white.jpg|left|320px|thumb|vāleti, lanu hinehina]] Ko e '''lolie''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, mita siʻisiʻi pē ʻi ʻolunga. ʻOku ʻi ai haʻane matalaʻiʻakau aʻu mei he hinehina ki he kulokula. ʻOku nau manongi, kā ko e ʻakau ʻomi ia, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai kau ki he [[kakala]].
Tokanga: ʻOku fakakona kapau te ke kai ʻa e ʻakau. Mahalo pē feʻunga ki he mate ʻa e valevale ko e lau ʻe taha pē. ʻOku tatau mo e ''oleander'' ʻe taha, ko e [[pua kalipea]]
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *lolie; koʻeni, oku ui foki ko e ''Nerium indicum'' Mill. *lolie, vāleti, ''Catharanthus roseus'' L. (APOCYNACEAE), [rosy periwinkle] *[[vāleti siʻi]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == *talona ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *kīhāpai ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], vāleti) *oliana ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) **pua ʻula (vāleti) *tiare tāpau, tiare tārona (=siale kulamūmū) ([[lea fakakuki]]) **tiare akiaki, tiare vareʻau (=siale vaioleti), tiare mākurūta, tire taramea, tiare sina (=siale hinehina), tiare kimo, kātini (vāleti) *rusi, vasa ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/nerium_oleander.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/catharanthus_roseus.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Feuʻu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Rain lily, Westwind flower |faitā=Zephyranthes candida.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AMARYLLIDACEAE]] |genus=Zephyranthes |species=candida |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} [[Image:Zephyranthes rosea1MTFL.jpg|left|300px|thumb|kulamaama]] Ko e '''feuʻu''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Ko e ngaahi lau, ʻoku tatau mo e [[mohuku]] ʻenau ʻasi. Ko e foʻi fua ʻuliʻuli, ko e fuopotopoto ʻe 3 ʻosi fēpaki.
Ko hono hingoa ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]] (''rain lily'', ʻa ia ko e lile ʻuha) mo e [[lea fakalatina]] (''zephyrantes'', ʻa ia ko e matala mei he matangi tonga (ko e matangi mafana mo e viviku ʻi he fonua ē)), ko e ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻoku kamata matala ʻa ʻeni ʻakau ʻosi he ʻuha lahi mo lōloa pē.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *feuʻu, feuʻu tea; koʻeni, matalaʻiʻakau hinehina *feuʻu, feuʻu engeenga, ''Z. citrina'' ; matalaʻiʻakau engeenga *feuʻu, feuʻu kulamaama, ''Z. rosea'' ; matalaʻiʻakau kulamaama *'''sangato sōsefo''', ''Z. rosea'' var?; tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e feuʻu kulamaama, kae siʻisiʻi ange (senimita ʻe 2, ʻikai ʻe 5) * tatau, ''Z. citrina''; ko e lanu engeenga ia ʻikai kulamaama
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *riri, riri ʻōniāni ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6800 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}} *[http://www.bulbsociety.org/GALLERY_OF_THE_WORLDS_BULBS/GRAPHICS/Zephyranthes/Zephyrantheslist.shtml Bulbsociety]
*[http://www.fotoplantas.110mb.com/liriosdachuva.html Fotoplantas]

page.title: Mamaea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Looking-glass mangrove |faitā=Heritiera littoralis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malvales]] |familia= [[STERCULIACEAE]] |genus=Heritiera |species=littoralis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Dryander|Dryand.]], [[William Aiton|Aiton]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Heritiera littoralis MHNT.jpg|thumb|'' Heritiera littoralis'']]
Ko e '''mamaea''' ko e hingoa ʻo e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau ʻe niʻihi ia. Naʻe tohi ʻe Yuncker ko e '''mamea''' ʻi he feituʻu ʻe taha mo e '''mamae''' ʻi he feituʻu ʻe taha mo e '''mamaea''' ʻi he feituʻu ʻe taha. Mahalo pē ko e ngaahi ʻakau koʻeni ʻoku ''mamae'' kotoa, kuo tupu ''mae'', koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻi ai ha meʻa hinehina ʻanautolu. Ko e mamae ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa hono foʻi fua siʻi mo tea. Ko e ongo mamaea, ko e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau lahi, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa hona ngaahi foʻi lau, tea ʻi lalo mo e lanumata ʻi olunga.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *mamaea, (mamea ?); koʻeni, tupu ofi ki he matātahi *mamaea, ''Litsea mellifera'' A.C. Smith (LAURACEAE); tupu ʻi lotofonua *mamae; vakai ki he [[fusi]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *rosarosa (?) ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kuusi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cape gooseberry |faitā=Gooseberry flower.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[solanales]] |familia= [[SOLANACEAE]] |genus=Physalis |species=peruviana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} [[File:Physalis.jpg|left|250px|thumb|foʻi fua]] [[File:Physalis peruviana MHNT.BOT.2008.1.50.jpg|thumb|250px|''Physalis peruviana'']]
Ko e '''kuusi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku tohi ʻe Yuncker ko e '''kuʻusi''', kā ʻoku ngalingali ʻasi ko e hala ia. Ko e foʻi lea ''goose (berry)'' ([[lea fakapilitānia]]) naʻe tupu ki he hingoa fakatonga ko e (foʻi fua) kūsí. Ko e meʻa pango: ʻoku ʻikai mei he ''cape'' (ʻaia ''Cape of Good Hope'', [[Houma ʻamanaki lelei]]) ka ko e fonua tupuʻanga ko [[ʻAmelika tonga]]; pea ʻoku ʻikai ha ''gooseberry'' mei he kāinga ʻo e ''grossulariaceae''. ʻOku sai ange ko e hingoa: ''gooseberry tomato'' pe ''Peruvian cherry''.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * manini, maninifualalahi ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * tūpere ([[lea fakatahisi]], [[lea fakakuki]]) * paʻina, pohā ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * botebote yadra, maulaqa, tukiyadra ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/physalis_peruviana.htm * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Motulekaleka
Matuʻanua
Siasi ʻo Tonga
page.text:
[[Image:Church of Tonga.jpg|left|400px|thumb|Ko honau fale lotu lahi taha ʻi Kilikali, Nukuʻalofa]] Ko e '''Siasi ʻo Tonga''', (Church of Tonga), ko e taha ʻo e [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga]].
Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻi 1928 ʻe he kau takilotu naʻe ʻikai te nau loto ki he fakataha ʻi 1924 ʻo e ''Wesleyan mission '' mo e ''Free church'' ki he [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]], pea ʻoku ʻikai foki te nau loto ki he haeʻi hoko, ko [[Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina]]. Naʻe kamata moʻoni ʻi he taʻu hoko, ko e 1929 ia.
Kā mahalo pē ko e meʻa fakapolitikale pē. Ko e palesiteni foʻou, ko e nōpele [[:Category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]], ko [[Siaosi Fīnau Mīsini]] naʻe fiemaʻu ʻa e fekau maʻana pē, koeʻuhi naʻe ʻikai te ne saiʻia kia [[Sālote Tupou III]], ko e ʻulu ʻo e Siasi Uesiliana. Ko ia ai ko e Siasi ʻo Tonga ʻoku ʻiloa foki ko e '''Siasi ʻo e houʻeiki''' pe '''Siasi Tonga houʻeiki''', pea mo e siasi ʻe taha ʻoku ui ko e Siasi ʻo e palesiteni.
ʻOsi he mālōlo ʻo Siaosi Fīnau Mīsini ʻi 1938, naʻe hoko palesiteni ko hono foha [[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea]]. Neongo ko [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] ko e tofiʻa ʻo ʻUlukālala, ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e Siasi ʻo Tonga ʻi hē. Ko e Palesiteni Lolotonga `o e Siasi ni ko Rev Dr Tevita Feke Mafi.
Ko e kote ʻuliʻuli ʻo e kau faifekau mahalo pē ko e meʻa foʻou ia ʻi he ngaahi taʻu 1900, ka ʻoku ākengamotuʻa he taimí ni.
ʻOku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻane akoʻanga. {{English|translation}} [[category:lotu]]

page.title: Siasi ʻo Tonga/en
page.text:
The '''Church of Tonga''' is one of the [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga|churches in Tonga]].
It was established in 1928 by those members who did not agree to the unification in 1924 of the ''Wesleyan mission'' and the ''Free church'' into the [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga|Free Wesleyan church of Tonga]], and they also did not agree with the schism of 1928 when the [[Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina|Free Church of Tonga]] broke away. So they broke away too, and were fully established the year after, 1929.
But perhaps in reality it was only political intrigue. The new president, the noble [[:Category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]], that was [[Siaosi Fīnau Mīsini]], wanted to have power for himself and this was a gesture he could make to frustrate [[Sālote Tupou III|queen Sālote]], who had been the main motor behind the unification and was the symbolic head of the Wesleyan church. As such, to avoid confusion with the Free Church of Tonga, this church is colloquially known as the '''Church of the lords''', and the former as the Church of the president.
After the death of Siaosi Fīnau Mīsini in 1938, his son, [[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea]] became the next pesident, until he died too in 1960. It is remarkable that despite that [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] is the estate of ʻUlukālala, the Church of Tonga is only very small there (not big anywhere for that matter).
They do not have any schools. {{Foki||Siasi ʻo Tonga}}

page.title: Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina/en
page.text:
The '''Free church of Tonga''' is one of the [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga|churches in Tonga]].
The church was established in 1928 by the president of the old Free church who did not agree to the unification in 1924 of the ''Wesleyan mission'' and the ''Free church'' into the [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa |Free Wesleyan church of Tonga]]. So he broke away, and claimed himself to be still the previous Free Church, and as such the Free church of Tonga mark still marks its official establishment date as 6 January 1885.
Not long after another faction broke away who also did not agree to the Free Wesleyan church and also claimed to be the true successor. They became the [[Siasi ʻo Tonga|church of Tonga]]. In colloquial speech the former are known as the '''Church of the president''', while the latter are named the Church of the lords.
The Free church of Tonga was first presided over by foreign reverends, until the presidentship came into local hands, the Fonua family where it has stayed since.
The curch operates 3 high schools, in Tongatapu, Haʻapai and Vavaʻu, all named '''Tailulu'''. {{Foki||Siasi ʻo Tonga tauʻatāina}}

page.title: Kainikavea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red mistletoe |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[santalales]] |familia= [[LORANTHACEAE]] |genus=Amylotheca |species=insularum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (A. Gray) Danser }} Ko e '''kainikavea''' pe '''topuʻuno''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Ko e kainikavea (nofo ʻi loto ʻo e ʻakau ʻe taha) ia.
Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Loranthus insularum'' A.Gray
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pauma ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://www.parasiticplants.siu.edu/Loranthaceae/images/AmylothecaInsularum2RH.jpg *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Takataka
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Wire grass, Crowfoot grass, etc. |faitā=Eleusine indica, closeup.jpg |faitālaulahi= 300px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |tribus= eragrostideae |genus=Eleusine |species=indica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] [[Joseph Gaertner|Gaertn.]] }} Ko e '''takataka''' ko e faʻahinga [[mohuku]] ia. ʻOku ne tupu ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē. ʻOku ongongataʻa ke taʻakifuʻu.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * takataka, takataka ʻa leala, mohuku [[siamane]]; koʻeni * takataka, ''Fimbristylis autumnalis'' (L.) R & S. (CYPERACEAE), [autumn rush] Naʻe ʻikai ʻoatu hano hingoa fakatonga ki ''E. indica'' ʻe Yuncker, kā ki he ''F. autumnalis'' pē. Naʻe ngalo ʻia te ia? ʻOku ʻikai ʻiloa ko hai ko '''Leala'''.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * fahitalo, mosie fahitalotalo ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * tamamau, tamaomao ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * mānienie aliʻi ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * taʻataʻa, fahitalo, sefa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * mauku mārōkiʻakiʻa (=mohuku ongongataʻa), matie tūtaekuri, ʻātangaroa ([[lea fakakuki]]) * kavoronaisivi, vorovoroisivi ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6099 * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/eleusine_indica.htm * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Vāleti siʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Egyptian starcluster |faitā=Pentas lanceolata white.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[gentianales]] |familia= [[RUBIACEAE]] |tribus=hedyotideae |genus=Pentas |species=lanceolata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} [[Image:Pentas lanceolata red.jpg|left|300px|thumb|lanu kulokula]] [[Image:Pentas lanceolata violet.jpg|left|300px|thumb|lanu vaioleti]] Ko e '''vāleti siʻi''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia (mita ʻe taha ʻi olunga pe siʻi ange). ʻOku lahi hono matalaʻiʻakau mei he hinehina, vaioleti, aʻu ki he kulokula. ʻOku tatau ʻa e ngaahi lanu kehekehe mo e [[lolie|vāleti]]. Ko e ʻakau ʻomi kā he taimí ni ʻoku lahi ʻi he ngaahi ngoue.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *vāleti (lahi), [[lolie]] *vāleti siʻi; koʻeni
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *tiare vareau (=siale vaioleti), tiare sina (=siale hinehina) ([[lea fakakuki]], ʻotu motu tokelau pē)
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6493 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Totoe
Sēiniʻoeʻofa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Chain of love, Mexican love vine |faitā=Antigonon leptopus.jpeg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[POLYGONACEAE]] |genus=Antigonon |species=leptopus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[William Jackson Hooker|Hook.]] & [[George Arnott Walker Arnott|Arn.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sēini ʻo e ʻofa''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi mo e totolo ia. Naʻe ʻomi mei [[Mekisikō]] ki Tongá ni.
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/antigonon_leptopus.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻAposetolohina
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White walking iris, White apostle plant |faitā=Neomarica gracilis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[IRIDACEAE]] |genus=Neomarica |species=gracilis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Herb.) Sprague 1928 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ʻaposetolohina''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, manakoa ʻi he ngoue. Naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni ʻikai fuoloa. Ko e matalaʻiʻakau ʻene lahi ko e sm. ʻe 5 pē, mo e mata (''stigma'') lōua ʻi loto. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Marica gracilis''
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *ʻaposetolohina; koʻeni *ʻaposetolohina, ''Neomarica northiana''; ko e matalaʻiʻakau lahi ange (sm ʻe 7) mo e mata lōtolu, manakoa ange ʻi [[ʻAmelika]] *[[ʻaposetolopulū]] ==Tataku== http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6428 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻaposetolohina
page.text: #REDIRECT[[ʻAposetolohina]]

page.title: Pua kalipea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lucky nut, Yellow oleander |faitā=Thevetia peruviana LeavesFlower BotGardBln0906k.JPG |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[gentianales]] |familia= [[APOCYNACEAE]] |genus=Thevetia |species=peruviana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Christiaan Hendrik Persoon|Pers.]]) [[Karl Moritz Schumann|K.Schum.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Thevetia peruviana MHNT.BOT.2007.27.24.jpg|thumb|''Thevetia peruviana'']] Ko e '''pua kalipea''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, mo e ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau engeenga pea mo e lou lausiʻi. Naʻa ne ʻomi mei he [[Kalipea]] ki Tongá ni. Ko e ngaahi ʻuhinga tatau: ''Thevetia nerifolia'', ''Cascabela thevetia'', ''Cascabela nerifolia'', ''Cerbera peruviana''. ʻOku ʻikai tatau moe [[pua]], neongo meimei tatau ʻa e ʻasi ʻo hona matalaʻiʻakau.
Tokanga: ʻOku fakakona kapau te ke kai ʻa e ʻakau. Mahalo pē feʻunga ki he mate ʻa e valevale ko e lau ʻe taha pē. ʻOku tatau mo e ''oleander'' ʻe taha, ko e [[lolie]].
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *piti, poupou ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *nohomālie (=nofo taʻengaue) ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]); mei heni ko e hingoa [[lea fakpilitānia]]: ''be still tree'' *venevene, pua ([[lea fakakuki]]) *irelepsech (=fuʻu ʻakau ʻo e kau muli) (ʻi [[ʻUliti]] (Ulithi, Yap)); mei heni ko e hingoa lea fakpilitānia: ''foreigner's tree''
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/thevetia_peruviana.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Leisihina
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White-lace shrub, French poinsettia |faitā=Euphorbia leucocephala closeup.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[EUPHORBIACEAE]] |genus=Euphorbia |species=leucocephala |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Lotsy |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''leisi hina''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi pe lahi ia, ʻoku manakoa ʻene ʻasi hinehina ʻi he ngoue Tonga. ʻOku ui foki ko e '''laʻi sinou''' (''snow flake'') koeʻuhi ʻene ʻasi pehē, meimei tatau ha sinou moʻoni, ʻoku ne kamata ʻi Mē pe ofi ki ai, ko e kamataʻanga ʻo e faʻahitaʻu momoko.
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6138 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monumanu unu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Araneus diadematus shed skin 2.jpg |faitālaulahi=250px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum='''monumanu unu''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''monumanu unu''' ([[lea fakalatina]] (lea fakasaienisi): ''ecdysozoa'') ko e vahe lahi (''superphylum'') ia ʻo e ngaahi monumanu ʻoku unu (kā ʻoku ʻikai kau ki ai ʻa e [[monumanu filo siliva|monumanu huituʻa]] ʻoku unu, fakatata ʻa e [[monumanu ngaolo pe totolo]] ). ʻOku fefeka ʻaupito honau kili, ko e ngeʻesi ia. ʻOku ʻikai te ne lava ke tupu. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku fōfoa ʻa e kili, pea ʻoku ne tupu ʻa e monumanu ki muʻa ʻa e fakafefeka hano kili foʻou. ʻOku toe ʻa e kili motuʻa, ko e ngeʻesi ʻoku ngeʻesi (faitā: ngeʻesi ʻo e hina).
ʻOku kau ko e ngaahi '''vahe''' (''phyla'') ki he vahe lahí ni: * '''[[veʻehokohoko]]''' (''arthropoda'') ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe 10 miliona tupu; (hina, ʻunufē, pako, …) * '''[[veli filo]]''' (''nematoda'') ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe 2 mano tupu; (kiatolo, ponuhuka, …) * mo e ha ngaahi vahe kehe ʻoku siʻi ʻenau faʻahinga mo e mahuʻinga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monumanu filo siliva
page.link: liliu fakalakalaka ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga

page.title: Ika kaponga tala
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Monterey Bay Aquarium Fish1.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum=[[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis='''ika kaponga tala''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e ngaahi '''ika kaponga tala''' (''actinopterygii'') ko e pupunga mahuʻinga taha ia ʻo e ngaahi ika. Ko e konga ʻe taha ʻo e ngaahi '''ika huihui''' ʻoku toe, ko e ngaahi [[ika kaponga uoua]] ia.
Ko e ngaahi ika ʻe niʻihi ʻoku kau ki ai: * [[tuna]] * [[toke]] * [[ʻono]] * [[ʻatu]] * [[sifisifi]] * [[kopoa]] * [[koango]] * [[malolo]] * [[pele (ika)|pele]] * [[ali]] * [[huʻila]] * [[vete]] * [[kanahe]] * [[ngatala]] * [[valo]] * [[mu]] * [[hohomo]] * [[sokisoki]] * [[haku]] * [[maʻava]] * [[taʻa]] * [[kavakava]] * [[fotuʻa]] * [[palu]] * [[nofu]] * [[ʻume]] * [[hakulā]] * [[humu (ika)|humu]] * [[lupo]] * [[totoa (ika)|totoa]] * [[valu (ika)|valu]] {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ika niuniu
Pakopako fakamalu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Umbrella sedge |faitā=cyperus alternifolius.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Cyperus |species=involucratus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[William Roxburgh|Roxb.]] }} Ko e '''pakopako fakamalu''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni, mahalo pē he taʻu 1920 tupu. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Cyperus alternifolius'', ''Cyperus flabelliformis''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[pakopako]] maʻa e ngaahi pakopako kehe
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻahuʻawa haole, puʻukaʻa haole ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/cyperus_involucratus.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6021 *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fainā kula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Oyster lily |faitā=Rhoeo Tradescantia spathacea.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |subclassis= [[commelinidae]] |ordo= [[commelinales]] |familia= [[COMMELINACEAE]] |genus=Tradescantia |species=spathacea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Olof Peter Swartz|Sw.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''fainā kula''' pe '''fainā faʻitoka''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, tupu ʻofi ki tahi. ʻOku ʻikai teitei ha [[fainā]] (haʻa tatau pē), kae ʻoku meimei tatau ʻa e fuo ʻo ʻena lou. Kā ko e meʻa makehe ko e lanu ʻo e ngaahi lou ʻo e ʻakaú ni: lanumata ʻi ʻolunga, lanu fisiʻifekika ʻi lalo.
ʻOku ne lava ke tupu ʻi he kelekele masivesiva, ʻa ia ko e ʻoneʻone (ʻi he faʻitoka), pe maka limu (feo).
ʻOku siʻisiʻi pe hono matalaʻiʻakau, ʻoku ne toi ʻi he kiʻi tangai ofi ki he tuʻunga lou. Meimei tatau mo e tofe pe kiʻi vaka, ʻai a ko e hingoa [[lea fakapilitānia]] ʻe taha: ''boat lily'' pe ''Moses in a boat''. Ko e ngaahi ʻuhinga fakasaienisi tatau: ''Tradescantia discolor'', ''Rhoeo spathacea'', ''Rhoeo discolor''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *laupapaki, talotalo ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *riri, riri mangio, riri vareau (=lile fisiʻifekika) ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6600 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/tradescantia_spathacea.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Veʻehokohoko
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Stenopus hispidus.jpg |faitālaulahi=250px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum=[[monumanu unu]] |phylum='''veʻehokohoko''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''veʻehokohoko''' ([[lea fakalatina]] (lea fakasaienisi): ''arthropoda'') ko e vahe (''phylum'') ia ʻo e ngaahi monumanu ʻoku ʻi ai hanau vaʻe ʻoku hokohoko pe vahevaheʻi. Koeʻuhi ʻoku fefeka honau kili, kā ʻoku nau fiengaue. Tatau pehē, ʻoku vahevaheʻi honau sino, konga ʻe 2 he kulupu ʻe taha, 3 he taha, mo e hā fua.
Ko e vahe ia ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga lahi taha, mahalo pe 80% he katoa.
ʻOku kau ko e ngaahi '''haʻa''' (''classis'') ki he vahé ni: * vahe siʻi: '''monumanu paipa mānava''' (''tracheata'' (pe ''uniramia'', ʻikai ke toe ngāueʻaki)) ** haʻa lahi: '''veʻelahi''' (''myriapoda'') *** haʻa: '''veʻeafe''' - [[ʻunufe kula]] *** haʻa: '''veʻeteau''' - [[molokau]] ** haʻa lahi: '''veʻeono''' (''hexapoda'') *** haʻa '''[[ʻinisēkite]]''' * vahe siʻi: '''monumanu kaungao fakakona''' (''chelicerata'') ** haʻa: '''[[hina]]''' (''arachnida'') *** haʻa siʻi: '''sikopio''' * vahe siʻi: '''monumanu fingota ngeʻesi fefeka''' (''crustacea'') ** haʻa: '''[[ʻuo moʻoni]]''' (''malacostraca'') ko e fanga ʻuo mo e paka lahi ʻoku kau ki ai ** haʻa: ʻuo vaʻelaumea (''branchiopoda'') ** haʻa: ʻuo haeane (''cephalocarida'') ** haʻa: ʻuo matataha (''maxillopoda'') ** haʻa: ʻuo kuku (''ostracoda '') ** haʻa: ʻuo tuʻunga (kakaʻanga) (''remipedia'') * haʻa: '''vahesinotolu''', (''trilobita''); auhamālie, kā ko e monumanu mahuʻinga taha ko e taʻu ʻe 400 milioni tupu kuo hili. mo e ha ngaahi vahe siʻi, haʻa lahi mo e haʻa kehe.
ʻOku ʻi ai ha kau saienisi ʻoku ʻikai te nau ʻilo ʻa e "monumanu paipa mānava" pea ʻoku nau fakafaʻahinga ʻa e "veʻelahi" mo e "veʻeono" ʻi he vahe siʻi, pea toʻo ʻa e vahe lahi. Kaeʻumaʻā ko e fanga "veʻelahi" mahalo pē ʻoku kau kinautolu ki he "monumanu fingota ngeʻesi fefeka'. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Teʻelango
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Candle bush |faitā=Senna alata.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |subfamilia=caesalpinioideae |genus=Senna |species=alata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[William Roxburgh|Roxb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''teʻelango''' (pe ko e '''faʻilafa''' ? mei Haʻamoa) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia (kā ʻoku lava ʻo tupu mita ʻe 4 ʻi ʻolunga). Ko e ʻakau ʻomi mei [[Mekesiko]] ʻikai fuoloa, ʻoku manakao ʻi he ʻapi ngoue koeʻuhi hono matalaʻiʻakau engeenga. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Cassia alata'' L.
Ko e ʻuhinga ko hono hingoa, teʻelango (kaniteli), ko hono ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku nau meimei tatau ʻenau ʻasi mo e ulo ʻo e teʻelango.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *mulamula ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *faʻi lafa, laʻau faʻi lafa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *bai ni cagi ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/senna_alata.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Hakoloaʻani
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Weeping willow |faitā=Willow Salix babylonica.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[SALICACEAE]] |genus=Salix |species=babylonica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''hakoloaʻani''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku tātelau ha ngaahi fuʻu hakoloaʻani ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku ui foki ko e '''uilou'''.
== Tataku == *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monū
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Luck plant, Wild hops |faitā=Flemingia strobilifera.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Flemingia |species=strobilifera |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[William Aiton|Aiton]] & [[William Townsend Aiton|Aiton f.]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''monū''' (pe '''ʻakau monū''' mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]], hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ʻakau fakaʻofoʻofa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue, kā ko e ʻakau ʻomi mo e ʻohofi. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Moghania strobilifera''. ʻOua e fakafefiofi mo e [[ʻakauʻuoiiki kula]].
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/flemingia_strobilifera.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6159 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻAkauʻuoiiki kula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red/Mexican Shrimp plant |faitā=Justicia brandegeeana.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[ACANTHACEAE]] |tribus=ruellieae |genus=Justicia |species=brandegeeana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Dieter Carl Wasshausen|Wassh.]] & [[Lyman Bradford Smith|L.B.Sm.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ʻakauʻuoiiki''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[Mekisikō]] ʻikai fuoloa. Ko hono hingoa koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻasi meimei tatau hono matala mo e kiʻi [[ʻuo]] pe [[tapatapa]]. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Beloperone guttata''. ʻOua e fakafefiofi mo e [[monū]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[ʻakauʻuoiiki enga]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻuru manu muramura (=fulufulu manupuna kulokula), moamoa ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6298 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻAkauveli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Añil indigo |faitā=Indigofera suffruticosa.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Indigofera |species=suffruticosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Philip Miller|Mill.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''ʻakauveli''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[ʻAmelika]], mahalo pē ʻi he teautaʻu hono 19 ʻe he [[kau misi]], pea hoko ki he vao kovi taha ʻo Tonga. ʻOku sai feʻunga hano matalaʻiʻakau, pea ʻoku fuʻu lahi ʻaupito ʻene ngeʻesi tenga.
ʻOku lava ke fai ha vali lanupulū fakapoʻupoʻuli mei he ʻakaú ni (ʻikai fai ʻi Tongá ni), ko e ''indigo''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻinikō, inikoa, kolū ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *laʻau mageso ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *ʻinitiko ([[lea fakakuki]]) *vaivai ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.issg.org/features/invasives_on_tonga.html *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/indigofera_suffruticosa.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Piti
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Yellow bells, Trumpet flower |faitā=Tecoma stans, flowers+pods.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[BIGNONIACEAE]] |genus=Tecoma |species=stans |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Antoine Laurent de Jussieu|Juss.]] ex [[Carl Sigismund Kunth|Kunth]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''piti''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni taʻefuoloa, mahalo pē mei [[Tahisi]], pea naʻe ʻomi ki hē mei he [[Kalipea]]. ʻOku ʻi ai hano ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau engeenga mo e fakaʻofoʻofa, kā ko e vao taʻefiemaʻu ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Stenolobium stans''.
Mahalo pē naʻe hala ʻa e PIER<ref>http://www.hear.org/pier/species/tecoma_stans.htm</ref>, ʻoku ʻikai '''piti''' ko hano hingoa fakatonga, ko hono hingoa fakatahisi pē. Ka pehē ʻoku ʻosi he taimí ni ʻene taʻehingoa.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *piti ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *neikarairai ([[lea fakakilipasi]]) *tekoma ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *<references/> *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sipaisi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Allspice, Pimento |faitā=Pimenta dioica, flowers.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[MYRTACEAE]] |genus=Pimenta |species=dioica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Elmer Drew Merrill|Merr.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sipaisi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku lahi ʻene tupu ʻi Tongá ni, fiemaʻu mo e taʻefiemaʻu. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Pimenta officinalis'' pe ''Myrtus pimenta''. [[Image:Pimenta_dioica_-_Köhler–s_Medizinal-Pflanzen-239.jpg|left|thumb|150px]]
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6537 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/pimenta_dioica.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sinamoni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bay rum tree |faitā=Pimenta racemosa.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[MYRTACEAE]] |genus=Pimenta |species=racemosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= J.W.Moore |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Myrcia acris.jpg|200px|left|thumb|mangaʻisinamoni]] Ko e '''sinamoni''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. Ko e ʻuhinga tatau: ''Caryophyllus racemosus''.
ʻOku kehe ia mei he '''sinamoni moʻoni''', (cinnamon tree), ko e ''Cinnamomum verum'' J.Presl, (Lauraceae), ʻoku ʻikai (teʻeki) te ne tupu ʻi Tongá ni (lahi ʻi [[Haʻamoa]]). Ko e ʻuhinga tatau: ''Cinnamomum zeylanicum''.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == *tigamoni, tinamoni ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], sinamoni moʻoni) *kaloni ([[lea fakafisi]], sinamoni moʻoni)
== Tataku == *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Touhuni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Tree heliotrope, Velvetleaf soldierbush |faitā=Starr_010520-0073_Tournefortia_argentea.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[BORAGINACEAE]] |genus=Tournefortia |species=argentea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus the Younger|L.f.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Tournefortia bush.jpg|320px|thumb|left|Ko e touhuni, ko hono anga: ʻoku ʻatāloa ʻi lalo lau, mo e manga pikopiko.]] Ko e '''touhuni''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Messerschmidia argentea'', pe ''Argusia argentea''. Ko e ''argentea'', ʻa ia ko hono 'uhinga ko e ''lanusiliva'' pe ko e ʻasi siliva ʻi lalo ʻo e lau. ʻOku ongoongoa ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu touhuni ʻi he [[Hala Vuna]] ʻi [[Nukuʻalofa]].
ʻOua ʻe fakapuputuʻu mo e [[puko]], ʻoku tatau ʻa e ʻasi ʻo hona lau, ka ʻoku kehe mo e toenga. ʻOku petepete ʻaupito ʻa e kili ʻo e ʻakaú ni.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *toihune ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *tahinu ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *tausuni ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *tauʻunu, taiʻinu, tausunu ([[lea fakakuki]]) *evu, roronibebe ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.agroforestry.net/tti/Tournefortia-treeheliotr.pdf *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[rosales]] |familia= [[RHAMNACEAE]] |genus=Rhamnella |species=vitiensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Bentham|Benth.]]) A.C.Smith }} Ko e '''taka''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia.

page.title: Vanila
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Vanilla |faitā=Vanilla planifolia3.jpg |faitālaulahi= 280px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[ʻoketi|ʻOKETI]] |subfamilia= [[vanilloideae]] |genus=Vanilla |species=planifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Jackson ex Andrews |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''vanila''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi mo e totolo ia. ʻOku lahi ʻene mahuʻinga maʻa e ngoue fakapaʻanga.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *ʻOku lahi faʻahinga ʻi he kāinga ofi ʻo e ''Vanilla'', kā ko ʻeni pe ''Vanilla fragrans'' ʻoku noa taha.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *vānira ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Vanilla planifolia
page.category: Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina
page.text: #REDIRECT[[vanila]] [[Category:Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina]]

page.title: Alu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Devil's ivy, Taro vine |faitā=Dragon-Tail Plant (Epipremnum pinnatum) 1.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[alismatales]] |familia= [[ARAECEAE]] |tribus=monstereae |genus=Epipremnum |species=pinnatum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Nicolson |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Epipremnum pinnatum TBU.jpg|left|240px|thumb|''E.p.'' cultivar ''aureum'']] Ko e '''alu''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia kae totolo ʻaupito ki ʻolunga ʻi he ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau. Ko hono ngaahi ʻuhinga: ''Epipremnum aureum'', ''Pothos aurea'', ''Raphidophora aurea'', ''Scindapsus aureus''.
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi fuo kehekehe: lau lanumata pe lau lanufiofio; lau ʻavaʻava pe lau makoko lahi pē.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * fuelaufao, laumaiʻa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * ʻara (=hala, hia; ʻa ia: tēvolo) ([[lea fakakuki]]) * alu, halu, maca, naqalanaqala, taga ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Toe meʻa kehe == Ko hono sino lōloa, ko e ''kaho alu'', ʻoku ngāueʻaki maʻa e langa kato, ko e ngaahi kato lelei taha.
== Tataku == * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/epipremnum_pinnatum_cv_aureum.htm * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lea fakakuki
page.text:
Ko e '''lea fakakuki''' ko e lea ia ʻo e ngaahi [[ʻOtu motu Kuki]] (ʻAvaikinui), pe, fakangatangata, ko e lea ʻo e motu mahuʻinga taha pē, ko [[Rarotonga]]. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻo e ngaahi motu tonga: [[Aitutaki]], [[Maʻuke]], [[ʻĀtiu]], [[Mangaia]], [[Mitiʻāro]]. Kā ko e ngaahi lea ʻo e ngaahi motu tokelau: [[Tongareva]], [[Palmerston]], [[Penrhyn]], [[Manuae]], [[Takūtea]], [[Manihiki]], [[Rakahanga]], [[Pukapuka (Kuki)|Pukapuka]], [[Nassau]], [[Suwarrow]], mahalo pē ʻoku nau ofi ange ki he [[lea fakahaʻamoa]].
[[category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Siasi ʻIngilani
page.text:
[[Image:St Paul's.jpg|left|400px|thumb|Ko honau fale lotu lahi taha ʻi Nukuʻalofa]] Ko e '''Siasi ʻIngilani''', (Church of Engand, Anglican church), ko e taha ʻo e [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga]].
Ko ʻenau akoʻanga: ko '''St. Andrews highschool''' ʻi [[Vaolōloa]].
[[category:lotu]]

page.title: Lepo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Castor bean |faitā=CastorBean Leaves Flowers and YoungFruit.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[EUPHORBIACEAE]] |tribus=acalypheae |genus=Ricinus |species=communis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lepo''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Naʻe ʻomi mei [[ʻAfelika]].
Tokanga: fakakona ki he mate kapau te ke kai ʻa e ngaahi tenga, neongo ʻenau ngāueʻaki he vai fakahinga.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *lepo hina *lepo kula *lepo: ko e ngaahi lau ʻa e [[loupata]] maʻa e ʻufiʻufi ʻumu
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == *tuitui fua ikiiki ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *tiairi popaʻa ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *kaʻapehā, kamakou, paʻaila ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *lama pālagi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *tuitui papaʻā, pākarāna ([[lea fakakuki]]) *pititu ([[lea fakamākuise]]) *belenivavalagi, totonivavalagi ([[lea fakafisi]]) ʻOku kehe ʻaupito ʻa e [[tuitui]] pe lama. *vakai foki ki he [[fonuamamala]].
== Tataku == *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga
page.category: Lotu
page.text:
[[Image:Saione.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko honau fale lotu lahi taha ʻi Nukuʻalofa, ko Saione (''Zion''), ko e fale lotu ʻa e tuʻi]] Ko e '''Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga''' (SUTT), (Free Wesleyan church, FWC), ko e taha ʻo e [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga]]. Ko e siasi mahuʻinga taha (neongo ʻoku ofi he taimí ni ʻa e [[Siasi Māmonga]]).
==Kau palesiteni ʻo e siasi== *Rev Setaleki Manu 1924-1925 *Rev Roger Page 1925-1946 *Rev Alfred Mckay 1946-1956 *Rev Ronald Woodgate 1956-1961 *Rev Howard Secomb 1961-1963 *Rev George Clemens Harris 1963-1969 *Rev Justin Gooderham 1969-1971 *Rev Dr Sione ʻAmanaki Havea 1971-1977 *Rev Dr Uiliami Huluholo Moʻungaloa 1977-1982 *Rev Dr Sione ʻAmanaki Havea 1982-1992 *Rev [[Sione Lepa Toʻa]] 1992-1993 *Rev [[Lopeti Tāufa]] 1993-1998 *Rev Dr [[ʻAlifaleti Malakai Mone]] 1998 — 2009 *Rev Dr [[Fīnau Pailā ʻAhio]] 2009 — ===toenga=== *Sēkelitali lahi — Rev Dr [[Tēvita Koloaʻia Havea]]. *Talekita ʻo e Kau Faifekau & Setuata — Rev Dr Tēvita Tonga Mohenoa Puloka *Talekita ʻo e Potungāue Ako Fakakalisitiane — Rev Tāufa Filiai *Talekita ʻo e Potungāue 'Evangelio — Rev Falematapule Lomu *Palesiteni Ako ʻo e SUTT ki he 2014 — Rev Dr Meleʻana Puloka *Tokoni Palesiteni Ako ʻo e SUTT ki he 2014 — Rev Dr Fisiʻihoi Mone *Faifekau Pule Tongatapu — Tuʻinauvai ʻAsaeli *Faifekau Sea Vavaʻu — Viliami Tuʻakoi *Faifekau Sea Haʻapai — Sione Finau ʻUlufonua *Faifekau Pule Vavaʻu — Tuʻipulotu Faletau *Faifekau Pule Haʻapai — ʻOpeti Fangupō *Faifekau Pule ʻEua — Kisepi Havea
==Ko ʻenau ngaahi akoʻanga mo e puleako== *Ngaahi akoʻanga māʻolunga **Kōlisi ngoue ko Hango ([[ʻEua]]) **Tupou tertiary institute ([[Fasi-moe-afi]]), Rev Dr Tēvita Hala Palefau **Akoʻanga tohitapu kōlisi ko Siaʻatoutai ([[Nafualu]]), Rev Dr Siotame Havea *Ngaahi kōlisi **Kōlisi Kuini Sālote ([[Kolomotuʻa]]), Rev Dr ʻAsinate Samate (puleako) **Kōlisi Tupou (Toloa), Rev ʻAlifeleti ʻAtiola (puleako) **Ako māʻolunga ko Tupou ([[Kolofoʻou]]), Rev Tuʻipulotu Finau **Kōlisi Moʻungaʻolive ([[Kolonga]]) **Kōlisi Mailefihi/Siuʻilikutapu ([[Neiafu]]) **Kōlisi Tāufaʻāhau/Pilolevu ([[Pangai]]), Rev Siosiua Selu Pele **Kōlisi Hofangahau ([[ʻEua]]) **Ako loto Houma, ([[Houma (Tongatapu)]]) * mo e ngaahi lautohi (FWPS, Free Wesleyan primary school) ʻe niʻihi.
Ko e lanu teunga ʻo e ngaahi akoʻanga, ko e teunga lanupulū pe lanumoana ia.
==Tataku== http://www.tonga-now.to/Article.aspx?Mode=1&ID=3292 [[Category:Lotu]]

page.title: Loupata
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= |faitā=Macaranga harveyana.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[EUPHORBIACEAE]] |tribus=acalypheae |genus=Macaranga |species=harveyana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Müll. Arg.) }} Ko e '''loupata''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi mei [[Fisi]]. ʻOku lahi ʻaupito ko hono lau, mahalo pē sm ʻe 40, moe fuo [[fakaloupata]]. ʻOku sai pē ʻa e ʻakau maʻa e tufunga.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *loupata; koʻeni *loupata, ''M. stipulosa'' pe ''M. carolinensis''; ʻoku tātātaha ange
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *laupata ([[lea fakaʻuvea]], [[lea fakafutuna]]) *pata, laupapata ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) **au fatu; putafatu, ''M. stipulosa'' *ʻenua ([[lea fakakuki]]) *saʻa ([[lea fakalotuma]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lau lahi maʻa e ʻufiʻufi ʻumu, ʻoku ui ko e '''lepo''' ia, pe lepolaupata (kā ko e ʻakau [[lepo]] ko e meʻa kehe ia).
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6355 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fululupe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] (violales) |familia= [[SALICACEAE]] (FLACOURTIACEAE) |genus=Xylosma |species=simulans }} Ko e '''fululupe''' ʻeni, ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, tupu ʻi ʻuta pē. Ko e fululupe ʻe taha, ''X. orbiculatum'', ko e ʻakau siʻi, tupu ʻi he matāfonua pe mataliku, ʻoku tātātahi.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *fululupe; koʻeni; ʻoku ui ko e [[filimoto]] ʻe he tokotaha. *filimoto, ''Xylosma orbiculatum''; ʻoku ui ko e fululupe ʻe he tokotaha; ʻoku ui foki ko e [[olamaka]] pe [[kakalaʻuli]] Mahalo pē ko e hingoa '''fulu-lupe''' ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai, ko e hala pē mei he '''filimoto''' ʻe he tokotaha.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *liki ([[lea fakaniuē]], ''Xylosma orbiculatum'')
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Filimoto
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Indian prune |faitā=Flacourtia rukam.JPG |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] (violales) |familia= [[SALICACEAE]] (FLACOURTIACEAE) |genus=Flacourtia |species=rukam |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Zoll. & Moritzi }} [[image:Flacourtia rukam Bo quan rung.JPG|thumb|left|''Flacourtia rukam'']] Ko e '''filimoto''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, naʻe tuʻufonua ʻi [[Niuatoputapu]] mo [[Tafahi]], kā ʻoku tupu ʻi he toenga ʻo Tonga he taimí ni.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *filimoto; koʻeni *filimoto, ''Xylosma orbiculatum''; mahalo pē ko e hala maʻa e [[fululupe]]; ʻuhinga tatau: [[olamaka]], [[kakalaʻuli]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *filimoto ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], [[lea fakafisi]], [[lea fakafutuna]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6158 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/flacourtia_rukam.htm *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tātāngia
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= |faitā=Acacia simplex, leaves.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Acacia |species=simplex |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Sparrm.) Pedley |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''tātāngia''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''A. simplicifolia'' mo e ''A. laurifolia''.
Ko e meʻa makehe, hono lauʻakau: ʻoku ʻikai lafalafa kā ʻoku tatau ha sēpuni.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * tatāgia ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) (tātāgia ?) * tatakia ([[lea fakafisi]]) (tātākia ?) ʻOku ʻikai tupu ʻa e ʻakaú ni ʻi Polinisia, ngata pē ʻi Tongá ni, Fisi mo Haʻamoa.
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Foʻui
Foʻui (ʻakau)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |hingoa=Foʻui |faitā=Grewia crenata.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malavales]] |familia= [[MALVACEAE]] (TILIACEAE) |genus=Grewia |species=crenata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Reinhold Forster|J.R.]] & [[Georg Forster|G.Forst.]]) [[Heinrich Rudolf Schinz|Schinz]] and [[André Guillaumin|Guillaumin]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''foʻui''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''G. mallococca''. ʻOku sai kai hono tenga.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *fau ui ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *auʻere ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Naʻe ʻi ai ha fuʻu foʻui ongoongoa ʻa [[ʻUluakimata I]] ʻi he tumutumu ʻo [[ʻEuakafa]]. Naʻe pehē ʻe [[Talafaiva]]: Ko hoʻo fuʻu foʻui pē. {{kananga|Ko ho foʻui ne fai.}}ʻA ia: Ko e foʻui (ʻakau) ʻa ʻUluakimata naʻe tupu ki he foʻui (kovi) ʻo ʻUluakimata.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6191 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fisipuna
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Little ironweed |faitā=Vernonia_cinerea.JPG |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Vernonia |species=cinerea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Christian Friedrich Lessing|Less.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Youngia denticulata (200609).jpg|left|240px|thumb|Matalaʻifisipuna (''Youngia'' ʻo e kāinga ofi)]] Ko e '''fisipuna''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Ko hono hingoa kehe: ''Cyanthillium cinereum'' pe ''V. insularum''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *fisipuna; koʻeni, kiʻi matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku lanufekika *fisipuna, ''Youngia japonica'' (L.) DC., ''Crepis japonica'', [oriental hawksbeard]; ʻoku tatau ʻene ʻasi, kā kiʻi matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku engeenga
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *vayavaya ([[lea fakakuki]], [[Pukapuka (Kuki)|Pukapuka]]) *kaukamea, covuka, vutikaumodro ([[lea fakafisi]]) **mosita ni Viti (''Youngia japonica'')
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/youngia_japonica.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/vernonia_cinerea.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Scarlet milkweed |faitā=Asclepias curassavica.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[gentianales]] |familia= [[APOCYNACEAE]], ASCLEPIADACEAE |genus=Asclepias |species=curassavica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tuʻulapepe''' pe '''loupepe''' pe '''vavaekona''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. (ʻOku kehe mei he [[vavae]]).

page.title: Loaano
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Swamp primrose, Willow primrose |faitā=Ludwigia octovalvis5.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[ONAGRACEAE]] |genus=Ludwigia |species=octovalvis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Jacq.) P.H.Raven |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''loa ano''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku lahi ʻene tupu ʻi he ngaahi ano. Ko e ʻakau tuʻufonua pe ʻomi kuo fuoloa. Ko hono ngaahi ʻuhinga tatau: ''Jussiaea suffruticosa'', ''Jussiaea erecta''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *loaano; koʻeni *loa; vakai ki he [[fau]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pitōrea, raʻau pāpaʻa, torea ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *alohalua, kāmole ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *fua samasama, laavai, mautofu vao ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *tiēmu, pītōrea, pulūmu ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== ʻOku ngaohi ha vali maʻa e louʻakau ngāueʻaki ʻi he langa.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Teʻekosi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red sage |faitā=Starr_051122-5376_Salvia_coccinea.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[LAMIACEAE]] |genus=Salvia |species=coccinea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Pierre Joseph Buc'hoz|Buc'hoz]] ex [[Etl.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''teʻekosi''' (taʻe ʻo e kosi) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Naʻe ʻomi mei [[ʻAmelika]] loto. ʻOku namukū hono lau.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *teʻekosi; koʻeni, matalaʻiʻakau kulokula *teʻekosi totolo, ''Salvia occidentalis'' Sw., [Blue sage]; matalaʻiʻakau lanupulū *teʻekosi; ko e faʻahinga [[piini]] *teʻekosi; ko e ʻakau vao, ''Malvastrum coromandelianum'' *teʻekosi pe [[teʻehoosi]] *[[teʻekosi sivilaise]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *momili ([[lea fakaniuē]], teʻekosi kulokula) **pupu elo, sealu (teʻekosi lanupulū) *līlīlehua ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *tītānia ([[lea fakakuki]] mei he ''zizania'' (ʻakauvao fakatohitapu), teʻekosi kulokula) **mauku ʻaunga-kino (=namu-kovi) (teʻekosi lanupulū)
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6622 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6623 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Amoʻula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pagoda flower |faitā=Clerodendrum buchananii.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[LAMIACEAE]] (VERBENACEAE) |genus=Clerodendrum |species=buchananii |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Lindley) Bakhuizen |fehokotaki= s }} [[File:Clerodendrum X speciosum.jpg|left|320px|thumb|''C. × speciosum'']] Ko e '''amoʻula''' (pe ʻamoʻula ?) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[ʻInitia]] pe [[Malēsia]].
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * amoʻula; koʻeni: hingoa lōloa: ''Clerodendrum buchananii var. fallax'' * amoʻula ''Clerodendrum × speciosum'' pe ''Clerodendrum splendens × Clerodendrum thomsoniae''. Ko e faʻahinga kehe, naʻe ʻomi mei [[ʻAfelika]], kā ʻoku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi, ko e tupu mei ha faʻahinga kehekehe ʻe ua. Ko hono hingoa ʻoku tatau ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]].
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * lauma pelu, talufe ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * rākau tupopoku ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5950 ''Clerodendrum buchananii var. fallax'' * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5955 ''Clerodendrum × speciosum'' * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.text: #REDIRECT[[Amoʻula]] [[Category:Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina]]

page.title: Ake
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Yellow wood |faitā=Zanthoxylum piperitum.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[RUTACEAE]] |genus=Zanthoxylum |species=pinnatum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (J.R.Forst. & G.Forst.) W.R.B.Oliv. }} Ko e '''ake''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. Ko e ʻakau fefeka; tupu pē ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]]. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Fagara pinnata'', ''Blackburnia pinnata'', mo e hā fua.
== Tataku == * http://www.anbg.gov.au/abrs/abif/flora/stddisplay.xsql?pnid=5672 * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻatono
page.text: #REDIRECT[[ʻAtono]]

page.title: ʻAtono
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Polynesian cress |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[brassicales]] |familia= [[BRASSICACEAE]] |genus=Nasturtium |species=sarmentosum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (G. Forster ex DC) Schinz & Guillaumin }} Ko e '''ʻatono''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku tupu ofi hi he ngaahi ano.
Naʻe liliu ʻe he kau saienisi ʻa e kāinga ''Nasturtium'' ki he ''Rorippa'', ʻa ia naʻe ui foki ko e ʻakaú ni ko e ''Rorippa sarmentosa''(G. Forst. ex DC.) J.F. Macbr. Ka he taimí ni, naʻa nau foki ʻe he kau saienisi ʻe taha ki he ''Nasturtium'' pe ''Cardamine'', ʻa ia ko e ʻuhinga ʻe taha:''Cardamine sarmentosa''. ʻOku toe lahi puputuʻu.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * ʻatono; koʻeni kapau ʻoku ui ''Nasturtium sarmentosum'' * akataha; koʻeni kapau ʻoku ui ''Rorippa sarmentosa''; mahalo pē ko e hingoa hala, koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi '''[[akataha]]''' kehe.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * paʻihi, ihi ku kepau, paihiihi ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * aʻatasi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * toatoa ʻenua, rokaroka ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6605 * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Talafaiva
Māhoaʻa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Polynesian arrowroot |faitā=Tacca leontopetaloides MS 6484.JPG |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[dioscoreales]] |familia= [[DIOSCOREACEAE]] |genus=Tacca |species=leontopetaloides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] }} [[Image:Starr 061106-9596 Tacca leontopetaloides.jpg|left|thumb|upright=1.2|''Tacca leontopetaloides'']] Ko e '''māhoaʻa''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku lava ke kai hono ʻaka (ʻa ia ko e foʻi lea māhoaʻa maʻa e meʻa ʻaonga tanu mā). Kā ʻoku ngāueʻaki pē maʻa e kokaʻanga ('''māhohaʻa kokaʻanga''').
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *māhoaʻa; koʻeni *māhoaʻa; ko e faʻahinga [[ʻufi]] mo ʻene ʻasi ʻo e hono aka meimei tatau
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pia ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], [[lea fakaniuē]], [[lea fakatahisi]]) *māsoā ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pia, pia māori, pia henua ([[lea fakakuki]]) *yabia ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6705 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tutuʻuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Wild jasmine |faitā=Jasminum simplicifolium.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[OLEACEAE]] |genus=Jasminum |species=simplicifolium |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Georg Forster|G.Forst.]] }} Ko e '''tutuʻuli''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau totolo ia. ʻOku lava fai vaitohi mei he foʻi fua ʻoku ʻuliʻuli.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *tutuʻuli ''Jasminum didymum'' G.Forst. *tutuʻuli ''Jasminum simplicifolium'' *'''vaʻatea''', ''Jasminum'' sp.; ko e taha ʻo e kāinga ofi
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻāketa, pirita ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6286 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[ʻoketi|ʻOKETI]] |subfamilia= spiranthoideae |genus=Corymborchis |species=veratrifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Reinwardt|Reinw.]]) [[Blume]] }} Ko e '''ʻutoʻuto''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku tatau mo e ''Corymborkis veratrifolia''.

page.title: Tamole
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Common purslane |faitā=Portulaca oleracea MHNT.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[PORTULACACEAE]] |genus=Portulaca |species=oleracea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tamole''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ko e ʻakau vao, tupu ofi ki he tahi pe ʻi he ʻoneʻone, ko e kelekele mate. ʻOku ʻi ai hono kiʻi matalaʻiʻakau engeenga, kā ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi fakakeheʻi mei he tōʻanga pulopula mo e matalaʻiʻakau lahi mo e hinehina pe kulokula.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * tamole; koʻeni, matalaʻiʻakau siʻi ange ʻi he louʻakau * tamole, ''P. lutea'' pe ''P. johnii'', matalaʻiʻakau lahi ange ʻi he louʻakau * kihikihingingie, (tamole ʻi [[Haʻamoa]]) ''P. samoensis'', ʻoku tatau ʻena lahi, ko e matalaʻiʻakau mo e louʻakau * kihikihingingie, ''P. pilosa''; matalaʻiʻakau fekika mo e kulokula; vakai ki he [[kihikihimaka]] pea ki he ngaahi [[kihikihi]] kehe
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * kamole ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * aturi, tatahi ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * ʻākulikuli kula, ʻākulikuli lauliʻi, ʻihi ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], ko e ''P. pilosa'' pe ''P. villosa'' ia) * tamole ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * pōkea papaʻā, kāturi, ongoongo ([[lea fakakuki]]) * pōkea papaʻā ([[lea fakamangareva]], [[lea fakapaʻumotu]]) * pokea ([[lea fakamākuise]]) * taukuka ni vuaka ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ango
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Turmeric |faitā=Koeh-199.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[zingiberales]] |familia= [[ZINGIBERACEAE]] |genus=Curcuma |species=longa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Zingiber-zerumbet.JPG|320px|left|thumb|angoango]] Ko e '''ango''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku faia ʻa e vali engeenga mei hono aka. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Curcuma domestica''.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * angoango, ''Zingiber zerumbet'' pe ''Amomum zerumbet'' (ZINGIBERACEAE), {wild ginger} * sinisā, ''Zingiber officinale'', {spice ginger} vakai foki ki he [[tēvunga]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * reʻa ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * ʻōlena ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) ** awapuhi (angoango) * ago ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) ** ʻavapui (angoango) * renga ([[lea fakakuki]]) ** kōpī ʻenua, niniore, kaopui ʻenua (angoango)
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6008 ango * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6802 angoango * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tono
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Asiatic pennywort |faitā=Starr_020803-0094_Centella_asiatica.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[apiales]] |familia= [[APIACEAE]] pe UMBELLIFERAE pe ARALIACEAE |genus=Centella |species=asiatica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Ignatz Urban|Urb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tono''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku lahi ʻene tupu ofi ki he matātahi. ʻOku sai maʻa e moʻui ke ke kai ia. Hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Hydrocotyle asiatica''.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * tono; koʻeni * tono, ''Geophila repens'' L. pe ''Geophila reniformis'' pe ''Carinta herbacea'' (RUBIACEAE); tatau ʻa e lau ʻene ʻasi
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * tono, tonu ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * pohe kula ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * lau taliga, togo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * kapukapu ([[lea fakakuki]]) ** toʻetupu, toʻetupou, poʻepoʻe tai (''Geophila repens'') * tatadra, totodro, totono ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5905 kapukapu * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6177 toʻetupu * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 * D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Moho
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bead vine, Rosary pea, Jequirity |faitā=Starr_031108-3197_Abrus_precatorius.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Abrus |species=precatorius |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]], 1753 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Abrus precatorius seeds.jpg|left|250px|thumb|ngaahi foʻi tenga]] Ko e '''moho''' pe '''matamoho''' pe '''matamoe''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau totolo ia. ʻOku ʻi ai ha ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe ʻoku ui pehē, kā kotoa ʻoku ʻi ai haʻanau '''mataʻi moho''' ʻi honau ngeʻesi tenga, ʻa ia ko e ngaahi foʻi tenga fefeka ʻoku kulokula pe hinehina pe ʻuliʻuli pe lanu ua. ʻOku nau fakakona.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *moho, matamoho; koʻeni, ngaahi foʻi tenga lanu ua: kulokula ʻahoʻaho mo e ʻuliʻuli ʻi lalo *moho ''Dalbergia candenatensis'' ([[August Wilhelm Dennstedt|Dennst.]]) [[David Prain|Prain]] pe ''D. monosperma''
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *mataʻila, pomea mataʻila ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *piptio, pitipitio ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *pūkiawe, pūpūkiawe, pūkiawe lei, pūkiawe lenalena ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *matamoso, fuefue lauliliʻi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pitipitiō, kōviriviri matatako, uiui, kirikiri rangi ([[lea fakakuki]]) *lele, leredamu, diridamu, qiridamu ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5681 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}
