page.title: Matalaʻulie
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Jungle ricegrass, Shama millet |faitā=Echinochloa colona.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |genus=Echinochloa |species=colonum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Johann Heinrich Friedrich Link|Link]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''matalaʻulie''' pe '''mohuku ʻa pōpoa''' ko e [[mohuku]] ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''E. colona''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *mohukuʻapōpoa = matalaʻulie; koʻeni *[[mohukuʻapōpoa]] (ngaahi faʻahinga kehe)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *sefa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *vayavaya ([[lea fakakuki]] ([[Pukapuka]]))
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mohuku vai
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Watergrass, Spreading dayflower |faitā=Commelina communis 002.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[commelinales]] |familia= [[COMMELINACEAE]] |genus=Commelina |species=diffusa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Burm.f. |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mohuku vai''' pe '''musie matala pulū''' ko e faʻahinga [[mohuku]] ia, mo e ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau lanulangi. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau ko e ''C. nudiflora'' pe ''C. pacifica''.
Ko e faitā ko e ''C. communis'', kae ʻoku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *musie matala pulū, kaningi, kanini (?), ''Commelina benghalensis'' {Tropical spiderwort} *vakai foki ki he [[mohukuʻapōpoa]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *mauʻu toga ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *mauku, mauku vai, mauku tītā, mauku puakatoro, mauku ʻoroe ([[lea fakakuki]]) *maʻapepe ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *honohono wai, mākolokolo ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *ai rogorogo, cobulabula, co qaloqalo, ... ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5970 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mohukuʻapōpoa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bristly crabgrass |faitā=Starr_050419-0383_Digitaria_ciliaris.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |genus=Digitaria |species=setigera |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Roth ex Roem. & Schult. |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mohuku ʻa pōpoa''' ko e ngaahi faʻahinga [[mohuku]] ia. Ko e faʻahinga matakakano ʻi heni, ʻoku lahi hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Digitaria pruriens'' (Fisch. ex Trin.) Büse, ''Panicum corymbosum'' Roxb., mo e hā fua.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *mohukuʻapōpoa; koʻeni, ʻoku meimei tatau mo e ''Digitaria ciliaris'' {Crab Gras} *mohukuʻapōpoa pe [[matalaʻulie]] *mohukuʻapōpoa = mohukuʻapōpoa tahi = musie liku = [[kefukefu]] *mohukuʻapōpoa, ''Centosteca lappacea'' L. (POACEAE) *[[mohuku vai]] *[[mohuku ano]] vakai foki ki he [[musie]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *kukae puaʻa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *sefa ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], matalaʻulie, ''Centosteca'') *vayavaya ([[lea fakakuki]] ([[Pukapuka]]), kotoa) **koʻekoʻe (ʻotu motu tonga, ''Centosteca'')
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko hai (pe ko e hā?) ko Pōpoa ia?
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5906 *http://www.hear.org/starr/hiplants/images/thumbnails/html/digitaria_setigera.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mohuku ano
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Saltwater knottgras |faitā=Starr_050223-4291_Paspalum_vaginatum.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |genus=Paspalum |species=vaginatum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Olof Peter Swartz|Swartz]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mohuku ano''' pe '''misilaite''' ko e fuʻu [[mohuku]] ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''P. distichum'' L. ʻe he kau saienisi ʻe niʻihi.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *mohuku ano; koʻeni *[[mohuku vai]] *[[mohukuʻapōpoa]] (mo e ngaahi mohuku kehe)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *mutia ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *mauku taʻatai, mauku vairākau ([[lea fakakuki]]) *matie, mutie ([[lea fakamākuise]]) *kabutu ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== ''Misilaite'' ko e [[lea fakatonga]] ia maʻa ''Mr. Wright'', naʻe ʻomi ia ʻa e mohuku ʻení ki Tongá ni.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Salapona
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red Natal grass |faitā=Melinis repens.jpg |faitālaulahi= 280px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |tribus=paniceae |genus=Melinis |species=repens |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carl Ludwig Willdenow|Willd.]]) [[Georg Zizka|Zizka]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''salapona''' pe '''musie Tonga''' ko e faʻahinga [[mohuku]] ia. ʻOku ke toe ʻilo ia, koeʻuhi ʻene ʻasi kulokula.
ʻOku tatau mo e ''Rhynchelytrum repens'' (Willd.) Hubbard, ''Tricholaena rosea'' Nees.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *cogicogi ([[lea fakafisi]]) ʻOku ʻikai tapu hahake ange ʻo Tonga ([[Haʻamoa]] mo e hā fua)
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mohuku
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Grass |faitā=Poaceae spp Sturm26.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= '''mohuku''' (POACEAE) |genus= |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Robert Brown|R.Br.]]) [[John Hendley Barnhart|Barnhart]] }}
Ko e '''mohuku''' ko e hingoa fakatonga ki he ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau mei he kāinga '''''poaceae''''' pe '''''gramineae''''' ʻi he lea fakasaienisi. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe taha mano tupu ʻi he kāingá ni. ʻOku nau kau ki he holongā ''poales'', tatau mo e kāinga ʻo e [[pako]].
Kā tatau ai pē mo e ''grass'' ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]] ʻoku ʻikai tatau ʻa e ngaahi mohuku kotoa pē ki he ''poaceae'', pea ʻoku ʻi ai ha ''poaceae'' ʻoku ʻikai ha mohuku. Ko e fakatātā mahuʻinga taha: ko e [[tō]] pe [[kaho]] pe [[pitu]] (kofe) ʻoku nau kau ki he ''poaceae'', kā ʻikai ui ha mohuku.
ʻI he lea fakatonga fakatupunga ko e '''mohuku''' ko ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau kinautolu ʻoku ngāueʻaki ki he kai maʻa e fanga monumanu, ʻa ia pulu, hoosi, kosi, mo e hā fua. ʻOku lahi ʻene tupu ʻi he kaikaiʻanga lahi ʻi ʻuta.
Ko e foʻi lea '''musie''', ʻoku meimei tatau, kā ʻoku ne ngāueʻaki maʻa e ngaahi musie (malaʻe) ʻi he ngoue ʻi kolo.
ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻi heni ko e mohuku = ''poaceae'', ʻoku lava te ke pehē: ko e mohuku moʻoni.
Ko e ngaahi faʻahinga mohuku: * [[ahisiaina]] * [[fisihina]] * [[hana]] * [[hefa]] * [[kaho]] (ʻikai tukufakaholo) ** kaho fōlalahi * [[kefukefu]] * [[koane]] * [[pitu|kofe]] (ʻikai tukufakaholo) * [[kola]] * [[limuvai]] * [[matalaʻulie]] * [[matapekepeka]] * [[moengālō]] * mohuku ** [[mohuku ano]] pe misilaite ** [[takataka|mohuku siamane]] ** [[mohuku vai]] ** [[mohukuʻapōpoa]] * [[musie]] ** musie liku ** musie matala pulū ** musie tonga ** musie vailima ** musie vai * [[pitu]] (ʻikai tukufakaholo) * [[puakatau]] * [[saafa]] * [[tō]] (ʻikai tukufakaholo) * [[tolulu]] * [[totoa]] ** totoatahi * [[salapona]] * [[sipilini]] * [[takataka|takatakaʻaleala]]
== Tataku == * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward

page.title: Kuta
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Water chestnut |faitā=Eleocharis dulcis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Eleocharis |species=dulcis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Nicolaas Laurens Burman|Burm.f.]]) [[Carl Bernhard von Trinius|Trin.]] ex [[Henschel|Hensch.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Eleocharis dulcis Blanco1.15.jpg|left|thumb|200px|kuta fakafisi]] [[File:Wasserkastanie 2.jpg|left|thumb|300px|ko e fohaʻikuta]] {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |hingoa=Kuta ngofe |faitā=Lepironia mucronata.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Lepironia |species=mucronata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[L.C. Richard|Rich.]] }} Ko e ongo '''kuta''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, tupu ʻi he ano pe ofi ki ai, fakatātā ko e ano [[Ngofe]] pe [[Vailahi]] mo e toe ange. ʻOku sai maʻa fai ngaahi [[taʻovala]] ʻe he kakai ʻo [[Tuʻanuku]], pe langa fihu. ʻOku tupu foki ʻa e ngaahi foha ʻi he aka, ʻoku sai ke kai.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * '''kuta''' (pe kuta fakafisi); lanu enga-mata (maama), ʻi Ngofe, ʻoku tupu ʻi he tapatakai ʻo e ano, ʻi he vai ʻikai loloto. * '''kuta ngofe'''; lanu mata-pulū (poʻuli), tupu ʻi he lotomālie ʻo Ngofe pē, ʻoku mita ʻe taha hono loloto. Ko e ongo feituʻu maama mo e poʻuli, ʻoku tupu ai ʻa e ongo kuta, ʻoku mataʻāʻā ʻi he ongo faitā ʻi mataʻu.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * ʻutuʻutu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * kuta, sasa, taria ([[lea fakafisi]])
== Tataku == * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/eleocharis_dulcis.htm * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pako
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Sedge |faitā=Cyperaceae spp Sturm13.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= '''pako''' (CYPERACEAE) |genus= |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Antoine Laurent de Jussieu|Juss.]] }}
Ko e '''pako''' ko e hingoa fakatonga ki he ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau mei he kāinga '''''cyperaceae''''' ʻi he lea fakasaienisi, pe ''sedge'' ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]]. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe 4000 ʻi he kāingá ni. ʻOku nau kau ki he holongā ''poales'', tatau mo e kāinga ʻo e [[mohuku]].
Ko e konga lahi taha ʻo e ngaahi pako ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi pē mo e ngaahi kau (sino) ʻoku tapatolu.
Ko e ngaahi faʻahinga pako, naʻe ui ʻi Tongá ni: * [[kuta]] ** kuta ngofe * [[mahelehele]] ** hano * [[pakopako]] ** [[pakopako fakamalu]] ** pako failolo ** ngaahi pakopako kehekehe
== Tataku == * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward

page.title: Malila
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Globe amaranth |faitā=Gomphrena globosa1.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[AMARANTHACEAE]] |genus=Gomphrena |species=globosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''malila''' pe '''laumalila''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku fuolahi hono matalaʻi ʻakau, ko e meʻa fuopotopoto mo e kulokula (pe hinehina), pea ʻoku tuai pē ʻenau mae ʻosi he toli. Ko e ʻakau ʻomi mei [[ʻAmelika]] loto.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *malila kura, malila tea ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *poʻe ʻura ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *lehua, lehua mau loa, lehua moa loa, lehua pepa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *malila ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pōkai kura ([[lea fakakuki]]) *poʻai ʻura ([[lea fakamangareva]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko e hingoa ʻo e [[Tuʻimalila]] (ko e fonu mei he ʻeikivaka [[Sēmisi Kuki]]), ʻoku haʻu mei heni ?
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/gomphrena_globosa.htm *http://www.hear.org/starr/plants/images/species/?q=gomphrena+globosa *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fisiʻiano
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Sessile joyweed |faitā=Alternanthera sessilis W2 IMG 3423.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[AMARANTHACEAE]] |genus=Alternanthera |species=sessilis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Robert Brown|R.Br.]] ex [[Augustin Pyrame de Candolle|DC.]] |fehokotaki= s }} [[Image:Alternanthera sessilis W3 IMG 3422.jpg|left|thumb|''Alternanthera sessilis'']] Ko e '''fisiʻiano''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku faʻa tupu ofi ki he vai pe ano. ʻA ia ko hono hingoa ko '''fisiʻi-ano'''. Naʻe tohi ʻe Yuncker pea hiki ʻe he tokolahi ko e '''fisiʻi-ʻano''', kā ko e hala ia.
Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Alternanthera nodiflora'' R.Br.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *palewāwae ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *vao sosolo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *mata kura ([[lea fakakuki]]) *ti ([[lea fakamākuise]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/alternanthera_sessilis.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.text:

==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *motou pe [[kakalaʻuli]]; koʻeni, ʻoku tatau mo e ''C. glaucescens'' var. ''pacifica'' *motou, ''Cryptocarya hornei''; tātātaha, ʻomi mei [[Fisi]]

page.title: Kakalaʻuli
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e ʻakau
page.text: {{Fakaʻuhingakehe}} ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau ʻoku ui ko e '''kakala ʻuli''' ʻi he [[lea fakatonga]], kā kotoa ko e hingoa fakalahi pē: *''Cryptocarya turbinata'' → [[motou]] *''Diospyros samoensis'' → [[koli|kolivao]] *''Planchonella costata'' → [[kalaka]] *''Planchonella membranacea'' → [[kau|kautahi]] *''Xylosma orbiculatum'' → [[fululupe]] pe [[filimoto]] pe [[olamaka]] [[Category:Saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]]

page.title: Hina (ʻakau)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Squash pumpkin |hingoa=Hina |faitā=Cucurbita_maxima_Blanco2.320.png |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[CUCURBITACEAE]] |genus=Cucurbita |species=maxima |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Antoine Nicolas Duchesne|Duchesne]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''hina''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku fuʻolahi hono foʻi fua, ʻoku sai ʻaupito ke kai. ʻOku lahi hono fakakeheʻi.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[fanguʻakumā]] *[[fangu]]
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko e hina ko e meʻa uta ki muli ʻoku mahuʻinga lahi ʻaupito maʻa e ʻekonomika ʻo Tonga.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kilisimasi (ʻakau)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Queen-of-flowers, Christmas bush, Crape myrtle |hingoa=Kilisimasi |faitā=LagerstroemiaIndica5.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[MYRTACEAE]] |genus=Lagerstroemia |species=indica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Christian Hendrik Persoon|Pers.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Lagerstroemia indica 3.jpg|320px|thumb|matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku ofi]] [[File:Lagerstroemia indica MHNT.BOT.2010.13.6.jpg|thumb|''Lagerstroemia indica'' ]]
Ko e '''kilisimasi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, aʻu ki he mita ʻe 6 ki ʻolunga. Ko e ʻakau ʻomi mei [[Siaina]], mo e lahi hono matalaʻiʻakau lahi mo kulokula pe fekika, pea mo e engeenga ʻi loto. ʻOku manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue. ʻOku ui ko e 'kilisimasi' ʻi Tongá ni, koeʻuhi ʻoku ne matala ʻi he taimi ko iá.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== * tiare tūava ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6308 * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Burdekin plum |faitā=Pleiogynium timorense.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[sapindales]] |familia= [[ANACARDIACEAE]] |genus=Pleiogynium |species=timorense |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (DC.) Leenh. }} [[Image:Pleiogynium timorense plums 1.jpg|thumb|left|''Pleiogynium timorense'']] Ko e '''tangato''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻoku sai ʻaupito ʻene ʻakau maʻa e tufunga. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Pleiogynium solanderi''. ʻOku tatau ko e ''timoriense'' mo e ''timorense''.
==Tataku== *http://www.sgapqld.org.au/bushtucker7.html *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Meleni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Watermelon |faitā=Watermelon-garden.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[CUCURBITACEAE]] |genus=Citrullus |species=lanatus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carl Peter Thunberg|Thunb]].) Matsum. & [[Takenoshin Nakai|Nakai]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''meleni''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia mo e ngaahi foʻi fua lahi mo huʻohuʻa, manakoa ʻe he kakai Tonga kotoa pē. Ko e hingoa motuʻa ko e ''C. vulgaris''.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * meleni maka, ''Cucumis melo'' * meleni ʻa e kumā, ''Cucumis callosus''
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * merēni ([[lea fakatahisi]], [[lea fakakuki]]) * meleni ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], [[lea fakatūvalu]], [[lea fakaniuē]])

page.title: Ahisiaina
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cuscus grass |faitā=Vetiveria zizanioides0.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[mohuku]] |genus=Chrysopogon |species=zizanioides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]), [[Guy Edouard Roberty|Roberty]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ahi siaina''' ko e faʻahinga [[mohuku]] ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Vetiveria zizanioides'' mei he foʻi lea ''vetiver'' ʻi he lea faka-tamil mei [[ʻInitia]], ko e feituʻu tupunga ʻo e ʻakaú ni.
Ko e meʻa makehe ʻo e faʻahinga mohuku ʻeni, ʻoku tupu ki lalo pē ʻa hono ngaahi aka, ʻikai fakalava. ʻOku sai ʻaupito maʻa e tuku ʻa e [[keina ʻo e kelekele]].
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * aʻi, mauku aʻi ([[lea fakakuki]]) * mulimuli ([[lea fakafisi]])

Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Merremia nymphaeifolia'', ''Ipomoea peltata''. ʻOku ne tupu pē ʻi [[ʻEua]], [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] mo [[Tafahi]].

page.title: Matavivi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Redbird cactus, Devil's backbone, Zigzag plant |faitā=Euphorbia tithymaloides.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[EUPHORBIACEAE]] |genus=Euphorbia |species=tithymaloides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Euphorbia tithymaloides ssp tithymaloides ies.jpg|left|200px|thumb|ʻOku ʻasi heni ʻa e fepiupiuaki]] Ko e '''matavivi''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he lea fakaniuē) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. Naʻa ne ʻomi ki Tongá ni ʻikai fuoloa, kā naʻe vave ʻene tupu ki he ʻakau vao.
Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: *fakasaienisi: ''Pedilanthus tithymaloides'' (L.) [[Poiteau|Poit.]], ''Pedilanthus carinatus'' *mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]: '''kakatisi manupunakula''' (koeʻuhi ʻa e fuo ʻo hono matalaʻiʻakau), '''huituʻa ʻo e tēvolo''' pe '''ʻakau fepiupiuaki'''
==Ngaahi fakakeheʻi kehekehe== *matavivi lanutaha; ko e ngaahi lau lanumata (vakai ki he ongo ʻata) *matavivi ʻingoʻingoʻi, var. ''variegatus''; ko e ngaahi lau lanufiofio, mata mo e tea
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *matavivi ([[lea fakaniuē]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Kapau ʻoku ʻikai matala pe ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e matalaʻi[[heilala]], ʻoku ngāueʻakiʻis ʻa e matalaʻimatavivi maʻa e fai kahoa. Meʻapango, ʻoku meimei tatau ʻena ʻasi, kā ʻoku ʻikai ha manongi ki he matavivi.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6490 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/pedilanthus_tithymaloides.htm {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Faʻēʻaemano
page.link: Joseph Marie Henry Alfred Perrier de la Bâthie
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Bryophyllum daigremontianum × delagoense.jpg |faitālaulahi=400px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[saxifragales]] |familia= [[CRASSULACEAE]] |genus=Kalanchoe |species=daigremontiana × delagoensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Raym.-Hamet & [[Joseph Marie Henry Alfred Perrier de la Bâthie|H.Perrier]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Bryophyllum tubiflorum × delagoense flower.jpg|left|300px|thumb|ʻoku matala]] Ko e '''faʻē ʻa e mano''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei he ʻapi ngoue ʻi [[ʻAositelēlia]], kā ko ʻene feituʻu tupuʻanga ko e [[ʻAfilika]] tonga ia. Ko e ʻakau ʻoku tupu mei he faʻahinga kehekehe ʻe ua, ko e '''faʻē ʻa e ʻafe''' mo e '''faʻē ʻa e miliona''' (vakai ki lalo). Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau ko e ''Bryophyllum daigremontianum × delagoense'', fakangoue ''Houghtonii''.
Pe mahalo pē ko hono hingoa totonu ko e ''B. tubiflorum × delagoense''. (PIER)
ʻOku makehe ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau mei he kāinga ʻo e ''Bryophyllum'' pe ''Kalanchoe''. ʻOku nau tupu honau fānau, ko e ngaahi kiʻi fuʻu ʻakau, ʻi ʻolunga ʻo honau lau. ʻOku ʻikai aʻu ki he taha ʻafe, mano, pe miliona, kae toe lahi. Pea ʻoku nau tō, pea tupu ʻi he fuʻu ʻakau foʻou. ʻOku ʻi ai hono matalaʻiʻakau kulokulamaama, kā ko e taimi nounou pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai he taʻu kotoa.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * ''Bryophyllum delagoense'' (Eckl. & Zeyh.) Schinz, ''Kalanchoe delagoense'', ''Bryophyllum tubiflorum'', [Mother of thousands, Chandelier plant, Friendly neighbour]; ʻoku ʻikai hano lau tongitongi * ''Bryophyllum daigremontianum'' (Raymond-Hamet & H.Perrier) A.Berger, ''Kalanchoe daigremontiana'', [Mother of millions, Devil's backbone, Mexican hat plant]; ʻoku laulahi ange hono lau, pea mo e [[fakaloupata]].
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=13741 * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=13869 * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/bryophyllum_daigremontianum.htm * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/bryophyllum_delagoense.htm * http://www.weeds.org.au/cgi-bin/weedident.cgi?tpl=plant.tpl&ibra=all&card=E25

page.title: Fakaloupata
page.text:
Ko e '''fakaloupata''' ko e hingoa fakasaienisi ia maʻa e ngaahi lauʻiʻakau ʻoku ʻikai fakapipiki ʻa honau kau ki he tapa ʻo e laʻilau, kā ʻoku nau fakapipiki ofi ange ki he lotomālie. ʻOku ui ''peltate'' ʻi he lea muli ia.
ʻOku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga pehē. Ko e ngaahi fakatātā ʻiloa ʻi Tongá ni *[[loupata]] (ʻoku moʻoni, mahalo pē ʻoku haʻu ʻa e hingoa ʻeni mei he lou [vaʻe][[pato]] *[[fotulona]] *[[talo|talotonga]] (ʻikai talofutuna)
[[category:Saienisi ʻo e ʻakau]]

page.title: ʻAmelia Lātūniua Taumoepeau-Tupou (ʻAhomeʻe)
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Taumoepeau-Tupou ʻAhomeʻe, ʻL |maama= fefine |tamai= [[Tēvita Manuopangai ʻAhomeʻe]] |faʻē= [[Heuʻifanga Veikune]] |ʻaho fanauʻi=1945 |ʻaho pekia=12 ʻAokosi 2007 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe]]|Tupou Kolotolu Puloka (ʻAhomeʻe)|Kaufoʻou Falekihetoa Naufahu (ʻAhomeʻe)|[[ʻElenoa Ngataialupe Tupouniua (ʻAhomeʻe)]]|[[Kalolaine Taukapa Lataifalefehi Fakafānua (ʻAhomeʻe)]]|[[Viliami Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau Manuopangai]]|Vaʻetapu Melehifokivai ʻAhomeʻe|Manuopangai ʻAhomeʻe|}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | | | | | | |}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Sonatane Tuʻakinamolahi Taumoepeau-Tupou]] |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|Christian David Fahaʻivalu|[[Marcella Margaret Tupoumoheofo Kalaniuvalu (Taumoepeau-Tupou)|Marcella Margaret Tupoumoheofo]]|Odette ʻAinise Kilinalivoni Tupouʻahomeʻe|Latasi Toutoupauʻu Taumoepeau-Tupou|||||}} |}}*http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/latuniua_130807_1800.shtml ==Hiva tauʻolunga ʻo Lātūniua== Faʻu ʻe [[Semisi ʻIongi]] (taʻanga) & [[Sione Tuʻifua Tutoe]] (fasi) ʻi 1967 maʻa e hilifaki kalauni ʻo e ʻohoano ʻo hona taʻoketelele. Naʻe finemui ʻa Lātūniua pea naʻe faiva [[tauʻolunga]] maʻa hono kāinga. Tokanga ki he ngaahi mataʻitohi ʻuluaki ʻo e veesi kotoa. Langa e māsila he ko ʻatu ē he kuo matangi ka tau ake ʻo tau tuʻula ʻi he kolope he ko e mokoi ʻo [[Sālote Tupou III|Kuini Sālote]]. Angi e matangi he Fangatapú na fenifea he ahi pea mo e vunga toli hao sei he fakamaʻunga ke feʻiloaki he Uafu-ko-Vuna. Te u suipi he hai mo e kāsinga ke na ʻāvea siʻoto ʻuhinga he ko e mapa koula ʻo e fahu siliva ʻokú ne ʻalaha he matanisiga. Uisa te u tala ke mou ʻilo ʻa e fika tapu hotau ʻaho he ʻoku hā ia heʻeta moto ʻa e tuku fonua ʻa [[:Category:Haʻa Moheofo|Haʻamoheofo]]. Te u vilo pate ka mou matea siʻi kukuvalu mo e fātea [[ʻElenoa Ngataialupe Lutui|Ngataialupe]] he te u ʻekea ko hoku kakala tauleva. Nakita e ʻofa ʻi he ʻunaloto ʻo ka akesiu e tavaketoto foʻi [[fā|fāhina]] ʻo Haʻamoheofo he mausa ʻo Sia-ko-Veiongo. ʻIsa siʻi lose ʻo Pakingihami ne fihi he maile ʻo Lofanitani Mona Lisa ʻo e huni tangitangi noʻo loto ko hoku saulavá ni. ʻUnuaki e tala ʻa haʻavavanga kau talanoa he langi ʻūmata ʻoku taha kae afe ʻa siʻono anga ko ʻeku naʻati kaloni kakala. ʻAve ʻeku ʻofa hē ki tonga hihifo ʻo fakafeʻao he vahamamaʻo pea luva ai mo hoku sino muimui folau ʻo ka ke soko. Ne ko e ʻaho ē ʻo e fakamalinga ʻi he kei hopo tonu ʻa e kaveinga pea tau tuē ʻi he hikuhikusila kae fakatē ai a Polinisia. ==Tataku== *Langi tauʻolunga & hiva kakala; Nukuʻalofa 2000; ISBN 978-982-98007-1-8 [[category:Hiva fakatonga|Taumoepeau-Tupou ʻAhomeʻe, ʻL]]

page.title: Kiekie/en
page.text:
A '''kiekie''' is a Tongan dress, an ornamental girdle around the waist, mainly worn by women on semiformal occasions, but nowadays also sometimes by men. At highly formal occasions both gender will settle for a [[taʻovala]]. At casual occasions no girdle is needed for any gender, although women may continue wearing a kiekie even then, as it is considered an easy sitting, nice looking decoration, with which one can show off. (All taʻovala look more or less the same, and are usually quite stiff and hot to wear).
The characteristic of a kiekie is that it is between a mat and a grass skirt ([[manafau]]): it is a string skirt attached to a waistband. It is supposed to be somewhat transparent, showing the [[piva|skirt]] or [[tupenu]] worn under it. The strings can be short as a mini skirt, or down to the ankles, but down to somewhat above the knees is most common.
Related to the kiekie is the [[sisi]] where the strings are [[sī]] leaves or plaited [[maile]] leaves, but where the waistband, full with sweet smelling flowers and fruits, is more important. Sisi are worn by both gender during dance performances.
Kiekie are part of the [[koloa]], the handicraft goods made by the women. Every woman can do it, although nowadays we see that some women specialise in it and sell their products on the market.
Kiekie can be made from many different materials, both natural and introduced: *strips of [[fā|pandanus]] leaves, often painted in bright colours. Either hanging loose, or plaited together. The ''salusalu'' is a long kiekie, especially for [[:category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]]. *strips of [[fau|hibiscus]] bast fiber. Same as the pandanus leaves, but not as course and therefore suited for finer designs. *''kaka'', de fibrous tissue which is wrapped around the growing fronds of [[niu|palm]] trees. It is usually varnished to make it stronger and then cut in all type of shapes. *strings or ropes *little disks (few centimeter diameter) made from coconut shell and strung together along their diameter. *old VHS tapes. *New Zealand flax, a [[māuli|Māori]] ''piupiu''. {{Foki||kiekie}}

page.title: Kiekie
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
[[Image:Kiekie yams.jpg|right|thumb|250px|ʻOku haʻi ʻe he fefine ngoue ʻa e kiekie vana]] Ko e '''kiekie''' ko e konga ia ʻo e [[vala fakatonga]], ʻoku faʻa haʻi ʻe he kau fefine ʻi he taimi taʻefāinoa, kā taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku tui foki ʻe he tamasiʻi, (ko e [[taʻovala]]) ko honau vala fai fakalelei). ʻOku manakoa ange ʻa e kiekie ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho mafana, koeʻuhi ʻoku vevela mo e kekeva ʻa e taʻovala.
ʻOku ofi ki he kiekie ko e [[sisi]] mo e [[manafau]]. Kā ko e sisi ko e teunga kakala, pea ko e manafau ko e teunga ia maʻa e ngaahi faiva.
Ko e kiekie ko e konga ia ʻo e [[koloa]] (fakafefine).
ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kiekie he ʻahó ni: *[[fā|louʻakau]] tuʻolalahi *louʻakau fepiupiuaki mo e kuo vali lanuʻahoʻaho; ko e [[salusalu]] mei [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] *[[fau]] tuʻoiiki ange, pea fī pe lalanga *kaka mei he fuʻu [[niu]] *pulu mei he foʻi niu, kuo fī *filo tuʻoiiki, filo milemila ʻi he ngaahi lanuʻahoʻaho *filo milemila, kuo lalanga, ko e kiekie [[vana]] *tupe ([[Paʻanga (ʻakau)|paʻanga]]) pe kiʻi tupu tuʻusi mei he ngeʻesi niu *ngaahi tepi vitiō motuʻa *mo e hā fua
==Tataku== *ʻI.F. Helu; Critical essays: Cultural perspectives from the Southseas; 1999
[[Image:kiekie2.jpg|272px]] [[Image:kiekie4.jpg|284px]] [[Image:kiekie3.jpg|172px]] {{English|more}} [[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Feifai
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= |faitā= |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Schleinitzia |species=insularum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Jean Baptiste Antoine Guillemin|Guill.]]) [[Arturo Erhardo Burkart|Burkart]] |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''feifai''' (pe '''mohemohe''') ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[siale mohemohe]]. Ko hoino ʻuhinga tatau: ''Schleinitzia forsteri'' pe ''Leucaena insularum'' pe ''Leucaena forsteri''. ʻOku sai hono ʻakau maʻa e tufunga.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pepe ? ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *toroire ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *toromiro, tororire, toroire ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== Kapau ʻoku fakapipine ʻa e kakai Tonga honau lauʻulu, ʻoku ngāueʻaki ko e ʻone (tuitui ʻa Tamale) pe lauʻi[[hangale]] pe lauʻifeifai. ʻOku ui ia ko e '''tongiʻone'''.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6639 *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Flowers of the Pacific island seashore; W.A. Whistler; ISBN 978-0-8248-1528-8 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *D.R. Drake et al., Rain forest vegetation of ʻEua Island, New Zealand Journal of Botany '''34''', 1996 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pī kula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Congo pea, pigeon pea |faitā=Cajanus cajan.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Cajanus |species=cajan |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Charles Frederick Millspaugh|Millsp.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Cajanus cajan MHNT.BOT.2015.2.47.jpg|thumb|''Cajanus cajan'']]
Ko e '''pī kula''' (pe '''piisi kula''', ka vakai ki he [[pī (ʻakau)]] ki he meʻafihi mo e hingoa eé) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni taʻefuoloa, mahalo pē ʻe he kakai [[ʻInitia]] mei [[Fisi]]. Ko e feituʻu tupunga ʻo e pī kula ko [[ʻAfilika]] ia, pea naʻe mafola ki ʻInitia. ʻOku tātātaha ʻi Tongá ni, ka ʻoku mafola. ʻOku lahi hono ngeʻesi tenga, mo e tenga ʻe fā (pe ofi ki ai) ʻi loto. ʻOku sai ke kai ʻosi haka. ʻOku fai ʻa e ''dahl'' (mā fakaʻinitia) mei ai ʻi Fisi.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * pī nūnū (=pī lupe), pī Pokoliko (=pī Puerto Rico) ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * qiriqiri, pi ([[lea fakafisi]]) * arhar, dahl ([[lea fakahinitī]])
== Tataku == http://www.hear.org/pier/species/cajanus_cajan.htm
== Tokanga == ''Vakai ki he [[pīkula]] maʻa e kiʻi monumanu uʻu.'' {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sākisi
Teʻehoosi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Broomweed, Arrowleaf sida |faitā=Arrowleaf.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malvales]] |familia= [[MALVACEAE]] |genus=Sida |species=rhombifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Goat weed |faitā=Starr_040209-0126_Ageratum_conyzoides.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Ageratum |species=conyzoides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''teʻe hoosi''' ko e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau siʻi mo e vao kinautolu mei he ngaahi kāinga kehe. ʻOku nau namukū. Ko e ''Sida rhombifolia'' ʻoku tatau mo e ''S. microphylla'', ʻoku faingataʻa ke toʻo.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *teʻehoosi pe teʻekosi, ''Sida acuta'' *teʻehoosi; ongo koʻeni, ko e matalaʻiʻakau engeenga maʻa e ongo ''Sida'', mo e lanulangi maʻa e ''Ageratum'' *ngaahi [[teʻekosi]] kehe
ʻOku ʻikai ʻilo ko e fē ʻo e ongo ʻakau ʻi lalo ʻoku tatau mo e ʻakau ʻi olunga *teʻehoosi tuʻu = teʻehoosi hako; ngāueʻaki maʻa e fai [[sisi]] *teʻehoosi totolo
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== ʻOku tui tatau ʻa e ''S. acuta'' mo ''S. rhombifolia'' ʻe he lea lahi taha *mautofu, motofu ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *porumu, purūmu, taʻano ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *mautofu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *purūmu ([[lea fakakuki]]) *hopa, kaepu, puehu, pulumi ([[lea fakamākuise]]) *bariana, deni puaka, denime, qavi ni lacoi, cavucidra ([[lea fakafisi]])
''Ageratum conyzoides'' *sekose sea, tekote tea ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *maire vaihi ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *maile hohono, maile kula ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *aʻamia, lau taioti, taeʻoti ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *botebotekoro, sogovanua, mastamocemoce ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/sida_acuta.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/sida_rhombifolia.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/ageratum_conyzoides.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6652 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6651 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5709 *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tiulipe
page.link: Ambroise Marie François Joseph Palisot de Beauvois
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=African tuliptree |faitā=Spathodea campanulata.JPG |faitālaulahi= 300px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[BIGNONIACEAE]] |genus=Spathodea |species=campanulata |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Ambroise Marie François Joseph Palisot de Beauvois|P.Beauv.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tiulipe''' (mei he ''tulip'' [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[ʻAfelika]] loto. ʻOku ui ''pisse lʻeau'' (mimi vai) ʻi he [[lea fakafalanisē]], pea ko e hingoa ofi ki ai ʻi he lea fakapolinisia ʻe niʻihi, koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻi ai ha vai ʻi hono moto.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *tiulipe; koʻeni *tiulipe vao, ''Harpullia pendula'' (SAPINDACEAE)
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *faʻapasi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *mata kōʻīʻī, (=mata pihi), pātītī vai, mimi, tiare akapisipisi ([[lea fakakuki]]) *taga mimi ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6668 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Multipurpose trees for agroforestry in the Pacific islands; R.R. Thaman, C.R. Elevitch, K.M. Wilkinson *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.text: {{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Aleamotuʻa, MT |maama=tangata |tamai= [[Paula Longolongoʻatumai ʻAtunaisa Aleamotuʻa]] |faʻē= Mele Tunakaimanu Aleamotuʻa |ʻaho fanauʻi= 1966 |ʻaho pekia=19 ʻAokosi 2007 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Kaimana Hauoli ʻo Kuini Tukuʻaho (Aleamotuʻa)]]|[[Siosaia Tupou Aleamotuʻa]]|Temaleti Manakovi Pahulu (Aleamotuʻa)||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | ||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua||Sālote Halaevalu Kalasini Aleamotuʻa|[[Tupou Tongapoʻuli Aleamotuʻa]]|||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Mele Simiki Aleamotuʻa |fānau1= {{tokoua|tamasiʻi ʻe 7|taʻahine ʻe 2|||||||}} |}}*http://www.matangitonga.to/article/tonganews/royalty/taulupe_200807_1659.shtml

page.title: Tuise
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Whitehead spikesedge |faitā=Starr_030807-0056_Kyllinga_nemoralis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[poales]] |familia= [[pako]] |genus=Kyllinga |species=nemoralis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (J.R.Forst. & G.Forst.) Dandy ex Hutch. & Dalziel |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''tuise''' (hingoa foʻou) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku ui foki ko e '''pakopako''' (hingoa motuʻa) pea ʻoku kau ki he kāinga ʻo e ngaahi pako. Ko hono ngaahi ʻuhinga tatau: ''Cyperus stoloniferus'', ''C. cyperoides'', ''Kyllinga monocephala''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== vakai ki he ngaahi [[pakopako]] kehe
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *matie tahiti, matie upoʻo, moʻu upoʻonui ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *kiliʻoʻopu, mauʻu mokae ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *mutia, tuise ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *neke ʻenua, tumu ʻenua, matie karanga ([[lea fakakuki]]) *vayavaya ([[lea fakapukapuka (motu kuki)]]) (ko e ''upoʻo'', ''upoko'' ko e ''ʻulu'' ia ʻi he lea fakatonga)
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/kyllinga_nemoralis.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6304 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tupuʻa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Slender amaranth |faitā=Amaranthus viridis.jpg |faitālaulahi= 300px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[caryophyllales]] |familia= [[AMARANTHACEAE]] |genus=Amaranthus |species=viridis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tupuʻa''' pe '''longolongoʻuha''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ko e ʻakau vao ia. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Amaranthus gracilis''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *tupuʻa, longolongoʻuha; koʻeni *tupuʻa, longolongoʻuha, ''A. blitum''; ʻoku tātātaha ʻi Tongá ni pea mo [[Tahisi]] ē. *[[longolongo]]; ko e ʻakau kehe ʻaupito *[[longolongoʻuha]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *katule ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *ʻeaʻeamata, huinihera, upoʻoti ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *ʻaheahea, pakai, pākaikai, pakapakai ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *ʻautasi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *vaʻine ʻara, puʻekao ([[lea fakakuki]]) *puaio, upoʻotiʻi ([[lea fakamākuise]]) *moca, driti, gasau ni vuka, tubua ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5736 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fafangupulū
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bluebell, Butterfly pea |faitā=Centrosema pubescens.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Centrosema |species=pubescens |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[George Bentham|Benth.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''fafangu pulū''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) pe '''pī pepe''' (mei he lea fakapilitānia), (ongo hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, naʻe ʻikai fuoloa. Ko e vao ia.
Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau mo e motuʻa: ''Bradburya pubescens'', ''Centrosema molle''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *kūtū, piriarero (=pulū ʻelelo (?)) ([[lea fakakuki]]) *pi ni ndola (=pī ʻa e pepe) ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/centrosema_pubescens.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5907 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fuepulupulutuʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=King's mantle, Bush clockvine |faitā=Thunbergia erecta0.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[ACANTHACEAE]] |genus=Thunbergia |species=erecta |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[George Bentham|Benth.]]) [[Thomas Anderson|T.Anderson]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''fue pulupulutuʻi''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[ʻAfelika]] pea mo e ngaahi kāungafonua ʻoku ʻikai fuoloa.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== vakai ki he [[fue]] maʻa e ngaahi fue kehekehe.
==Toe meʻa kehe== Ko e lanu fisiʻifekika ko e lanu paʻanga lahi ʻa ia naʻe hoko ʻa e lanu fakatuʻi ia ʻi he kuonga ʻemipaea Loma.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6733 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lole
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Snowbush |hingoa=Lole (louʻileʻila) |faitā=Breynia disticha, leaves.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[PHYLLANTHACEAE]] |genus=Breynia |species=disticha |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Johann Reinhold Forster|J.R.Forst.]] & [[Georg Forster|G.Forst.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e lole ko e hingoa ia maʻa e ongo fuʻu ʻakau siʻi. ʻOku manakoa kinaua ʻi he ʻapi ngoue.
Ko e '''lole''' ʻe taha pe '''pekōnia''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau ʻomi ki Tongá ni. Ko haʻane anga fakaofo ko e [[potupotutatau|taʻepotupotumālie]] ʻo e ngaahi lau. ʻOku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo e pekōnia, mahalo pē ko e faʻahinga ʻoku manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue Tonga ko e ''B. semperflorens'' ia, ka ʻoku ui ko e 'lole' ko e faʻahinga kotoa pē.
Ko e '''lole''' ʻe taha pe '''lou ʻileʻila''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[Vanuatu]]. ʻOku faʻa ngāueʻaki he ʻā, ko e '''ʻā ʻileʻila'''. Ko e meʻa taau ke tokangaʻi hono lau ʻileʻila mo e lanumata, kulokula pea mo e hinehina.
ʻOku tatau (pē ha faʻahinga kehe, ʻoku ʻikai pau ʻa e kau saienisi) mo e ''Breynia nivosa 'Roseo-picta' '' (W. Bull) Small, pea mo e ''Phyllanthus nivosus'' W.G. Sm. Ko e kāinga ʻo e ''Phyllanthaceae'' naʻe haeʻi mei he ''Euphorbiaceae'' ʻoku taʻefuoloa.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== ===pekōnia=== *pīkōnia, pēkōnia ([[lea fakamauli]])
===lou ʻileʻila=== *eomonon ([[lea fakanaulu]]) *kāpaiē, maemae ([[lea fakakuki]]); ko e ''kāpaiē'' ʻoku ngāueʻaki maʻa e ngaahi ʻā kotoa
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/breynia_disticha.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5840 *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Begonia |hingoa=Lole (pekōnia) |faitā=Begonia semperflorens.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[BEGONIACEAE]] |genus=Begonia |species=semperflorens-cultorum |fehokotaki= s }} {{potuʻi}}

ʻAfiofolaha Tuʻihaʻateiho
Fusipala Taukiʻonetuku
Pōpao/en
Pōpao
page.category: Meʻa fakaengāue
page.text:
[[Image:Pōpao.jpg|center|thumb|500px|Ko e pōpao tukufakaholo ʻi [[Vaipūua]], Vavaʻu]] Ko e '''pōpao''' ko e kiʻi vaka siʻi maʻa e tokosiʻi, ʻalu ki tahi (ʻikai folau ki vaha) pea toutai.
Ngaahi konga: *katea *kiato *hama (pe ama) *tauama. Ko e fuo '''U''' ʻoku hangē ʻa e anga Tonga.
Kapau ʻoku (meimei) tatau hona lahi, ko e katea mo e hama (fakatātā ko e [[kalia]]), ʻoku na ui ko e '''fakatoukatea'''. {{potuʻi}} {{English|abstract}} [[Category:Meʻa fakaengāue]]

page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Rose apple |faitā= Syzygium jambos.JPG |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[myrtales]] |familia= [[MYRTACEAE]] |genus=Syzygium |species=jambos |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] Alston |fehokotaki=c }} Ko e '''fekika papālangi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau ia mo e ngaahi foʻi fua siʻisiʻi ʻenau ifo. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Eugenia jambos'' pe ''Caryophyllus jambos''.

page.title: Potupotutatau
page.category: Saienisi ʻo e fika
page.text:
ʻOku '''potupotutatau''' ha meʻa (pe ha pupunga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa) kapau ʻoku tatau ʻi he ngaahi fua ʻe 2 pe lahi ange mei heʻene lotomālie. Fakatātā ko e fetuʻu.
Kapau ʻoku tatau ia ʻi he ngaahi fua kotoa, ʻoku ui ko e '''fuopotopoto'''.
ʻOku '''potupotumālie''' ha ongo meʻa (pe ha ongo konga ʻo e meʻa ʻe taha) kapau ʻoku tatau ko e hema mo e mataʻu hangē ha sioʻata. Fakatātā ko e nima hema mo e nima mataʻu.
ʻI he ʻulungāanga fakatonga ʻoku potupotumālie ha tokotaha kapau ko e tuʻunga ʻo ʻene ʻeiki pea mo e tuʻunga ʻo ʻene fehuhu ʻoku tatau.
[[Category:Saienisi ʻo e fika]]

page.title: Sophora
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Silver bush |faitā=Sophoracassioides14.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Sophora |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e ʻakau lahi, ko e '''Sophora''' ko e kāinga ofi mei he ''fabaceae'' ia. ʻOku ʻi ai mahalo pē ko e faʻahinga ʻe 60 ʻoku kau ki ai ʻi māmani. ʻI loto pasifiki, ʻa ia ko Tonga, ʻoku tupu ʻa e taha pē: ko e '''[[lata]]''', ''S. tomentosa''.
ʻOku lahi ange ʻi Hauaiʻi, tānaki ko e ''Sophora chrysophylla'' - '''mamane'''
Pea ʻoku lahi ange foki ʻi Nuʻusila: ko e ''Sophora tetraptera''- '''kōwhai raunui''', ''Sophora microphylla'' - '''kōwhai rauriki''', mo e hā fua.
== Tataku == * Smith JMB. 1990. Drift disseminules in [[Fisi|Fidjian]] beaches [http://www.rsnz.org/publish/nzjb/1990/4.pdf ''N Z J Bot'' 28:13] * Heenan PB, Dawson MI, Wagstaff SJ 2004. The relationship of ''Sophora'' sect. Edwardsia (Fabaceae) to ''Sophora tomentosa'', the type species of the genus ''Sophora'', observed from DNA sequence data and morphological characters ''Botanical Journal of the Linnean Society'' 146, 439–446. * Palomino G, Martinez P, Bernal C, Sousa M. 1993. Diferencias Cromosomicas Entre Algunas Especies de los géneros ''Sophora'' L. y ''Styphnolobium'' Schott ''Annals of the Missouri Botanical Garden'', 80, 284-290. * Yakovlev G.P. 1967. Zametki po sistematike i geographii roda Sophora L. i blizkikh rodov. ''Trudy Leningradskogo khimico-farmacevticheskogo instituta''. 21:42-62
== Fehokotaki ki tuʻa == * [http://www.hear.org/starr/hiplants/images/thumbnails/html/sophora_tomentosa.htm Images] * [http://www.ildis.org/LegumeWeb/6.00/names/nsynon/914.shtml taxonomi] * [http://web.archive.org/web/20070701105535/http://www.biotemas.ufsc.br/pdf/volume192/p29a36.pdf fenologia] * [http://web.archive.org/web/20020313033226/http://hort.ifas.ufl.edu/shrubs/SOPTOMA.PDF Sophora tomentosa (en.)] * [http://www.chlorischile.cl/Pena/sophora.htm Peña, RC. & Cassels BK 1996. Phylogenetic relationships among Chilean ''Sophora'' species. Biochem. Syst. and Ecol. 24 (7/8): 725-733 (span.)√]
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kakala
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
[[Image:Garcinia sessilis, flower.jpg|right|250px|thumb|Ko e heilala, ko e kakala ʻiloa fika ʻuluaki]] Ko e '''kakala''' ko e ʻakau pe foʻi matala pe foʻi fua pe foʻi tenga ia, ko e konga ia ʻoku manongi. Pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e [[:Category:Talatukufakaholo|tala tukufakaholo]] ʻo ʻene tupu. ʻA ia ko e ʻakau ʻomi, ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai haʻane tupu tukufakaholo, neongo ʻene manongi, ʻoku ʻikai ha kakala ia (fakatātā: [[kalonikakala]]).
Ko e ngaahi '''kakala ʻiloa''' pe '''kakala hingoa''' ko e ngaahi kakala kinautolu maʻa e houʻeiki. Ko e ngaahi '''kakala vale''' maʻa e kakai. Vakai foki ki he [[kahoa kakala]].
{| border=1 | '''kakala hingoa''' || '''kakala vale''' |- | *[[ahi]] *[[fā]] (falahola, fākula, kukuvalu, paongo) *[[hea]] *[[heilala]] *[[huni|huni kulukona]] *[[koli]] *[[langakali]] *[[moʻonia]] *[[maile]] *[[mapa]] *[[motelolo]] *[[nukonuka]] *[[pipi]] *[[vunga]] | *[[fā]] (fātea, hingano) *[[fatai (ʻakau)|fatai]] *[[huni]] *[[mohokoi]] *[[pua]] *[[puopua]] *[[siale tafa]] *[[tetefa]] *[[uhi]] |}
==Ko e tupu ʻo e matalaʻiʻakau kakala ʻi he tukutala fakatonga== ʻOku ʻi ai ha ngaahi sitepu ʻe hongofulu<ref>ʻOku pehē ʻe [[Futa Helu]]</ref> #fatakau, ko e kamataʻanga ʻuluaki ʻo e matala #tangitangi, ʻoku kei siʻisiʻi ʻa e moto #moto #fisi, ʻoku kamata ʻa e mafola ʻo e moto #lūpū, ʻoku mafola #mafola, kuo mafola ʻaupito ʻa e matala #mae, ko e kamataʻanga ʻo e mate #maheikau #maheilau, ʻoku mapelu ʻa e matala #ngangana, ʻoku ne tō
ʻOku kiʻi kehekehe mei he kakai ʻe taha<ref>ʻOku pehē ʻe Churchward, ko e tikisinale fakatonga</ref> #fatakau #mataliki, ʻoku kamata ʻa e moto ʻene ʻasi #moto #fisi, kuo kiʻi mafola ʻa e moto #tangitangi, tatau mo e fisi maʻa e [[siale tafa]] #lūpū, ko e moto ʻo e [[fā|hingano]] (lūpuuʻihingano), ʻoku kamata ʻene mafola #mafola #mae #maheikau #mokulu #ngangana
Ngaahi foʻi lea toe<ref>ʻOku pehē ʻe Mapa Veikune</ref> *punalau: mafola pe mae ==Tataku== <references/>
{{English|abstract}} [[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Kakala ʻiloa
page.text: #REDIRECT [[Kakala]]

page.title: Kakala vale
page.text: #REDIRECT [[Kakala]]

page.title: Kakala/en
page.text:
<nowiki>{{Expand Tongan|</nowiki>''Tonganarticletitle''<nowiki>|date=July 2016}}</nowiki>
A '''kakala''' is the Tongan term for any plant, be it its wood, flower, or seed, which has a good smell. It is often translated as 'flower', but that is not always correct. It is also a requirement that there is a mythical origin for the plant. As such introduced plants, like the [[kalonikakala]] are no ''kakala'' despite their smell, as there is no (not yet) a myth about their origin invented.
The ''kakala'' are divided into 2 groups: the '''named or known ''kakala''''' ''(kakala hingoa, kakala ʻiloa )'', which are for the use of the chiefs, and the '''stupid ''kakala''''' ''(kakala vale)'', which are for the normal people.
==Blossoming stages== The development stages of the kakala flowers have been named. Different authorities have different lists however. #fatakau, the flowerbud is absolutely unopened, all parts are as a stick together #tangitangi, budding starts #moto, budding #fisi, flower starts to open #lūpū, flower opens further #mafola, flower completely opened #mae, withering starts #maheikau, the flower is withered now #maheilau, the flower bends down #ngangana, the flower falls
{{foki||kakala}}

page.title: Polohauaiʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Devil's apple, Spiny necklace-berry |faitā=Solanum capsicoides.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[solanales]] |familia= [[SOLANACEAE]] |genus=Solanum |species=capsicoides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carlo Allioni|All.]] |fehokotaki= }} Ko e '''polo hauaiʻi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia naʻe ʻomi ki Tonga naʻe ʻikai fuoloa. He taimí ni ʻoku ne tupu pē ʻi [[ʻEua]] mo [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]], pea ʻoku sai feʻunga, koeʻuhi ko e ʻakauvao ia mo e ngaahi talatala māsila mo fakakona. ʻOku ne mafola. Ka ʻoku sai faikahoa mei he ngaahi foʻi fua lanumoli, aʻu ki he senitimita ʻe 3.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == vakai ki he [[polo]] maʻa e lahi ngaahi polo kehekehe
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * akaaka, akaka, kīkānia lei ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) * poroʻiti taratara ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/solanum_capsicoides.htm * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=13713 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Tobacco tree, Woolly nightshade |faitā=Solanum mauritianum, flowers, fruits.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[solanales]] |familia= [[SOLANACEAE]] |genus=Solanum |species=mauritianum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Scop. |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''pula''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia (ka ʻikai lahi ange ʻi he mita siʻisiʻi pē). ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Solanum verbascifolium'' var. ''auriculatum''. ʻOku fulufulua ʻaupito ʻa e ʻakau. ʻOku lava ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lou ki her tapaka.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[polo]]; vakai heni maʻa e lahi ngaahi polo kehekehe *pula; vakai foki ki he [[fuehina]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pua nānā honua ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *rau ʻavaʻava [[lea fakakuki]]) *polo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/solanum_mauritianum.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6656 *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Piinivao
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cow pea, Wild bean |faitā=Starr_040324-0024_Macroptilium_lathyroides.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Macroptilium |species=lathyroides |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Ignatz Urban|Urb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }}{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Purple bushbean |faitā=Starr_030612-0118_Macroptilium_atropurpureum.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Macroptilium |species=atropurpureum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[de Candolle|DC.]]) [[Ignatz Urban|Urb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''piini vao''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia (piinivao kulokula) pe ko e fuʻu ʻakau totolo ia (piinivao pulū fio kulokula). Ko e [[piini]] pe [[piʻisi]] kinaua, kae ko e vao, ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻatokoni. Ko hona ʻuhinga tatau: ''Phaseolus lathyroides & atropurpureus''.
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/macroptilium_lathyroides.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/macroptilium_atropurpureum.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6359 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6358 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fetuʻupetelihema
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Star of Bethlehem |faitā=Hippobroma_longiflora.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[campanulales]] |familia= [[CAMPANULACEAE]] |genus=Hippobroma |species=longiflora |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) G.Don }} Ko e '''fetuʻu petelihema''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]], hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni ʻikai fuoloa. ʻOku fakaʻofoʻofa ʻene ʻasi, ka kona ʻaupito ʻene toʻi hinehina, koeʻuhi ko e meʻakemi ko e ''lobeline'' ʻi loto ʻi ai.
Ko hono ngaahi ʻuhinga tatau: ''Isotoma longiflora'', ''Lobelia longiflora'', ''Laurentia longiflora''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *fetiʻa (=fetuʻu) ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *pua hōkū (=pua fetuʻu) ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/hippobroma_longiflora.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6237 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Huni melanisia
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=False eranthemum |faitā=Pseuderanthemum carruthersii atropurpureum.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[ACANTHACEAE]] |genus=Pseuderanthemum |species=carruthersii |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Berthold Carl Seemann|Seem.]]) [[André Guillaumin|Guillaumin]] |fehokotaki= s }} [[Image:Pseuderanthemum carruthersii reticulatum.jpg|left|320px|thumb]] Ko e '''huni melanisia''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku manakoa ʻi he ngoue. Ko e hingoa taʻefakalakanga, koeʻuhi ʻoku tui ko e [[huni]] ia ʻe he kakai Tonga (meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi), pea naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni ʻikai fuoloa, mei hono feituʻu tupuʻanga, ko [[Niukaletonia]] mo [[Vanuatu]]. Ko e kāinga ofi ʻo e ''Pseuderanthemum'' naʻe ʻui foki ko e ''Eranthemum''.
ʻOku ʻi ai haʻane fuo kehekehe: *'''huni melanisia kelo''', ʻoku kelokelo ange (pe kulokula fio laupulū) hono lau mo hono matala (faitā toʻomataʻu). ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Pseuderanthemum atropurpureum'' (W. Bull) Radlk. *'''huni melanisia felo''', ʻoku hinehina ange hono matala pea engeenga ange hono lau (faitā toʻohema). ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Pseuderanthemum reticulatum'' Radlk. *'''huni melanisia tea''', ʻoku kulokulo mo e hinehina hono matala pea mo e tapa hinehina hono lau.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *tiare vaehau ([[lea fakakuki]], fuo kelo)
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/pseuderanthemum_carruthersii.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6579
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sikiviu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Polynesian thriller |faitā=Lalage maculosa.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[passeriformes]] |familia= [[CAMPEPHAGIDAE]] |genus=Lalage |species=maculosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Titian Peale|Peale]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sikiviu''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua mo e mafolalahia ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 15. Ko hono fulufulu ʻoku hinehina mo e melomelo maʻa e tuʻunga ʻe taha, pe hinehina mo e ʻuliʻuli maʻa e tuʻunga ʻe taha.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mafatakikoula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Golden shower tree |faitā=Cassia fistula, closeup.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |tribus=cassieae |genus=cassia |species=fistula |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mafataki koula''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia. ʻI he taimi ʻene matala (Nōvema ʻi Tongá ni), ko e tuʻuna ʻo e matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku tatau mo e mafataki ʻo e ʻuha.
[[File:Cassia fistula MHNT.BOT.2007.26.54.jpg|left|thumb|ngaahi foʻi fua moho]] == Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *[[mafatakipingikī]]
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == ʻOku ʻikai (teʻeki) ʻi ai ʻa e hingoa tuʻufonua ʻi he Pasifiki, koeʻuhi naʻe ʻomi ki heni ʻoku ʻikai fuoloa. Ka ʻoku lahi ʻi muli: ''amaltas'', ''laburnum'' (lea fakahinitī), ''dok khuen'' (lea fakatai), mo e hā fua.
== Tataku == *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5883 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/cassia_fistula.htm {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Cassia fistula
page.text: #REDIRECT[[Mafatakikoula]]

page.title: Lile kula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Barbados lily |faitā=Hippeastrum (Tonga).jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AMARYLLIDACEAE]] |genus=Hippeastrum |species=cvs. |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[William Herbert|Herb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Hippeastrum.overallview.arp.jpg|left|220px|thumb|fakakeheʻi kulokula]] Ko e '''lile kula''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga; mei he [[lea fakafalanisē]]: ''lis rouge'') ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue. Ko e meʻa lahi hono matalaʻiʻakau, ʻoku ʻi ai ha ongo fakakeheʻi mo e kulokula kotoa pe kulokula mo e hinehina. ʻOku manakoa kinaua ʻi he ngoue Tonga, pea ʻoku toe ʻa e ngaahi fakakeheʻi lahi ʻi muli.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[lile]] *[[lile veʻemoa]] *[[lile lēpati]] *[[lile kalukalu]] *[[lile pilisipeni]] *[[lile lalahi]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *riri ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6236 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/hippeastrum_puniceum.htm {{potuʻi}}

{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Brisbane lily, Cardwell lily |faitā=Proiphys amboinensis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AMARYLLIDACEAE]] |genus=Proiphys |species=amboinensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[William Herbert|Herb.]] |fehokotaki= }} Ko e '''lile pilisipeni''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga; mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue. Ko e ʻuhinga tatau: ''Eurycles amboinensis''.

page.title: Maheʻuliʻuli Tupouniua
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi|hokohoko=Tupouniua M |maama= tangata |tamai= |faʻē= |ʻaho fanauʻi=1927 |ʻaho pekia=19 ʻOkatopa 2007 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|?||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[ʻElenoa Ngataialupe Tupouniua (ʻAhomeʻe)]] |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|ʻIesina ʻo Pilolevu Fusimālohi|Sālote Mafikaunanga Naufahu|Nicolette Tuʻihaʻateiho|Sela Tupouniua|ʻOlakaʻaina Melenaite Vaka|ʻUnaloto ki Nukumaʻanu Tupouniua|Maheʻuliʻuli Sandhurst Tupouniua||}} |}}*Kalonikali Tonga, '''XLII''', 43; 1 nov 2007 Ko e palēmia leʻoleʻo ʻo Tonga ʻuluaki ko e tuʻa pē. *palēmia leʻoleʻo: Tisema 1965 *minisitā paʻanga: 1967—1972 *talekita seniale [[SPEC]]: 1972—1979, 1983—1986 *poate ki he kau hopoate ʻi [[Nuʻusila]]: 1993—1995 *fakafofonga fika 2 he kakai ʻo Tongatapu: 1996—1998

page.title: ʻElenoa Ngataialupe Tupouniua (ʻAhomeʻe)
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Tupouniua ʻAhomeʻe, ʻEN |maama= fefine |tamai= [[Tēvita Manuopangai ʻAhomeʻe]] |faʻē= [[Heuʻifanga Veikune]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe]]|Tupou Kolotolu Puloka (ʻAhomeʻe)|Kaufoʻou Falekihetoa Naufahu (ʻAhomeʻe)||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | ||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Kalolaine Taukapa Lataifalefehi Fakafānua (ʻAhomeʻe)]]|[[Viliami Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau Manuopangai]]|Vaʻetapu Melehifokivai ʻAhomeʻe|Manuopangai ʻAhomeʻe|[[ʻAmelia Lātūniua Taumoepeau-Tupou (ʻAhomeʻe)]]||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Maheʻuliʻuli Tupouniua]] |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|ʻIesina ʻo Pilolevu Fusimālohi|Sālote Mafikaunanga Naufahu|Nicolette Tuʻihaʻateiho|Sela Tupouniua|ʻOlakaʻaina Melenaite Vaka|ʻUnaloto ki Nukumaʻanu Tupouniua|Maheʻuliʻuli Sandhurst Tupouniua||}} |}}*Kalonikali Tonga, '''XLII''', 43; 1 nov 2007

page.title: Lose
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Rose |faitā=Red_rose_00090.JPG |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[rosales]] |familia= [[ROSACEAE]] |genus=rosa |species=sp. |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lose''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, ʻa ia neongo ʻoku manongi ʻaupito ʻa hono ngaahi matalaʻiʻakau ʻoku ʻikai kau ki he [[kakala]] ia. Kā ko e matalaʻiʻakau [[heliaki]] mahuʻinga taha maʻa e kau pālangi ia, ʻoku ngāueʻaki foki ʻa e heliaki ʻo e lose ʻi he [[hiva kakala]] ʻo Tonga. ʻOku ʻikai sai ʻa e tupu fuʻu lose ʻi he ʻea mafana ʻo Tongá ni.
== Tataku == *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}} [[File:A Rose 004uf.jpg|thumb|left|]] [[File:Rose desktop.jpg|thumb|left|]]

page.title: Nati
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Macadamia |faitā=Macadamia integrifolia, buds.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[proteales]] |familia= [[PROTEACEAE]] |genus=Macadamia |species=integrifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Maiden & Betche |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Macadamia integrifolia.jpg|240px|left|thumb|Ngaahi tenga]] Ko e '''nati''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]: ''nut'') ko e fuʻu ʻakau faʻiteliha ia mo e tenga lahi mo fefeka, ʻaia ko e [[niu kelekele]], [[telie]], [[ʻai]], mo e hā fua, kā ʻikai ko e [[niu]]. Kae ʻumaʻā hake ko e fuʻu ʻakau ʻeni, ʻoku ʻikai hano hingoa totonu, ʻoku ui ko e "nati".
Ko e nati ʻeni ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi mei [[ʻAositelēlia]] hahake. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e faʻahinga ʻe 8 ʻi he kāinga ofi, ʻoku ʻi ai hona tenga lahi ki he ua pē, (ko ongo nati ʻasi ʻi lalo), ʻoku ʻikai hanau tenga ki he toenga pe ʻoku kona ʻonautolu. Ko e ''Macadamia tetraphylla'' ʻoku ui ko e nati foki, ʻoku kulokula hono matalaʻiʻakau. Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku ngāueʻakiʻi ʻa e hingoá ni ki he [[pīnati]].
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *nati, nati tea, ''M. integrifolia'', matalaʻiʻakau tea, ''smooth shelled macadamia'' *nati, nati kula, ''M. tetraphylla'', matalaʻiʻakau kula, ''rough shelled macadamia''
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6353 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kāpisi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cabbage |faitā=Brassica oleracea2.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[brassicales]] |familia= [[BRASSICACEAE]] |genus=Brassica |species=oleracea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''kāpisi''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e ngaahi fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, kā ʻoku manakoa he taimí ni maʻa e meʻatokoni, pea maʻu paʻanga lahi ʻi he maketi.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *kāpisi fua, ''B. oleracea'' var. ''capitata'', {head cabbage} *kāpisi siaina, ''B. campestris'' pe ''chinensis'' = ''B. rapa'' var. ''chinensis'', {chinese cabbage, pak choi} *masitati, ''B. nigra'', {black mustard} *kolifalaoa, ''B. oleracea'' var. ''botrytis'', {cauliflower} *tenipi, ''B. rapa'' = ''B. chinensis'' var. ''rapa'', {turnip} mo e ha ngaahi fakakeheʻi lahi ange
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == *mākeke ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]], masitati) *kapisi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *kāpati ([[lea fakakuki]]) **pīnapi (kāpisi siaina)
== Tataku == *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5838 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/brassica_rapa.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fehimuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pink orchid tree |faitā=Bauhinia monandra.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |tribus=cercideae |genus=Bauhinia |species=monandra |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Wilhelm Sulpiz Kurz|Kurz]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''fehi muli''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[Matakasikali]], ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai hano hingoa tuʻufonua. ʻOku ʻikai tatau mo e [[fehi]] moʻoni, kā ʻoku ui ko e '''fehi''' ʻe he kakai Tongan, mahalo pē koeʻuhi ʻoku tātātaha ʻa e fehi moʻoni.
ʻOku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e matalaʻifehimuli, meimei tatau mo e [[ʻōhai lahi]] pe ha [[ʻoketi]], pea ʻoku ʻi ai hano matalaʻiʻakau iiki pē ki he fehi moʻoni. Kā ʻoku lahi ʻaupito (sm ʻe 20) ʻa hona ngeʻesi tenga, pea ʻoku fefeka hona ʻakau, sai maʻa e tufunga.
ʻOku mohe ʻa e ngaahi lau lolotonga he pō.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *pinē fua loloa (piini fua lōloa ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *pine ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *vae povi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pī, pine, ʻīpena ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monumanu maʻukave
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Dosidicus gigas.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum='''monumanu maʻukave''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''monumanu maʻukave''' ([[lea fakalatina]] (lea fakasaienisi): ''lophotrochozoa'') ko e vahe lahi (''superphylum'') ia ʻo e ngaahi monumanu ʻoku ʻi ai honau maʻukave ofi ki he ngutu (ko e taimi kotoa ʻi heʻenau moʻui, pē ʻi heʻenau valevale pē).
ʻOku kau ko e ngaahi '''vahe''' (''phyla'') ki he vahe lahí ni: * '''[[fingota molū]]''' (''mollusca'') ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe taha kilu tupu; (feke, fingota, …) * '''[[kelemutu mama]]''' (''annelida''); (kelemutu, …) * mo e ha ngaahi vahe kehe ʻoku siʻi ʻenau faʻahinga mo e mahuʻinga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monumanu kili talatala
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Linckia.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum='''monumanu kilikili talatala''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''monumanu kilikili talatala''' ([[lea fakalatina]] (lea fakasaienisi): ''echinodermata'') ko e vahe lahi (''superphylum'') ia ʻo e ngaahi monumanu ʻoku ʻi ai honau kilikili talatala. ʻOku ui foki '''fingota talatala''' koeʻuhi ʻoku nofo ʻa e konga lahi ange ʻi he tahi.
ʻOku kau ko e ngaahi '''vahe''' (''phyla'') ki he vahe lahí ni: * '''[[fulufuluʻātai]]''' (''crinozoa'') * '''[[mangamangaʻātai]]''' (''asterozoa'') - alamea * ''echinozoa'' ** vahe siʻi: '''[[vana]]''' (echinoidea) ** vahe siʻi: '''[[loli]]''' (holothurioidea) * ''homalozoa'' * mo e ongo vahe ko e ''pelmatozoa'' mo e ''blastozoa'', ka ʻoku na ʻauhamālie. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sukini
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Zucchini, Courgette |faitā=Zucchini.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[CUCURBITACEAE]] |genus=Cucurbita |species=pepo |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sukini''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku fuʻolahi hono foʻi fua, ʻoku sai ʻaupito ke kai. ʻOku ʻi ai ha ngaahi fakakeheʻi: ko e sukini ko e faʻahinga taha pē ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau ʻoku ui ko e ''Cucurbita pepo''. Kā ʻi Tongá ni ʻoku ʻiloa ko e sukini pē.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lētisilau
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lettuce |faitā=Iceberg lettuce (IJssla krop).jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Lactuca |species=sativa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lētisi lau''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni. ʻOku ui nounou ko e '''lētisi''' pē, ka ʻoku ʻi ai ha [[lētisifoha|lētisi]] kehe. Ko hono lau ʻoku manakoa ki he meʻatokoni. ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi fakakeheʻi.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Koko
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cacao |faitā=Cacao.jpeg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malavales]] |familia= [[STERCULIACEAE]] pe MALVACEAE |genus=Theobroma |species=cacao |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Theobroma cacao MHNT.BOT.2004.0.204.jpg|thumb|''Theobroma cacao'']]
Ko e '''koko''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, mo e ngaahi foʻi fua ʻoku nau ʻoatu ha koko ki he siokoleti. Ko e meʻa lahi ia ʻi [[Haʻamoa]], ka ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e tupu ʻi Tongá ni.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * koko ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]])
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lētisi
Lētisifoha
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Radish |faitā=Radish.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[brassicales]] |familia= [[BRASSICACEAE]] |genus=Raphanus |species=sativus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''lētisi foha''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ui nounou ko e '''lētisi''' pē, ka ʻoku ʻi ai ha [[lētisilau|lētisi]] kehe. ʻOku ngāueʻaki foki ko e ʻuhinga ko '''lātisi'''. ʻOku ne fakatupua (pea vave ʻene tupu) ʻi he ngoue Tonga pea ʻoku fakatauʻi ʻa e ngaahi foha ʻi he maketi.
==Tataku== *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fangu/en
page.text:
'''Fangu''' (and [[hina]]) are generic names for gourds or calabashes which have given their names to the daily word for ''bottle''. For long time it was believed that ''Lagenaria siceraria'' was the plant that was called ''fangu'' in Tonga and west Polynesia and ''hue'' in east Polynesia. But this was recently shown to be false, as the ''Benincasa hispida var. pruriens'' is found in the west, and the ''hue'', a different species, the ''Lagenaria siceraria'', is found in the east.
The ''fangu'' (Benincasa) is an old introduction from Maleisia. It can be eaten when green, (but it is not sweet, despite its English name, wintermelon), and it can be made into bottle when ripe and dried up. Traditionally it is still used to store scented coconut oil (''lolo'').
When the Polynesians reached South America around 500 – 1000 AD, they returned home with 2 new plants, the [[kumala]] and the ''hue'' (''Lagenaria''). The latter was found to be much superior as a bottle, that the original ''Benincasa'' almost or completely died out in the east. Especially in [[Hauaiʻi|Hawaiʻi]] and [[Lapanui|Easter island]], where there was no [[kofe|bamboo]] to make water containers, the new gourds became very important. In Hawaiʻi they even became important attributes to the hula.
{{foki||fangu}}

page.title: Fangu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bottle gourd, Calabash |faitā=Courge encore verte.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[CUCURBITACEAE]] |genus=Lagenaria |species=siceraria |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Molina) Standl. |fehokotaki= cs }} {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Wax gourd, Winter melon |faitā=W tougan4091.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[cucurbitales]] |familia= [[CUCURBITACEAE]] |genus=Benincasa |species=hispida |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carl Peter Thunberg|Thunb.]]) [[Célestin Alfred Cogniaux|Cogn.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Lagenaria siceraria var peregrina MHNT.BOT.2013.22.54.jpg|thumb|''Lagenaria siceraria var peregrina'']] Ko e '''fangu''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi mo totolo ia. ʻOku ui foki, lea fakapikopiko, ko e '''kalapasa'''. ʻI he onoʻaho ko e fangu mo e hina (ongo fuʻu ʻakau) ko e fangu pe hina (ʻaiʻanga) pē kinaua, ʻa ia hona hingoa. Ko e fangu onopooni, ʻomi ki Tongá ni ko e ''Lagenaria'' ia, sai ke kai kapau mata, sai he ʻaiʻanga kapau moho, motuʻa mo mōmoa. Kā ko e fangu onoʻaho, ko e ''Benincasa'' ia (ʻoku fakatautalaʻi ʻe Yuncker), ʻoku sai ke kai, ka saisai pē he ʻaiʻanga. ʻOku loi hono hingoa fakapilitānia: ʻoku ʻikai ha [[meleni]], ʻoku ʻikai melie, ʻoku ʻikai tupu ʻi he taimi momoko (faʻolaki pē).
Ko e ''Benincasa hispida var. pruriens'' (Polynesian wax gourd) ʻoku fuopotopoto ange, ʻikai lōloa hangē ʻi he ʻata.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[fanguʻakumā]] *[[hina (ʻakau)]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== ===Lagenaria siceraria=== *hue ([[lea fakatahisi]]) *pōhue ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *fagu ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *ʻue ([[lea fakakuki]]) ===Benincasa hispida var. pruriens=== *hue ʻaroro ([[lea fakatahisi]] fuoloa) *pōhue ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *melo ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]], mei he lea fakapilitānia: melon ?) *ʻua roro ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Toe meʻa kehe== ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngāueʻaki ʻo e fangu ʻi he faiva faka[[hauaiʻi]], ko e ''hula'', pea mo e ʻaiʻanga vai, ʻoku ui ko e ''hue''. Tatau mo [[Lapanui]]. ʻOku siʻi ange ia ʻi Polinisia hahake. Naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻa e [[kofe]] ki he ʻaiʻanga vai ʻi [[Tahisi]]. Pea ʻoku ʻikai ʻaupito (faiva mo e ʻaiʻanga vai) ʻi Tongá ni mo e Polinisia hihifo.
Mahalo pē ko e «fangu» (''Benincasa hispida'') ʻo e [[Polinisia hihifo]] ʻoku ʻikai tatau mo e «hue» (''Lagenaria siceraria'') ʻo e [[Polinisia hahake]]. Naʻe ʻomi mei [[ʻAmelika]] tonga ʻa e «hue», ka naʻe ʻomi mei [[Maleisia]] ʻa e «fangu» ʻoku fuoloa ange. ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e fangu ki he fangu [[lolo]] (vakai foki ki he [[folau ʻa Kae]]), ko e foʻi lea «roro» ʻi [[Tahisi]] mo [[ʻOtu motu Kuki]].
ʻOsi he aʻu ki ʻAmelika tonga ʻe he kau Polinisia ʻi 500 – 1000 [[T.S.]], naʻa nau foki ki ʻapi mei ai mo e ongo ʻakau foʻou: ko e [[kumala]] mo e «hue». Ko ia ai, naʻe ʻikai ʻilo ʻa e «hue» ʻi Polinisia hihifo. Ko ia ai foki, ʻilo ʻoku sai ange ʻa e «hue» ki he ʻaiʻanga, naʻe pulia ʻa e fangu mei he ngaahi feituʻu ē.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6307 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5817 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/showarticle.asp?id=16 *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{English|abstract}} {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lolo
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
Ko e '''lolo''' onopooni ko e ngako pe huni ʻoku tafe, ngāueʻaki maʻa e ngaahi mīsini.
Ko '''Lolo''' ko e kiʻi motu ia → [[Lolo (Vavaʻu)]]
Ka ko e '''lolo''' moʻoni mo fakatonga, ko e '''lolo milimili''' pe '''lolo pani''' ia, maʻu mei he tatau niu, pea tuku pē ha ngaahi [[kakala]] ʻi ai maʻa ʻene manongi. [[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: ʻAselola
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Acerola |faitā=Malpighia glabra2.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[malpighiales]] |familia= [[MALPIGHIACEAE]] |genus=Malpighia |species=glabra |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''ʻaselola''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau lahi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni. ʻOku sai ke kai hono foʻi fua, meimei tatau mo e [[ʻāpele]] siʻi.
== Tataku == * Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Malpighia glabra
page.category: Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina

page.title: Siasi Māmonga
page.category: Lotu
page.text:
[[File:Nuku_alofa_Tonga_Temple_2007-11-17.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko honau fale fakataha lahi taha ʻi [[Matangiake]] (Liahona).]] Ko e '''Siasi Māmonga''', (Mormon church), pe '''Siasi ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi ʻo e kau māʻoniʻoni he ngaahi ʻaho ki mui ní''' ko e taha ʻo e [[ngaahi siasi ʻi Tonga]].
Naʻe fokotuʻu ʻi Tongá ni ʻi 1891, ʻa ia ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi siasi motuʻa ange ʻi ai.
Ko [[Tupou Moheofo]] ko ʻenau mēmipa ʻuluaki ʻo e fale ʻalo.
Ko ʻenau akoʻanga māʻolunga: ko '''Liahona''' ʻi [[Matangiake]], mo '''Saineha''' ʻi [[Neiafu]]. Mo e ngaahi akoʻanga lotoloto ʻe niʻihi: * Liahona Middle School * ʻEua Middle School * Havelu Middle School * Saineha Middle School * Pangai Middle School * Pakilau Middle School Ko e teunga ʻo e tamasiʻi mo e taʻahine ako: lanumata mo e ongo matatohi hinehina ʻi lalo.
[https://www.lds.org/study?lang=ton Siasi ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi ʻo e kau māʻoniʻoni he ngaahi ʻaho ki mui ní website] {{potuʻi}}
[[Category:Lotu]]

page.title: Matavaikula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Coral plant, Fountain bush |faitā=Russelia equisetiformis.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[PLANTAGINACEAE]] |genus=Russelia |species=equisetiformis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Diederich Franz Leonhard von Schlechtendal|Schlecht.]] & [[Adelbert von Chamisso|Cham.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''matavai kula''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá, pea ʻoku manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue Tonga.
ʻOua e maveu mo e [[teʻekosi sivilaise]] pe [[fuekulaʻahoʻaho]]. Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Russelia juncea''. Ko e hingoa kāinga ʻo e ''Scrophulariaceae'' ʻoku ʻikai ke toe ngāueʻaki.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *tamafine ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *menemene ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6614 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/russelia_equisetiformis.htm *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lile lēpati
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Blackberry lily |faitā=Belamcanda chinensis 2007.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[IRIDACEAE]] |genus=Belamcanda |species=chinensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[A. P. de Candolle|DC.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lile lēpati''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[Siaina]] pe [[ʻInitia]]. ʻOku tupu ʻi he ngaahi ngoue Tonga.
ʻOku lahi hono ʻuhinga, [lea fakapilitānia]: ''leopard lily'' pe ''leopard plant'' (meʻapango, ko e hingoa ''leopard lily'' ʻoku ʻosi ngāueʻaki maʻa e ngaahi ''dieffenbachia''); [ [[lea fakalātina]]]: ''B. punctata'', ''Gemmingia chinensis'', ''Iris chinensis'', ''Ixia chinensis'', ''Morea chinensis'', ''Pardanthus chinensis''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[lile kalukalu]] *[[lile veʻemoa]] *[[lile pilisipeni]] *[[lile kula]] *[[lile]] *[[lile lalahi]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *lili taika, riri ʻōketi ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5815 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lile kalukalu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White spider lily |faitā=Hymenocallis littoralis 001.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AMARYLLIDACEAE]] |genus=Hymenocallis |species=littoralis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Nicolaus Joseph von Jacquin|Jacq.]]) [[Richard Anthony Salisbury|Salisb.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lile kalukalu''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku ʻi ai hano kiʻi kalukalu ʻi he lauʻimatala.
Ko e foha ʻo e lile kotoa ʻoku fakamate ʻaupito. ʻOku meimei tatau mo e ''Hymenocallis pedalis''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[lile]] *[[lile veʻemoa]] *[[lile pilisipeni]] *[[lile kula]] *[[lile lēpati]] *[[lile lalahi]]
