page.title: Siolaʻā mekesikō
Siolaʻā siʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Tree marigold |faitā=Tithonia diversifolia.JPG |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Tithonia |species=diversifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[William Botting Hemsley|Hemsl.]]) [[Asa Gray|A. Gray]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''siolaʻā siʻi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻa e ʻasi ʻa hono matala ki he [[siolaʻā]] ʻe taha, kā ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange, mahalo pe senitimita ʻe 5 pē, pea mo e kāinga ofi kehe.
ʻOku lahi ʻene tupu ʻi [[:Category:Vavaʻu|Vavaʻu]] pē, naʻe ʻomi mei [[ʻAmelika]] loto.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[siolaʻā]] *[[siolaʻā mekesikō]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *matalā, matalaʻa ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *pua renga (=pua engeenga), tiare rengarenga, kavakava ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/tithonia_diversifolia.htm *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6206 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Talupite ulo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Flaming-trumpet vine |faitā=Pyrostegia venusta3.JPG |faitālaulahi= 290px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[BIGNONIACEAE]] |genus=Pyrostegia |species=venusta |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[John Bellenden Ker Gawler|Ker Gawl.]]) [[John Miers|Miers]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''talupito ulo''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi mo totolo ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni mei [[ʻAmelika]] tonga, ʻoku ʻikai fuoloa. ʻOku sai maʻa e ʻā ʻo e vaokakala.
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6594 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Toloa
page.text: {{Fakaʻuhingakehe}} *ko e pupunga fetuʻu ʻiloa (''crux'') → [[Toloa (pupunga)]] *ko e feituʻu ʻi Tongatapu → [[Toloa (Tongatapu)]] *ko e manupuna vai (''anas'') → [[Toloa (manupuna)]]

page.title: Toloa (manupuna)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pacific black duck |faitā=Pacific black duck bibra wa gnangarra.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[anseriformes]] |familia= [[ANATIDAE]] |genus=Anas |species=superciliosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]] 1789 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''toloa''' (''A. superciliosa'' var. ''pelewensis'') ko e manupuna tuʻufonua mo e mafolalahia ʻi Tongá ni ia. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 50. ʻOku ne nofo ofi ki he ngaahi anovai (vai melie).
ʻOku ui foki ko e '''pato''', ka mahalo pē ko e [[pato]] ko e faʻahinga kehe ia. == Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Humu
Humu (ika)
page.text:
Ko e '''humu''' ko e faʻahinga ika ʻi moana ia ''([[lea fakalatina]]: (kāinga) balistidae, [[lea fakapilitānia]]: triggerfish).''
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Malau
page.text: {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Tongan megapode |faitā=MegapodiusPritchardiiBuller.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[galliformes]] |familia= [[MEGAPODIIDAE]] |genus=Megapodius |species=pritchardii |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[John Edward Gray|Gray]] 1864 }} Ko e '''malau''' ko e manupuna ia, mahalo pē ko e fakaʻilonga fakafonua ʻo Tonga. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 28. Naʻa ne nofo pē ʻi he motu moʻungaafi ko [[Niuafoʻou]], ka naʻe hikiʻi foki ki [[Fonualei (moʻungaafi)|Fonualei]]. == Tataku == *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}} [[File:Malau.jpg|thumb|left|320px|ko e kiʻi malau ʻi he sitapa lītohi mei Niuafoʻou]]

page.title: Manupuna
page.category: Ngaahi tohi hokohoko
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Bird.parts.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= '''manupuna''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e '''manupuna''' ko e monumanu filo siliva ia mo e toto mafana. ʻOku ne kau ki he haʻa lahi ʻo e monumanu veʻefā. Ka ʻoku toe pē ʻa e vaʻe ʻe ua moʻoni (ko e ongo vaʻe ʻi mui) ki he manupuna kotoa pē, pea naʻe liliu ʻa e vaʻe ʻi muʻa ki he ongo kapakau. ʻOku lahi ange ʻo e fanga manupuna ʻoku lava ke nau puna.
==Ko e ngaahi manupuna ʻi Tongá ni== ===manupuna matātahi fakafonua=== *[[motuku foʻou]], ''Egretta novaehollandiae'', ''Ardea novaehollandiae'' *[[motuku lahi]], ''Egretta sacra'' *[[motuku siʻi]], ''Butorides striatus'' (ʻauhē) *[[pato]], ?, ''Anas acuta'' (ʻauhē) *[[toloa (manupuna)|toloa]], ''Anas superciliosa''
===manupuna ʻuta=== *[[fuiva]], ''Clytorhynchus vitiensis'' *[[fuleheu]], ''Foulehaio carunculata'' *[[henga]], ''Vini australis'' *[[hengehenga]], ''Pachycephala jacquinoti'' (ʻi Tongá ni pē) *[[kalae]], ''Porphyrio porphyrio'' *[[kaleva]], ''Eudynamys taitensis'' *[[kōkī]], kakā, ''Prosopeia tabuensis'' *[[kulukulu (manupuna)|kulukulu]], ''Ptilinopus porphyraceus'' *[[lulu]], ''Tyto alba'' *[[lupe]], ''Ducula pacifica'' *[[lupe pālangi]], ''Columba livia'' *[[malau]], ''Megapodius pritchardii'' (ʻi Tongá ni pē) *[[manufoʻou]], ''Pycnonotus cafer'' *[[manumaʻa]], ''Ptilinopus perousii'' *[[misi]], ''Aplonis tabuensis'' *[[misi pālangi]], ''Sturnus vulgaris'' *[[moa kaivao]], ''Gallus gallus'' *[[moho (manupuna)|moho]], ''Porzana tabuensis'' *[[ngutuenga]], ''Acridotheres fuscus'' *[[pekepeka (manupuna)|pekepeka]], ''Hirundo tahitica'' *[[pekepekatea]], ''Aerodramus spodiopygius'' *[[sikiviu]], ''Lalage maculosa'' *[[sikotā]], ''Todirhamphus chloris'' *[[taiseni]], ''Circus approximans'' *[[tu]], ''Gallicolumba stairi'' *[[veka]], ''Gallirallus philippensis''
===manupuna tuʻafanga=== *[[tavake|ekiaki]], hinaekiaki, ko e tavake mui, ʻoku hina *[[katafa lalahi]], ''Diomedea exulans'' (ʻauhē) *[[katafa ʻuli]], ''Macronectes giganteus'' (ʻauhē) *[[lafu kapakauʻuliʻuli]], ''Pterodroma nigripennis'' *[[lafu afā]] ''Nesofregetta fuliginosa'' *[[lafu fakamelomelo]], ''Pterodroma arminjoniana'' *[[lafu houma]], ''Daption capense'' *[[lafu ikunonou]], ''Puffinus tenuirostris'' *[[lafu kiutea]], ''Pterodroma cervicalis'' *[[lafu kola]], ''Pterodroma brevipes'' (ʻauhē) *[[lafu lavilavi]], ''Puffinus griseus'' *[[lafu puli]] ''Puffinus bulleri'' (ʻauhē) *[[lafu tahisi]], ''Pterodroma rostrata'', ''Pseudobulweria rostrata'' *[[lafu tea]], ''Pterodroma alba'' (ʻauhē) *[[lafu ʻata]], ''Pterodroma neglecta'' *[[lafu ʻileʻila]], ''Pterodroma inexpectata'' *[[lofa lalahi]], helekosi, ''Fregata minor'' *[[lofa iiki]], helekosi, ''Fregata ariel'' *[[manuʻuli]], lafu, teiko ''Puffinus pacificus'' *[[ngongo (manupuna)|ngongo]], ''Anous'', ''Procelsterna'' **[[ngongo melomelo]], ''Anous stolidus'' **[[ngongo ʻuliʻuli]], ''Anous minutus'' **[[ngongo pulupulū]], ''Procelsterna cerulea'' **[[ngongo lavilavi]], ''Procelsterna albivitta'' *[[ngutulei]], ''Sula'' **[[ngutulei veʻekula]], ''Sula sula'' **[[ngutulei melomelo]], ''Sula leucogaster'' **[[ngutulei fakapūloaʻi]], ''Sula dactylatra'' *[[tala]], ''Sternidae'' (''Sterninae'') **[[tala lalahi]], ''Sterna bergii'' **[[tala tuʻakiuʻuli]], ''Sterna sumatrana'' **[[tala tuʻalavilavi]] ''Sterna lunata'' **[[tala piti]], ''Sterna anaethetus'' **[[tala tea]] ''Gygis alba'' **[[talatā]], talatahi, ''Sterna fuscata'' *[[tavake toto]], ''Phaethon rubricauda'' *[[tavake]], ''Phaethon lepturus'' *[[teiko]], ''Puffinus lherminieri'' * ''Stercorarius pomarinus'' (ʻauhē) * ''Stercorarius maccormicki'' (ʻauhē) * ''Stercorarius parasiticus'' (ʻauhē)
===manupuna matātahi mei muli=== *[[kiu]], ''Scolopacidae'' **[[kiu foaʻunga]], ''Numenius tahitiensis'' **[[kiu foaʻunga kula]], ''Limosa lapponica'' **[[kiu koula]], ''Pluvialis fulva'' **[[kiu tea]], ''Tringa incana'', (''Heteroscelus incanus'') **[[kiu vave]], ''Calidris alba'' **[[kiu vaʻesiʻi]], ''Arenaria interpres''
===manupuna kehe=== *fata *heku *kō *kueili *kula *kuusi *lefulefu *liliko *moalulu *mūtuʻu *pīpī *tengetenga *tukau
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga *J.F. Clements, Birds of the World: a Checklist. Cornell University Press, 880; 2000; ISBN 0934797161
[[Category:Ngaahi tohi hokohoko]]

page.title: Manufoʻou
Fuiva
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Fiji Shrikebill |faitā=Beitrag zur fauna Centralpolynesiens. Ornithologie der Viti-, Samoa- und Tonga-inselnPl8.jpg |faitālaulahi= 280px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[passeriformes]] |familia= [[MONARCHIDAE]] |genus=Clytorhynchus |species=vitiensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Gustav Hartlaub|Hartlaub]] 1866 |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''fuiva''' ko e manupuna ʻi Tongá ni pea mo [[Fisi]] mo [[Haʻamoa]], nofo ʻi he vaotā ʻi he ngaahi motu siʻi pē, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai faingofua ʻene ʻilo. ʻOku holo hifo ange hono lahi.
Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 19. Ko e manupuna ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he ʻata mataʻu.
Vakai foki ki he [[manufoʻou]].
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Sikotā
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Collared kingfisher |faitā=Collared Kingfisher.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[coraciiformes]] |familia= [[HALCYONIDAE]] |genus=Todirhamphus |species=chloris |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Pieter Boddaert|(Boddaert]] 1783 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''sikotā''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua mo e mafolalahia ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 20. ʻOku ne tao mo hono ngutu ʻa e ngaahi ika kiʻi mei he ano tongo, kā ʻoku lata ʻi ʻuta foki.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Heletui fakasepeni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Spanish dagger |faitā=Yucca gloriosa 10.JPG |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AGAVACEAE]] |genus=Yucca |species=gloriosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''heletui fakasepeni''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga, mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni, ʻoku ʻilo ʻi he ngaahi ngoue ʻe niʻihi pē. ʻOku ui foki ko e '''ʻakau fuaʻimoa''' koeʻuhi ʻoku tatau ʻa e fuo mo hono lahi ʻa e ngaahi foʻi fua mo ha fuaʻimoa. Ka ʻoku ʻikai tatau mo e [[paingani]], ko e ''egg plant'' ʻi he lea fakapilitania.
ʻOku masila ʻaupito ʻa e hikuhiku ʻa hono ngaahi lau (kiʻi lanupulū), tatau mo ha heletui, ʻa ia ko hono hingoa.
ʻOku meimei tatau mo e ''Yucca aloifolia'', kā ko hono lau ʻoku lanumata ange (ki he kaveinga ʻo e engeenga), ʻoku ʻikai aʻu ki he lanupulū. ʻOku teʻeki ʻene ʻomi ki Tongá ni.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * koke, tiare kīona ([[lea fakakuki]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6796{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Fāʻonelua
page.category: Hisitōlia
page.text:
Ko e '''fāʻonelua''' ko e ʻakau ʻiloa ia tuʻu ʻi he toafa ʻo [[Lapaha]]. Ko e [[tongo]] ia, kā mahalo pē ko e faʻahinga kehe, koeʻuhi ʻoku kulokula ʻaupito hono foʻi matalaʻiʻakau.
ʻOku toe ʻa e fāʻonelua ʻe taha, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he kolo ʻo ʻUiha ʻi [[ʻUiha]], kā ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e kulokula ʻa hono matalaʻiʻakau.
ʻI he onoʻaho ʻoku ngofua pē ki he [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ke ne tui ʻa e [[kahoa kakala]] ʻo e matalaʻiʻakau pehē. ʻA ia naʻe hoko ʻa e Fāʻonelua ki he [[heliaki]] ʻo e Tuʻi Tonga.
[[Image:Fāʻonelua.jpg|center|400px|thumb|ʻOku kulokula ʻaupito ʻa e matalaʻitongo ʻi Lapaha]] [[Category:Hisitōlia]]

page.title: Kiu koula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pacific golden plover |faitā=Pluvialis fulvaUSFWS003413A.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[kiu|CHARADRIIDAE]] |genus=Pluvialis |species=fulva |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], [[1789]]) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''kiu''' (pe '''kiu koula''' ki he fakaʻehiʻehi maveuveu) ko e manupuna ʻoku ʻasi fakataʻu ʻi he kotoa ʻo Tongá ni mei he Sēpitema ki ʻEpeleli. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 25. Ko hono fulufulu ʻoku saisai, ʻoku engeenga pē kā ʻoku kamata ʻene hoihoifua mo e fulufulu ʻuliʻuli ʻi he taimi fakafānau pea ʻe ʻalu ia ki he tokelau mamaʻo, ki he ngaahi toafa momoko ʻo [[Sipēlia]] mo [[ʻAlasika]]. Ko ʻene folau ʻoku lahi ange ʻi he kuata ʻo e fuatakai māmani, kilomita ʻe taha mano tupu, tuʻoua ʻi he taʻu !
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kiu tea
Kiu vave
Kiu vaʻesiʻi
Kiu foaʻunga kula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bartailed godwit |faitā=BartailedGodwit24.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[kiu|SCOLOPACIDAE]] |genus=Limosa |species=lapponica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Bar-tailed Godwit migration.jpg|left|thumb|300px|Ko e folau mei Nuʻusila ki Siaina ʻi he tikite fakaʻilonga satelaite]] [[File: Limosa lapponica MHNT.jpg|thumb|'' Limosa lapponica '']]
Ko e '''kiu foaʻunga''' (pe '''kiu foaʻunga kula''' ki he fakaʻehiʻehi maveuveu) ko e manupuna ʻoku ʻasi fakataʻu ʻi he Sēpitema ki ʻEpeleli, kā ʻoku hāhāmolofia. Ko hono nofoʻanga ʻoku faʻa fai, ko [[Nuʻusila]] ia. Kā ʻoku ne folau kilomita taha mano tupu ki [[Siaina]] pea fakafānau ʻi ai (mo e ngaahi feituʻu in [[ʻEulope]] mo e hā fua). Ko e folau lōloa taha ʻo e faʻahinga manupuna kotoa ʻo māmani.
Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 39. ʻOku piko hake hono ngutu. ʻOku saisai pē hono fulufulu, ka ʻoku hoko hoihoifua ʻaupito mo e kulokula ʻi lalo ʻi he taimi fakafānau (hā ʻi he faitā).
ʻOku ui ko e ''kūaka'' ʻi he [[lea fakamauli]].
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

Fuleheu

Longolongoʻuha
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=purple sow thistle |faitā=Emilia sonchifolia Blanco2.282.png |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Emilia |species=sonchifolia |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]]) [[Augustin Pyrame de Candolle|DC.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=common sow thistle |faitā=Sonchus oleraceus Sturm49.jpg |faitālaulahi= 240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asterales]] |familia= [[ASTERACEAE]] |genus=Sonchus |species=oleraceus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''longolongoʻuha''' ko e (ngaahi) fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni naʻe fuoloa (''Sonchus'', ko e taʻuteau hono 19, ''Emilia'' mahalo pē ko e taʻuteau hono 20). ʻOku tupu he taimí ni ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu vao kotoa pē.''
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[tupuʻa]], ʻoku ui foki ko e longolongoʻuha
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *puha, pualele, pupu lele ([[lea fakaniuē]]) *pualele ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]]) *fua lele liliʻi, fualele, pualele ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pūʻā, puā ([[lea fakakuki]]) *se vuka (''Emilia'', [[lea fakafisi]]) **cadavu (''Sonchus'')
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6101 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6664 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/sonchus_oleraceus.htm *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/emilia_sonchifolia.htm *Hokohoko ngaahi ʻakau; Vaʻa fekumi ngoue Vainī *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻOketihina
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Spider orchid |faitā=Spider orchis.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[ʻoketi|ʻOKETI]] |subfamilia=[[epidendroideae]] |tribus=[[vandeae]] |genus=Arachnis |species=maingayi |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (J.D.Hooker) |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''ʻoketi hina''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga)(mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ko e [[ʻoketi]], ʻomi ki Tongá ni, manakoa ʻi he ngaahi ngoue Tonga.
Ko hono ngaahi ʻuhinga tatau: ''Arachnis × maingayi'' (ʻoku sai ange ia, koeʻuhi ʻoku paʻa ʻa e ʻakaú ni), ''Arachnis hookeriana'', ''Arachnis flos-aeris''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻōketi, ʻōkita ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5760 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻOketi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Orchidaceae |faitā=PhalaenopsisOphrysPaphiopedilumMaxillaria.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= '''ʻOKETI''' |genus= |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Antoine Laurent de Jussieu|Juss.]] }} Ko e ngaahi '''ʻoketi''' pe '''ʻokita''' ko e kāinga ia mo e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻoku kau ki ai ko e ua mano tupu. Ko e kāinga lahi taha ia ʻo e vahe ʻakau matala.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi ʻoketi taʻehingoa fakatonga, koeʻuhi naʻa nau ʻomi ki Tongá ni. Ka ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻiloa ʻoku kau ki ai: * [[kumukumutahi]] * [[vanila]] * [[ʻoketihina]] * [[ʻutoʻuto]]
Taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku na ui ko e ʻoketi, koeʻuhi ʻoku makehe hona matalaʻiʻakau, ka ʻoku ʻikai kau ki ai: [[fehimuli]], [[ʻōhai lahi]].
== Tataku == * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lile lalahi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red crinum lily |faitā=Starr_030807-0090_Crinum_sp..jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[AMARYLLIDACEAE]] |genus=Crinum |species=augustum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Roxborough|Roxb.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''lile lalahi''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻomi ki Tongá ni. ʻOku tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e ongo [[lile]] (ʻa ia ko e '''tolotalo''' mo e '''samoa'''), ka ʻoku kulokula ange pea oku lalahi ange.
Ko hono ʻuhinga tatau: ''Crinum × augustum'' (ʻoku sai ange ia, koeʻuhi ʻoku ne paʻa), ''Crinum amabile'' var. ''augustum''.
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *[[lile]] *[[lile kalukalu]] *[[lile veʻemoa]] *[[lile pilisipeni]] *[[lile kula]] *[[lile lēpati]]
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *riri ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=5989 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Taiseni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pacific harrier |faitā=SwampHarrierBuller.jpg |faitālaulahi= 280px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[falconiformes]] |familia= [[ACCIPITRIDAE]] |genus=Circus |species=approximans |fakamoʻoniʻanga= Peale,1848 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[Image:Tonga 1998 50s.jpg|left|320px|thumb]] Ko e '''taiseni''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua ʻi Tongá ni, ka ʻoku nofo pē mamaʻo mei he kakai: [[Tofua]], [[Kao]], [[ʻAta]], [[Niuafoʻou]]. Neongo ʻoku ʻilo taimiʻ e niʻihi ʻi Tongatapu. Ko e manupuna kai kiki. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 55.
ʻOku ui ''kāhu'' ʻe he kau [[Mauli]] ʻi [[Aotealoa]]. ==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kalae
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Purple swamphen |faitā=Porphyro porphyrio.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[gruiformes]] |familia= [[RALLIDAE]] |genus=Porphyrio |species=porphyrio |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]] 1758 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''kalae''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua mo e mafolalahia. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 37. ʻOku kulokula ʻa hono ngutu mo e laʻe pea lanupulū fesiʻifekika hono fulufulu ʻi muʻa. ʻOku ne nofo ʻi he vao mo e ano.
ʻOku ne ui ko e '''pūkeko''' ʻi he lea [[fakamauli]]. == Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kaleva
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Longtailed cuckoo |faitā=Eudynamistaitensis.jpg |faitālaulahi=250px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[cuculiformes]] |familia= [[CUCULIDAE]] |genus=Eudynamys |species=taitensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Anders Sparrman|Sparrman]], 1787) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''kaleva''' pe '''kaleveleva''' ko e manupuna ʻoku nofo pē ʻi Tongá ni, ʻi he taimi momoko (ʻEpeleli ki ʻOkatopa]]. Ko e toenga ʻo e taʻu ʻoku nofo ia ʻi [[Nuʻusila]] pē pea ʻoku ne fakafanau ʻi ai. Ko e anga ʻo fakafanau ʻo e ngaahi ''[[cuculiformes]]'' ko e kainikavea kinautolu. ʻOku nau fakatō ʻi he pununga ʻo e manupuna kehe. Pea ʻoku fehiʻa kinautolu ʻe he fanga manupuna siʻi. ʻOku ʻikai te ne fakafanau ʻa e kaleva ʻi Tonga ni, neongo ʻoku fehiʻa ʻi ai ʻe he fanga kiʻi manupuna kehe.
Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 40. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Urodynamis taitensis''. ʻOku ui '''koekoeā''' ʻi [[Nuʻusila]]. ==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Misi pālangi
Misi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Polynesian starling |faitā=Polynesian Starling.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[passeriformes]] |familia= [[STURNIDAE]] |genus=Aplonis |species=tabuensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1788) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''misi''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua mo mafolalahia ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu meimei kotoa pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 19.
== Tataku == *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lulu
Ngutuenga
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Jungle mynah |faitā=Jungle Myna (Acridotheres fuscus) on Kapok (Ceiba pentandra) in Kolkata I IMG 1340.jpg |faitālaulahi=250px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[passeriformes]] |familia= [[STURNIDAE]] |genus=Acridotheres |species=fuscus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Georg Wagler|Wagler]], 1827) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ngutu enga''' ko e manupuna ʻomi, mahalo pē mei [[Fisi]] ʻi 1980 nai. ʻOku nofo ʻi [[Niuafoʻou]] pē. ʻOku lahi ʻi Fisi, ʻomi mei [[ʻInitia]]. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 21.
== Tataku == *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Moa kaivao
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red junglefowl |faitā=Red junglefowl hm.jpg |faitālaulahi=340px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[galliformes]] |familia= [[PHASIANIDAE]] |genus=Gallus |species=gallus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Gallus gallus MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.5.11.jpg|thumb| ''Gallus gallus'']] Ko e '''moa kaivao''' ko e manupuna ʻomi ki Tongá ni naʻe fuoloa. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 60. ʻOku ne toi ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu vao lahi, nofo pē ʻi he ngaahi motu vaotā. ʻOku ne lava fakafānau mo e fanga moa tauhi lālata (''Gallus gallus domesticus'').
== Tataku == *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Veka
Moho (manupuna)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Spotless crake |hingoa=Moho |faitā=MarshCrake SpotlessCrake.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[gruiformes]] |familia= [[RALLIDAE]] |genus=Porzana |species=tabuensis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1766 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''moho''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua i Tongá ni ka ʻoku ʻikai mafolalahia. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 15. ʻOku ne lata ʻi he vao fihi, pea ʻe ʻikai vave ʻene ʻasi ki he kakai. ʻOku ʻilo pē ʻi [[Niuafoʻou]], [[Late]] pea mo [[Hunga (Haʻapai)|Hunga Haʻapai]].
ʻOku kau ki he kāinga tatau mo e [[veka]], ko e manupuna lahi ange mo ʻiloa ange.
Ko e manupuna toʻomataʻu pē ʻi he ʻata.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lilevai
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Water lily |faitā=B103 pondi700.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[nymphaeales]] |familia= [[NYMPHAECEAE]] |genus=Nymphaea |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''lile vai''' (mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]]) ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku maʻanu ʻi he vai melie, ʻomi ki Tongá ni. ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga mo e ngaahi fakakeheʻi fakatupu.
Ko e faʻahinga ʻi he ʻata mahalo pē ko e ''Nymphaea pubescens'' ?? ʻOku nau tupu ʻi he ano ʻo [[ʻAtenisi]].
ʻOku ʻikai ko e [[lile]] moʻoni ia, ko e ngaahi lile moʻoni ʻoku nau kau ki he haʻa [[lautengaʻitaha]].
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * riri vai, riri moevai (=lile mohe vai) ([[lea fakakuki]]) ''Nymphaea capensis cvs.'' (vakai foki ki he [[hainitevai]])
== Tataku == * http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6445 * http://www.hear.org/pier/species/nymphaea_spp.htm * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Nymphaea spp
page.category: Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina
page.text: #REDIRECT[[lilevai]] [[Category:Tohi hokohoko ʻo e fanga meʻamoʻui ko honau hingoa fakalatina]]

page.title: Pīkula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Yellow paper wasp |faitā= Polistes olivaceus.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum= [[veʻehokohoko]] |classis= [[ʻinisēkite]] |subclassis = kapakau |superordo= kapakau tupu ʻi loto |ordo = [[kapakau kalukalu]] |subordo = [[apocrita]] |familia= [[VESPIDAE]] |genus= Polistes |species= olivaceus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Pierre Latreille|Latreille]], 1802 }} Ko e '''pī''' pe '''pī kula''' ko e kiʻi monumanu ia. ʻOku mamahi ʻaupito ʻene nifo (ʻoku ʻikai ha nifo ʻi he ngutu, ka ko hono tole ʻi mui ʻoku uʻu.) Ko hono hingoa mei he [[lea fakapilitānia]] ko e ''bee'', ko e [[ʻinisēkite]] ʻe taha meimei tatau ʻene hā, ka ʻoku fai hone, ʻa ia ʻoku ui ko e [[hone]] ʻi he lea fakatongá.
Ko e meʻa fakatāfuʻua honau fale, ko e pununga. Naʻe fai ʻe kinautolu mei he pepa ʻi he fuo ʻo e ngaahi tapaono.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *rango pātia (=lango uʻu), rango pao, koʻonga ([[lea fakakuki]])
==Tataku== *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=9369 *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward
==Tokanga== ''Vakai ki he [[pī kula]] (pe pī fisi) maʻa e fuʻu ʻakau mo hono ʻū pī.'' {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻinisēkite
page.link: liliu fakalakalaka ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Insects |faitā= Catagramma cynosura.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum= [[veʻehokohoko]] |classis= '''ʻinisēkite''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e fanga ʻinisēkite ko e haʻa ʻe taha ia ʻo e haʻa lahi ko e '''veʻeono''' (hexapoda). Ko e ngaahi haʻa kehe ʻoku nau kau ki ai, ko e monumanu: * '''ʻinisēkite''' (''insecta'') * '''hiku lōua''' (''diplura'') * '''moeʻi''' (''protura) * '''hiku puna''' (''entognatha'') * '''hiku fulufulu''' (''thysanura'') ka ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻi he ngaahi haʻa mui ʻe fā laungā ki he haʻa ʻuluaki, ko e fanga ʻinisēkite moʻoni.
ʻOku pehē ʻe he kau saienisi ʻe taha, ko e ngaahi haʻa mui ʻe fā ʻasi ʻi ʻolunga, ko e ngaahi haʻa siʻi ange kinautolu ʻoku kau ki he ʻinisēkite. Ko e pupunga ia ʻo e '''taʻekapakau''' (''apterygota''), ko e ʻinisēkite moʻoni ʻoku nau kau ki he '''kapakau''' (''pterygota''); ko e ongo haʻa siʻi ia.
Kā he taimí ni, ʻoku tui ʻe he kau saienisi ʻa e hiku fulufulu, ʻoku kau ki he ʻinisēkite, ha holongā lahi ʻe taha, neongo ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai hanau kapakau.
ʻAia ko e ngaahi ʻinisēkite moʻoni kātoa ʻoku ono honau vaʻe mo e fā honau kapakau, neongo naʻe mole ʻe he fanga ʻinisēkite ʻe niʻihi ʻa e kapakau ʻe ua pe fā ʻi he [[liliu fakalakalaka ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga]]. Ko honau hingoa mei he [[lea fakalatina]], ko e ʻuhinga ia ko ''in sector'', ʻa ia ʻoku vahevaheʻi honau sino ʻi he konga ʻe tolu.
Ko e haʻa ʻo e ʻinisēkite (pe haʻa siʻi ʻo e ʻinisēkite kapakau), ʻoku vahevaheʻi ʻi he ongo holongā lahi: * '''hiku fulufulu''' (mahalo pē, vakai ki ʻolunga) * '''kapakau tupu ʻi tuʻa''' pe '''liliu sino fakakonga''' (''exopterygota'' pe ''hemimetabola'') ** holongā ʻe 15 mo e ha ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe 130000 kei moʻui mo e lahi naʻe ʻauhamālie * '''kapakau tupu ʻi loto''' pe '''liliu sino kakato''' (''endopterygota'' pe ''holometabola'') ** holongā ʻe 11 mo e ha ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe 680000 kei moʻui mo e lahi naʻe ʻauhamālie * '''[[kisikisi]]''' (''odonata'') ** ʻoku vahevaheʻi mavahe koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻikai te nau lava ke pikoʻi honau kapakau ʻi olunga sino
== Lea fakatonga == Naʻe ʻikai vahevaheʻi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo e ʻinisēkite ʻi he ʻulungāanga Tonga onoʻaho. Ko e ngaahi lea naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻe he kakai Tonga, ʻoku nau kau ki he ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo e ʻinisēkite pe ha ngaahi veʻehokohoko kehe: * [[ane]] (ko ha hiku fulufulu, mo e kiʻi mū foki) * [[mū]] * [[līfio]] * [[pepe]] * [[heʻe]] * [[ʻunufe]] * [[kisikisi]] * [[mokohula]], kamā * [[pīkula]] * [[hone]] * [[ʻuanga]] * [[lango]] * [[namu]] * [[ʻungongo]] * [[tunga]] * [[ʻofato]] * [[kutu]], [[liha]] * [[tuma]] * [[mokomokotuʻaniu]] * [[mongomonga]] * [[fonu]] * [[tongoi]] * [[lō]]
ko e ngaahi [[veʻehokohoko]] kehe, ka ʻoku ʻikai kau ki he veʻeono. * [[hina]] * [[molokau]] * [[ʻunufe kula]]
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Pekepeka (manupuna)
Pekepekatea
Tu
Kulukulu (manupuna)
Manumaʻa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Many coloured fruitdove |faitā= Manycoloured fruitdove male bobbys.JPG |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[columbiformes]] |familia= [[COLUMBIDAE]] |genus=Ptilinopus |species=perousii |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Titian Peale|Peale]], 1848 |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''manumaʻa''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua ʻi Tongá ni, ka ʻoku tātātahi he taimí ni. ʻOku lahi pē ʻene toe ʻi he vaotātā ʻo [[Late]]. Pea ʻoku ne nofo foki ʻi [[Haʻamoa]], [[Niuē]], mo [[Fisi]]. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 23. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[kulukulu (manupuna)|kulukulu]]. Ko ʻene tangi ko e ''ko-ko...'' (tuʻovalu pe ofi ki ai) ʻoku hikihiki tō.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lupe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Pacific pigeon |faitā=Carpophaga pacifica - 1824-1839 - Print - Iconographia Zoologica - Special Collections University of Amsterdam - UBA01 IZ15600101.tif |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[columbiformes]] |familia= [[COLUMBIDAE]] |genus=Ducula |species=pacifica |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1789) |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e '''lupe''' ko e manupuna tuʻufonua ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku mafolalahia, neongo ʻoku ʻasi pē ʻi he vaotā ʻoku kei lahi feʻunga. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 40.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lupe pālangi
Poui
Jacaranda mimosifolia

page.title: Teiko
Manuʻuli
Lafu ikunonou
Lafu lavilavi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Sooty shearwater |faitā=Sooty shearwater kaikoura.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Puffinus |species=griseus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1789 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 44, kapakau sm ʻe 105. Ko e manupuna lahi mo hono fulufulu lavilavi (ka ko e ʻila tea ʻi he kapakau).
ʻOku ne nofo pea fakafānau ʻi he taimi mafana (Tisema mo e hā fua) ʻi [[Nuʻusila]] pe ofi ki ai, pea ʻoku ne folau ʻi ʻolunga ʻo e [[pasifiki]] ki he tokelau mamaʻo, pea nofo ʻi he [[ʻĀketika]] ʻi Sune mo e hā fua. ʻA ia ʻoku ne ʻahia pē ʻa e tuʻafanga ʻo Tongá ni tuʻoua he taʻu: lolotonga Maʻasi ki Mē pe Sēpitema ki Nōvema. Ka ʻoku lahi taha ʻi he taimi Maʻasi ki Mē (feangai he [[lafu ikunonou]]).
ʻOku ui ko e ''tītī'' ʻi he [[lea fakamauli]]
== Tataku == *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu puli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Buller's shearwater |faitā=Buller's shearwater.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Puffinus |species=bulleri |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Osbert Salvin|Salvin]] 1888 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻauhē ʻa e lafu puli (lafu ʻo ''Buller''), ʻaʻahi pē he potutahi ʻo Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 47, kapakau sm ʻe 98.
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu kiutea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White-necked Petrel |faitā=Pterodroma cervicalis - SE Tasmania.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Pterodroma |species=cervicalis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Osbert Salvin|Salvin]], 1891) |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 43, kapakau sm ʻe 31.
==Tataku== {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu fakamelomelo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Herald petrel |faitā=OestrelataHeraldica.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Pterodroma |species=arminjoniana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Enrico Hillyer Giglioli|Giglioli]] & [[Tommaso Salvadori|Salvadori]] 1869 |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 37, kapakau sm ʻe 95. Ko e manupuna lahi mo hono fulufulu ʻi lalo kete ʻoku melomelo. ʻOku tupu mo fakafānau fakakolonia ʻi he ngaahi motu ʻe niʻihi ʻi Tongá ni.
ʻOku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[lafu ʻata]], kā ʻoku ʻikai ʻa hano konga hinehina ʻi he loto kapakau.
Mahalo pē ko e faʻahinga kehe ia, ko e ''P. (arminjoniana) heraldica''.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu ʻata
Lafu ʻileʻila
Mokomokotuʻaniu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Coconut stick insect |faitā= Coconutstick.jpg |faitālaulahi= 350px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum= [[veʻehokohoko]] |classis= [[ʻinisēkite]] |subclassis = kapakau |superordo= kapakau tupu ʻi tuʻa |ordo= [[phasmatodea]] |subordo = [[verophasmatodea]] |infraordo= [[anareolatae]] |familia= [[PHASMATIDAE]] |tribus=[[platycranini]] |genus= Graeffea |species= crouanii |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Le Guillou, 1841) }} Ko e '''mokomokotuʻaniu'' ko e kiʻi monumanu ia, nofo ʻi Tongá ni ʻoku fuofuoloa. ʻOku ʻikai manakoa ʻe he kau tangata ʻo e kelekele.
Ko e fefine ʻoku ʻasi ʻi he ʻata; ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange mo e melomelo ko e tangata.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *ʻeʻe, ʻēʻē, ʻē, ēē, vēvē, vini ([[lea fakakuki]]) *mōmoatuʻaniu, mongomongatuʻaniu (lea faka[[niuatoputapu]])
==Tataku== *http://phasmida.speciesfile.org/Common/basic/Taxa.aspx?TaxonNameID=1003918 *http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=7362 *Polynesian classification of small animals; W. Pond; The Weta '''7(4)''' 1984 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Katafa lalahi
Katafa ʻuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Antarctic giant petrel |faitā=Giant petrel - Macronectes giganteus.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Macronectes |species=giganteus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Gmelin]], 1789 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Pétrel géant MHNT.jpg|thumb |'' Macronectes giganteus'' ]] Ko e '''katafa''' ko e manupuna lahi ʻaupito. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 87, kapakau sm ʻe 195. ʻAuhē, ʻoku ne ʻaʻahi taimi ʻe niʻihi ki he potutahi ʻo Tongá ni lolotonga Sune ki ʻAokosi. ʻOku ne nofo ʻi he taimi mafana ʻi [[ʻAnetātika]].
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lofa lalahi
Lofa iiki
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Lesser frigatebird |faitā=Lesser frigatebird lei.jpg |faitālaulahi=360px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[FREGATIDAE]] |genus=Fregata |species=ariel |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[George Robert Gray|Gray]] 1845) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Fregata ariel MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.2.18.jpg|thumb| ''Fregata ariel'']]
Ko e '''lofa''' pe '''helekosi''' ko e manupuna lahi ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 75. ʻOku siʻi ange ʻa e lofa iiki ʻi he [[lofa lalahi]]. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻena ʻasi, kā ko e lofa iiki ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa hono konga hinehina ʻi hono fulufulu ʻi ʻolunga. Pea ʻoku toe hono tangai-monga kulokula, ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻe he manupuna tangata ʻi heʻene fiehā ki he ngaahi fefine.
ʻOku ui ko e ''iwa'' ʻi he [[lea fakahauaiʻi]].
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu tea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Phoenix petrel |faitā= |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Pterodroma |species=alba |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1789) |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻauhē ʻa e lafu tea, ʻaʻahi pē he potutahi ʻo Tongá ni, ʻoku ʻikai fakafānau ʻi ai. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 35, kapakau sm ʻe 83.
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu tahisi
Lafu houma
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Cape petrel |faitā=Daption capense (Cape Petrel), Kaikoura, New Zealand.jpg |faitālaulahi=300px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Daption |species=capense |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]] 1758) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File: Daption capense MHNT.jpg|thumb|'' Daption capense'']]
Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻaʻahi ʻe he fanga manupuna siʻisiʻi ʻi he potutahi fakatonga ʻo Tongá ni lolotonga Siulai ki Sēpitema. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 39, kapakau sm ʻe 86. ʻOku ʻileʻila ʻaupito hono fulufulu: hinehina mo ʻuliʻuli.
Ko e ''cape'' ko e houma ia, ko e [[Houma ʻamanaki lelei]], ko e feituʻu naʻe ʻilo ia ʻe he kau pālangi taimi ʻuluaki. ʻOku ne nofo ʻi he potutahi ʻo [[ʻAnetātika]] mo e ngaahi feituʻu tonga ʻo māmani kotoa. ʻI he taimi momoko ʻi ai, ʻoku ne folau ki he ngaahi fonua ʻoku tokelau siʻi ange.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu afā
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Polynesian storm-petrel |faitā= |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[HYDROBATIDAE]] |genus=Nesofregetta |species=fuliginosa |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]] 1789) Mathews 1912 |fehokotaki= s }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻauhē ʻi Tongá ni ??
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu kapakauʻuliʻuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Black-winged petrel |faitā=Blackwinged petrel vanua levu jun08.JPG |faitālaulahi=280px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Pterodroma |species=nigripennis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Walter Rothschild, 2nd Baron Rothschild|Rothschild]] 1893) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻauhē ʻi Tongá ni ??
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lafu kola
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Collared petrel |faitā= |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[Procellariiformes]] |familia= [[PROCELLARIIDAE]] |genus=Pterodroma |species=brevipes |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Titian Peale|Peale]] 1848) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi '''lafu''' lahi ia, ko e manupuná ni. ʻOku ʻauhē ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 30, kapakau sm ʻe 71, hono fulufulu ʻoku tukumisi.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tavake
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White-tailed tropicbird |faitā=Tropikvogel.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[PHAETHONTIDAE]] |genus=Phaethon |species=lepturus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Rene Primevere Lesson|Lesson]], 1839 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Phaethon lepturus MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.2.12.jpg|thumb| ''Phaethon lepturus'']] Ko e '''tavake''' ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku ne fakafānau meimei kotoa pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 78, kapakau sm ʻe 92.
Ko e tavake mui ʻoku hinehina kotoa ia, ʻoku ui ko e '''ekiaki''' pe '''hinaekiaki''', ko e lea heliaki ia maʻa e [[:category:fale ʻalo|fale ʻalo]].
Ko hono ʻuhinga faʻahinga siʻi ko e ''P. l. dorotheae''.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tavake toto
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red-tailed tropicbird |faitā=Re-tail.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[PHAETHONTIDAE]] |genus=Phaethon |species=rubricauda |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Pieter Boddaert|Boddaert]] 1783 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Phaethon rubricauda MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.2.14.jpg|thumb| ''Phaethon rubricauda'']] Ko e '''tavake toto''' ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku ne fakafānau ʻi [[ʻAta]] pē (?), ka ko ʻene ʻasi ʻoku ne tātātaha ʻi he feituʻu kotoa. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 78, kapakau sm ʻe 107 (ʻoku siʻi lahi ange ʻi he [[tavake]]). Ko e meʻa utua hono iku kulokula, ko e laveʻi-tavake, ka ʻoku faingataʻa ʻene ʻilo ʻi he langi ngingila. Naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lave ē ʻe [[Havea Hikuleʻo Helu]] ʻi heʻene [[ao]] ko e [[palatavake]].
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tala tea
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=White tern |faitā=Fairy tern Seychelles.jpg |faitālaulahi=280px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Gygis |[genus]=tala |species=alba |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Anders Sparrman|Sparrman]] 1786) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tala tea''' ko e tala ʻe taha ia, ʻoku hinehina. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku ne fakafānau ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 30, kapakau sm ʻe 78.
ʻOku ui foki ko e '''ekiaki''', koeʻuhi ʻoku hinehina ʻa hono fulufulu kotoa. Ka ko e hala ia, ko e ekiaki moʻoni ko e kiʻi manupuna hinehina ʻo e [[tavake]].
ʻOku ui ko e ''manu-o-Kū'' ʻi [[Hauaiʻi]].
ʻOku ʻikai nofo pununga ka ʻoku fakatō ʻi ʻolunga ʻo e manga siʻi ʻo ha fuʻu ʻakau, pea ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ʻa hono foʻi fua ʻe he ngaahi [[kumā]] pe [[moko]].
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Talatā
Tala tuʻalavilavi
Tala piti
Tala tuʻakiuʻuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Black-naped tern |faitā=Black-naped Tern LEI.JPG |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Sterna |[genus]=tala |species=sumatrana |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Stamford Raffles|Raffles]], 1822 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''tala tuʻakiuʻuli''' ko e tala ʻe taha ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku lahi ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 31, kapakau sm ʻe 61; ko e tala siʻi ia. ʻOku meimei hinehina kotoa hono fulufulu, ʻa ia ʻoku ui foki ko e [[tavake|ekiaki]], ka ʻoku hala ia.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tala lalahi
Ngutulei veʻekula
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Red-footed booby |faitā=Red-footed Booby (Sula sula) -adult on nest with chicks.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[SULIDAE]] |genus=Sula |species=sula |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]] 1766) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Red-footed booby.jpg|250px|thumb|left|Taimi hā lanu maama ange]] [[File:Sula sula MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.45.9.jpg|thumb|left| ''Sula sula'']]
Ko e '''ngutulei veʻekula''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngutulei ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 69, kapakau sm ʻe 141.
ʻOku ʻi ai ha fuo ʻe ua: taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻoku fakapōpōʻuli ange ʻa e nguteleí ni, ʻoku melomelo hono fulufulu; taimi ʻe niʻihi oku maama ange, ʻoku tea ia. Ka ʻoku ʻuliʻuli taimi kotoa ko e mui ʻo hono kapakau.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngutulei melomelo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Brown booby |faitā=Brown Booby LEI jan08.JPG |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[SULIDAE]] |genus=Sula |species=leucogaster |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Pieter Boddaert|Boddaert]] 1783) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Sula leucogaster MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.45.7.jpg|thumb| ''Sula leucogaster'']] Ko e '''ngutulei melomelo''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngutulei ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku lahi taha ʻene ʻasi ʻi he ngaahi motu. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 71, kapakau sm ʻe 152.
== Tataku == * D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngutulei
page.text: {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Booby |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[SULIDAE]] |genus=Sula |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Mathurin Jacques Brisson|Brisson]] 1760 }} ʻOku ʻi ai ʻi he kāinga ʻo e '''ngutulei''' (''sula'') ko e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe tolu ʻoku nonofo ʻi Tongá ni. <br clear="all"><gallery heights="200px" widths="200px"> Image:Brown boobytern .JPG|[[ngutulei melomelo]] Image:Masked booby (Sula dactylatra) in flight -Ecuador.jpg|[[ngutulei fakapūloaʻi]] Image:Red-footed Booby (Sula sula) -Galápagos.jpg|[[ngutulei veʻekula]] </gallery>

page.title: Ngutulei fakapūloaʻi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Masked booby |faitā=Maskedboobys.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[pelecaniformes]] |familia= [[SULIDAE]] |genus=Sula |[genus]=ngutulei |species=dactylatra |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[René-Primevère Lesson|Lesson]] 1831) |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Sula dactylatra MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.45.6.jpg|thumb| ''Sula dactylatra'']] Ko e '''ngutulei fakapūloaʻi''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngutulei ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 86, kapakau sm ʻe 152, ko e ngutulei lahi taha ia.
==Tataku== {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngongo ʻuliʻuli
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Black noddy |faitā=Anous minutus.JPG |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Anous |[genus]=ngongo (manupuna) |species=minutus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Friedrich Boie|Boie]] 1844 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ngongo ʻuliʻuli''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngongo ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[ngongo melomelo]], ka ʻoku siʻi ange hono sino mo pakapakau lahi ange hono ngutu pea mo hinehina ange hono tumuʻaki. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 34, kapakau sm ʻe 76.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga. :ʻOku ne ui ia ko e ''Anous tenuirostris'', ka ko e faʻahinga kehe ia, ʻoku ne nofo pē holo he [[Moana ʻInitia]]. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngongo melomelo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Brown noddy |faitā=Noddytern.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Anous |[genus]=ngongo (manupuna) |species=stolidus |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]] 1758) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ngongo melomelo''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngongo ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku melomelo hono fulufulu, ka ʻoku fuʻu fakapoʻuli, ʻoku aʻu ki he ʻuliʻuli ia, kapau ʻiloʻi ʻi he langi ngingila. ʻA ia ʻoku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[ngongo ʻuliʻuli]], ka ʻoku lahi ange hono sino. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 42, kapakau sm ʻe 82.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngongo lavilavi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Grey noddy |faitā=Grey Ternlet flight NZ jan05.jpg |faitālaulahi=280px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Procelsterna |[genus]=ngongo (manupuna) |species=albivitta |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Charles Lucien Bonaparte|Bonaparte]] 1856 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ngongo lavilavi''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngongo ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku ne tātātaha, ʻoku nofo ʻi [[ʻEua]] mo [[ʻAta]] pē. ʻOku tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[ngongo pulupulū]], ka ʻoku ne nofo pē ʻi he tokelau mamaʻo. Naʻe tui ʻe he kau saienesi ʻi he taimi kuo hili, ko e ongo faʻahinga naʻe taha pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 27, kapakau sm ʻe 60.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngongo pulupulū
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Blue noddy |faitā=Blue-grey Noddy.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Procelsterna |[genus]=ngongo (manupuna) |species=cerulea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Frederick Debell Bennett|Bennett]] 1840) |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ngongo pulupulū''' ko e taha ʻo e fanga ngongo ia. Ko e manupuna ʻo e tuʻafanga ʻi Tongá ni. ʻOku ne tātātaha, ʻoku nofo ʻi he [[:Category:Ongo Niua|ongo Niua]] pē. ʻOku tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e [[ngongo lavilavi]], ka ʻoku ne nofo pē ʻi he tonga mamaʻo. Naʻe tui ʻe he kau saienesi ʻi he taimi kuo hili, ko e ongo faʻahinga naʻe taha pē. Ko hono lahi ko e senitimita ʻe 27, kapakau sm ʻe 60.
==Tataku== *D. Watling, Tohi talateu ki he manupuna ʻo Tonga. {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Ngongo (manupuna)
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |hingoa=Ngongo |name=Noddy |faitā= |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= [[LARIDAE]] |genus=Anous, Procelsterna |species= }} ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe fā ʻi Tongá ni ʻoku kau ki he kāinga ofi ʻo e '''ngongo''' (ko e ''Anous'' [ [[James Francis Stephens|Stephens]] 1826], mo e ''Procelsterna'' [ [[Frédéric de Lafresnaye|Lafresnaye]] 1842]).
ʻOku ʻikai fuoloa naʻe toki vahevahe ʻe he kau saienisi ʻa e kāinga ʻeni, ʻoku ne kau ki he [[tala|STERNIDAE]] he taimí ni. <br clear="all"><gallery heights="200px" widths="200px"> Image:Grey Ternlet NZ jan05.jpg|[[ngongo lavilavi]] Image:Blue-grey_Noddy.jpg|[[ngongo pulupulū]] Image:Anous stolidus 03.jpg|[[ngongo melomelo]] Image:Anous_minutus.JPG|[[ngongo ʻuliʻuli]] </gallery>

page.title: Pato
page.text: {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Northern pintail |faitā=Anas acuta.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[anseriformes]] |familia= [[ANATIDAE]] |genus=Anas |species=acuta |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carl Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758 |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Anas acuta distribution map 1.png|left|250px|thumb|vahe fakamāmani, lanumata: feituʻu fakafānau, lanupulū: feituʻu fakafaʻahitaʻu, lanupoʻuli: ʻiloʻi taimi kotoa pē, tukumisi: ʻikai ʻiloʻi]] [[File:Anas acuta MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.20.6.jpg|thumb| ''Anas acuta'']] Ko e '''pato''' ko e manupuna ʻauhē ia ki Tongá ni. ʻOku ʻikai pau ʻoku moʻoni ʻene haʻu ki ai pe ʻikai, koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ʻa e faʻahinga ʻi he konga ʻeni ʻo māmani. Mahalo pē naʻe hē ʻa e manupuna siʻi mei [[Hauaiʻi]] ki Tonga. Mahalo pē naʻe fehalaʻakiʻi, koeʻuhi ʻoku tatau ʻa e ʻasi ʻo e fanga fefine ʻo e pato mo e [[toloa]]. == Tataku == {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kiu
page.text: {{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Bristle-thighed Curlew and 2 Ruddy Turnstones.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= '''SCOLOPACIDAE''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e fanga manupuna ʻoku ui ko e '''kiu''' ʻoku nau kau ki he kāinga ʻo e ''SCOLOPACIDAE'' (mo e ''CHARADRIIDAE'' (ko e kiu koula pē)). ʻOku nau aʻa ʻi he ngaahi toafa ʻo e matātahi (pe ʻi loto fonua foki), ʻoku nau fāngota. <br clear="all"><gallery heights="200px" widths="200px"> Image:Bristle-thighed_Curlew.jpg|[[kiu foaʻunga]] Image:Limosa lapponica1.jpg|[[kiu foaʻunga kula]] Image:Pluvialis fulvaUSFWS003413A.jpg|[[kiu koula]] Image:Tringa incana.jpg|[[kiu tea]] Image:Sanderling01sm.jpg|[[kiu vave]] Image:Arenaria interpres roskarl.jpg|[[kiu vaʻesiʻi]] </gallery>

page.title: ʻĀketika
page.category: Siokālafi
page.text:
[[File:Arctica surface.jpg|right|400px]] Ko e konitineniti momoko ia ʻi he tokelau ʻo māmani. ʻOku ʻikai ha fonua ʻi lalo ʻaisi, ʻoku maʻanu ʻi he moana ʻāketika pē. (Kapau ʻoku toe ha ʻaisi he taimí ni.) Ko e feituʻu fehangahangai ko [[ʻAnetātika]] ia {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tala
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Captiva terns2.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |divisio= [[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis= [[manupuna]] |ordo= [[charadriiformes]] |familia= LARIDAE |genus= Sterna |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Charles Lucien Jules Laurent Bonaparte|Bonaparte]] 1838 }} Ko e fanga manupuna ʻoku ui ko e '''tala''' ʻoku nau kau ki he kāinga ofi ʻo e ''sternae''. Ka ʻoku ʻikai lototaha ʻe he kau saienisi. Mahalo pē ko e ''sternidae'' ko e kāinga fakamavahe mei he ''laridae'', pea ʻoku ʻikai ha kāinga iiki ʻoku falala ki ai, ko e ''sterninae''. Pea hoko mahalo pē ʻoku ʻikai kau ngata pē ʻa e ''sterna'' (fanga tala ʻoku tea mo lalahi) ki ai, ka ʻoku tānakiʻi foki ʻa e ngaahi kāinga ofi ʻo e ''gygis'' mo ''onychoprion'' mo ''procelsterna'' ([[Ngongo (manupuna)|ngongo]]) mo ''thalasseus'' (fanga tala ʻoku tomokosi honau tope) mo e hā fua.
Ko e ngaahi manupuna ʻo e tahi ko kinautolu, ʻoku nau siu kotoa.
== Ngaahi tala ʻi Tongá ni == <br clear="all"><gallery heights="200px" widths="200px"> Image:Crested Tern.jpg|[[tala lalahi]] Image:Bridled Tern.jpg|[[tala piti]] Image:Sooty tern on nest.jpg|[[talatā]] Image:Mating Fairy terns.jpg|[[tala tea]] Image:Black-naped Tern LEI.JPG|[[tala tuʻakiuʻuli]] Image:Starr_990518-0815_Boerhavia_repens.jpg|[[tala tuʻalavilavi]] </gallery>

page.title: Monumanu ngaolo pe totolo
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Tuatara.jpg |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum=[[monumanu filo siliva]] |classis='''monumanu ngaolo pe totolo''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e fanga '''Monumanu ngaolo pe totolo''' (''sauropsida'') ko e pupunga siʻi ia ʻo e ngaahi monumanu veʻefā. Ka naʻe mahuʻinga taha honau haʻa ʻi māmani ʻosi he taʻu ʻe ono noa miliona tupu.
He onopooni ʻoku toe ʻa e holongā ʻe fā ʻi he haʻá ni: * '''moko''' mo '''ngata''' (''squamata'') ** [[moko]] ** [[pili]] ** mokotea ** fokai ** kalihelihe ** [[ngata (monumanu)|ngata]], ʻoku ʻauhamālie ʻi Tongá ni, mahalo pē lolotonga he teautaʻu hono 16. *** tukuhali *** peva (?) * '''[[fonu]]''' (''testudines'') ** fonu koloa ** fonu tongotongo ** fonu tungange ** fonu tuʻakula ** fonu tuʻapolata ** fonu tuʻaʻuli ** tūfonu ** [[fonu ʻuta]], ko e taha pē nofo ʻi ʻuta (ʻikai ʻi he tahi) * '''[[kalokataile]]''' mo '''[[ʻalakeita]]''' (''crocodilia''), ʻoku ʻikai nofo ʻi Tongá ni. * '''tuatala''' (''sphenodontia''), ko e ''tuatara'' mei [[Nuʻusila]] pē (ʻasi ʻi he ʻata). {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Monumanu nofo ʻuta mo vai
ʻUo moʻoni
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=General malacostracan en.svg |faitālaulahi=360px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum=[[monumanu unu]] |phylum=[[veʻehokohoko]] |classis='''ʻuo moʻoni''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e haʻa ʻo e '''ʻuo moʻoni''' (''malacostraca''), ʻoku kau ki ai ʻa e fanga [[ʻuo]] mo e [[paka]] mo e hā fua. Ko e ngaahi fingota lahi ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga ē ʻoku nau kātoa kau ki ai. ʻOku nau aʻu ki he faʻahinga ʻe ua mano tupu.
Ko e ngaahi haʻa siʻi ʻo e ʻuo moʻoni: * ''eumalacostraca'' ** holongā lahi: ''syncarida'' ** ''peracarida'' ** ''eucarida'' *** holongā: ''amphionidacea'' *** ''euphausiacea'', ko e meʻakai maʻa e fanga [[tofuaʻa]] ofi ki [[ʻAnetātika]] *** '''[[veʻehongofulu]]''' (''decapoda''), ko e fanga fingota lahi ʻeni * ''hoplocarida'' * ''phyllocarida'' {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻuo moʻoni
page.text: #REDIRECT [[ʻUo moʻoni]]

page.title: Veʻehongofulu
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Haeckel Decapoda.jpg |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum=[[monumanu unu]] |phylum=[[veʻehokohoko]] |classis=[[ʻuo moʻoni]] |ordo='''veʻehongofulu''' |genus= |species= }} Ko e fanga '''veʻe hongofulu''' (''decapoda''), ko e holongā ia mei he [[ʻuo moʻoni]]. ʻOku 16 ʻa e ngaahi vaʻe moʻoni ʻo e ʻuo moʻoni, ka ʻoku toe pē 10 ki he ngaahi faʻahinga ʻeni. Ko e toenga, ko e ngaahi vaʻe ʻe ono ʻi muʻa, naʻe nau hoko ʻa e kiʻi 'nima', ʻoku nau tokoni ʻi he maʻu meʻakai (ko e monumanu kai kiki ʻa kinautolu) pea ʻave ki he ngutu. ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga naʻe hoko ʻa e ongo vaʻe ʻi muʻa ki he nifo.
ʻOku vahevaheʻi ʻa e veʻehongofulu ʻi he holongā siʻi ʻe ua: * '''ʻuo iiki''' (''dendrobranchiata'') {prawns} * '''''pleocyemata''''' ** holongā siʻi ange: '''ʻunga''' (''anomura'') {hermits} ** '''ʻuo''' (''astacidea'') {lobsters} ** '''paka''' (''brachyura'') {crabs} ** '''tapatapa''' (''caridea'') {shrimp} ** ''palinura'' ** ''stenopodidea'' ** ''thalassinidea''
== Veʻehongofulu ʻi Tongá ni == * ʻuo ** [[mohi]] ** [[uloulaʻavai]] ** [[valo]] ** [[ʻuo]] ** [[ʻuo fisi]], ʻileʻila ** [[ʻuo leleva]] ** [[ʻuo tavake]], tuhituhi ** [[ʻuo motapatapa]] ** [[ʻuo fakavaingatutu]] * paka ** [[hingavele]], siʻi mo e ngeʻesi molū ** [[huhutefua]] ** [[kakafatu]] ** [[kalamihi]] ** [[kamakama]] ** [[keviki]], lanu enga, nofo ʻi he ʻoneʻone, hoko ki he [[taielo]] ** [[kuka]] ** [[mafana (paka)|mafana]], fulufulua, fakakona ** [[paka]] *** [[pakatea]] ** [[pesiloa]], siʻi mo e nifo lahi ** [[pesiluku]] ** [[polupolu]] ** [[popotu]], siʻi ** [[tāfola]] ** [[tātāfiefie]], tuʻa petepete (paka-hina) ** [[tātāʻuha]] ** [[teitei]] ** [[tolitoli]], lahi ** [[tulu]] *** [[tulu ngahehe]] *** [[tulu veʻelei]] *** [[tulu puniluo]] ** [[tupa]] ** [[tupaolelangi]] ** [[tūtū]], ngaahi ʻileʻila lahi mo kulokula ʻi hono tuʻa ** [[ʻataʻata]], siʻisiʻi ʻaupito, ʻoku lahi pē ʻa e nifo ʻe taha ** [[ʻūʻū]], lahi ʻaupito * tapatapa ** [[tapatapa]] * ʻunga ** [[sovini]], siʻi ** [[ʻunga]], lahi (ʻunga kikiva)
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Tupa
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |faitā=Cardisoma carnifex.JPG |regnum= [[monumanu]] |superphylum=[[monumanu unu]] |phylum=[[veʻehokohoko]] |classis=[[ʻuo moʻoni]] |ordo=[[veʻehongofulu]] |infraordo=[[paka]] |familia = GECARCINIDAE |genus=Cardisoma |species=carnifex |fakamoʻoniʻanga= ([[Johann Friedrich Wilhelm Herbst|Herbst]] 1794) |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''tupa''' ko e [[paka]] ʻoku nofo ʻi ʻuta ia (vao [[tongo]]).
Ko e hingoa, tupa, ʻoku leʻo ʻi Tonga, ka ʻoku tapu ʻi [[Niuatoputapu]] koeʻuhi ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ʻeiki mo e huafu tatau. ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻi hē ʻa e ʻuhinga ko e '''nana''' (ʻi he taimi mui) pe '''lailo''' (ʻi he taimi ʻoku lahi ʻa e paká ni). ʻOku pehē pē ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻe he taki Niuatoputapu ʻa e foʻi lea ''fakatuʻanana'' = ''fakatuʻapaka''.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *tupa ([[lea fakaʻuvea]], [[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *lairo ([[lea fakafisi]]) =''Sesama gracilipes''
==Tataku== *Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward *Polynesian classification of small animals; W. Pond; The Weta '''7(4)''' 1984 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻUngongo
ʻungongo
page.text: #REDIRECT [[ʻUngongo]]

page.title: Mokohula
Heʻe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Short-horned grasshoppers |faitā= Nymph of Locust - Project Gutenberg eText 16410.png |faitālaulahi= 360px |regnum= [[monumanu]] |phylum= [[veʻehokohoko]] |classis= [[ʻinisēkite]] |subclassis = kapakau |superordo= kapakau tupu ʻi tuʻa |ordo = '''kapakau hangatonu''' |genus= |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Pierre André Latreille|Latreille]] 1793 }} [[File:Criquet.1(L).jpg|left|thumb|320px|heʻe mata (spp)]] [[File:Criquet à pattes rouges.jpg|left|thumb|320px|heʻe mōmoa (spp)]]
Ko e ngaahi ʻinisēkite mahuʻinga taha ʻo e holangā kapakau hangatonu (''orthoptera'') ko e fanga '''heʻe''' kinautolu. Ko e heʻe ko e kiʻi manu ia mo hono vaʻe kaumālohi, ʻoku ne lava puna mamaʻo.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * '''heʻe mata''' (holongā siʻi: ''ensifera'', kāinga: ''Tettigoniidae'', long-horned grasshopper); lanumata * '''heʻe mōmoa''' (holongā siʻi: ''caelifera'', kāinga: ''Acrididae'', short-horned grasshopper); melomelo; ʻoku nau ngaʻutoʻuta * '''heʻe vai''' pe '''heʻe vao''', (holongā siʻi: ''ensifera'', kāinga: ''Gryllidae'', real crickets); ʻoku leolahi ʻenau ongo * '''heʻe vai''' pe '''heʻe vao''', (holongā: ''hemiptera'', kāinga: ''Delphacidae'', planthoppers)
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * hē ([[lea fakatahisi]]) (ko e [[ʻunufe]]) * sē ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]])
== Toe meʻa kehe == * heʻe mata — ko e pekepekātama lelei * heʻe mōmoa — ko e pekepekātama kovi
== Tataku == * Tongan dictionary; C.M. Churchward * Polynesian classification of small animals; W. Pond; The Weta '''7(4)''' 1984 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Peni Tutuʻila Malupō
Meleluafaletele Halatokoua
page.text: {{Kāinga ofi |hokohoko= Halatokoua M |maama= fefine |tamai= Siope Fonua kihe Hau Halatokoua ([[ʻUiha]]) |faʻē= Meleane Tuʻikolongahau ([[Felemea]]) |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1900 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=ʻInoke Manuhekina Malupō |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Peni Tutuʻila Malupō]]||||||||}} |}}nofo [[ʻUiha]]

page.title: Ula
page.category: Faiva fakatonga
page.text:
[[Image:Ula fu.jpg|right|thumb|320px|fū — ko e kamataʻanga ʻo e faiva kotoa]] Ko e '''ula''', ko e faiva mei onoʻaho, naʻe sio ki ai ʻe he ʻeikivaka [[Semisi Kuki]]. ʻOku ne ui he onopooni ko e '''faʻahi ula''', pe taʻemaau ko e '''fahaʻiula''', koeʻuhi ʻoku ''faʻahi'' ʻa e faiva: ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻoku hū ʻa e ongo pupunga kau fefine ki he funga faivaʻanga mei he hema mo e mataʻu, (mo e taimi ʻe niʻihi ʻa e kulupu fakatolu mei mui). Ko e faiva fakafefine ia, ʻoku faiva tātātaha ʻe he kau tamasiʻi.
Ko e ula ko e tupuʻanga ʻo e [[tauʻolunga]]. ʻOku manakoa lahi ʻa e tauʻolunga he taimí ni, ʻoku tātātaha ange ʻa e ula. ʻOku mālie pe tuai ʻene haka mo e hiva, ʻoku siʻisiʻi pē ʻa e ngaue fakasino, meimei kekeva ʻa e haka. ʻOku kehe ʻaupito ʻa e tauʻatāina ʻo e tauʻolunga.
ʻOku tatau ʻa e teunga mo e teunga tauʻolunga, kā ko e teunga kulokula ʻoku manakoa taha.
==taʻanga== Ko e ngaahi konga motuʻa taha, ʻoku ʻasi naʻe haʻu mei [[Haʻamoa]] ʻOiau, siʻa langi ula; ʻi ʻiē fai mai siʻa tauʻolunga. ʻio!
Tulopa he ʻiau moe; ʻio ē! vasaleva ʻiau moe; ʻio!
Sina vai tava ʻā ē he ʻiē, ʻā ē.
Sina vai tafe loʻu lonā. ʻio, ʻio, he loʻu lonā.
Tunotuna ʻoe Ale-le-sā, manuia ʻoe saualuma.
Laulau tuʻi Vaea ē, Vaea lau mānaʻia.
Ko e ngaahi konga mei he kamataʻanga ʻo e teautaʻu hono 20, mahalo pē [[Vili Pusiaki]] mei [[Lapaha]]
Tonga, Tonga ē, tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē peʻi kau muʻa peʻi kau mai ke tau kalofi kuo tau e langi tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē.
Tonga, Tonga ē, tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē ko e faiva ni ko hoto kakala ʻo lau taʻanga pea fola haka tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē.
Tonga, Tonga ē, tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē kuo ke meaʻi siʻoto founga fiemālie tuku ke u ula tulituli faiva, he tuli faiva ē. {{potuʻi}} [[Category:Faiva fakatonga]]

page.title: Sitiveni ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Poluleʻuligana Tanusia maʻa Tonga Tukuʻaho

page.text:

page.title: Māʻuluʻulu
page.category: Faiva fakatonga
page.text:
Ko e māʻuluʻulu ko e taha ia ʻo e ngaahi faiva tukufakaholo ʻo Tonga. ʻOku pehē ko e maʻu ʻa e faiva māʻuluʻulu mei he [[ʻotuhaka]] pea mo e māʻuluʻulu faka-Haʻamoa ʻi he senituli 19.
ʻOku tangutu fakataʻane e kau faiva hono kotoa tukukehe ʻo kapau ʻoku fuʻu tokolahi e kau māʻuluʻulu pea ʻe tuʻu e toenga ki ʻolunga ʻo hangē ʻo ka fai ʻe ha ʻapiako e māʻuluʻulu. Ki he tafaʻaki toʻohema pe toʻomataʻu ʻo e kau faiva ʻoku tuʻu ai e nafa pea tuʻu leva ʻi mui ʻa e kau hiva pe ko e [[langituʻa]].
ʻOku konga ʻe ua ʻa e māʻuluʻulu ʻa ia ko e konga ʻoku hivaʻi pea mo e konga ʻoku hakaʻi fakalongolongo ʻo hangē ko e ʻotuhaka. ʻOku makatuʻunga e taʻanga ʻo e māʻuluʻulu mei he katonga ʻoku fai ai e māʻuluʻulu ko ia.
[[Image:Māʻuluʻulu lahi taha.jpg|thumb|1000px|center|Ko e faiva lahi taha ʻo māmani, ko e kau lautohi ʻe 9000 tupu, ʻoku nau haka ʻenau faiva maʻa e kalauni ʻo e tuʻi ʻi [[Teufaiva]] ʻi 29 Siulai 2008. Ko e punake (ʻi mua, teunga kulokula), ko [[Motuliki Fakatava]].]]
[[Category:Faiva fakatonga]]

page.title: Soane-Patita Vaimua Lavelua
Falakika Seilala
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Lavelua (Tuʻi ʻo ʻUvea) |hokohoko=Seilala F |ʻaho fakanofo=1858 |ʻaho fakamālōlō=19 Fēpueli 1869 |ki muʻa=[[Soane-Patita Vaimua Lavelua]] |hoko=[[Amelia Tokagahahau Aliki]] |}} Naʻa ne liliu ʻa e huafa ʻo hono tuongaʻane (Lavelua) ki he hingoa fakanofo ʻo e tuʻi. Talu mei heni ko e ngaahi tuʻi ʻo [[ʻUvea]] ʻoku nau ui ko '''Lavelua'''.
Ko e Lavelua ʻuluaki ia ʻoku ʻilo ʻe he kau pule Falanisē.
{{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=aliki |hokohoko=Seilala F |maama= tangata |tamai=[[Tūfele]] |faʻē= ʻOfakivavaʻu |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia=1869 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|Maalamalu|[[Soane-Patita Vaimua Lavelua]]|Manuonukuloa||||||}} |ʻohoana1= |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*http://www.worldstatesmen.org/Wallis_Futuna.html *Talanoa ki ʻUvea; Pātele Henquel (lea fakaʻuvea, ISBN 0959378731), Lose Miller Helu (lea fakatonga)

page.title: Amelia Tokagahahau Aliki
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo= Lavelua (Tuʻi ʻo ʻUvea) |hokohoko=Tokagahahau A |ʻaho fakanofo=Fēpueli 1869 |ʻaho fakamālōlō=10 Maʻasi 1895 |ki muʻa=[[Falakika Seilala]] |hoko=[[Vito Lavelua II]] & [[Isaake]] |}} ʻOsi ʻene pekia naʻe ʻikai loto ki ai ko hai hoko, naʻe hoko ki he Lavelua, ko Vito mo Isaake.
{{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=aliki |hokohoko=Tokagahahau A |maama= fefine |tamai= [[Soane-Patita Vaimua Lavelua]] |faʻē= |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia=1895 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |}}*http://www.worldstatesmen.org/Wallis_Futuna.html

page.title: Laufilitonga
page.text: #REDIRECT [[Sanualio Laufilitonga]]

page.title: Tūpakapakanava
page.category: Hisitōlia
page.text:
ʻI onoʻaho ko e '''tūpakapakanava''' ko e hulungia ʻo e matātahi ia ʻe he tokolahi, ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi ama pe toume, pea naʻe ʻilo ʻa e ngaahi kau fakaʻuli ʻo e vaka ʻo e tuʻi Tongaʻi heʻene foki ki Tonga ʻoku ʻi fē ʻa e kaveinga.
He onopooni ʻoku fakataha ʻa e longaʻi fānau ʻi he pō fakahifo ʻo e tuʻi pe ha kātoanga kehe mahuʻinga, ʻi [[:Category:Tongatapu & takatakai|Tongatapu]] he matātahi ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]], [[Pangaimotu (Tongatapu)]], [[Fafā]] mo e [[ʻAtatā]], pea nau fakahulungia.
[[Image:Tūpakapakanava.jpg|center|400px|thumb|Ko e tūpakapakanava maʻa e kalauni ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou V]] ʻi 1 ʻAokosi 2008]] [[Category:Hisitōlia]]

page.title: Kalauni ʻo Tonga
page.category: Fakapuleʻanga
page.text:
[[Image:Tonga 1997 45s.jpg|left|300px]] [[Image:Coat of arms of Tonga.svg|right|300px]] <br clear="all"> ʻOku ngāueʻaki ʻa e kalauni ʻi he [[sila ʻo Tonga]].
Naʻe fai ʻa e hilifaki kalauni ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou V]] ʻi 1 ʻAokosi 2008.
Naʻe fai ʻa e hilifaki kalauni ʻo [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]] ʻi 1967.
[[Category:Fakapuleʻanga]]

page.title: Haʻamonga ʻa Maui
Haʻamonga ʻa Maui (maka tupuʻa)
page.category: Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga
page.text:
[[Image:Haʻamonga.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko e haʻamonga mo hono hala ki he maka faakinanga]] [[Image:Maka faakinanga.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko e maka faakinanga]] [[Image:Mape ʻo e Haʻamonga.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Ko e mape ʻo Heketā, mo e lautohi ʻo Niutōua ʻi he tafaʻaki hemalalo; ʻoku mahino ʻa e hala ʻe tolu ki he hopoʻanga ʻo e laʻā]] [[Image:Haʻamonga sun paths.jpg|left|400px|thumb|Ko e ongo hala tokelau taha ki he hopoʻanga ʻo e laʻā]] Ko e '''Haʻamonga ʻa Maui''' ko e maka tupuʻa ongoongoa ia, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi Heketā, ʻa ia ʻoku ofi ki he kolo [[Niutōua]] ʻi Tongatapu.
Naʻe langa ʻe he [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ko [[Tuʻitātui]], ʻi he teautaʻu hono 13 pe ofi ki ai. Ko e hūʻanga ia ki hono lotoʻā, pea ko e hala ki hono ʻafioʻanga ko e '''Maka faakinanga'''.
Ko e [[ʻotu langi|Langi Heketā]] ko e langi fungavaka ʻe tolu, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he lotoʻā. ʻOku ofi, ʻi [[Afā]] ko e langi Moʻungalafa, maʻa e ʻofefine ʻo Tuʻitātui.
Naʻe tui ʻe he tuʻi kuo mamaʻo, ko [[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]], naʻe tatau ʻa e Haʻamonga mo e [[Stonehenge]] ʻi [[Pilitānia]], ʻa ia ko e meʻa mamata feituʻu tukufakaholo. Naʻe ʻasi ʻe he Haʻamonga ko e ngaahi feituʻu hopoʻanga ʻo e laʻā ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho lōloa taha, nounou taha pea mo e pōtatau. Kā ʻoku ʻikai ʻaupito ha fakamoʻoni ki ai.
[[Category:Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Malaʻekula
page.category: Tuʻi Kanokupolu
page.text:
[[Image:The pine road.jpg|320px|thumb|Ko e hala [[paini]] (Hala Tuʻi) aʻu mei he [[pālasi]] ki he Malaʻekula mo e moʻunga ʻo Siaosi Tupou I ʻi he vāmamaʻo]] Ko e '''Malaʻekula''' ko e malaʻe ia ʻi loto [[Nukuʻalofa]], kā naʻe hoko ki he telioʻanga ʻi 1893 aʻu ki he taimí ni.
ʻOku tōfā ʻa e ngaahi tuʻi ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]] mo ʻenau ʻohoana mo ha kakai fale ʻalo ʻe niʻihi. Ko e ngaahi tuʻi ʻo onoʻaho, ko e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] mo [[:Category:Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua|Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua]], ʻoku nau tōfā ʻi he ngaahi telioʻanga kehe: ko e [[ʻotu langi]] ʻi [[Lapaha]], [[Malaʻeʻāloa]] ʻi [[Sopu]], [[Malaʻelahi]] ʻi [[ʻUiha]] mo e hā fua.
Ko e hingoa ʻo e feituʻu: ko e malaʻe naʻe kulokula, koeʻuhi naʻe ʻai ʻa e teunga kulokula ʻe he kakai kotoa pē ʻo [[Nukuʻalofa]] lolotonga he ''kātoanga kula'', ko e ʻaho kumi sōvaleni ([[paʻanga]]) ia maʻa e [[Kolisi Tonga]] ʻi he taʻu 1885.
ʻI muʻa ʻa e mamaʻo ʻo kuini Sālote, naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻa e musie he tāpulu.
ʻOku nau tōfā heni: *[[Siaosi Tupou I]] 1893 *[[Lavinia Veiongo Fotu]] 1902 *[[Siaosi Tupou II]] 1918 *[[ʻAnaseini Takipō Afuhaʻamango]] 1918 *[[Viliami Tupoulahi Tungī Mailefihi]] 1941 *[[Sālote Tupou III]] 1965 *[[Melenaite Tupoumoheofo Veikune]] 1993 *[[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni]] (Tuʻipelehake) 1999 *[[Fatafehi ʻAlaivahamamaʻo Tukuʻaho]] (Māʻatu) 2004 *[[Tāufaʻāhau Tupou IV]] 2006 *[[Siaosi Tupou V]] 2012 *[[Halaevalu Mataʻaho ʻAhomeʻe]] 2017
==tutuku== *E. Wood-Ellem, Queen Sālote of Tonga, Auckland university press, 1999 *M. Hixon, Sālote, queen of paradise, University of Otago press, 2000 {{potuʻi}} [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]] [[Category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu]]

page.title: St Peter's College, Auckland
page.category: Akoʻanga
page.text:
[[File:St Peter's College, Auckland; Bro O'Driscoll Building.JPG|thumb|right|300px|St Peter's College, Bro O'Driscoll Building (1939, additions 1944)]] Ko e '''St Peter’s College (Kolisi St Peter)''', [[‘Aokalani]], ko e Kolisi [[Siasi Katolika Loma|Katolika]] ma‘a e tamaiki tangatá ‘oku tu‘u ‘i loto ‘Aokalani, [[Nu‘u Sila]]. Ko e ‘apiako Katolika lahi taha eni ‘i Nu‘u Silá. Na‘e fokotu‘u ‘a e ‘apiakó ni ‘i he ta‘u 1939 ‘e he kautaha felela ko e Christian Brothers, ka ‘i he ta‘u 2008 ‘oku ‘ikai te toe ‘i ai ha taha ‘o e kau mo‘ui fuakava ‘e kau atu ki he faiako.<ref> Rick Maxwell, St Peter's College, Auckland, Simerlocy Press, ‘Aokalani, 2008.</ref> Ko e tokolahi ‘a e fānau ‘oku ako he apiakó ni ko e toko 1200 mei he ngaahi matakali kehekehe. ‘I he mala‘e ‘o e fekumi faka’atamai ‘oku ‘oatu ‘e he ‘apiakó kiate kinautolu ‘i honau ngaahi ta‘u faka’osí ‘a e NCEA pe ko e Setifikeiti fakapule‘anga ki he A‘usia Fakaakó, pea toe kau atu foki ki ai mo e Sivi Fakavaha‘a Pule‘anga ko e Cambridge (CIE).<ref>Ibid.</ref>
* '''Moto''': Ke ‘ofa pea ke faifatongia (''Amare et Servire'') * '''Fa‘ahinga''': Kolisi Katolika ma‘a e fānau Tangata (Ta‘u 7–13) * '''Ta‘u na‘e fokotu‘u''': 1939 * '''Tu‘asila''': 23 Mountain Rd, Epsom, ‘Aokalani 3 Telefoni: +64 9 524 8108 Fax: +64 9 524 9459 * '''Tohila''': admin@st-peters.school.nz * '''Pule Ako''': James Bentley * '''Tokolahi e ako''': 1177 (2008) * '''Tu‘unga faka‘ekonomika sōsiale''': tesaile 8 (tesaile 10 ‘a e ma‘olunga taha) [[File:St Peter's College cricket field and Outhwaite Park.JPG|thumb|left|300px|St Peter's College cricket field (St Peter's Oval) and Outhwaite Park]]
=== Ni‘ihi ‘o e kau kolisi tutuku ‘iloa<ref>Ibid.</ref> === * '''‘Epikopo Dennis George Browne''' (fa‘ele‘i 1937), ko e ‘Epikopo hono hongofulu ‘o e Taiosisi ‘Aokalani (1983 – 1994), ‘Epikopo hono ua ‘o Hemilitoni (1994–ki he lolotonga´ ni). * '''‘Eiki Falealea Christopher Joseph Carter''' (fa‘ele‘i 1952): Minisitā ‘o e Kapineti. * '''Mēsia Seniale Martyn Dunne''' (fa‘ele‘i 1950), Komanitā ‘o e Kau Sōtia Fakatahataha ‘a Nu‘u Sila ‘oku nau kau atu ki he Kau Tau Malu‘i Fonua ‘a Nu‘u Sila (2001–2004). * '''Sir Michael Fay''' (fa‘ele‘i 1949), ko e tokotaha fakalele pangike, sea ‘o e ngaahi feinga tu‘o tolu ‘a e Nu‘u Sila ke pole‘i ‘ a e ipu Amelika ‘i he lova ‘iote ‘i he 1987, 1988, pea mo e 1992. * '''Sam Hunt''' (fa‘ele‘i 1946), ko e tangata punake fa‘u maau. * '''Bernard Joseph McCahill''' (fa‘ele‘i 1962), All Black, second five-eighth mo e centre three-quarter (1987–1991). [[File:St Peter's College, Bro Wilkes Technology Building.JPG|thumb|right|300px|St Peter's College, Bro Wilkes Technology Building]]
=== Paenga ngaluope fakalakanga === [http://www.st-peters.school.nz/ www.st-peters.school.nz]
== Tataku == <references/>
[[Category:Akoʻanga]]

page.title: Falelotu Sangato Mikaele
page.text:
[[File:Sangato Mikaele, Lapaha.jpg|right|400px|thumb|Sangato Mikaele II ʻi heʻene ʻaho huufi, Tisema 2008]]. Ko e falelotu ʻo Sangato Mikaele ʻo e [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] ʻoku tuʻu ʻi [[Lapaha]]. Ko e falelotu motuʻa pe ʻuluaki, naʻe langa ʻi he taʻu 1850 pe ofi ki ai. Naʻe kiʻi maumauʻi ʻa e falelotu ʻe he mafuike ʻo 4 Mē 2006, pea naʻe langa ha falelou foʻou ʻe he kau takilotu. Naʻe huufi ʻa e falelotu foʻou pe II ʻi he 24 ki 26 Tisema 2008.
Ko e meʻa fakaofo (ʻa ia ʻi Tongá ni) ʻoku ʻi ai hono matapāsioʻata sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu. <gallery heights="200px" widths="200px" caption="Ko e ngaahi sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu ʻe niʻihi ʻo e falelotu Sangato Mikaele"> File:First mass in Tonga.jpg|Ko e misa ʻuluaki in Tongá ni ʻi [[Pangaimotu (Tongatapu)]] File:Pierre Chanel.jpg|Ko e maletile ko [[Petelō Sanele]] File:Sofele Kakala.jpg|Ko e punake ko [[Sofele Kakala]] File:Pierre Bataillon.jpg|Ko e ʻepikopō ko [[Pierre Bataillon]] File:Jean Baptiste Pompallier.jpg|Ko e ʻepikopō ko [[Soane Patito Pompallier]] </gallery>
[[category:lotu]] [[category:Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Pātele Sevelo
page.text:
Ko pātele Sevelo (Chevron), ko e muʻa ʻo e kau misinale [[Siasi Katolika Loma|katolika]] ʻi Tongá ni. Naʻa ne folau mai ʻi 1842, pea naʻe pekia ʻi 1884. Naʻe telio ia ʻi he [[ʻotu langi|langi Tu‘ofefafa]] ofi ki hono kaumeʻa ko [[Sanualio Laufilitonga]].
[[File:Laufilitonga cross.jpg|right|300px|thumb|Ko e faʻitoka ʻo pātele Sevelo, ofi ki he moʻunga ʻo Laufilitonga]]
[[category:lotu]] [[category:Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Petelō Sanele
page.text:
[[File:Peter Chanel.jpg|left|300px|thumb|Petelō Sanele]] [[File:Pierre Chanel.jpg|right|300px|thumb|Ko hono ʻata sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu ʻi he [[falelotu Sangato Mikaele]]]]
Ko '''Petelō Sanele''' ([[lea fakafalanisē]]: Pierre Chanel), ko e pātele ʻo e [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] ia. Naʻa ne pekia he [[maletile]], pea naʻa ne hoko ki he sangato ʻi 12 Sune 1954 ʻe he tuʻitapu ko [[Pius XII]].
Naʻe faʻeleʻi ʻa Petelō ʻi [[Falanisē]] ʻi he kolo [[La Potière]] ʻi 12 Siulai 1803, naʻe tāmateʻi ia ʻe [[Musumusu]], ko e toʻa ia ʻo e tuʻi ʻo [[Futuna]] ko [[Niuliki]], ʻi he kolo [[Poi]] ʻi he ʻaho 28 ʻEpeleli 1841.
Ko e [[sōkē]] (''eke'' ʻi he [[lea fakafutuna]]) ko e faiva lahi ia, naʻe fai ʻe he kakai Futuna ʻosi heʻene pekia, pea ko e faiva mo e siasi katolika kotoa naʻe haʻu mei Futuna mo [[ʻUvea]] ki Tonga ʻi 1842.
Ko e ngaahi akoʻanga katolika ʻe niʻihi ʻi Tonga ʻoku ui kia te ia, ʻa ia ko e [[Kolisi Petelō Sanele]].
{{potuʻi}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Sanele P}} [[category:lotu]] [[category:kakai]] [[category:Hisitōlia]]

page.title: Pierre Bataillon
page.category: kakai
page.text:
[[File:Pierre Bataillon.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Hono ʻata ʻi he matapāsioʻata sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu ʻo e [[falelotu Sangato Mikaele]]]] Ko Pierre Bataillon, ʻoku ui ko ʻEnosi ʻi Tongá ni, (1810-1877) ko e ʻepikopō ʻuluaki ʻo e [[Siasi Katolika Loma]] naʻe nofo ʻi loto [[Polinisia]], ʻa ia, naʻa ne nofo ʻi [[ʻUvea]].
Naʻa ne ave ʻa [[Petelō Sanele]] ki [[Futuna]].
{{potuʻi}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bataillon P}} [[Category:kakai]] [[category:lotu]] [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Soane Patito Pompallier
page.category: Kakai
lotu
hisitōlia
page.text:
[[File:Jean Baptiste Pompallier.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Hono ʻata ʻi he matapāsioʻata sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu ʻo e [[falelotu Sangato Mikaele]]]] Ko Soane Patito Pompallier (pe '''Jean Baptiste François Pompallier''' ʻi he [[lea fakafalanisē]]) ko e ʻepikopō ʻuluaki ʻo [[Polinisia]] ia. (Kā naʻa ne nofo ʻi [[ʻAokalani]], [[Nuʻusila]] pē. Ko e ʻepikopō ʻuluaki nofo ʻi loto Polinisia, ʻa ia ko [[ʻUvea]], ko [[Pierre Bataillon]] ia.)
Naʻa ne faʻeleʻi ʻi [[Lyon]] ʻi [[Falanisē]] he 11 Tisema 1802, pe pekia ʻi [[Puteaux]] ofi he [[Pālesi]] he 21 Tisema 1871.
Ko ia mo e ngaahi faifekau [[Malisi]], naʻa nau folau mei [[Falanisē]] ki [[Mangareva]] mo [[Tahisi]]. Pea naʻa nau folau he 5 ʻOkatopa 1837 ki Tongá ni, ka naʻe fakafisi heʻenau tūʻuta. Naʻa nau ʻalu ki [[ʻUvea]], pea ko [[Pierre Bataillon]] mo [[Joseph Xavier]] naʻa na tūʻuta ki ai he 1 Nōvema 1837, pea ko [[Petelō Sanele]], naʻa ne tūʻuta ʻi [[Futuna]]. Ko Pompallier naʻa ne hoko atu ʻene folau ki [[Lotuma]] (fakafisi tūʻuta), pea naʻa ne aʻu ki [[Senē]].
ʻOsi ʻa e kiʻi mālōlō naʻa ne folau ki Nuʻusila, aʻu ki ai ʻi he 10 Sānuali 1838. Pea naʻe fuoloa ʻene nofo ʻi ai. Naʻa ne hoko ʻepikopō ʻi 1848, pea ʻi heʻene motuʻa, naʻa ne foki ki Falanisē ʻi 1868
{{potuʻi}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pompallier SP}} [[Category:Kakai]] [[Category:lotu]] [[Category:hisitōlia]]

page.title: Sofele Kakala
page.category: Kakai
Hiva fakatonga
page.text:
[[File:Sofele Kakala.jpg|right|250px|thumb|Hono ʻata ʻi he matapāsioʻata sioʻata-ʻi-he-pulu ʻo e [[falelotu Sangato Mikaele]]]] Ko '''Sofele Kakala''', (pe Sir Sofele Kakala, ʻosi hono fakangeiaʻi) ko e punake ʻiloa ia mei [[Lapaha]]. ʻOku lahi ʻene fatu hiva maʻa e [[Siasi Katolika Loma]], pea maʻa [[Sālote Tupou III]].
ʻAho faʻeleʻi: 21 Maʻasi 1916, ʻaho pekia: 30 Sēpitema 1991.
Ko ʻene ngaahi hiva ʻiloa ʻe niʻihi: *ʻŪpē ʻo [[Mele Siuʻilikutapu Kalaniuvalu (Tukuʻaho)|Siuʻilikutapu]] (1948, fasi pē, taʻanga: Sālote Tupou III) *ʻŪpē ʻo [[Siaosi Tupou V|Manumataongo]] (~1955, fasi pē, taʻanga: Sālote Tupou III) *Uisa ʻete fiefia (1964) *Hakohako (1970, fasi pē, taʻanga: [[Sione Ngū Manumataongo Uelingatoni|Tuʻipelehake (Fatafehi)]]) *Hiva ʻo [[Tēvita Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau|Vuna Tuʻiʻoetau ʻAhomeʻe]] (1971, fasi pē, taʻanga: Malia Latai)
==Tataku== *Langi tauʻolunga & hiva kakala; Nukuʻalofa 2000; ISBN 978-982-98007-1-8
{{potuʻi}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:Kakala S}} [[Category:Kakai]] [[Category:Hiva fakatonga]]

page.title: Peesi tali fiefia
page.text:
__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ {| style="margin-top: 5px; padding: 10px; border-left: 2px solid darkblue; border-top: 2px solid darkblue; border-right: 2px solid darkblue; border-bottom: 2px solid darkblue; background:#ef2" width="100%" cellpadding="10" {| width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" | colspan="2" |
{{English|translation}} [[Image:Coat_of_arms_of_Tonga.svg|right|100px]] [[Image:Flag of Tonga.svg|100px|border]]
'''Ko e kotoa ʻo ha'a tangata ʻoku fānauʻi mai ʻoku tauʻatāina pea tatau ʻi he ngeia mo e ngaahi totonu. Naʻe fakanāunauʻi kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e ʻatamai mo e konisenisi pea ʻoku totonu ke nau feohi ʻi he laumālie ʻo e nofo fakatautehina.''' *''This is the wikipedia for the language of TONGA, Polynesia, South Pacific.'' *''Ceci est la wikipedia en langue tongienne (Polynésie, Pacifique Sud).'' *''Добро пожаловать в Википедию на тонганском языке, официальном языке Королевства Тонга (Полинезия, южная часть Тихого океана).'' *''这个维基百科是用汤加语——一种南太平洋波利尼西亚语言来写作的。'' *''Ko e wikipedia ʻeni maʻa lea fakatonga ʻi TONGA ni, ʻi Polinisia, mo e muli.'' '''Ko e lahi ʻo e [[Special:Allpages|ngaahi kupu kotoa]] he taimí ni: [[Special:Statistics|{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}]].''' |- | width="60%" style="vertical-align:top;" |
