page.title: Kahoa kakala
page.category: Faiva & Tohi
page.text:
Ko e ngaahi kahoa kakala, ko e ngaahi kahoa fakaʻeiki ia fonu he [[heliaki]]. Naʻe tuia he ngaahi [[kakala]], ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi kahoa maʻa e houʻeiki pea maʻa e tuʻa.
==kahoa hingoa== *tuituʻu, ko e kahoa māʻolunga taha *papai-falahola, ko e kahoa māʻolunga taha foki *alamea, tuʻunga vaeua *(faka-)matamoana, kahoa māʻulalo, tatau mo e ngaahi hoko *faka-ʻotu-sia *mafi-ko-fakalaʻā *mapa mataʻiʻulua *nusi-heilala-fisiʻiniu *nusi-pala-taha *papai-paongo *pitoʻi-ngalau *tuitui-vao
==kahoa vale (mo e sisi)== *faka-ofilani *lala *lei-pua, lei-huni,… *papai-fā *papai,… ʻoku ne maʻu ʻa e tuʻunga mei he tuʻunga ʻo e ngaahi kakala ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻi loto. *salusalu *sisi fakavainiaku *veʻeveʻe-faifio *lavalava, ko e tuʻunga māʻulalo taha *saulava, mei [[Fisi]]
==kahoa makehe== *[[Fāʻonelua]], maʻa e Tuʻi Tonga pē, ko e matalaʻiʻakau [[tongo]] makehe ia. *fala mohokoi *Futu-ko-Vuna, ko e [[futu]] ʻo [[Vuna Takitakimālohi]] ʻi [[Lapaha]] *kato-kakala, ko e tuʻi mo hono falé *lou-fatai, ko e [[fatai]] ko e heliaki ki he kakai tuʻa *Mapa-ko-Mataʻi-ʻulua, ko e [[mapa]] ʻi [[ʻotu langi|Loʻāmanu]] ʻi Lapaha, heliaki ki he [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] *sisi fungani ua *Toa-ko-Maʻafu, ko e fuʻu [[toa]] ʻi ʻolunga ʻo e [[Sia-ko-Veiongo]] he onoʻaho, pulia he taimi ni; ko e heliaki maʻa e [[:Category:Tuʻi Kanokupolu|Tuʻi Kanokupolu]] *ahi-mo-e-vunga, ko e fuʻu [[ahi]] mo e [[vunga]] ʻi ʻolunga ʻo e Sia-ko-Veiongo, tatau mo e Toa-ko-Maʻafu
== tataku == *Langi tauʻolunga & hiva kakala, ISBN 978-982-98007-1-8
[[Category:Faiva & Tohi]]

page.title: Mateloi talatalalalahi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Giant sensitive plant, Nila grass |faitā=Bi-chiu kian-siau-chhau e hoe.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Mimosa |species= diplotricha |fakamoʻoniʻanga= C. Wright ex Sauvalle |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''mateloi talatala lalahi''' (hingoa taʻefakalakanga) pe '''mateloi tahiti''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, meimei tatau mo e [[mateloi]], ka ʻoku lahi ange ʻene lōloa, (ki he mita ʻe 2 ʻi ʻolunga kapau taʻemaveu), mo loa ange hono talatala masila. Ko e ʻakau taʻefiemaʻu ʻaupito. Naʻe ʻohofi ia ʻi he [[Pasifiki]] (tupuʻanga mei [[Palāsili]]) pea naʻe nofo ʻi he kāungafonua kotoa, tukukehe Tongá ni. Naʻe hā ʻi Tonga ʻi ʻEpeleli 2009 ʻi he malaʻe [[Fangatongo]] ʻi [[Neiafu]], ka naʻe toʻo ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau kotoa ʻe he vaʻa [[kolonitini]] ʻo e puleʻanga ʻi he māhina hoko.
Naʻe hā ʻa e ʻakau ʻi he taʻu 2000 pe ofi ki ai ʻi [[Niuē]], ka naʻe meimei taʻakifuʻuʻi ia he taimi ni. Koeʻuhi ʻoku moʻui ʻa e ʻū tenga lolotonga he taʻu ʻe 20 tupu, ʻoku pau ʻe ʻaʻahi ʻe he kakai taʻakifuʻu ʻa e ngaahi vahe naʻe tupu he ʻakau ʻi aiʻoku fuoloa.
Ko hono hingoa motuʻa: ''Mimosa invisa'' MART.
==Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe== *laʻau fefe palagi, vao fefe pālagi ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) *pikikaʻa papaʻā ([[lea fakakuki]]) *co gadrogadro, wa gadrogadro levu, wa gadrogadro ni wa galelevu, wagadrogadro levu ([[lea fakafisi]])
==Tataku== *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/mimosa_diplotricha.htm
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: ʻAposetolopulū
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Blue walking iris, Blue apostle plant |faitā=Neomarica caerulea.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[asparagales]] |familia= [[IRIDACEAE]] |genus=Neomarica |species=caerulea |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Ker Gawl.) Sprague 1928 |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''ʻaposetolopulū''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, manakoa ʻi he ngoue. Naʻe ʻomi ki Tongá ni ʻikai fuoloa. Ko e matalaʻiʻakau ʻene lahi ko e sm. ʻe 5 pē, mo e mata (''stigma'') lōua ʻi loto. ʻOku ui foki ko e ''Marica caerulea''
==Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe== *ʻaposetolopulū; koʻeni *[[ʻaposetolohina]] ==Tataku== http://cookislands.bishopmuseum.org/species.asp?id=6427 {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Babai
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Giant swamp taro |faitā= babai.jpg |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[alismatales]] |familia= [[ARACEAE]] |genus=Cyrtosperma |species=chamissonis |fakamoʻoniʻanga= (Schott) Merr. |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''babai''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau ia mei [[Mikolonisia]], meimei tatau mo e [[kape]]. ʻOku ʻikai te ne tupu ʻi Tongá ni, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ʻi ai hano hingoa ʻi he lea fakatonga; ko e ''babai'' ko e [[lea fakakilipasi]] ia.
ʻOku ne tupu lelei ʻi he ano. ʻOku tō ʻa e ''babai'' ʻe he kau Kilipasi ʻi he ngaahi kato fakalouniu mo e lou ʻakau popo. Naʻe ʻauhē ʻa e ''babai'' kotoa ʻi [[Tarawa]] ʻe he puke, ka toe lahi ʻi he ngaahi motu kehe.
ʻOku te haka ʻa e ''babai'' tatau mo e [[talo]], ka ʻoku toe fefeka ʻa e foha.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * iaraj ([[lea fakamasolo]])
== Tataku == {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Mele ʻAla ki Hihifo Tuʻihaʻangana (Fakafānua)
Sione Kavahuʻimei Langi
ʻIlaisa Futa Helu
page.category: Kakai
Akoʻanga ʻi Tongá ni
page.text:
[[File:School-of-`Atenisi.jpg|right|thumb|Ko Futa tuku ʻi he ''faleako ʻo ʻAtenisi'' moʻoni, ko e ʻata fakaʻiloa ʻe [[Lafaele]], ʻoku ne talanoa fakafilosofia mo [[Palato]] pea mo [[Alisitotele]]|400px]]
Ko hono hingoa kotoa, ko '''ʻIlaisa Futa-ʻi-Haʻangana Helu''' ko e tangata saienisi lahi taha ʻo Tongá ni ia, mei [[Foa|Lotofoa]] Haʻapai.
{{Kāinga ofi |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Siosaia Fatai Helu]] |faʻē= [[ʻIlaisaane Sisiʻuno Lomu]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= 17 Sune 1934 |ʻaho pekia= 2 Fēpueli 2010 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Mosaʻati Helu|ʻOfa Helu|Susana Helu (1918 — 5 Sune 2013)|Talatala Helu|Viki Kaufusi Helu|Feki Helu|Vili Helu||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | | | | | ||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Pauline Fakahikuʻoʻuiha Vuna |ʻaho1= Maʻasi 1963 |fānau1= {{tokoua|ʻikai||||||||}} |ʻohoana2= ʻAna Kaloni Saafi |ʻaho2= ʻOkatopa 1970 |fānau2= {{tokoua|Suliasi Niulala Vakaola-ʻo-tonga|ʻIlaisaane Sisiʻuno|Luʻisa|ʻIlaisa|ʻAtolomake Siniva|Veisinia|Tuʻiʻāhai (ohi)||}} |}}Naʻe tokolahi ange ʻa ʻene tokoua, kā naʻe taʻu siʻi pe ʻi heʻenau mate.
== Tataku == *http://atenisi.edu.to/ Ko e paenga ngaluope fakalakanga *Genealogy of ʻIlaisa Futaʻihaʻangana Helu, http://histfam.familysearch.org/oralhistories/getperson.php?personID=I1&tree=IlaisaHelu *http://histfam.familysearch.org/oralhistories/media/054FutaHeluTonganVersion.pdf
{{DEFAULTSORT:Helu, ʻIF}} [[Category:Kakai]] [[Category:Akoʻanga ʻi Tongá ni]]

page.title: Kavaʻonau
Marcella Margaret Tupoumoheofo Kalaniuvalu (Taumoepeau-Tupou)
Fangafeʻatu
page.category: Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga
page.text:
Ko e '''Fanga-feʻatu''' ko e feituʻu ʻi he matātahi ʻo [[Talasiu]] ia, ʻoku puna ʻa e kiʻi vaitafe mei lalofonua ki tahi. ʻOku ofi ki he Vai-ko-Tālanga-mo-e-vale. [[File:Fangafeʻatu.jpg|300px|thumb]]
==Mahuʻinga fakahisitōlia== Ko e peito ia ʻo e [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]], pe ʻo e Faleʻalo e [[:Category:Tamahā|Tamahā]], ʻa ia ko e kau [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga Fefine|Tuʻi Tonga fefine]].
{{feituʻu Tonga|21°1737|175°1144}} {{potuʻi}} [[category:Tongatapu & takatakai]] [[Category:Hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Pālasi
page.text:
[[File:Tonga Royal Palace Oct 08.jpg|thumb|340px|right|ko e pālasí]] [[File:Towerless royal palace.jpg|thumb|340px|right|ko e monomono ʻo e taua ʻi ʻAokosi 2007]] [[File:Palace-extended.jpg|thumb|340px|right|ko hono fakalahi ange lolotonga ʻo e 2010]] ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi ʻafioʻanga (nofoʻanga ʻo e tuʻi) ʻi Tongá ni, ʻoku ʻi ai ha '''pālasi''' ʻi he ngaahi ʻotu motu kotoa pē. ʻA ia: *pālasi ʻi Kolomotuʻa [[Nukuʻalofa]] * ʻi [[Fuaʻamotu (Tongatapu)]] *Kauvai ofi ki [[Longoteme]] *Liukava ʻi [[Kolovai]] *Tufumāhina ʻi he vaeua ʻo [[Tofoa|Koloua]] mo [[Pea]] tafaʻaki fangaʻuta *Vila ([[lea fakapilitānia]]: ''villa'') ʻi [[Matakiʻeua]], ʻi he vaeua ʻo [[Tofoa|Koloua]] mo [[Pea]], langa 1990 *Tauʻakipulu ʻi [[Lifuka]] *Fangatongo ʻi [[Talau]] * ʻi Taʻanga [[ʻEua]] * ʻi Hihifo [[Niuatoputapu]] * ʻi Angahā [[Niuafoʻou]]
Ka ko e pālasi moʻoni, ko e pālasi ʻi Nukuʻalofa (Kolomotuʻa) ia, langa ʻe [[Siaosi Tupou I|Tāufaʻāhau I]] ʻi 1867. ʻOku tapu ʻaupito ʻa e ʻafioʻanga, ʻa ia ʻoku lahi hono hingoa fakaheliaki: *Loto ʻā *ʻĀ maka *Fangatapu (ko e matātahi) *Hangai Tokelau (ko e fuʻu ʻakau ʻofi ki he peito)
[[File:ngaahi ʻā.jpg|thumb|340px|left|ko e ʻā maka motuʻa mo e ʻā taiamoni motuʻa ʻoku na holoki, pea mo e ngaahi pou sima ʻo e ʻā foʻou ʻi 2010]] Ko e ʻāmaka motuʻa naʻe tapu ʻaupito, naʻe ʻikai ha tokotaha fakatoʻotoʻa ʻo tangutu ʻi ai. Ka naʻe ʻikai tui ki ai ʻa e tuʻi ʻi 1990, pea naʻe langa ʻa e ʻa taiamoni foʻou. Pea naʻe fakamālohiange ʻa e ngaahi matapā ʻi 2000. Naʻe tui ʻoku teʻeki feʻunga ia, ʻa ia ko e langa ʻo e ʻā foʻou, māʻolunga ange, ʻi he 2010.
{{potuʻi}} [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Taʻetaʻe
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name= Basil |faitā=Ocimum basilicum 002.JPG |faitālaulahi=240px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[lamiales]] |familia= [[LAMIACEAE]] |genus=Ocimum |species=basilicum |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= cs }} Ko e '''taʻetaʻe''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, tupu ʻi māmani kotoa, ngāueʻaki ʻi he tī pe ʻaonga ʻi he kai. Naʻe ako ia ʻe he kau pālangi, ʻa ia hono hingoa ʻe taha: '''ʻakau papālangi'''. Ko hono hingoa fika tolu, ko e '''sanga''' māhalo pē ko e sipelahalaʻi ia mei he foʻi lea ''sauga'', ko hono hingoa ʻi he lea fakahaʻamoa. Ko e hingoa '''mili''', ʻoku ngāueʻaki ʻi he kāungafonua ʻe niʻihi, ʻoku ne haʻu mei he ''mint'', ko e hingoa ʻe taha ʻi he [[lea fakapilitānia]].
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == * meimei tatau, kae ʻoku lahi ange: ''Ocimum gratissimum'' L.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe == * (lāʻau) sauga ([[lea fakahaʻamoa]]) * momili, momili elo, momili manogi ([[lea fakaniuē]]) * miri (kura) ([[lea fakakuki]]) * miri ([[lea fakatahisi]]) * mili ([[lea fakatūvalu]]) * kī ‘aʻala, kī paoa ([[lea fakahauaiʻi]])
== Tataku == *Plants of Tonga; T.G. Yuncker; BPB bulletin '''220''', Honolulu 1959 *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/ocimum_basilicum.htm {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Siaosi Kiu Ngalumoetutulu Kaho
Siale ʻAtaongo Kaho
ʻAlifaleti Malakai Mone
page.category: lotu
kakai
page.text:
'''Rev Dr ʻAlifaleti Malakai Mone''' (Faʻeleʻi 12 Sēpitema 1938)
Ko e Tangataʻeiki Palesiteni Mālōlō ia ʻo e [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]] mei he 1998-2009. Ko e Tangataʻeiki Faifekau ni ko e foha ia ʻo e Faifekau Misinale ko Tevita Tuʻikupulau Mone ʻo [[Folaha]] Tongatapu pea mo Lātū Faiva ʻo [[Kolomotuʻa]]. Naʻe Hilifakinima ʻa ʻAlifaleti ʻi he Konifelenisi ʻa e Siasi Uesiliana ʻi he 1977. Naʻa ne hoko foki ko e Talekita `o e Potungāue ʻEvangelio ʻa e Siasi ʻi he ngaahi taʻu lahi. Pea ne toe hoko foki ko e Faifekau Pule ʻo e Siasi ʻi [[Nuʻusila]].
Naʻa ne mali mo ʻEita Faletau ʻa ia kuo ne pekia ʻi he taʻu 2000. ʻOku kei mo`ui pē ʻa ʻAlifaleti pea mo ʻene fānau ʻe toko 3 pea mo e fanga mokopuna.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Mone, ʻAlifaleti Malakai}} [[Category:lotu]] [[Category:kakai]]

page.title: Melesiu
Fifitaniua

ʻAminiasi Fonuakihehau
Fifita Holeva Tuʻihaʻangana
Fīnau Pailā ʻAhio
page.category: lotu
kakai
page.text:
Ko Rev Tōk ʻAhio ko e Tangataʻeiki Palesiteni Lolotonga ia ʻo e [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]]. Naʻa ne hoko hake ki he lakanga Palesiteni ko e fetongi ʻo Rev Tōk [[ʻAlifaleti Malakai Mone]]. Naʻa ne ʻi he Lakanga ko e Puleako mo e Tiuta Lahi ʻo e Kolisi ko [[Siaʻatoutai]] pea pehe foki ki he Lakanga ko e Sēkelitali Lahi ʻo e Siasi Uesiliana mei he 2005-2009. Ko hono hoa ko Loukinikini ʻAhio.
{{DEFAULTSORT:ʻAhio, Fīnau Pailā}} [[Category:lotu]] [[Category:kakai]]

page.text: {{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=houʻeiki |hokohoko=Langi, ʻULT |maama=fefine |tamai= [[ʻAsipeli Kupuovanua Fotofili]] |faʻē= [[Lātū Soana Haʻangata Fotofili (Fusituʻa)]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Tēvita Fusituʻa Fotofili|ʻAmelia Afa Fotofili|||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | |||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|Kalolaine Fotofili|Luseane Talahiva Fotofili|Vika Lenitelo Fotofili|Matafonua Fotofili|Momo Fotofili|Pisila Fotofili|Fekeʻila Fotofili||}} |ʻohoana1=Vea Langi |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Malia ʻi Lutu Losaline Tae Falaula Aleamotuʻa (Langi)|Malia ʻi Lutu Losaline Tae Falaula]]||||||||}} |}}*http://www.pacificislanderseducationalnetwork.com/lord-fielakeba-married-malia-i-lutu-of-canterbury.php

page.title: Soakai
page.text:
{{Kāinga ofi |faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama=tangata |tamai= |faʻē= |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1800 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ? |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Mele Moala]]||||||||}} |}} Ko e toʻa mālohi mo e ʻeiki lahi ʻo [[ʻUiha|Felemea]], [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]].
Ko Soakai naʻe nofo ʻi [[Lapaha]] ʻi 1750 pe ofi ki ai, ko e Soakai kehe ia, mahalo pē ʻene kui ? Ko e tangata ngāue ki he Tuʻi Tonga ia. Naʻá ne feʻauhia ko e taumafa (soa-kai pe hoa-kai). Ko e kaumeʻa mo [[Pahulu]]. *[[ʻIlaisa Futa Helu]]

page.title: Mele Moala
Malaʻeʻāloa
page.text:
Ko '''Malaʻe ʻā loa''' ko e faʻitoka ia ʻi Sopu, he matāfanga. ʻOku tokolahi ʻa e houʻeiki ʻoku toka ʻi ai (ko e houʻeiki ʻoku tōfā, ʻoku nau tōfā ʻi he telioʻanga ko e [[Malaʻekula]]).
ʻOku nau toka heni: *Tuʻimala (ʻohoana ʻuluaki ʻo [[Mumui Tupouʻila Mapatongiamanu]]), naʻe tanu ia ʻi hono matafale ʻo hono ʻapi, ʻa ia ko e kamataʻanga ia ʻo Malaʻeʻāloa *[[Aleamotuʻa (Josiah Tupou)]] 1845 *[[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea]] 1960 *[[Heuʻifanga Veikune]] 1996 *[[Siosaia Aleamotuʻa Laufilitonga Tuita]] 1998 *[[ʻAmelia Lātūniua Taumoepeau-Tupou (ʻAhomeʻe)]] 2007 * mo e hā fua
Ko e faʻitoka he onopooni ko e konga pē ia ʻo e Malaʻeʻāloa ʻo Tuʻimala. Ko e feituʻu moʻoni ʻoku kamata ʻi he [[pālasi]] ʻi hahake, ʻa ia ko e [[ʻapi ko Talakaipau]] (ʻapi houʻeiki), mo e [[Niukāsā]] (ʻapi ʻo [[:Category:ʻUlukālala|ʻUlukālala]]), mo e [[Polataʻane]] (ʻApi e konisela, ko e nofoʻanga ʻo e konisela [[Pilitania]]), pea ʻosi ʻi he faʻitoka ʻi hihifo.
Ko e ngaahi vahevahe ʻe fā ʻo e faʻitoka ʻoku ʻi ai honau hingoa foki: *Faletuipapai (tafaʻaki ki tahi ʻoku tanu/telio ai ʻa e houʻeiki). *Likutea (kamata fakatatau mei he ngaahi faʻitoka ʻo Veikune, ʻoku lahi hono tanu ai ʻa e kau papālangi misinale motuʻa, ʻa ia, mahalo pē hono hingoa: ko e liku-tea). *Makahokovalu (kamata fakatatau mei he faʻitoka ʻo Tupoutuʻa 'a ia 'oku tanu ai ʻa [[Siaosi Tangata ʻo Haʻamea|ʻUlukālala Haʻamea]]). *(heʻikai hano hingoa) pea fakamuimui ʻa e konga ne faiputu ai ʻa e kau [[ʻUtulau]].
==Tataku== *http://www.facebook.com/topic.php?uid=121562531232388&topic=63 TALA ʻO E FAʻITOKA KO MALAʻEʻĀLOA [[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Malaʻelahi
page.text:
[[Image:Halatoaongo.jpg|right|350px|thumb|Hala toa ongo]] Ko '''Malaʻe lahi''' ko e faʻitoka mahuʻinga ia ʻi [[ʻUiha]], ʻoku toka pe tōfā ʻa e houʻeiki mo e fale ʻalo ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Tonga, he taimi naʻe meʻa ʻa [[Siaosi Tupou I|Tāufaʻāhau I]] ʻi Vavaʻu mo Haʻapai.
Ko e kiʻi hala, mo e ngaahi fuʻu [[toa]] hema mo mataʻu, ko e hala ʻoku hake mei tahi ʻo lele pē ki he malaʻe ia, ʻoku fakahāʻele ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻafakaʻeiki ki moʻunga, ʻoku ui '''Halatoaongo'''
ʻOku nau tanu ʻi heni: *[[Tupoutoʻa (TK)]] 1820, faʻitoka fai ʻe Poʻoi *Poʻoi *[[Tuʻuakitau]] 1842 *[[Vuna Takitakimālohi]] 1862 *[[Tēvita ʻUnga]] 1879 * mo e hā fua
[[category:hisitōlia ʻo Tonga]]

page.title: Toloa (Tongatapu)
page.text:
Ko '''Toloa''' ko e feituʻu ʻi Tongatapu ʻi he vaeua ʻo [[Vainī]] mo e [[malaʻe vakapuna Fuaʻamotu]].
Ko e [[Kōlisi Tupou]] ʻi heni he taimí ni.
Ko e ʻafioʻanga ia ʻo e ngaahi [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]] ʻuluaki ia.
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Manunā
Kulīhaʻapai
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo=Māʻatu |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho fakamālōlō=~1825 |ki muʻa=[[Puakaʻilakelo]] |hoko=[[Pungakaitofola]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Puakaʻilakelo]] |faʻē=Siulolovao |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= ~1825 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|Fataimoamanu||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= [[Kavafutuna]] |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Ikamāfana II]]|||||||||}} |}}*http://kitwithers.fortunecity.com/tonga/nobles.html *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 ʻOku tatau ia mo '''Ikamāfana I''' ?
Naʻe tau ʻa e vaka mei [[Niuafoʻou]], mo e ongo fefine ko '''Hekuau''' mo '''Siulolovao'''. Naʻe sō ʻa Hekuau ʻe Puakaʻilakelo, ka naʻe ʻikai te ne fiehoa, koeʻuhi ʻene hoa ʻi Niuafoʻou ko Mailetalamai. Pea naʻa ne sō ʻa Siulolovao, ko e ʻofefine ʻo Valamotu, ko e ʻofefine ʻo Fusituʻa mo Fotofili Alofi.
Fataimoamanu ko e ʻofefine ohi pē, ko hono tamai moʻoni ko Alokuoʻulu, ko e tokoua ʻo Siulolovao.

page.title: Pungakaitofola
Puakaʻilakelo
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo=Māʻatu |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= ~1800 |ki muʻa=[[Puakatefisi]] |hoko=[[Kulīhaʻapai]] |}}
{{Kāinga ofi|faʻahinga=houʻeiki |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Puakatefisi]] |faʻē=(mei Fuimaono) |ʻaho fanauʻi= |ʻaho pekia= ~1800 |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Pungakaitofola]]||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| ||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Fuimāono]]||||||||}} |ʻohoana1= Siulolovao |fānau1= {{tokoua|Fataimoamanu|[[Kulīhaʻapai]]||||||||}} |}}*http://kitwithers.fortunecity.com/tonga/nobles.html *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929
Naʻe ʻi ai ʻene taokete, ko Pungakaitofola, ka naʻe puke ia ʻi he ihu, ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai ke hoko ki he Māʻatu. (Naʻa ne hoko ki he Māʻatu ia, ʻosi Kulīhaʻapai, ka mahalo pē ko Pungakaitofola kehe ia). Kaekehe ʻoku pehē ʻe he tokotaha ko Pungakaitofola ko e Māʻatu hoko, pea ʻosi ko ia ko Puakaʻilakelo.
Ko hono huafa, ko '''Lātū''' mei hono ʻeiki, naʻe liliu ia ki '''Māʻatu''', koeʻuhi ʻaho ʻe taha, naʻe ʻaʻahi ki [[Niuatoputapu]] ʻa [[:Category:Lavelua (Tuʻi ʻo ʻUvea)|Lavelua]], ko [[Munigoto]] (pe [[Ngalu Atuvaha]] ?). Naʻe ʻave ʻe ia ʻa e mātaʻu fingota hoihoifua. ʻI he taimi ko ia, naʻe ui ko e ''pā'' ʻi he lea Niuatoputapu, pe ''utumāʻatu'' ʻi he lea faka[[ʻUvea]]. Naʻe fefetongiʻaki ʻa e ongo hingoa ʻe he ongo tuʻi. ʻA ia he taimi ni ʻoku ui ʻa e mātaʻu pehē ko e ''utumāʻatu'' ʻi Niuatoputapu pea ''pā'' ʻi ʻUvea, pea naʻe hoko ki he lea tapu ʻa e foʻi lea motuʻa ko e ''utumāʻatu'' ʻi ai.

page.title: Puakatefisi
page.text:
{{Houʻeiki|fakanofo=Māʻatu |ʻaho fakanofo= |ʻaho fakamālōlō= |ki muʻa= (ʻuluaki) |hoko=[[Puakaʻilakelo]] |}}

Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 Naʻe ʻi ai hono huafa ko '''Lātū''' foki. Puaka-te-Fisi, ko e feituʻu ia ʻi [[Tafahi]].

page.title: Pahulu
Havea Hikuleʻo Helu
page.text:
{{Kāinga ofi |maama=tangata |tamai= [[Pahulu]] |faʻē= ʻofefine ʻo [[Soakai]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1750 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|||||||||}} |ʻohoana1=taʻahine taʻeʻiloa ʻi [[:Category:Haʻapai|Haʻapai]] |ʻaho1= |fānau1= {{tokoua|[[Siuta Havea Hikuleʻo]]|kau fefine ʻoku ui ''kau Fūnaki''|||||||}} |ʻohoana2=[[Halaevalu Fonongavaʻinga]] |ʻaho2= |fānau2= {{tokoua|[[Kaunanga Lataihahake]]|ʻUhilamoelangi|||||||}} |}} [[File:Palatavake.jpg|left|300px|thumb|Ko e palatavake]] Ko e foha ʻo e tangata ngāue ki he Tuʻi Tonga ʻi [[Lapaha]]. Naʻá ne folau ki [[Foa]] pea nofo ʻi ai, ko e houma tokelau taha ko Houmatala, ofi ki [[Nukunamo]]. (ʻOku ʻiloa he taimi ni ko matātahi Houmaleʻeia). Naʻe faʻu ʻa e [[ao]] (pe helu) ia moʻo [[Pau]]. Naʻe ikuna ʻa Tonga ʻi he feʻauhi fakataʻu mo [[Haʻamoa]] koeʻuhi naʻe lelei ange ʻa e ao ki he ngaahi [[kie]] ʻo Haʻamoa. ʻOku ui ʻa e aó ni ko e '''palatavake''' koeʻuhi naʻe ngāueʻaki ʻa e ngaahi laveʻi-[[tavake toto]] ʻi he ao koʻeni. Naʻe tānaki ʻa e [[kafo]] mo e ngaahi ngeʻesi [[ʻelilivao]] ʻoku ui ko e [[ʻE Tuʻi Fuiono]]. Naʻá ne hoko ko e Helu ʻuluaki ia.
Ko Siuta mo e kau Fūnaki naʻa nau nofo ʻi Haʻapai; ko e hako ʻo Halaevalu Fonongavaʻinga naʻa na nonofo pē ʻi Lapaha. *Genealogy of ʻIlaisa Futaʻihaʻangana Helu, http://histfam.familysearch.org/oralhistories/getperson.php?personID=I66&tree=IlaisaHelu

{{Kāinga ofi |maama=tangata |tamai=[[Sioeli Fangatua Helu]] |faʻē= [[Lesieli Mafikovi Tuʻakilaumea]] |ʻaho fanauʻi= ~1910 |ʻaho pekia= |taʻokete-tokoua= {{tokoua|[[Siosaia Fatai Helu]]|[[Viliami Tāvao Helu]]|[[Tēvita ʻOfahemoʻoni Helu]]|Sione Mateaki|Tohi Koula|[[Neomai Latai Taliai (Helu)]]|||}} |taʻokete-lau= {{tokoua| | | | | | |||}} |tehina-tokoua= {{tokoua|Mele Kafoʻatu|Siosifa Holati Helu|||||||}} |ʻohoana1= ʻAna Tēvita Vaʻinga |fānau1= {{tokoua|fānau|ʻe|toko|13|||||}} |}}[[File:Sione Kulī Helu.jpg|left|thumb|213px|Sione Kulī Helu ʻi heʻene ako ʻi Kolisi ko Tupou]] Mo e tānaki fānau ʻeveʻeva ʻe toko-4.
Ko Sione Kulī naʻe ako ia ʻi [[Kolisi ko Tupou]] pea ko e kāpiteni ia ʻi 1926. *Genealogy of ʻIlaisa Futaʻihaʻangana Helu, http://histfam.familysearch.org/oralhistories/getperson.php?personID=I26&tree=IlaisaHelu

page.title: Manu palataisi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Bird of paradise, Crane lily |faitā=Strelitzia larger.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻitaha]] |ordo= [[zingiberales]] |familia= [[STRELITZIACEAE]] |genus= Strelitzia |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[William Aiton|Ait]] |fehokotaki= cs }} [[File:Strelitzia reginae MHNT.BOT.2009.13.52.jpg|thumb|''Strelitzia reginae'']]
Ko e '''manu palataisi''' ko e hingoa ia ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau mo honau matalaʻiʻakau hoihoifua, ʻoku manakoa he taimí ni ʻi he ngaahi ngoue ʻo Tonga, kā ko e ʻakau ʻomi mei muli, ʻa ia ko [[ʻAfelika tonga]].
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == ʻOku ʻi ai ha ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe nima: *S. alba pe S. augusta *S. caudata *S. nicolai *S. reginae pe S. parvifolia *S. juncea pea mo e ha ngaahi faʻahinga tuifio.
== Hingoa ʻi he ngaahi lea kehe ==
[[File:Pacific energy.svg|left|thumb|200px|Fakaʻilonga ʻo ''Pacific energy'']] == Meʻa kehe == Naʻe fili ʻae matalaʻiʻakau ʻe he pausa Tonga, ko "Pacific", ʻo hoko hono fakaʻilonga.
== Tataku ==
{{potuʻi}}

page.title: Lopeti Tāufa
page.category: lotu
kakai
page.text:
Ko Rev '''Lopeti Tāufa''' ko e Palesiteni ʻo e [[Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga]] mei he 1993—1998. Naʻa ne Puleako ʻi he Kōlisi ko Siaʻatoutai ʻi he 1980-1984 pea ne hoko foki ko e Talekita ʻo e Potungāue Ako Fakakalisitiane ʻi he 1984-1992. Naʻa ne ngāue ko e Sēkelitali Lahi 'o e Siasi mei he 1992-1993. Naʻa ne mali mo Mele Tonga Paane Simiki 'o ʻi ai ʻena fānau mo e fanga makapuna.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Tāufa, Lopeti}} [[Category:lotu]] [[Category:kakai]]

page.title: Sione Lepa Toʻa
page.text: Ko Rev '''Sione Lepa Toʻa''' ko e Tangataʻeiki Palesiteni ia ʻo e Siasi Uesiliana tauʻatāina ʻa Tonga mei he 1992—1993. Naʻa ne hoko ko e Sēkelitali Lahi ʻo e Siasi mei he 1980—1992 lolotonga ia ʻoku Palesiteni ʻa Faifekau Tōketā Huluholo Moʻungaloa mo Faifekau Tōketā [[Sione ʻAmanaki Havea]]. Naʻa ne hoko foki ko e Puleako mo e Tiuta Lahi ʻo e Kōlisi ko Sia'atoutai ʻi he ngaahi taʻu lahi. Naʻa ne mali mo ʻAnasēini Heimuli ʻo ʻi ai ʻena fānau mo e fanga makapuna. Naʻe pekia ʻa e Faifekau ni ʻi he 2007 ʻi hono taʻu 84.

page.title: Fehuluni
page.category: ʻotua
page.text:
Ko e ʻotua ʻo onoʻaho ia (ʻoku ui tēvolo ʻe he kau misa). Kapau ʻene hā ki ha tangata, ko Fehuluni ko e fefine hoihoifua ʻaupito. Kapau ʻene hā ki ha fefine, ko e talavou ia. Tangata pe fefine, ʻosi ʻa e fai, naʻe mate ʻa e maama. Kapau ʻoku vākai ʻa Fehuluni ki he maama, ʻoku lotohē ia. ʻOku lava vete ʻa Fehuluni hono ʻulu ʻi he helu ʻo e louʻulu.
Ko hono fale toputapu naʻe ʻi ai ʻi Tuʻanuku pe ʻĀhau pe Taleheu (ngaahi feituʻu ʻi [[Nomuka]]) pea mo [[Aʻa]], ka naʻe ʻilo foki ia ʻi Tonga kotoa. {{potuʻi}} *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 [[Category:ʻotua]]

page.title: Hikuleʻo
page.category: ʻotua
page.text:
Ko '''Hikuleʻo''' ko e ʻotua tukufakaholo ia (ʻoku ui tēvolo he taimi ni), ko e ʻotua lahi ʻo [[Pulotu]] ia, pea mo e ʻotua ki he [[:Category:Tuʻi Tonga|Tuʻi Tonga]]. Taimi lahi ko ha tangata ia, kā taimi ʻe niʻihi ko ha fefine.
Ko hono ngaahi fale toputapu: Falemeʻe, tuʻu ʻi Fanakava ʻi [[Haʻano]]; Taoa ʻi [[ʻUiha]]; *E.W. Gifford, Tongan Society, BPB museum bulletin 61, 1929 [[Category:ʻotua]]

page.title: ʻApi Foʻou
page.category: Akoʻanga ʻi Tongá ni
page.text:
Ko e4 '''ʻApi Foʻou''' ko e ako māʻolunga ʻo e [[siasi Katolika Loma]] ia, tuʻu ʻi [[Maʻufanga]]. Naʻa ne tanupou ʻi he taʻu 1865 `i he feituʻu ʻoku tuʻu ʻa e falelotu ʻo Maʻufanga he taimi ni, pea naʻe ui ko '''Sangato Stanselaus''', ko e ako ma`e tamasiʻi pē. Naʻe hiki ia ki hono feituʻu onopooni ʻi 1886, pea naʻe ui ko e ʻapi foʻou.
==Ni‘ihi ‘o e kau kolisi tutuku ‘iloa==

page.title: Makahokovalu (faʻitoka)
page.text:
Ko e '''MAKAHOKOVALU''' ko e ʻesi, pea ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he tuʻaliku fakatokelau 'o [[ʻUiha|'Uiha]]. ʻA ia ʻoku hanga ki he Liku Hangavale. ʻOku lahi e ngaahi talanoa ki he ʻuhinga mo e ngaahi tala ʻo e Makahokovalu, ka e sai pe ke u hili atu ai leva ʻe au ia ʻeku kiʻi fakamatala ni ke kamataʻaki!
Koe meʻa mahino taha ʻo e Makahokovalu, ko e anga hono ngaohi. ʻOku lauʻi maka ʻe valu 'a e ngaahi tafaʻaki kotoa ʻe fā, ʻa ia ko e lauʻi maka ʻe 32 fakakātoa ʻo e Makahokovalu.
ʻOku hanga pē ʻa e talanoa ki he tupuʻanga mo e hisitōlia ʻo e Makahokovalu ko ha toe mātanga ʻi Tonga ʻo ʻikai taha pe. He taumaiā ne hiki mo lekooti- ne fanongonongo tokoto pē.
ʻOku pehē ko Valu ne ne langa, ko e ʻesi ʻo hono ʻofefine ʻa ʻUngatea, he ne mali mai ia ki ʻUiha. Pea haʻu ai pe ʻa Valu ʻo muimui mai hono ʻofefine ki ʻUiha. Ne nofo ʻa Valu mei Uonuku ʻo fai mai ʻene tauhi. Ko Uonoku ko e ongo motu ia he fakatonga 'o ʻUiha mo Felemea (kau ai mo Tofonga he ko e motu 'e 3). Pea ne ne langa ai ʻa e ʻesi ko e ʻesi 'o hono ʻofefine- ko e Maka-hoko-e-valu. Ko e nofoʻanga ʻo Valu ʻi Uonoku ʻoku ui ko Faleovalu, pea ʻoku kei tuʻu pē taimi ni.

page.text:

page.title: Lōnuku
page.text: Ko e fo'i lea Tonga ko e "lonuku" 'oku tatau ia pea moe "fakataha". Sipinga:Tapu atu ki ha sola mo ha vulangi 'oku tau "lonuku" he kelekele ni.

page.title: Kihikihipālangi
page.text:
{{Puha fakafaʻahinga |name=Clover |faitā=Trifolium occidentale.jpg |faitālaulahi= 320px |regnum= [[ʻakau]] |divisio= [[ʻakau matala]] |classis= [[lautengaʻiua]] |ordo= [[fabales]] |familia= [[FABACEAE]] |genus=Trifolium |species= |fakamoʻoniʻanga= [[Carolus Linnaeus|L.]] |fehokotaki= c }} Ko e '''kihikihipālangi''' ko e fuʻu ʻakau siʻi ia, ʻoku kihi ia. ʻOku tupu ʻi he ngaahi fonua kotoa pē ʻo māmani, kā ʻoku tātātaha ʻi he Pasifiki. ʻOku ʻilo ʻi Nuʻusila, Viti, Hauaiʻi, mo e ngaahi feituʻu kehekehe ʻe niʻihi. ʻOku lahi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo e kihikihipālangi.
== Ngaahi faʻahinga kehekehe == *[[kihikihi]]; ko e ʻakau mei he fāmili ʻo e ''oxalidaceae'', ʻoku tupu ʻi Tonga ni. ʻOku meimei tatau ʻene ʻasi mo e kihikihipālangi. *sameloki; ko e ʻakau ʻe taha mei he kāinga ofi ʻo e kihikihipālangi (kā ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloa ko e fē), ko e fakaʻilonga fakafonua ʻo e [[ʻAealani]]. Ko e ngaahi lau ʻe tolu ko e fakatātā ki he tokotolu tapu.
==Meʻa makehe== Ko hono hingoa ʻi he leafakalātina ''trifolium'', ko e ʻuhinga ''lau ʻe tolu'' ia. Kā taimi ʻe niʻihi ke ke ʻilo ʻa e ʻakau ʻe taha mo hono lau ʻe fā (pe lahi ange!). Ko e fakaʻilonga ʻo e monūʻia.
== Tataku == *http://www.hear.org/pier/species/trifolium_repens.htm {{potuʻi}}

page.title: Kalaʻau/en
page.text:
The sign besides the rock tells the following story: Maui's stone throw This massive stone in Tongan legends recounts the story of demi-god Maui Kisikisi, who was angrily awoken by the crowing of his father's rooster that he tried to kill it. The frightened fowl escaped from ʻEua to Tongatapu but Maui Kisiksi kept hurling rocks at it, where by this boulder, which is the largest would be the one that slaughtered the rooster. Tsunami rock Researchers hypothesize that this large coral boulder, which is believed to be the largest tsunami rock in the world, was brought 100m inland from the surrounding reefs by a massive tsunami that hit Tonga approximately thousands of years ago.
{{Foki||Kalaʻau}}
